Na ka ɔnana ɔmmɔ uuubo lɛla lɛni na ɔkana kayu kammɔ bɔƒɔ ɔsu ni, ɔga ɔmmɔ údie lɛdi ɔnii beti anwu ku ulekudi ku nwuna bebi ku ala ani ƒui na ubo beye na baƒɔ kayu kammɔ.
"Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ ɔga ɔmmɔ akɔnkɔ kalɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnini, 'Kɛku-mi kayi na ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kana ƒui!'
Ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ lɛ́kywi ɔga ɔmmɔ kaƒɔ, anwuɔsu úti kayu kammɔ ƒui ɔ́kyiɛ-nwu na ɔ́nyonu-nwu na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
"Amu ka ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ ni, útánu nwuna ɔblane ɔkpana ɔni nda-nwu abuli atɛ lɛyuƒɔla. Amu na úƒie-nwu na ɔ́da-nwu limɔ ɔ́mana momoomo na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ƒɔ-mi kayu kani na ada-mi!'
"Na nwuna ɔkpana ɔmmɔ úvele-nwu ɔnini, 'Kɛku-mi kayi na ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kana ƒui!'
"Nsu úbulo na ɔ́ya na bákya-nwu ɔtɔ watálɛ uwi ɔni na wakana kayu kammɔ ƒui bɔƒɔ.
Na ka nwuna kabla bablane bakpana bánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ ni, kasusu kékpoku-ma na bésie bátásu ɔga ɔmmɔ ala ani ƒui nébo.
"Anwuɔsu ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́tala na bátálɔ kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ béboku na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ukyuli ukpidi na adi. Ka évele-mi anii nti nkyiɛ-ɔ ni, líti lɛla lɛdi biala lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.
Lɛni kani na ɔdi ka awɔ lɛnɔ anu ƒula ɔkpana kɔnyana aani kalɛ na lɛ́nu-ɔ kɔnyana.'
Na ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ kɔnyi geen na úti-nwu úte ɔnii bakya-nwu ɔtɔ na bani-nwu kɔtu utédu uwi ɔni na waƒɔ kayu kammɔ ƒui."
Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ kɔtɛ kɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Lɛni kani na mina Ɔti ɔni nkya katɔ ɔdubɔbla bina akɔ ɔdi biala si biléti taakyiɛ bina baƒɔtaadine bakpana ɔ́si bina kayi kemo ƒui."
Ka Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ Galilea na úsie Yudea kalɛkɛ na Yordan ketu ɔvi.
Na bekyuli pii badi básiaku-nwu kama na ɔ́bwi-ma lɛlɛ na mmɔ.
Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bésie-nwu kudɔ banii bétéwi-nwu kenye benu. Na béye-nwu banini, "Mose ɔda bubo úte kuƒi ka ɔnana ɔsia kasusu biala lɛlɔ na ɔnyonu ulekudi?"
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bítaka na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka kalɔ kesekɔ ni, Katɔti údie ɔnana ku uleku?
Na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔnana ɔdubɔda ɔti ku uni use na uti lɛlɔ utámana ulekudi na bana inyɔ babla ɔlɔna unwi.'
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, basɔ baaadi nkyuli inyɔ. Mmomu bénwini ukyuli unwi. Anwuɔsu útalɛka ukyuli ugyingya lɛla lɛni na Katɔti úti ɔ́sala."
Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ básu-nwu banii, "Amu na bi ɔsu na Mose úte kuƒi ɔnii ɔnana ute ulekudi ɔku ka ɔnyonu-nwu na udie-nwu ulu?"
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Mose úte-mii kuƒi ɔnii bɛnyonu bina beleku na bina atu ɔkplu ɔsu. Nsu ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ni, na uuuse lɛni.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii si ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́nyonu ulekudi na ɔɔɔdi kɔsɔnɔ na ɔ́di asa na útéti uleku ɔbambadi ni, ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ."
Amu na Yesu batɛyane básu-nwu banini, "Si lɛni na kɔgya ku kule litemi lise ni, si ɔnana úteti uleku muedi ni, na ɔdia utulo."
Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli biala ndubɔkana na ɔbla ala ani na bɛɛsu mɛni, amu ntu bekyuli bani na Katɔti úte-ma kani.

Ɔsika lɛla lɛni ɔsu na banana beléti beleku lɛdanku kasusu lidu lidu. Badi ni, lɛni na báwɔ-ma. Na badi ama ni, bekyuli nábla-ma lɛni. Na badi lɛnɔ ni, beléti beleku ɔsika baawia ka belie ngba bataabla Katɔti lɛga bɔdi kabla ɔsu. Si bɛɛkana ni, bitaabla lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su mɛni."
Bekyuli badi béti banamu béboku Yesu kudɔ banii uti enu ɔsia-ma lɛlɔ na ɔkpali katɔ ute-ma. Nsu ni, nwuna batɛyane bádɔnku bekyuli bammɔ.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su batɛyane bammɔ ɔnini, "Bɛya na banamu bammɔ bebo-mi kudɔ na bitetile-ma kuƒi. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kese kete bekyuli bani néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ aani banamu bamɛni udu kalɛ."
Yesu úti nwuna enu ɔ́sia-ma lɛlɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ úte-ma. Nwuna kama ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Na uwi bamba kemo ni, okloƒu ɔdi úbo Yesu kudɔ na úye-nwu ɔnini, "Ɔtinane, bi ndia na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na Katɔti ute-mi ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?"

Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Lɛla lɛni ndia na ɔlɛka babla lɛlɔ litemi na eeye-mi? Katɔti lɛti pɛ ndia. Na si aayɔ́ anii Katɔti ute-ɔ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii ni, di nwuna ɔda bubo ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ."
Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmmɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, "Ɔda bubo bɔmani?" Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Tadu ukyuli, tadi kɔsɔnɔ, teyu, tada ƒula ukyulikpana kenye,
bu ƒula ɔti ku ƒula uni, na ayɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ."
Amu na okloƒu ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, "Lɛ́ɛdi ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ. Bi lɛnɔ násɔ ébu na lɛbla?"

Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Si aayɔ́ anii aabla sɛɛn awɔlɔ ƒui ni, sie na etéti ala ani ƒui na ébo eye. Na eti egulabi ammɔ ete bawabane, na adubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla na katɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama asa na ebo abasiaku-mi kama."
Nsu ka okloƒu ɔmmɔ únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ebiti átada-nwu na ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ, ɔsika ubo egulabi pii.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii ɔdubɔyu balakɛne ɔkplu asa na beduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ.
Nsɔ mɔɔsia kama lɛsu-mii nnii úse ubo ɔlakɛne ɔkplu geen asa na wakana na weduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ utulo kalɛ na ebuo ɔni nébomo utulo ƒui ɔvi udila liƒi."
Uwi ɔni na batɛyane bammɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Anwuɔsu béye banii, "Amu si use lɛni ni, ɔma ndubɔkana na ɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?"
Amu na Yesu ɔ́nu-ma anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔyawine biala ulakana ɔmɛni bɔbla. Nsu Katɔti anwu ni, ɔɔkana lɛla biala bɔbla."
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Nu! Bɔ́da lɛla lɛdi biala búse na bɔsiaku-ɔ kama. Bi na bɔdubo bɔkɛ?"

Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Amii bɛkɛ kayi. Uwi ɔni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi mebo na mina lɛlɔyɔ kemo na nlie mina lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na kayawi kawɔdi kammɔ kemo ni, bina leevu-inyɔ bani nsiaku-mi lɛnɔ bɛdubulie agaboku lɛlɔ na bɛdi Israelƒuɔ adukpa leevu-inyɔ lɛlɔ.

Na ukyuli biala ɔni néni nwuna kaduli iye banwani bananabi iye banwani belekubi iye uni iye bebi iye imo ka ɔsiaku-mi ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ-nya akpa eti anyɔ utulo. Na Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Nsu ni, bekyuli pii bani ntɔ ɔƒɛni ni, badubɔvi bakpɛ kama. Na bani nkpɛ kama ɔƒɛni ni, badubɔvi batɔ."
"Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni kalɛ. Uwi ɔdi ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ta ɔtanta tutuutu ɔnii utáwia bekyuli badi na batuma nwuna kemo bete-nwu na limeyi lɛyuƒɔla kenye.
Kemo ɔlati ku kabla bablane bénu lɛlɔ kalɔ ka badubɔƒɔ limeyi lɛyuƒɔla, na bátɔlɔ bésie-nwu kemo.
"Uwi ɔni na úbo lɛdɔ yaalenwi ni, ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya na útánu banana badi ka benye ukpludi.
Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Amii lɛnɔ biteesie mina kemo bitátuma na ndubɔƒɔ-mii kayu kani námanku bina kabla kammɔ.'
Anwuɔsu bésie kemo kammɔ. "Na ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya mmɔ útábla lɛni kani lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ ku lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
Uwi ɔni na lɛdɔ ɛlɔ líbo ni, ɔ́sɔ úsie kuyeya mmɔ na útánu banana babambadi ka bénye mmɔ. Na úye-ma ɔnini, 'Bi nébo ɔsu na amii bilie mɛni ɔmwi limeyi limodi na bítabla kabla kadi?'
"Bédie kenye banii, 'Ukyuli ɔdi útete-bu kabla kadi ɔnii bɔbla.' "Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Amu biteesie mina kemo.'
"Amu uwi ɔni na lɛdɔ ɛku líbo ni, kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́su batumane bammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔnini, 'Lɔ batumane bammɔ ƒui na aƒɔ-ma kayu. Na ese kalɔ asi bekyuli bekplodi lɛlɔ atálɛ bedeedi lɛlɔ.'
"Amu na báƒɔ limeyi lɛyuƒɔla kayu béte bekyuli bani nébo useyi lɛdɔ ɛlɔ kemo.
Na uwi ɔni na údu bani néesie ɔtanta lɛdɔ ɛku lɛlɔ ni, básusu banii ama badubɔkɛ betulo bana bakpana. Nsu ama lɛnɔ ɔdi biala ɔ́kɛ limeyi kenye lɛyuƒɔla.
Na ka báƒɔ egulabi ammɔ ni, bése kalɔ baadɔnku kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ banii,
'Bekyuli bani nábla kabla ɔdɔ unwi ku abu bani nénye ɔƒɛ lɛlɔ limeyi limodi ƒui bɔ́ƒɔ lɛyuƒɔla linwi!'
"Amu na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Bakpana, binu kalɔ. Ńtaƒiɔ-mii. Ami ku-mii ƒui búnu kalɔ bɔnii limeyi kenye kayu ndi bina lɛyuƒɔla.
Anwuɔsu bɛƒɔ bina lɛyuƒɔla na biteesie kaduli. Mɔɔyɔ́ ka lite bekyuli bekplodi bamɛni lɛyuƒɔla lɛni kani na líte-mii.
Mbo kuƒi na lɛblaku mina egulabi kalɛ na mɔɔyɔ́. Anwuɔsu ɔƒɛ utada-mii na mina lɛƒɔndia lɛlɔ.' "
Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ɔnini, "Lɛni geen na bekyuli bani ntɔ badubɔvi bakpɛ kama, na bani nkpɛ kama bavi batɔ."
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákɔ bésela Yerusalem ni, úti-ma úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Binu, búsela Yerusalem kesii kani na badubuti ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bakya bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane enu kemo. Na badubɔdu-mi kukpi kɔtɔ.
Na ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ badubuti-mi babla lɛmala, na bebo-mi, na bakana-mi bamana ugyii lɛlɔ na likpi. Nsu emeyi atɛ kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔlɛku bekpine akɔ."
Amu na Sebedeo ulekudi útiku nwuna bebi inyɔ úsienku Yesu kudɔ ɔnii útevele-nwu kebunku.

Na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na aawia?" Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, "Mɔɔwia ka ese-mi kayi na si éduo ƒula lɛga kadikɔ na ete kuƒi na mina bebi bananabi inyɔ bamɛni belie ƒula kɔdianu kakɛ ku ƒula kɔmii kakɛ."
Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni geen na biiye. Lɛbibo lɛni ndubo buti ni, amii lɛnɔ bɛdubɔkana-nya buti?" Amu na bedie kenye banii, "Ɛɛn, bɔdubɔkana."
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka bɛdubɔkana-nya buti. Nsu liiibo kuƒi ka lidie ukyuli ɔdi nnii ulie-mi kɔdianu ku kɔmii. Kuliekɔ kɔmɛni kuse kute bekyuli bani na mina ɔti ɔ́klibi-ku úse."
Amu uwi ɔni na batɛyane leevu bakladi bénu ka banwani bammɔ baayɔ́ ka badi-ma lɛlɔ ni, béti kɔnyi geen!
Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma ɔ́sala na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛgyi ka lɛlɔ badine bani mɔɔdi bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ bátadi lɛlɔ ni, bebo ɔyikun biala na bana lɛlɔ.
Nsu ɔɔɔdi lɛni na ɔlɛka use na amii baƒɔtaadine akɔ. Si bina akɔ ɔdi ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔƒɔ lɛnyi ku ɔbu ni, ɔlɛka unwini kabla ɔblane ute bakladi.
Na si bina akɔ ɔdi ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔbla udeedi ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla lɛlɔ aani ukyuli uyedi ute bakladi ƒui.
Lɛni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛ́bla. Ńtebo nnii babla mina kabla. Mmomu líbo mbabla kabla na liti mina ngba lɛƒɔ bekyuli pii lili kayu."
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bátɔlɔ Yeriko ni, bekyuli pii badi basiaku-ma.
Na banumbwɛne inyɔ badi belie ulu kudɔ na bénu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔɔví. Amu na bése kalɔ baava banii, "Blɔti, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-bu kɔnyana!"
Bekyuli bammɔ básu banumbwɛne bammɔ banii baba lɛsɛ. Nsu ni, báva momoomo bébu banii, "Blɔti, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-bu kɔnyana!"
Yesu údi únye na ɔ́lɔ-ma úboku na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na bɛɛwia bɛnii mbla nte-mii?"
Amu na bédie kenye banini, "Ati, bɔɔyɔ́ ka aya na butaanu."
Amu na Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kɔnyana na útuku bana anumi. Na kɔnakunwi ni, bákana na baanu, na básiaku-nwu kama.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bákpɛ béde Yerusalem na bétédu Betƒage na Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ na batɔ anumi.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biteesie lɛkpaklɔ lɛni ntɛ-mii lɛtɔtɔ mmɔ kemo. Mmɔ ni, bɛdubɔnu ebuo utine ɔni na bákya-nwu kabuli na ubidi unye-nwu kudɔ. Bidie-nwu kabuli na biti-ma biboku-mi.
Na si ukyuli ɔdi úye-mii lɛla lɛdi ni, bɛsu-nwu bɛnii, 'Blɔti mɔɔwia-ma.' Na badubɔnyonu-ma bete-mii kɔnakunwi."
Ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ lɛni aani kalɛ na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi ɔ́su úse ɔnii,
"Bɛsu Sion bekyuli bɛnii, 'Bɛnu! Bina ɔga ɔdubo-mii kudɔ. Úboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na ulie ebuo ala utine ubi lɛlɔ ɔdubo.' "
Anwuɔsu batɛyane inyɔ bammɔ bésie na bátábla aani kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii batábla.
Na béti ebuo utine ɔmmɔ ku ubi béboku, na béti bana adi béwi-ma lɛlɔ, na Yesu ɔ́kɔ úlie ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Na bekyuli bammɔ beete yiidu na béti bana adi béwi ulu lɛlɔ. Na badi lɛnɔ békulo kuke béwi ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Amu na bekyuli bani ntɔ ku bani nkpɛ ƒui bése kalɔ baava taasu banii, "Yiidu! Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ ɔmmɔ ɔ́si ɔdubo o-o! Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo! Hosiana!"
Uwi ɔni na Yesu úduo Yerusalem ni, nwuna lɛlɔ litemi lɛ́ƒɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ ƒui. Na bekyuli béye lɛlɔ banii, "Ɔma na ɔdi?"
Na bekyuli bamba bédie kenye banini, "Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ!"

Yesu úsie útéduo Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔ́gya bekyuli bani nkya mɔɔdi kuye na mmɔ ɔ́lɛku kaduli kammɔ kemo. Údi kasiakɔ kani lɛlɔ na bekyuli bani mɔɔvumana kɔlɔ bamba egulabi teete bekyuli mmɔ úbo. Na údi bani muuyé babloduma lɛnɔ eboku úbo.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Badubɔlɔ mina kaduli banii kesii kani na badubɔkpali katɔ.' Nsu amii bíti-ka bínwini beyune kabɛkɔ!"
Amu na badi béti banumbwɛne ku bani naaakana busie kaduɛ béboku kakpakɔ kaduli mmɔ, na Yesu ɔ́bwi-ma.
Na ka bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bánu akɔla ani na Yesu ɔdaku bɔbla ku banamu bani mɔɔva taasu banii, "Bimwi Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ" mmɔ ni, béti kɔnyi geen.

Anwuɔsu béye Yesu banii, "Eenú lɛla lɛni na banamu bammɔ baasu mɛni?" Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Muunú. Na ngyi lɛnɔ ka bɛ́ka ɔmɛni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka ni, 'Ábla banamu ku bebiwɔ anii beti bumwi bɔni náƒɔ kuye geen bete-ɔ.' "
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bammɔ kudɔ na úsie útéduo Betania útátɛ.
Na kadi kégye ɔtanta ɔni na ɔ́sɔ únwini ɔdubo ni, kɔka kubo kɔɔda-nwu.

Na ka ɔ́nu kɔdingyii kɔdi na ulu kudɔ mmɔ ni, údeyi úsie mmɔ. Nsu útanu lɛla lɛdi útetulo kuna evete. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su kugyii kɔmmɔ ɔnini, "Asɔ alanwu ebi adi kudii lɛnɔ." Kɔnakunwi ni, kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kúse kalɔ kɔɔyɛyɛ.
Ka batɛyane bammɔ bánu lɛni ni, kasusu kéƒu-ma. Na béye banini, "Bi náya na kɔdingyii kɔmɛni kúkpi kɔnakunwi lɛni?"

Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii si bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di na bina kasusu keeese inyɔ inyɔ ni, bɛdubɔkana lɛla lɛni na lɛ́bla kɔdingyii kɔmɛni bɔbla. Nsu ɔɔɔdi ɔmɛni lɛti. Mmomu ni, bɛdubɔkana na bɛsu kɔbi kɔmɛni muedi bɛnii, 'Gyu mɛni téduo ɛpu kemo,' na ɔdubɔlɛ lɛni.
Na lɛla biala lɛni na bɛdubuye Katɔti na bɔƒɔtaadi kemo ni, bɛdubɔkɛ-ni."

Amu na Yesu únwini úbo Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ka ɔɔtina ala ni, Katɔti bakpane benengu ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bébeye-nwu banii, "Kenyekɔ kamani na ebo asa na aabla ala amɛni udu? Na ɔma néte-ɔ kenyekɔ kammɔ?"
Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛya na liye-mii lɛla lɛdi linu. Na si bídie kenye kaduɛ ni, asa masu-mii kenyekɔ kani na mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni.

Wɛ na Yohane ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kani na ubo asa na ɔ́kpila bekyuli ntu ɔ́siku? Katɔti kudɔ na kási munuu ukyuli kudɔ na kási?" Amu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ teenu banii, "Bi na ɔlɛka bɔsu? Si bɔ́su bɔnii kási Katɔti kudɔ ni, ɔdubuye-bu ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na bítaƒɔ Yohane bítadi?'
Nsu si bɔ́su bɔnii ukyuli kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ-ka ɔ́siku ni, bɔɔyia ka bekyuli badubɔbla-bu lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika bana ƒui báƒɔ bádi banii Katɔti kenye udiene na ɔdi."

Anwuɔsu na bédie kenye banini, "Bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku." Mmɔ na Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdubo-mii bɔsu kenyekɔ kani mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni udu."
"Dɛ na bɛɛkali taasiku litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ? Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya na ubo bebi bananabi inyɔ. Ɔ́su unengudi ɔnini, 'Ubi, teesie tátuma na mina kemo ɔmwi.'
"Amu na ubi ɔmmɔ údie ɔti ɔda ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛdubo busie.' Nsu kama ni, ɔ́vumana kasusu na úsie.
"Amu na ɔti úsie útásu ubidi unyɔdi lɛnɔ lɛni kani. Na anwu ɔ́tuna, nsu útesie.
"Bana kemo ɔmani nábla ɔti ɔmmɔ lɛyɔla?" Bédie kenye banii, "Ubi unengudi ɔmmɔ." Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa nnii beyune ku bayalɛ baaví-mii teeduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma!

Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo úbatina-mii ulu buni ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛsia, nsu bítaƒɔ-nwu bítadi. Nsu beyune ku bayalɛ ama báƒɔ bádi. Na ina ka bɛ́nu ɔmɛni muedi ni, bítavumana bina kasusu na bɛƒɔ-nwu bɛdi.

"Binu lɛgba lɛbambadi lɛdi. Ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya dii ɔni mbo adingyii kemo kani na ɔ́tu awodu ɔ́mana. Ɔ́bla ntɛ kebulokɔ na ɔ́tu ɔgyumanane keliekɔ. Amu na úti kemo kamɛni úte bekyuli badi ɔnii bataanu-ka lɛlɔ, na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ulu.
Uwi ɔni na egyiibi ammɔ édu bude ni, kemo ɔlati ɔmɛni ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batáƒɔ nwuna kadikɔ beboku-nwu.
"Kemo lɛlɔ banune bamɛni béƒie kabla bablane bamɛni na bébo unwi na bádu unwi, na bébo unwi lɛnɔ atabi bádu.
Amu na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tala kabla bablane babambadi bani mmomo ntulo bedeedi. Na bábla ama lɛnɔ aani kalɛ na bábla bedeedi bammɔ.
Kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́tala ubidi ɔlati ɔ́kya-ma. Na ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka badubɔbu mina ubidi anwu.'
"Nsu uwi ɔni na lɛlɔ banune bamɛni bánu ubidi ɔmɛni ni, básu lɛlɔ banini, 'Aanu kemo ɔlati ubidi ɔni ndi nwuna ala ɔdine. Bɛya na bɔdu-nwu na buƒie nwuna ala bɔƒɔ.'
Anwuɔsu béƒie-nwu na bebo balɛku kemo kammɔ kemo, na bádu-nwu."
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔƒɛni ni, bi na bɛɛbu ka kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔdubo kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bɔbla si ɔ́si úbo?"
Bédie kenye banini, "Ɔdubɔdu bekyuli bekpidi bammɔ ulikplu kemo na uti kemo kammɔ ute lɛlɔ banune babambadi bani ndubuti edula beboku-nwu si údu edula ɔƒɛwi."

Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bínu na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka ni, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na batune béni báva banii lɛɛɛdia ni, ani mmomu nébenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye litulo na atabi ƒui akɔ. Katɔti nábla lɛla bonwu lɛmɛni. Na lɛ́ƒɔ-bu anu geen!' "
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ nwuna lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ na bina kudɔ bileduo-ka! Na ɔdubuti ute bekyuli bamba bani ndubɔbla nwuna lɛyɔla.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni mebuli mayu lɛtabi lɛni béni báva mmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔdu lɛlɔ. Na si lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛnɔ lɛ́lɛ líbo ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, lɛdubutu-nwu lɛbwɛ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ."
Na ka bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu Yesu agba amɛni ni, báti ka ama na ɔda.
Anwuɔsu báwia ka beƒie-nwu. Nsu baayia bekyuli pii bammɔ, ɔsika bana ƒui baabu Yesu aani Katɔti kenye udiene.
Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli ala na agba kemo ɔnii,
"Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni. Uwi ɔdi ni, ɔga ɔdi ɔ́di uleku buti limeyi lɛdi úte ubidi.
Ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batásu bekyuli bani na ɔ́lɔ ɔnii bebo limeyi kadikɔ mmɔ na bebo. Nsu béni na banii belebo.

"Anwuɔsu ɔ́tala kabla bablane babambadi ɔnii batásu bekyuli bammɔ banii, 'Limeyi lɛni bɔdubo bɔdi lídu! Bɔ́ɔdu bebuo bani ƒui na bɔdubuti bútaanu-mii kama. Na báaklibi lɛla biala bése. Anwuɔsu biteebo uleku ketikɔ!'
"Nsu bana ɔdi biala útabu nwuna bɔlɔ bɔmmɔ. Mmomu bátɔlɔ bésie kesii kani na ɔdi biala ɔɔyɔ́. Ɔdi ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie nwuna kemo. Na ɔdi lɛnɔ úsie kuye kadikɔ.
Na babambadi lɛnɔ béƒie kabla bablane bammɔ na bébo-ma na bádu-ma.
Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ kɔnyi geen, na ɔ́tala nwuna bekpone na bátádu bekyuli badune bammɔ ƒui na bákyula bana ɔma.
"Amu na ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Mina ubi uleku buti limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi uwi údu. Nsu bekyuli bani na lɛ́lɔ liboku limeyi lɛmmɔ kadikɔ ni, bátamanku bétete limeyi lɛmmɔ.
Anwuɔsu biteesie kuye ekpo ekpo ƒui na bitálɔ bekyuli bani na bɛdubɔnu ƒui bɛnii bebo limeyi kadikɔ mɛni.'
Amu na kabla bablane bammɔ bésie kuye ekpo ekpo ƒui bátálɔ ukyuli biala na bánu béboku. Bekyuli bekpidi ku babuni ƒui béyi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ.
"Na ka ɔga ɔmmɔ úduo úsie utánu bekyuli bani nlie kadikɔ mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔni naaakya uleku ketikɔ limeyi bɔdi awu.
Na ɔga ɔmmɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, 'Ɔkpana, dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ébo mɛni na aaakya uleku ketikɔ limeyi bɔdi awu?' Nsu útakana kenye budie.
"Amu na ɔ́su nwuna bagyumanane mmɔ ɔnini, 'Bibo kɔgba bɛda-nwu enu ku lɛgba, na bibo-nwu bɛlɛku bitákya kasuudikɔ. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya.' "
Na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, "Katɔti ɔɔlɔ bekyuli pii ka baƒɔ-nwu badi, nsu ɛlɛɛ kani na ɔ́ƒuna údie-ma akɔ."
Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bátása na bábla kasusu banii betéwi Yesu kenye benu na bawia-nwu litemi.

Anwuɔsu bátala bana batɛyane badi ku bekyuli bani nsiaku Herode kama bákya Yesu. Na ka bésie ni, básu-nwu banini, "Ala ɔtinane, bɔgyi ka ese siin na aatina Katɔti bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ geen, ɔsika alánu ukyuli anumi taabla lɛla lɛdi. Na alákpete bekyuli asula lɛnɔ.
Anwuɔsu, su-bu ƒula kasusu. Bula ɔda bubo buute kuƒi ka butaaƒɔ kuyi teete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi munuu útalɛka butaaƒɔ?"
Nsu Yesu ɔ́ɔnu bana lɛkwɛ likpidi ɔ́ti ɔsu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Amii anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli! Bi ɔsu na bɛwia-mi litemi?
Bɛtina-mi kaplɛ kani na biiti taaƒɔ kuyi kɔmmɔ na bɔnu." Amu na béti ɔdi béboku-nwu.
Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔma na báta básia mɛni, na ɔma lɛnyi nsia mɛni?"
Amu na bédie kenye banini, "Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare na ɔdi." Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti lɛla lɛni ndi Kaesare lɛdi bite Kaesare. Na biti lɛla lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛdi bite Katɔti."
Ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, kasusu kéƒu-ma na bátɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ.
Na limeyi lɛmmɔ kani lɛlɔ ni, Sadukiƒuɔ bani mɔɔsu banii bekpine basɔ baláta bébo Yesu kudɔ.

Na bébeye-nwu banini, "Ala ɔtinane, Mose ɔ́su-bu ɔnii si ɔnana ɔdi úkpi na ɔ́da ulekudi úse na beeebo bebi ni, na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnwani ɔnanabi uti ukpinele ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ku-nwu bawɔ bebi. Na beti bebi bammɔ babla aani ɔnana ɔni nsɔ neeebo mmɔ bebi.
Amu na uwi ɔdi ni, banwani bananabi maatɛ badi bákya mɛni. Ɔnanabi unengudi úti uleku, na bátawɔ asa na ɔnanabi ɔmmɔ úkpi. Na nwuna ɔnwani ɔnanabi ɔni nsia-nwu kama úti ukpinele ɔmmɔ.
Na ɔnanabi unyɔdi ku ɔtɛdi útálɛ maatɛdi lɛlɔ ƒui béti uleku ɔmmɔ ɔni anwu ku bana kemo ɔdi bátawɔ asa na békpi.
Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, uleku ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úbekpi.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata ni, bana akɔ ɔmani ulekudi na uleku ɔmmɔ wenwini ka bana ƒui béti-nwu dii?"
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Bɛ́yii ulu ɔmmɔ geen! Ɔsika bilenu Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ kalɔ, na bɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti ɔyikun lɛlɔ.
Na si bekpine básɔ báta belie ngba ni, badubɔbla aani Katɔti batu na beleti beleku na belelie agya lɛnɔ.
Bítaka lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́su-mii ɔ́si kalɛ na bekyuli badubɔsɔ bata lɛlɔ? Katɔti ɔ́su ɔ́siku bina bati kuuku lɛlɔ ɔnini,
'Ami ndi Abraham Katɔti ku Isak Katɔti ku Yakob Katɔti!' Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka ama bani néekpi ni, bamua beli ngba. Anwuɔsu ɔdi ama lɛnɔ Katɔti."
Na ka bekyuli pii bammɔ bénu ala amɛni ni, bana kasusu kábla kalɛ kadi na ala ani na Yesu ɔ́tina ɔsu.
Uwi ɔni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ bénu ka Yesu ala kenye budie bɔ́ya na Sadukiƒuɔ bammɔ básɔ bátakana na beye lɛla lɛdi ni, bábasala.
Na bana kemo unwi ɔni ndi ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔ́wia ɔnii uuye Yesu litemi lɛdi na uti ɔkywɛ-nwu kakpagyuɛ. Ɔ́su ɔnini,
"Ala ɔtinane, ɔda bubo bɔmani ndi bunengudi ƒui na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ƒui akɔ?"
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔlɛka bɛyɔ Unwoti ɔni ndi bina Katɔti ku bina kayi ƒui ku bina kɔyu ƒui ku bina kasusu ƒui.
Na ɔmɛni ndi ɔda bubo bunengudi ƒui. Na ɔdi uuutulo ɔmɛni.
Na ɔni nsɔ nsia lɛnɔ use aani udeedi ɔmmɔ kalɛ. Yɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ.
Ɔda bubo inyɔ bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na Mose ɔda bubo ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala bɔtina ƒui bɔsia."
Ka Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bása lisu ni, Yesu úye-ma litemi lɛdi ɔnini,
"Bi na bɛɛkali taasiku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ? Na ɔma kaba kemo ubi na ɔdi?" Bédie kenye banii, "Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo ubi na ɔdi."
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, "Si use lɛni ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na Dawid ɔkɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ na ɔɔlɔ-nwu ɔnii Ɔti? Na Dawid ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔ́su ɔnini,
'Katɔti ɔ́su mina Ɔti ɔnini, "Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na maya na akɔliku ƒula lɛgba anya ƒula bekisine lɛlɔ." '
Na si Dawid ɔɔlɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔnii Ɔti ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla na ɔ́sɔ ɔdi Dawid ɔmmɔ kaba kemo ubi?"
Bana akɔ ɔdi útakana na udie Yesu litemi lɛmmɔ kenye. Na ɔ́si limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ɔ́sɔ útakana na use kayi uye Yesu litemi lɛbambadi lɛdi.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɛmiku bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ku nwuna batɛyane.
Ɔ́su ɔnini, "Ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ ama ni, benye Mose kenye na bebo kuƒi kɔni na bedie Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kalɔ.
Anwuɔsu ɔlɛka bɛbla lɛla biala na básu-mii kaduɛ. Nsu ni, bitasiaku ala ani na baabla kama, ɔsika baládi ala ani baasu mmɔ lɛlɔ.
Kalɛ na beedie ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, ubo bekyuli ɔkplu geen ka badi-mu lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na baatɛ etila ku unu taasia bekyuli lili. Na balayɔ ka bakyaku-ma kɔnu na akɔsi-ma bude.

"Baabla lɛla biala kalɛ na bekyuli banu-ma aani Katɔti kabla bablane geen. Bɛnu ala ani na bébo báda bana atɛntɛ ku enubɔ na Bunweni Kedee etemila asia-nya lɛlɔ, ku kalɛ na bákya-nya na ébomo. Na bɛnu kakpakɔ ala ani na báta bámana ala abuni lidu lɛni bákya mmɔ lɛlɔ.
Baayɔ́ kuliekɔ kɔbuni bulie na emeyi kadikɔ ku kuliekɔ kunengudi bulie na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ.
Baayɔ́ banii bekyuli beteebo kalɔ teegyele-ma na kuyeya na bataalɔ-ma banii Ala Ɔtinane.
"Na bɔƒɔtaadi ulu lɛlɔ ni, bitaya na bekyuli balɔ-mii Unwoti, ɔsika banwa na bɛdi bite lɛlɔ. Na Unwoti unwi pɛ kani na bibo.
Na bina akɔ ni, bitalɔ ukyuli ɔdi na kayawi mɛni bɛnii Blɔti, ɔsika Blɔti unwi pɛ na bibo. Na ɔkya katɔ.
Na bitalɔ ɔdi bɛnii Ɔtinane, ɔsika bina Ɔtinane unwi pɛ ɔni kani na bibo ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
Bina kemo ɔni mɔɔwia ɔnii ɔƒɔ lɛnyi ku ɔbu ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla aani kabla ɔblane.
Na ukyuli ɔni na ɔɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔyula-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔtalaku-nwu katɔ.

"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛ́kalɛ Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ulu bɛ́da bekyuli. Na amii alati biléduo, na biléte bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔkya ɔkplu lɛnɔ ulu na beduo.

Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Biisié bekpinele kudɔ ka bitébunku-ma, nsu bɛɛtɔ́lɔ-ma taaƒɔ-ma ala. Na bɛɛkpali katɔ gyɔlɔɔ taabu-ma kɔdɔlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bina kɔtu bɔni bɔdubɔkɔ katɔ bubu!

"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛkɛ kayawi ekpo ekpo ƒui biitú lɛlɔ kalɛ na bɛkɛ ina ɔƒɔtaadine unwi bite Katɔti. Na si bɛ́kɛ ɔdi ni, bɛɛtina-nwu kalɛ na ubie na uduo lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo utulo amii alati ƒui!

"Bɔbwɛ muute amii banumbwɛne ulu batinane bani anumi nábwɛ! Bɛɛtina bɛnii, 'Si ukyuli ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti kakpakɔ úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ liiibo ɔkplu. Nsu si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ sika ugyiedi ani nsia Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu geen.'
Banumbwɛne badɔlɔdi! Bi náƒɔ kuye útulo, sika ugyiedi ɔmmɔ munuu Katɔti kakpakɔ kani mɔɔyá na sika ugyiedi ɔmmɔ ɔɔbla kedee?

Bɛɛtina lɛnɔ bɛnii, 'Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti lɛkpabi úse kenye kadi ni, linyese lɛmmɔ liiibo ɔkplu. Nsu si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ ala ani na béti básia lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ úse kenye ni, linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu geen.'
Banumbwɛne geen na bɛdi! Bi náƒɔ kuye útulo, ala ani nsia lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ munuu lɛkpabi lɛni mɔɔyá na ala ammɔ aabla kedee?
Anwuɔsu ni, si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ lɛkpabi úse kenye ni, na linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ ku ala ani nsia-ni lɛlɔ ƒui.
Na si ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti kakpakɔ úse kenye ni, na linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku kakpakɔ kammɔ ku Katɔti ɔni keliekɔ ndi kakpakɔ kammɔ.
Na si ukyuli ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ katɔ úse kenye ni, nwuna linyese lɛmmɔ lɛdanku Katɔti lɛgaboku ku Katɔti ɔlati ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.

"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Biiti kevoma kutu akyala ƒɛƒɛɛ ani bɛ́bla muedi lɛkpa leevudi teete Katɔti, nsu bíni na biládi ɔda bubo bɔni náƒɔ kuye geen butulo lɛlɔ. Na muna lɛlɔ bɔdi ndi kalɛ na bilanu bekyuli anumi bilabla lɛla lɛdi. Na bɛnu bekyuli kɔnyana. Na bɛdi lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ bite bekyuli. Ala amɛni lɛnɔ na ɔlɛka bɛbla, na bitada ɔdi bitese.
Batɔnkune banumbwɛne bɛɛsia bina ɔdi anu na bɛɛtimi alɔlɔ blii suɛ na ntɛ anumi. Nsu bina ablala aatina ka biibweli kubweyi kɔni ntulo balɔlɔ bammɔ ƒui!
"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛɛƒɔ bina lɛɛƒɛɛ ku akyami kama na eekeye, nsu ana kemo eesé lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na bíyi ku ɔdivo ku ami lɛti lɛkɛ.
Awɔ Ƒarisini ɔnumbwɛne! Ka ƒula ɔɔƒɛɛ kemo bɔƒɔ, na nwuna kama lɛnɔ kadubukeye.

"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bise aani kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔni na bákwa-ku kama na kɔɔdia bɔnu. Nsu nwuna kemo ɔdi ukpine ɔni nébie na úbu ekubi ekubi.
Lɛni kani na bɛɛbla lɛlɔ aani bekyuli babuni na bekyuli anumi, nsu bíyi ku kenwini ku ekpidi lidu.
"Bɔbwɛ muute amii Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɛdi! Bɛɛtú kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔbuni teete Katɔti kenye bediene bani nélie siin, na bɛɛklibi-ku kaduɛ.
Na bɛɛsu ka, 'Si bula bati kuuku uwi na bulie ni, nka abu bulasiaku-ma kama na bɔdu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ.'
Nsu bina ala ani bɛɛbla mɔɔtina geen ka bekyuli bani nádu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ kaba bebi na bɛdi.
Anwuɔsu ni, bisie anumi na bɛwɔlɔ lɛla lɛni na bina bati kuuku bése kalɔ.
"Bekyuli bekpidi bɛdi! Bise aani balakpi ku bana bebi! Anwuɔsu ni, bɛɛɛdubo bɔkana na bikeli Katɔti kɔtu kɔni na ɔdubɔni-mii na lɛgyavonku kemo!

Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ndubɔtala Katɔti kenye bediene ku banundane ku Katɔti ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛkya-mii akɔ. Na ka biikisi-ma ɔsu ni, bɛdubɔkana badi bɔmana ugyii lɛlɔ na bekpi, na bibo badi kugyiimi na kasalakɔ, na bɛbɔku badi lɛnɔ bɛsiku ɔma unwi bisienku ɔma unyɔdi kemo.

Na bekyuli bani nse siin ubugya ɔni na bíwiakun ɔ́si Habel lɛlɔ útálɛ Barakia ubidi Sakaria ɔni na bina bati bádu-nwu na kakpakɔ ku lɛkpabi ntɛ mmɔ ni, ubugya ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsi bina kadi bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ.
Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ubugya buwiakun bɔmɛni bɔsia amii bani nlie ngba mɛni lɛlɔ.

"Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Awɔ muubó Katɔti kenye bediene ku bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-mii atabi taadu. Kɔlɛ kɔlɛ sɔɔn mɛni na líbimi mina enu nnii mɔɔsála-mii aani kalɛ na akɔkɔ uledi uuti nwuna avwi teebi nwuna bebi lɛlɔ, nsu étenu kalɔ!
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ɔma ɔmɛni atu na ɔyii udu.
Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ɔ́si ɔƒaani ni, bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdubo-mi bɔnu wetédu ka bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo!' "
Ka Yesu ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔɔtɔlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ na bakya baatina-nwu kakpakɔ lɛtɔ lɛmmɔ.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛsia-ni anumi kaduɛ. Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii nnii badubɔƒɛ lɛtɔ lɛmɛni ƒui, ɔni na lɛtabi lɛdi lilébu lilasia lɛkpanadi lɛlɔ muedi. Badubugyingya ana ƒui bewi kalɔ."

Uwi ɔni na Yesu úsie útélie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ na básu-nwu banii ɔtina-ma uwi ɔni na ala amɛni adubɔlɛ ku ala abambadi ani lɛnɔ ndubɔlɛ na watina ka kawɔlɔkɔ kani na ɔdubɔsɔ ubo uwi údu.
Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bise anu kaduɛ na ukyuli ɔdi ulátɔlɔ-mii.
Bekyuli pii badubuti mina lɛnyi bebo babasu-mii banini, 'Ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ' na batɔlɔ bekyuli pii.
Bɛdubunu kekpo ku kekpo etemila. Nsu bitaya na ɔtɔtɔ ɔgyu-mii. Ɔdi ka ala amɛni ƒui udu alɛ, nsu ulátina ka kawɔlɔkɔ kammɔ kéedu tɔ.
Kalɔ kadi bekyuli badubɔta na bekpoku babambadi. Na lɛga kadikɔ kadubukpoku kabambadi. Na kɔka kɔdububo na ekpo ekpo. Na kalɔ lɛnɔ kadubo butaakunku na ekpo ekpo.
Ala amɛni ndubuse kalɔ aani kalɛ na kawɔƒɔ keesé uleku kalɔ ku bɔdu.
"Bina bekisine badubɔya na beƒie-mii bete ɔma benengu na batɛku-mii litemi. Na bani-mii kɔtu na badu-mii. Kadi ƒui bekyuli badubukisi-mii, ɔsika bɛdi mina batɛyane.
Bekyuli bani náƒɔ-mi bádi pii badubunwini kama bakya-mi uwi ɔmmɔ kemo. Na badubɔkya bana bakpana kakya na beteekisi lɛlɔ.
Bekyuli pii badubɔta banyi ɔkɔ banii ama ndi Katɔti kenye bediene na batɔlɔ bekyuli pii.
Likpidi bɔbla lɛdubo bumomo na baƒɔtaadine pii basɔ baláyɔ lɛlɔ.
Na ukyuli ɔni ndubɔkya ɔkplu utálɛ kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba ƒui.
Na bekyuli badubɔkɔ Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi buni lɛmmɔ lɛsa na kayawi ƒui kalɛ na ukyuli biala ɔkɛ kuƒi unu-ni asa na kawɔlɔkɔ kammɔ kedu.

"Na bɛdubɔnu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti uukisi na liisé lɛlɔ ka unye nwuna likpo kedee kalɛ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Daniel únweni úse. Na amii bani mɔɔká ɔku ɔmmɔ ni, biduo-nwu kemo kaduɛ na binu-nwu kalɔ.
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, amii bani nkya Yudea ni, ɔdi ka bikeli bisie abi lɛlɔ.
Na ukyuli ɔni nnye nwuna lɛsa lili ni, utayu utebo kalɔ ɔnii ubedie nwuna ala na ɔtɔ kemo.
Na ukyuli ɔni nkya kemo ɔsɔ utenwini utesie kaduli ɔnii utéti nwuna kɔdi.
Na baƒɔndane ku bebi beni bani nda bebi bani mɔɔnyimi ni, bana lɛlɔ lɛdubɔbla kɔnyana geen.
Bivele Katɔti bɛnii bukeli bɔmɛni butebo na kɔyɔ uwi iye lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ.
Ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ ni, lɛbibo libendi lɛmɛni udu lítebo tɔ kudii. Na nina udu ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔsɔ ulebo kudii.
Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́ɔƒana emeyi ammɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔsɔ uuubo ngba. Nsu bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úse ɔsu na ɔdubɔƒana emeyi ammɔ.
Anwuɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Nu! Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔkya mɛni,' iye si badi básu banii, 'Ɔkya ngye' ni, bitaƒɔ-nwu bitadi.

Ɔsika bekyuli badubɔta banyi ɔkɔ banii ama ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ, na badi lɛnɔ basu banii Katɔti kenye bediene badi. Na badubɔbla akɔla budie bɔtina ebendi lidu lidu, kalɛ na si nka bakana ni, beti batɔlɔ bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úse muedi.
Binu! Mɔɔlɛ-mii lise asa na uwi ɔmmɔ udu.
"Si bekyuli básu-mii banii, 'Ɔkya ketele kemo' ni, bitesie bitatánu. Na si básu-mii banii, 'Ɔkya ɔtɔ mɛni' ni, bitaƒɔ bitadi.
Ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubudie mina lɛlɔ keyi aani kalɛ na ɔnantu ɔdubo bɔna ɔɔbwɛ bukeye taasi kayaa na ɔƒɛ katukɔ taatálɛ kanukɔ.
Anwuɔsu bitayiƒla ka kesii kani na lɛla lɛdi likpi lɛtɛ ni, mmɔ na begbini baasa.
"Na lɛbibo emeyi ammɔ kama ni, ɔƒɛ ɔdubɔbla suu, na kɔbuli kɔsɔ kulekeye lɛnɔ, na ayabi adubɔnu asi katɔ, na kayaa ɔyikun ƒui ɔdubɔkunku.

"Ala adi adubɔlɛ na kayaa ani mɔɔtina ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubo. Na kayawi bekyuli ƒui badubuwulo na bana ekpidi ɔsu uwi ɔni na badubɔnu ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔkɛ uyɔlɔ kemo ɔ́yu ɔ́si kayaa ɔdubo na bukeye bonwu ku ɔyikun kemo.
Badubɔvwii kakpɛɛ. Na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubɔtala nwuna batu na basi katɔ betédie bekyuli baƒunadi ƒui basiku kayawi kesii biala.
"Bɛtɛya lɛla lɛdi bɛsiku kɔdingyii lɛlɔ. Si uwi ɔni na bɛnu ka kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kɔgba kúmo ntu na kuse kalɔ kuudie evete awɔdi ni, na ɔɔtina ka ketudi údu.
Lɛni kani na si bɛnu ala amɛni ƒui ni, bɛti ka uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ubo úude, na unye kayakun.
Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ala amɛni ƒui adubɔlɛ asa na bina akɔ badi na mɛni bɛdubɔsa bukpi.
Katɔ ku kalɔ kadubɔvi, nsu mina etemila anya aaadubo bɔvi kudii.
"Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔɔgyi limeyi iye uwi ɔni kemo na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, nsɔ ndubo. Katɔti batu baaagyi, na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛgyi. Ati lɛti kani ngyi.
Ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ndubo buse aani kalɛ na ɔ́lɛ na Noa uwi.
Uwi ɔmmɔ asa na ɔnantu wana waƒɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ni, bekyuli bákya bátaadi taani. Na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ útálɛ limeyi lɛni na Noa útéduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo.
Nsu bátati lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ úti útédu uwi ɔni na ɔnantu ɔ́na ɔ́gbala-ma ƒui. Lɛni kani na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bubo lɛnɔ bɔdubɔbla.
Na banana inyɔ badubunye kemo na, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ unwi na ɔda unwi use.
Na beleku inyɔ badubɔkya ɔlaaƒɔ kakɔkɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ unwi na ɔda unwi use.
"Anwuɔsu bilie kagyumana, ɔsika bɛɛɛgyi limeyi lɛni na bina Unwoti ɔdububo.
Si kaduli ɔlati ɔgyi uwi ɔni na uyune ɔdububo ni, nka ɔdubulie kagyumana. Na uláya na uyune ɔmmɔ wabwɛ weduo-nwu ɔtɔ kemo.
Lɛni kani na ɔlɛka amii lɛnɔ bilie kagyumana, ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo mbeyu-mii lɛtu.
"Kabla Ɔblane ɔni náda anu na ɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu na nwuna unwoti uuti teenye kabla bablane bakladi kenye. Na uunye-ma kenye teete-ma adila na uwi ɔbuni kemo.
Kubiti geen ndubo kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ si nwuna unwoti ɔ́si úbo úbanu ka ɔɔbla lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su.
Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka unwoti ɔmɛni ɔdubuti kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔbla nwuna ala ƒui lɛlɔ ɔnune.
Nsu si ɔdi kabla ɔblane ukpidi ni, ɔdubɔsu na nwuna kayi kemo ɔnini, 'Mina unwoti ɔdubutu uwi geen!'
Anwuɔsu ɔdubuse kalɔ uteebo nwuna kabla ɔblane bakpana bammɔ. Na anwu ku ntɛ bekpine bataadi na bataani.
Na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdububo uwi ɔni na kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni ulásia-nwu anu ku uwi ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔɔɔgyi uuuse.
Na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔni kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ kɔtu geen. Na nwuna kɔtu bɔni kɔdubɔyu ɔkplu aani anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli bɔdi kalɛ! Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya!"
"Na uwi ɔni na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo ni, Katɔti lɛga bɔdi buse aani ɔmɛni. Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, belekubi leevu badi béti bana lɛsogya banii batákpanku uleku ɔgya ku ulekudi besienku kaduli.
Bana kemo ɛlɔ badi badɔlɔdi, na ɛlɔ bakladi lɛnɔ badi banundane.
Badɔlɔdi bammɔ béti bana lɛsogya, nsu béteti inɔmii bɔdi bétebunku-ni.
Na banundane bammɔ ama béti inɔmii bébunku bana lɛsogya báda.
Ka uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpɛ kama ku bubo ɔsu ni, lɛlɛɛ líbo lɛɛda begblebi bammɔ na bálɛɛ.
"Ɔbla usientɛ asa bénu kɔvanu ka ni, 'Bɛɛnu uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ o-o! Bɛta bɛlɛ bibo na butásiaku-nwu!'
"Amu na begblebi leevu bammɔ báta na bátu bana lɛsogya.
Na badɔlɔdi bammɔ básu banundane bammɔ banii, 'Bite-bu bina inɔmii bɔmmɔ bɔdi, ɔsika bula lɛsogya lɛdaku buni.'
"Na banundane bammɔ básu-ma banini, 'Bula inɔmii bulédu abu ku-mii, anwuɔsu biteesie beyene kudɔ na bitéye bina bɔdi.'
"Ka bánya bátɔlɔ kani na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ úbeduo. Na begblebi ɛlɔ bani náda lɛlɔ bése mmɔ básiaku-nwu béduo uleku ketikɔ mmɔ, na bákalɛ ɔtɔ.
"Kama ni, begblebi bakladi bammɔ lɛnɔ bébo na básu banii, 'Ati, ati! Ya na buduo!'
"Na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Kudi kudii! Lɛɛɛgyi-mii.' "
Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ lɛgba lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Anwuɔsu bilie kagyumana, ɔsika bɛɛɛgyi limeyi iye uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo."

"Na uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔdubo ni, Katɔti lɛga bɔdi bɔdubuse aani ɔmɛni lɛnɔ. Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, unengu ɔdi ɔ́ta na ɔ́bla kasusu ka usie ulu ɔdi. Ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane na úti nwuna ala ɔ́kya-ma lɛkɔkɔ.
Úte ɔdi biala lɛla lɛni na wakana bɔda. Unwi ni, úte-nwu egulabi aƒɔ alɔ. Na ɔbambadi ni, úte-nwu aƒɔ anyɔ. Na ɔkladi ni, úte-nwu koƒo kunwi. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ulu.
Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ aƒɔ alɔ amɛni úsie kalɔ kɔnakunwi na útébo egulabi ammɔ únwini na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ aƒɔ alɔ ɔ́sia.
Lɛni kani na kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ aƒɔ anyɔ lɛnɔ úbo nwuna ɔdi únwini na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ aƒɔ anyɔ abambadi ɔ́sia.
Nsu kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi koƒo kunwi anwu úsie útégyeli kalɔ na úti nwuna unwoti egulabi ɔ́bala mmɔ.
"Na emeyi pii adi kama ni, kabla bablane bamɛni unwoti ɔmmɔ únwini úbo na anwu ku-ma bábu akunta.
Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi aƒɔ alɔ úti aƒɔ alɔ bamba ɔ́sia úboku na ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Ati, éte-mi egulabi aƒɔ alɔ na lɛ́kɛ alɔ líbunku.'

"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii, 'Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni, ábla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ geen! Ka ásia ala blii suɛ amɛni anu kaduɛ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene ala enengudi kenye. Bo butaadi na butaani na butaakɛ ebiti!'
"Kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi aƒɔ anyɔ lɛnɔ úbo na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ati, éte-mi egulabi aƒɔ anyɔ na lɛ́kɛ aƒɔ anyɔ bamba líbunku.'

"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii, 'Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni, ábla lɛla biala ulu lɛlɔ geen! Ka ásia ala blii suɛ amɛni anu kaduɛ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene ala enengudi kenye. Bo butaadi na butaani na butaakɛ ebiti!'

"Amu na kabla ɔblane ɔni náƒɔ egulabi koƒo kunwi úbo na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ati, ngyi ka adi ukyuli ɔni na ƒula litemi libo ɔkplu na eedé edula na kesii kani na átava adi. Na aaƒɛ edula kesii kani na átagya adi.
Na ka mɔɔyia ɔsu ni, líti ƒula egulabi ammɔ ńtéku lɛ́kya kalɔ. Anwuɔsu aanu ƒula egulabi ƒui mɛni.'
"Nwuna unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Kabla ɔblane ukpidi ku ɔkɔsɔne na adi. Agyi ka muudé edula na kesii kani na ńtava adi, na mɔɔƒɛ edula kesii kani na ńtagya lɛla lɛdi.
Amu bi ɔsu na éteti mina egulabi étetése egulabi kesekɔ, na si líbo ni, na mbaƒɔ mina egulabi ku kuvonsia?'
"Amu na unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su kabla ɔblane bamba ɔnini, 'Bɛƒɔ egulabi ammɔ na nwuna kudɔ na biti-nya bite ukyuli ɔni nda aƒɔ leevu mmɔ.'
Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mbo lɛla lɛdi ni, anwu kani na basɔ badubo bute na ɔsɔ ɔkɛ ubu. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo ɔdi anwu ni, ubliidi ɔni nse-nwu muedi ni, badubɔƒɔ balɛku-nwu lɛkɔkɔ.
Na kabla ɔblane ɔni na nwuna lɛlɔ liiibo kɔsia kɔdi mɛni anwu ni, bibo-nwu bɛlɛku bitákya kasuudikɔ. Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya.
"Uwi ɔni na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo na nwuna lɛga bɔdi kemo ni, Katɔti batu bana ƒui badubɔka bamana-nwu. Na ɔdubo ubelie nwuna lɛgaboku lɛlɔ.
Na kadi ƒui bekyuli badubɔsala bebenye-nwu anumi. Mmɔ na ɔdubule-ma kemo aani kalɛ na baƒonu lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔɔƒuna baƒonu taalɛku bese akɔ.
Ɔdubɔya na bekyuli babuni bebenye-nwu kudɔ. Na ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bekpidi bammɔ besie kama.

"Na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsu bekyuli bani nnye-nwu kudɔ ɔnini, 'Amii ndi bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔni ndi mina Ɔti ɔ́ya na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-mii kaduɛ. Anwuɔsu bibo na bibeduo lɛga kadikɔ kani na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse úte-mii ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.
Mɔɔƒɔ-mii kayu kamɛni ɔsika uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔ́da-mi ni, bíte-mi adila. Ka utukwɛ ɔ́da-mi ni, bíte-mi ntu. Ka ndi ɔƒɔ ni, bígyingya enu bɛ́ƒɔ-mi na ḿbeduo-mii kudɔ.
Na ka nkɛ kasɔngya ni, bíte-mi adala. Na uwi ɔni na muuƒi ni, bɛ́nu-mi lɛlɔ. Ka bákya-mi ɔtɔ ni, bíbo bíbanu-mii.'
"Mmɔ ni, bekyuli babuni bamɛni badubuye-nwu banini, 'Ati, uwi ɔmani na bɔ́nu-ɔ ka kɔka kɔɔda-a na búte-ɔ adila, iye utukwɛ ɔɔda-a búte-ɔ ntu?
Uwi ɔmani na adi ɔƒɔ ébeduo-bu na bɔ́ƒɔ-ɔ, iye akɛ kasɔngya na búte-ɔ adala?
Na uwi ɔmani na búnu ka eeƒi iye bákya-a ɔtɔ na búbo búbanu-ɔ?'
"Amu na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubudie kenye ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii nnii uwi ɔni na bíbunku ukyuli ɔni na bilábu ƒui na mina badi akɔ ni, ami na bɛ́bla bíte.'

"Amu na ɔdubɔsu bani na ɔ́ya na bésie kama ɔnini, 'Bɛkpɛ bɛlɛ-mi lɛlɔ, amii bani na Katɔti úwida! Biteesie lɛgyavonku lɛni neeeni kudii na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse úte ukisine ɔmmɔ ku nwuna ayu ekpidi kemo!
Kɔka kɔ́da-mi na bítete-mi adila na lɛdi. Utukwɛ ɔ́da-mi na bítete-mi ntu na lɛni.
Ndi ɔƒɔ ḿbeduo-mii na bítaƒɔ-mi. Nkɛ kasɔngya na bítete-mi adala. Líƒi na bákya-mi ɔtɔ, nsu bítabanu-mi.'
"Amu na ama lɛnɔ badubuye-nwu banini, 'Ati, uwi ɔmani na bɔ́nu ka kɔka kɔɔda-a, iye utukwɛ ɔɔda-a, iye adi ɔƒɔ, iye ákɛ kasɔngya, iye eeƒi, iye bákya-a ɔtɔ na bútebo na bubebunku-ɔ?'
"Mmɔ na Ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsu-ma ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, uwi ɔni na bítabla lɛbuni bítete ukyuli ɔni na balábu ƒui na mina badi akɔ ni, ami na bítabla bítete!' "
Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ɔnini, "Bekyuli bamɛni na badubuti batákya lɛbibo lɛni naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo. Na bekyuli babuni bammɔ badubɔkɛ ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii."
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ ala amɛni ƒui bɔtina ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,
"Bɛgyi ka kébu emeyi anyɔ na bɔdi limeyi lɛni bɔɔlɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi. Na badubuti ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, bete na bakana-mi bamana ugyii lɛlɔ."
Amu na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bátása na Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa kaduli.
Na béti kasusu kalɛ na beƒie Yesu na bɔbɛ kemo na badu-nwu.
Nsu básu lɛnɔ banii, "Buleƒie-nwu na limeyi bɔdi kemo, ɔsika bekyuli badubɔta babakyaku-bu unyeƒi."
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́kya Betania na ɔnana ɔdi baalɔ Simon ɔni na úƒi ɔlɛgyie kesii.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ulie ɔɔdi ni, uleku ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ. Ɔda inɔmii ku ɔsii ɔdi. Na buunwenyi ƒɛƒɛɛ na bɔ́ƒɔ kuye geen. Na úwilimi-mu úwi Yesu lili lɛlɔ.
Ka nwuna batɛyane bánu ɔmɛni ni, útayɔ-ma kaƒɔ. Béye lɛlɔ banii, "Bi ɔsu na uubile inɔmii bɔmɛni lɛni?
Ɔdubɔkana na uti inɔmii bɔmɛni uye kuye bonwu na uti egulabi ammɔ ute bawabane."
Ka Yesu únu lɛla lɛni na badaku bɔsu ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na bilaya na uleku ɔmɛni ɔkɛ atu kesekɔ? Ɔ́bla lɛla lɛbuni úte-mi.
Bawabane bakya-mii akɔ uwi biala. Nsu ami ni, ɔɔɔdi uwi biala na ndubɔkya-mii kudɔ.
Uleku ɔmɛni úti inɔmii bɔmmɔ úwi-mi lɛlɔ úse úte mina bɔva.
Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, kesi kesii na badubɔkɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛsa na kayawi mɛni ni, badubuti lɛla lɛni na uleku ɔmɛni ɔ́bla mɛni basu batina na beti benyimo-nwu."
Amu na basiakune leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Yuda Iskariot úsie bakpane benengu kudɔ.
Na úye-ma ɔnini, "Bi na bɛdubute-mi si lɛ́kya Yesu kakya na lídie-nwu lite-mii?" Mmɔ ni, bátuna ka badubute-nwu sika ɔƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ.
Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ úsela ni, úse kalɔ ɔkya ɔɔwia uwi ɔbuni ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na udie Yesu ute-ma.
Amu na limeyi lideedi lɛni lɛlɔ na baadi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu ni, batɛyane bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ banii, "Wɛ na aayɔ́ ka butáklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi adila bute-ɔ?"
Ɔ́tala-ma ɔnana ɔdi kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bisie ɔmankemo na bitásu-nwu bɛnii, 'Ala ɔtinane ɔnii, "Mina uwi úudu. Na ƒula kesii na ami ku mina batɛyane bɔdubɔdi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila ammɔ." ' "
Anwuɔsu batɛyane bamɛni bábla kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma na bátánwa Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi adila amɛni bése.
Na ka useyi uwi údu ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bébo bebelie kalɔ.
Na uwi ɔni na belie baadi ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, bina kemo unwi ɔdubɔkya-mi kakya."
Litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́yu batɛyane bamɛni ɔlɛ geen na bésie kalɔ beeye-nwu unwi unwi banii, "Blɔti, ɔɔɔdi ami na ada, ntu?"
Yesu údie kenye ɔnii, "Ukyuli ɔni na ami ku-nwu kɔnu nkya lɛkyami kemo ndubɔkya-mi kakya.
Ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubukpi aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su. Nsu ni, bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni na ndubɔkya-mi kakya. Si nka bátawɔ-nwu muedi ni, na nka ɔdia-nwu utulo."
Amu na Yuda, ɔni ndubɔkya-nwu kakya mmɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, "Ala ɔtinane, ɔɔɔdi ami na ada, ntu?" Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnii, "Bɔsu na ada."
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane belie baadi ni, úti bodobodo. Na ka ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ni, ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úle-ku úte-ma. Ɔ́su ɔnini, "Bɛƒɔ ɔmɛni na bɛdi. Ɔmɛni ndi mina ɔlɔna."
Amu na úti ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔdi, na ka ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ni, úti úte-ma. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bina ƒui bɛni.
Ɔmɛni ndi mina ubugya ɔni na líti muusé kenye kani na Katɔti únyimi ku nwuna bekyuli likpo. Na ndubuti-nwu liwi kalɔ na bekyuli pii lili, kalɛ na Katɔti uti ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.
Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo ntɛ bɔmɛni udu bɔdi bɔni ntu limeyi lɛni na ami ku-mii bɔdubɔni ntɛ bɔwɔdi na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ."
Amu na bátu ɔnu ɔdi béti bemwi Katɔti, na bávi bálɛ bésie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ.
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, "Bina ƒui bɛdubukeli-mi kudɔ, na kebu ami lɛti. Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnini, 'Katɔti ɔdubɔdu baƒonu ɔdane ɔmmɔ na nwuna baƒonu begyingya.'
Nsu na mina bɔsɔ bɔta bɔsi bekpine akɔ ni, ndubɔgyu lɛtɔ-mii na Galilea."
Amu na Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, "Si ina bakladi ƒui béni-ɔ muedi ni, ami lɛɛɛdubo-ɔ kama bɔlɛ kudii!"
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, "Mɔɔsu-ɔ ka usien ɔmɛni asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye muedi ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi."
Petro údie kenye ɔnini, "Si ina ɔlɛka badu ami ku-ɔ muedi ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔsu nnii lɛɛɛgyi-ɔ." Na lɛni kani na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ ƒui básu.
Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bammɔ bésie kesii kani baalɔ Getsemane, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bɛsɔ bilie mɛni na lisie ngye ntákpali katɔ."
Úti ku Petro ku Sebedeo bebi inyɔ bammɔ ɔ́da. Na ka bákɛ ni, kɔyɔ kúwi-nwu na lɛƒɛda lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Muunú ɔlɛ na mina kɔyu kemo geen aani si bukpi nda. Bɛsɔ binye mɛni na bitaagyumana ku-mi."
Amu ka úsie lɛtɔtɔ blii ni, ɔ́yu úbi kalɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔnini, "Mina Ɔti, si wadia ni, na aƒɔ lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni na mina kudɔ. Nsu ni, tabla mina lɛyɔla, mmomu bla ƒula lɛdi."
Ka ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ kudɔ ni, ɔ́nu ka baalɛɛ. Na úye Petro ɔnini, "Bítakana na binyeku-mi kagyumana ɔdɔ unwi pɛ?
Bɛsɔ bilie kagyumana na bɛkpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kpakplaa kemo. Kɔyu kɔɔyɔ́ ka kɔbla, nsu ɔlɔna use kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ."
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie kunyɔdi na ɔ́kpali ɔnini, "Mina Ɔti, si lɛbibo lɛni ndubo buti mɛni lilávi-mi lɛlɔ na ɔdi-ɔ lɛƒɔyɔ ka liti-ni ni, ya na ɔlɛ lɛni."
Ka Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ni, úbanu ka lɛlɛɛ litulo batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ na bátakana bana anumi muedi bubimi.
Yesu ɔ́da-ma úse na ɔ́sɔ úsie kɔtɛdi na ɔ́kpali katɔ kalɛ na ɔ́kpali úbavi.
Amu na ɔ́sɔ úbo batɛyane bammɔ kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ɔsu bɔtɛ na bɛmua bɛtɛ bɛɛnwuna lɛni? Ɔƒɛni na uwi ɔmmɔ údu ka beti Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ bakya bekyuli bekpidi enu kemo.
Bɛta na buteesie. Bɛnu, kakya ɔkyane ɔmmɔ úude."
Yesu ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmiku-ma asa na Yuda ɔni ndi leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́da úbalɛ. Ɔdanku bekyuli lisu lɛni na bakpane benengu ku batɔnkune bédie. Na bada lɛkɛɛ ku ligyii.
Kakya ɔkyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́ya na báti bése ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔni na makya kɔgbu ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na bɛɛwia. Biƒie-nwu."
Ka Yuda ɔ́nya ɔ́nu Yesu kani na úsie-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ala ɔtinane, keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-ɔ." Amu na ɔ́kya-nwu kɔgbu.
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɔkpana, bi na aawia mɛni?" Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na béƒie-nwu na báda-nwu kpakplaa.
Na bani nsiaku Yesu mmɔ kemo unwi ɔ́ni nwuna ɔkɛɛ ɔ́kpa na úbeyi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔtu úkulo.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Ti ƒula ɔkɛɛ kya nwuna kakyakɔ. Bekyuli bani mɔɔgyumana lɛlɔ ku lɛkɛɛ ni, lɛkɛɛ kenye na beekpi.
Munuu aaagyi anii lɛkana na livele mina Ɔti na ubebunku-mi? Na mmɔ kani ɔdubuti Katɔti batu bekpone limomo lɛni ntulo akpa leevu-anyɔ umene-mi!
Nsu si bébo na békpo béte-mi ni, na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku etemila ammɔ elebo aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́su úse lɛni na ɔdi ka ɔlɛ."

Ɔmɛni kama ni, Yesu úye bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka biti ligyii ku lɛkɛɛ bibo bɛnii bibeƒie-mi aani si lɛ́ta línye aban lɛlɔ? Lɛ́tina bekyuli ala limeyi biala na Katɔti kakpakɔ na bíteƒie-mi.
Nsu ala amɛni ƒui álɛ lɛni kalɛ na ala ani na básu bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ébo éte lɛni." Amu na nwuna batɛyane ƒui békeli bátɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ.
Amu na ama bani néƒie Yesu mmɔ bétiku-nwu bésienku Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa kaduli, kesii kani na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bása belie.
Petro anwu ɔkpɛ kama buɛɛ na úbavi útéduo kaduli kammɔ kemo. Útélie kalɔ na bagyumanane bammɔ kudɔ na ɔnu kalɛ na litemi lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔwɔ.
Bakpane benengu bamɛni ku litemi batɛne bani nlie mmɔ ƒui báyɔ ka bawiaku Yesu litemi lɛdi lɛni lɛlɔ na basia na bakɛ-nwu badu.
Nsu ina ka bekyuli pii bébo bábada-nwu kenye muedi ni, bátakɛ lɛla lɛdi. Nkyuli inyɔ badi bébo
na básu banii, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ndubɔƒɛ Katɔti kakpakɔ. Na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ndubɔsɔku-ka lɛtu.' "
Ɔkpane unengudi ɔ́ta unye na úye Yesu ɔnini, "Eenú etemila ani na baasu na ƒula lɛlɔ mɛni? Bi na ebo na adubɔsu?"
Nsu Yesu úbile kenye na útasu lɛla lɛdi. Ɔkpane unengudi ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Lɛ́kpali Katɔti mɔɔkya-a nnii su-bu si awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ."

Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Ɛɛn. Awɔ násu, na use lɛni sɔsɔ. Na mɔɔsu-mii nnii uwi klukui kemo ni, bɛdubɔnu Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔmmɔ ka ulie Katɔ Ɔyikune Ƒui kɔdianu. Na bɛdubɔnu ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔdubo na uyɔlɔ kemo!"
Uwi ɔni na ɔkpane unengudi únu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́ni nwuna awu ɔ́bwɛ na ɔ́va ɔnini, "Binu enyekpi ani na ɔɔtɛmi! Bɔsɔ buláwia kenye bediene badi lɛnɔ!
Bi ndi bina kasusu?" Bana ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Ɔlɛka badu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ!"
Amu na bétuo lisuo béwi-nwu anumi na bébo-nwu. Na badi lɛnɔ báƒiɛmi-nwu lɛtugya.
Na béye-nwu banii, "Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ na adi? Su-bu ukyuli ɔni nébo-ɔ!"
Amu na Petro ɔmua ulie keyi mmɔ asa na ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane ɔni ndi ulekubi úbo mmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, "Awɔ lɛnɔ ásiaku Yesu ɔni nási Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ."
Nsu Petro ɔ́tuala na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui anumi ɔnii, "Ńtenu lɛla lɛni na aasu mɛni kalɔ."
Na ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ úténye kaduli kammɔ kayakun. Ulekubi kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔ́nu Petro na ɔ́su bani nnye mmɔ ɔnii, "Anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku Yesu Nasareni ɔmmɔ."
Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tuala na ɔ́kpali ala ɔnini, "Lɛɛɛgyi ukyuli ɔmmɔ!"
Uwi útetu asa na bani nnye mmɔ bébo bábasu Petro banii, "Útalɛka eni anii aaadi-ma akɔ unwi. Ɔsika ƒula butemi buudie-ɔ keyi nwaa."
Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali ala momoomo ɔnini, "Katɔti ɔni-mi kɔtu si ɔkɔ na mɔɔnyi nnii lɛɛɛgyi ukyuli ɔmmɔ." Kɔnakunwi ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.
Na Petro únyimo lɛla lɛni Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, "Asa na akɔkɔ ɔdubute kenye ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ sɔɔn ka aaagyi-mi." Anwuɔsu ɔ́lɛ keyi na útéwulo geen.
Ka kadi kégye ni, bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bálɛ ugyii ka badubɔdu Yesu.
Bébo-nwu kɔgba na béti-nwu bátákya Romaƒuɔ aban unengu Pilato enu kemo.
Uwi ɔni na Yuda ɔni nákya-nwu kakya únu ka bádu Yesu kukpi kɔtɔ ni, ɔ́yu-nwu ɔlɛ geen. Na úti sika aƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ ammɔ úsienku bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lɛ́bla likpidi ka lɛ́kya ukyuli ɔni nátaƒiɔ ɔmmɔ kakya nnii badu-nwu." Na bédie kenye banini, "Ɔmɛni anwu ɔɔɔkɛ-bu. Ƒula litemi na lɛdi!"
Amu na Yuda úbo egulabi ammɔ úwi Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ, na úsie útákya lɛlɔ ɔbuli.

Na bakpane benengu bammɔ bábuma egulabi ammɔ na básu banii, "Utalɛka buti egulabi amɛni bɔsalaku ani nkya Katɔti kakpakɔ kuyi kavumi kemo, ɔsika ukyuli ubugya egulabi na adi. Na bula ɔda bubo buutile ɔmɛni kuƒi."
Na ka básala eli ni, bálɛ-nwu ugyii banii badubuti egulabi amɛni betéye kalɔ kani baalɔ banii Ɔvɔne Kalɔ, na bataava baƒɔ na mmɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, baalɔ kalɔ kammɔ banii Ubugya Kalɔ úbalɛ ɔmwi.
Amu na lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yeremia ɔ́su úse úbo úte lɛni sɔsɔ ɔnii, "Béti sika aƒualadi ebi aavlatɛ ani na Israelƒuɔ bátuna ka baƒɔ na nwuna lili
bétéye ɔvɔne kalɔ aani kalɛ na Unwoti ɔ́su-mi."
Na béti Yesu bényene Romaƒuɔ aban unengu Pilato anumi. Na úye-nwu ɔnini, "Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?" Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, "Awɔ mɔɔsu."
Nsu ina ka bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ benye baadá-nwu kenye muedi ni, Yesu útakpete-ma.
Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, "Etemila ani na baasu na ƒula lɛlɔ mɛni aakɛ́-ɔ yoo?"
Nsu ɔ́bla aban unengu ɔmmɔ kalɛ kadi geen ka Yesu útakya-nwu kenye muedi.
Na Yudaƒuɔ emeyi ammɔ bɔdi biala kemo ni, Romaƒuɔ aban unengu ɔmɛni ɔɔnyonu Yudaƒuɔ ɔtɔntɛne unwi ɔni lili na kadi bébevele.
Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, na ɔtɔntɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na bekyuli beenú-nwu kɔku, na baalɔ-nwu banii Baraba.
Amu na uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii bamɛni bábasa ni, Pilato úye-ma ɔnini, "Ɔma na bɛɛyɔ́ bɛnii nnyonu nte-mii? Baraba munuu Yesu ɔni na bekyuli baalɔ-nwu Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ?"
Ɔ́bla lɛni ɔsika ɔgyi ka lɛnungyie ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bédie-nwu béte.

Na uwi ɔni na Pilato ɔkya ɔɔtɛ litemi ni, ulekudi ɔ́tala ɔtu ɔ́kya-nwu ɔnii, "Die enu na ukyuli ɔni nátaƒiɔ ɔmɛni litemi kemo. Ɔsika kamaadi usien lígye kɔna na nwuna lɛlɔ kɔni náya na liƒu lɛ́da-mi geen!"
Na bakpane benengu ku ɔma benengu bammɔ bébile bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ atu ka beye Pilato na ɔnyonu Baraba na badu Yesu.
Amu na Pilato úye bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ɔnini, "Nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ɔmani na bɛɛyɔ́ bɛnii nnyonu nte-mii?" Bédie kenye banii, "Baraba!"
Na Pilato ɔ́sɔ úye-ma ɔnini. "Bi na mbla Yesu ɔni na baalɔ-nwu banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔƒɛni?" Bana ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!"
Nsu Pilato ɔ́sɔ úye-ma ɔnini, "Na bi likpidi na ɔ́bla?" Mmɔ ni, bése kalɔ baava momoomo banii, "Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!"

Uwi ɔni na Pilato ɔ́nu ka ɔ́sɔ ulakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla, na mmomu unyeƒi kpakplaa ndubo bɔlɛ ni, úti ntu na ɔ́ƒɔ enu na bekyuli bammɔ anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Ukyuli ɔmɛni kukpi kɔɔɔsia-mi lɛlɔ! Bina litemi na lɛdi."
Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ ƒui bédie kenye banii, "Nwuna kukpi kɔsia abu ku bula bebi lili!"
Amu na Pilato ɔ́nyonu Baraba úte-ma. Na ka ɔ́ya na béti kɔbuli kɔni na bélii básala na bébo Yesu kaduɛ ni, ɔ́nyonu-nwu úte aban bekpone ɔnii bakana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
Amu na nwuna bekpone bammɔ béti Yesu bésienku Pilato kaduli na bekpone bani nkya mmɔ ƒui báka bámana-nwu.
Bédie nwuna awu na béti awu ugyiedi ɔdi bákya-nwu.

Na bédi liyu kabwa bébi-nwu lili asa na béti ugyii bákya-nwu kɔdianu lɛkɔkɔ. Bábla-nwu ala amɛni ƒui aani ɔga kalɛ. Na bálɛ akɔnkɔ na nwuna anumi, na baamá-nwu taasu banii, "Yiidu! Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ulie ngba gyɔlɔɔ!"
Bétuo lisuo béwi-nwu lɛlɔ na báƒɔ ugyii ɔmmɔ báƒiɛmi-nwu lili.
Uwi ɔni na báma-nwu lɛni báwɔlɔ ni, bédie-nwu awu ugyiedi ɔmmɔ na básɔku nwuna lɛwu bákya-nwu. Amu na bétiku-nwu bátɔlɔku banii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.
Uwi ɔni na bási ɔmankemo bakɛ bésela ni, básiaku ɔnana ɔdi ɔni nási Kirene na baalɔ-nwu banii Simon. Bekpone bammɔ béƒie-nwu banii ɔlɛka ubunku Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ buti.
Na béti Yesu bésienku kataku kadi baalɔ Golgota ɔni kalɔ budie ndi Opokuo.
Béte Yesu ntɛ bɔni na básala ku kuvo kɔni mbo ɔdu kati kati banii ɔni. Nsu ka útu-mu ɔnu ni, útani.
Amu na bekpone bammɔ bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na bátu egulabi asa na béti nwuna lɛwu béle béte lɛlɔ.
Nwuna kama ni, básɔ bélie kalɔ na bágyumana-nwu.
Na bébo kegyiikɛ kadi bámana-nwu eli. Na bénweni lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bádu-nwu básia-ka lɛlɔ banii, "Yesu, Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga, mɛni."
Bákana beyune inyɔ badi lɛnɔ bámana ligyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu. Unwi ɔma-nwu kɔdianu kakɛ na unwi lɛnɔ ɔma-nwu kɔmii kakɛ.
Bekyuli bani návi mmɔ ƒui bákunku bana eli na bédumi Yesu.
Básu banii, "Awɔ násu ka adubɔƒɛ Katɔti kakpakɔ na asɔku-ka atu emeyi atɛ kama! Si adi Katɔti Ubidi ni, yu na aƒɔ lɛlɔ asiku kukpi enu kemo."
Lɛni kani na bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku ɔma benengu bammɔ lɛnɔ báma-nwu banini,
"Úbunku badi, nsu ulákana na ubunku lɛlɔ. Ɔɔɔdi anwu ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ɔmmɔ? Ɔyu ɔsi ugyii ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na bɔnu na bɔƒɔ-nwu bɔdi!
Ɔ́sia Katɔti anu, na ɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii Katɔti Ubidi. Na si Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ ni, ɔdubɔƒɔ-nwu ɔƒɛni kani bɔnu!"
Lɛni kani na beyune bani na bákana-ma ligyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu lɛlɔ mmɔ bédumi-nwu.
Amu na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui kábla suu ɔ́si lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ uwi útalɛ lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
Na ɔdɔ ɔtɛdi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́va momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" Ɔni kalɔ ndi, "Mina Ɔti, mina Ɔti! Bi ɔsu na áda-mi ányonu?"
Na ka bekyuli badi bani nnye mmɔ bénu lɛni ni, básu banii, "Ɔɔkpali Elia!"
Bana akɔ unwi úkeli útéti unwo ɔni na béti bákya ntɛ bɔni nányi kemo na úti ɔ́tu ugyii ɔdi lɛlɔ úboku-nwu ɔnii ɔni.
Nsu bekyuli bakladi básu banii, "Sɔ nye! Bɛya na bɔnu si Elia ɔdubo ubamami-nwu ugyii ɔmɛni lɛlɔ."
Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́va momoomo na ɔ́yula.
Kɔnakunwi na Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔma kemo ni, kɔdi kɔni na béti béle Kakpakɔ mmɔ kɔ́bwɛ kemo inyɔ ɔ́si katɔ úbedu kalɔ. Na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui kákunku, na atakpɛ ábwɛ.
Na kɔƒiɔtɔ kúbimi, na bekyuli kedee bani nékpi báta bálɛ bekpine akɔ.
Na ka bávi bálɛ bana kɔƒiɔtɔ kemo na Yesu bɔsɔ bɔta kama ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ kemo, na bédie bana lɛlɔ keyi bátina bekyuli pii.

Na uwi ɔni na bekpone unengu ku bekpone bani nnye mɔɔgyumana Yesu bánu kalɛ na kalɔ kákunku ku ala ani nálɛ ƒui na mmɔ ni, ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma na liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen! Na básu banii, "Sɔsɔ na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti Ubidi."
Amu na beleku pii bani nási Galilea na badi Yesu bebunkune bákya mmɔ. Na benye ɔgyu baanu ala ani nálɛ.
Bana badi ndi Maria Magdalene, ku Maria ɔni ndi Yakobo ku Yoseƒ uni, ku Yohane ku Yakobo uni.
Uwi ɔni na useyi uwi údu ni, ɔnana ɔlakɛne ɔdi baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔdi Yesu ɔtɛyane ɔ́si Arimatea úbo.
Úsie Pilato kudɔ na útéye-nwu ɔnii uti Yesu ukpine ute-nwu. Pilato úte kuƒi ka beti ukpine ɔmmɔ bete-nwu.
Amu na Yoseƒ úti kɔdi kɔƒualadi kɔdi na úti únyimi ukpine ɔmmɔ.
Na úti-nwu útáva lɛtakpɛ ubu kaƒiɔtɔ kawɔdi kani na ɔ́ya na béku béte-nwu kemo. Na ɔ́ya na béminime lɛtakpɛ lɛdi bétile-ka kenye na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Na Maria Magdalene ku Maria unyɔdi básɔ bélie kaƒiɔtɔ anumi mmɔ.
Na kadi kégye ɔni ndi lɛnwunameyi ni, bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bésie Pilato kudɔ.
Na básu-nwu banini, "Unengu, uwi ɔni na ɔkɔ ɔnyine ɔmmɔ úlie ngba ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Si líkpi ni, nsɔ ndubɔta lɛlɛ bekpine akɔ emeyi atɛ kama.'

Anwuɔsu su kpakplaa anii bagyumanane banu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kaduɛ utálɛ limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kalɛ na nwuna batɛyane bammɔ beléyu ukpine ɔmmɔ na basu banii ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ bekpine akɔ. Ɔsika buláwia ka katɔlɔ kani masia ketulo kedeedi."
Amu na Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Biti bekpone bisienku na bitágyumana kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kalɛ biala bɛdubɔkana."
Amu na bésie bátábala lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ kenye na bése-ni likpo kalɛ na si ukyuli ɔdi útuku-ka na banu bati. Na báda bekpone bése mmɔ na baagyumana kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ.
Ka kadi kégye Kwasida ɔtanta ni, Maria Magdalene ku Maria ɔkladi ɔmmɔ bésie banii batánu Yesu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ.
Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ kákunku momoomo geen. Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́yu ɔ́si katɔ úbo na úbeminime lɛtakpɛ lɛmmɔ, na úlie-ni lɛlɔ.
Nwuna lɛlɔ liikeye aani ɔƒɛ na nwuna awu use ƒututuutu.
Liƒu lɛ́da bagyumanane bammɔ na lɛlɔ lɛ́tɔ-ma geen, na básini bátɛ aani bekpine.
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ útemiku beleku bammɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bitayia. Ngyi ka bɛɛwia Yesu ɔni na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ.
Uuubo mɛni. Ɔ́ta úlie ngba aani kalɛ na ɔ́su úse. Bibo na bibanu likpo lɛni na báva-nwu.
Bisie pla na bitásu nwuna batɛyane bɛnii ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ bekpine akɔ ulie ngba, na ɔtɔ-mii anumi úsela Galilea. Mmɔ na bɛdubɔnu-nwu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu nkɛ."
Anwuɔsu bábabla bátɔlɔ kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ. Na ina ka liƒu lɛ́da-ma muedi ni, béti ebiti békeli bésie banii batásu Yesu batɛyane kenye kammɔ.
Kɔnakunwi ni, ama ku Yesu bása na ulu lɛlɔ. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Lígyele-mii." Mmɔ na bákpɛ béde-nwu na béboku lɛlɔ kalɔ báda-nwu lɛgba na bémwi-nwu.
Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Bitayia. Biteesie na bitásu mina banwa bɛnii beteesie Galilea. Mmɔ na badubɔnu-mi."
Uwi ɔni na beleku bammɔ bénwini bésela ni, bekpone bammɔ badi bésie ɔma kemo na bátásu Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu bammɔ ala ani nálɛ mmɔ ƒui.
Amu na bakpane benengu bammɔ ku ɔma benengu bátása banii beeti kasusu. Béte bekpone bammɔ egulabi pii adi,
na básu-ma banini, "Bɛsu bɛnii usien uwi ɔni na bɛɛlɛɛ ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo na bébeyu ukpine ɔmmɔ bátɔlɔku.
Na si Romaƒuɔ aban unengu únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, bɔdubɔya na unu kalɔ geen ka ɔɔɔdi bina bɔƒiɔ."
Bagyumanane bammɔ báƒɔ egulabi ammɔ na bábla aani kalɛ na básu-ma. Na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bégyingya Yesu ukpine buyu litemi lɛmmɔ na bana akɔ úbalɛ ɔmwi.
Na batɛyane leevu-unwi bammɔ bákɔ bésie Galilea lɛbinkpo lɛni lɛlɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma úse.
Na ka bánu-nwu ni, bana badi bémwi-nwu. Nsu badi lɛnɔ kasusu kábla-ma inyɔ inyɔ.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, "Katɔti úti katɔ ku kalɔ ɔyikun ƒui úte-mi.
Anwuɔsu biteesie kayawi kadi biala bekyuli akɔ na bɛtina-ma ala kalɛ na benwini mina batɛyane. Na bɛkpila-ma ntu na Ati ku Ubi ku Katɔti Kɔyu lɛnyi kemo.
Na bɛtina-ma bɛnii badi ala ani ƒui na lɛ́tina-mii lɛlɔ. Na ndubɔkya-mii akɔ uwi ƒui utálɛ kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ."
Ɔmɛni ndi litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ɔni ndi Katɔti ɔlati ubidi.
Kukuuku ni, Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni úse ka Katɔti ɔ́su Ubidi ɔnini, “Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na wagyu watɔ-ɔ, kalɛ na ɔklibi bekyuli ute ƒula bubo.
Adubunu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔkɛ ɔɔva na ketele kemo taasu ɔnini, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo!' ”

Ɔtu ɔmɛni ndi Yohane. Anwu nébo úbelie ketele kemo, kesii kani na ɔɔkpila bekyuli ntu na ketu kemo aani kalɛ na Yudaƒuɔ baabla kalɛ. Na ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa ka ɔlɛka bekyuli benwini kayi na bada ekpidi bɔbla baya na baƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubuti bana alaekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.

Bekyuli pii bási Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ku bana ɔma unengudi ɔni baalɔ Yerusalem bésie ketele kamɛni kemo béténu Yohane litemi. Bédie bana ekpidi kalɔ béte Katɔti, na Yohane ɔ́kpila-ma ntu na ketu kani baalɔ Yordan kemo.
Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Yohane ɔkya ɔƒlumu linwini awu, na úti ebuo ɔku kabuli ɔ́da kevobi. Nwuna adila ani na ɔɔdi ndi uwɔ ku baalɔlɔ bani muubile edula.
Nwuna linyesia lɛni lɛlɔ na ɔɔkɔ́ lɛsa ndi ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni nkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ni, anwu utulo-mi ƒui. Ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.
Ami ni, ntu na muuti taabla bula bɔkpila ɔdi. Nsu anwu ndubuti Katɔti Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.”
Uwi útetu asa na Yesu ɔ́si ɔma ɔni baalɔ Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ úbo, na ɔ́ƒɔ Yohane ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Yordan kemo.
Ka Yesu ɔ́nya ɔ́lɛ ntu bɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔ́nu ka katɔ kébimi na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́si kɔɔyu-nwu lɛlɔ aani aasɛ.
Na lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si Katɔ lɛɛsu lɛnii, “Awɔ ndi mina ubi ɔni náƒɔ-mi kuye, na kubiti kɔɔda-mi ƒula lɛlɔ.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́kpanku Yesu kúsienku ketele kemo, kesii kani na beƒiebuo bakya.
Anwu lɛti úlie mmɔ emeyi aavlene. Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo na Satan úkpoku Yesu ɔ́nu si wasiaku-nwu. Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti batu bébo bébebunku-nwu na bákya-nwu ɔkplu.
Uwi ɔni na béƒie Yohane ɔni mɔɔbla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi bákya ɔtɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Galilea na útásu Katɔti litemi buni mmɔ.
Ɔkya ɔɔsu ɔnini, “Uwi ɔbuni ɔmmɔ úudu. Katɔti lɛga bɔdi uwi úude. Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi na bɛ́ƒɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni bɛdi!”
Ka Yesu ɔkɛ ɔɔví na ɛpu ɔdi kudɔ na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́nu asawu bewine inyɔ badi bani ndi Simon ku ɔnwani Andrea ka bakya beewi asawu.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Bibasiaku-mi, na matina-mii kalɛ na bidie bekyuli biboku Katɔti kudɔ.”
Na kɔnakunwi ni, báda bana lɛsawu béwi na báta básiaku-nwu.
Úsie anumi blii úbu na ɔ́nu banwani inyɔ badi bani ndi Sebedeo bebie Yakobo ku Yohane. Na belie bana ɔkɔlɔ kemo baaklibi bana lɛsawu.
Ka Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kani na ɔ́lɔ-ma. Ama lɛnɔ báta kɔnakunwi na báda bana ɔti Sebedeo ku nwuna kabla bablane lɛti pɛ bákya ɔkɔlɔ kemo, na básiaku Yesu.
Yesu ku nwuna basiakune bamɛni bésie bétéduo ɔma ɔni baalɔ Kapernaum. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛni nébo na bana mmɔ busie kama ni, Yesu úsie bana kasalakɔ na úsie ɔkya ɔɔsu litemi buni.
Ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nénu nwuna ala bɔtina kalɛ kadi, ɔsika uuuse aani ama bani baatina ɔda bubo. Mmomu ni, ɔɔtina ala ku ɔyikun taasiku nwuna kayi kemo.
Uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kulie-nwu lɛlɔ ɔkya kasalakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́va momoomo ɔnini,
“Yesu Nasareni, bi na aawia asiku bula kudɔ? Bubo na ébo anii abakyula-bu? Ngyi ukyuli ɔni na adi. Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ɔtalane Kedee!”
Yesu ɔ́bala kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Da bɔtɛmi ya! Na avi alɛ ɔnana ɔmmɔ kemo.”
Kɔyu kɔmɛni kɔ́kunku ɔnana ɔmɛni momoomo na kɔ́ya-nwu ɔ́va asa na kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
Ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye ƒui yaa na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi litemi lɛdi mɛni? Bi bɔkpa bɔwɔdi udu na bɔmɛni bɔdi? Ukyuli ɔmɛni ubo ɔyikun ɔni na ɔɔtɛmi ku ayu ekpidi na eenú-nwu litemi!”
Anwuɔsu Yesu lɛlɔ litemi lígyingya na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ku Yakobo ku Yohane bálɛ kasalakɔ mmɔ, na bátɔlɔ bésie Simon ku Andrea kaduli.
Ka bétéduo mmɔ ni, bekyuli badi básu Yesu ka Simon ulekudi uni uuƒi ɔtɛ ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛbi-nwu.
Anwuɔsu Yesu úsie útéduo-nwu kudɔ, na úƒie-nwu kɔnu ɔ́da na ɔ́tala-nwu únyene. Kɔnakunwi na nwuna ɔlɛ ɔ́da-nwu ɔ́ya, na ɔ́ta na úte-ma adila.
Ka useyi uwi údu ni, bekyuli béti balɛne pii ku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi asiaku-ma béboku Yesu banii ɔbwi-ma.
Na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli ƒui bébenye kayakun mmɔ baanu.

Yesu ɔ́bwi bekyuli pii bani muuƒi lɛlɛ lidu lidu na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi pii lɛnɔ ɔ́lɛku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi asiaku-ma lɛlɔ. Ka Yesu ɔgyi ɔnii ayu amɛni agyi ukyuli ɔni na ɔdi ɔsu ni, útatuna ka ayu ammɔ asu lɛla lɛdi asiku nwuna lɛlɔ.
Ɔtanta tutuutu asa na kadi kadubɔda ni, Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kaduli mmɔ. Na ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsie kesii kani na ukyuli ɔdi biala uuude, na útákpali katɔ.
Kama ni, Simon ku nwuna bakpana bésie bakya baawia Yesu.
Na uwi ɔni bánu-nwu ni, básu-nwu banini, “Bekyuli pii bakya baawia-a!”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛya na busie lɛma lɛbambadi lɛnɔ. Ɔlɛka lɛsu ama lɛnɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni, ɔsika ɔmɛni ndi mina kabla kani na líbo mabla na kayawi kemo.”
Anwuɔsu úsie ɔ́vi Galilea kalɔ kesii biala. Ɔkɛ ɔɔsu litemi buni na kasalakɔ, na ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ lɛnɔ.
Ɔnana ɔdi ɔni muuƒi ɔlɛgyie úbo Yesu kudɔ. Ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ, na úvele-nwu ɔnii ubunku-nwu. Ɔ́su Yesu ɔnii, “Si aayɔ́ ni, akana na abwi-mi na lɛlɔ lɛbla-mi sɛɛn.”
Nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́kywi Yesu kaƒɔ, anwuɔsu únene kɔnu na útuku-nwu. Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́. Lɛlɔ lɛbla-a sɛɛn ƒui!”
Kɔnakunwi ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu.
Mmɔ kani na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ka ɔtɔlɔ mmɔ, na úbo-nwu ɔda kpakplaa ɔnini,

“Tedi tenye ulu lɛlɔ na asu bekyuli lɛla lɛni nébo. Mmomu teesie na eti lɛlɔ atátina ɔkpane. Na ete akpala ani na Mose ɔda bubo bɔ́tina. Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔtina bakpane bammɔ ka ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-a na ábla sɛɛn.”

Nsu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni úsela ni, úse kalɔ ɔɔva taasu kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́bwi-nwu. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu útakana na uduo ɔma ɔdi kemo, ɔsika bekyuli pii beebo-nwu kudɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya alakpi akɔ. Nsu bekyuli básɔ bási ekpo ekpo bébo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ.
Emeyi adi kama ni, únwini úsie Kapernaum na nwuna bɔsɔ bubo lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kúbeyi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo uwi klukui kemo.
Uwi útetu asa na bekyuli bébeyi kesii kani na úduo mmɔ na kaduli ku keyi ƒui. Na ɔkya ɔɔsu-ma litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
Mmɔ na nkyuli ine béti ɔlɛne ɔdi náƒɛ uwi kalɔ béboku-nwu.
Na ka bátakɛ kavinkɔ na kayakun ɔ́si bekyuli bumomo ɔsu ni, bátákɔ ɔtɔ katɔ na báyula ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ ku nwuna atɛla báva Yesu anumi.
Ka Yesu ɔ́nu kalɛ na báƒɔ bádi kpakplaa ka ɔdubɔkana ɔlɛne ɔmɛni bɔbwi ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔ́su ɔlɛne ɔmɛni ɔnii, “Ubi, líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.”
Nsu ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya mmɔ beeti kasusu na bana kayi kemo banii,
“Bi ɔsu na ɔɔtɛmi lɛni? Katɔti lɛti mɔɔkana ekpidi buti taakyiɛ!”
Yesu ɔ́nu bana kasusu kemo ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Bi ɔsu na ɔmɛni uukpóku-mii?
Ukyuli biala ɔkana ɔsu ɔnii, 'Líti ƒula ekpidi lɛ́kyiɛ-ɔ.' Nsu ubo ɔkplu utulo si ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ta, na eti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie.'
Anwuɔsu kalɛ na bɛƒɔ bɛdi ka ami ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi mbo kuƒi ka liti ekpidi lɛkyiɛ bekyuli na kayawi kamɛni kemo ɔsu ni, bɛnu!”
Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini anumi ɔ́tina ɔlɛne ɔmmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na eti ƒula lɛtala na eteesie kaduli.”

Na ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na úti nwuna lɛtala na úsie ɔ́vi bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ akɔ, na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie nwuna kesii. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ ƒui kalɛ kadi. Na bátakɔsi Katɔti bumwi. Bana ƒui básu banii bátanu lɛla lɛmɛni udu kudii!
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Galilea Ɛpu kudɔ na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bébo nwuna kudɔ mmɔ, na ɔ́su-ma litemi buni.

Ka úti úsela ɛpu kudɔ mmɔ ni, útánu Lewi ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ka ɔ́bla keliekɔ kadi na ulie mmɔ ɔɔƒɔ́ kuyi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bo basiaku-mi kama.” Amu na Lewi úmii ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na ɔ́siaku-nwu.

Useyi uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ku bekyuli pii bani nsiaku-nwu bébo Lewi kesii banii babadiku-nwu. Na basiakune bammɔ akɔ ni, badi badi kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bablane. Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa linwi lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ kemo lɛnɔ bébo mmɔ.

Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nási Ƒarisiƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo bánu ka Yesu ulie ɔɔdiku bekyuli bani lɛlɔ neeebo ɔbu mɛni ni, béye nwuna batɛyane banii, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla na anwu ku bekyuli bamɛni udu nlie mɔɔdi?”

Ka Yesu únu litemi lɛni na badaku bɔsu ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Balɛne mɔɔwia kuvo ɔblane, na ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani mbo lɛlɔ ɔkplu. Ńtebo nnii mbalɔ bekyuli babuni na benwini kayi, mmomu líbo na bekyuli bani ngyi ka alaekpidi bablane badi ɔsu.”

Amu uwi ɔdi ka Yohane ku nwuna batɛyane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ beelie kɔka na bana katɔ bɔkpali ɔsu ni, bekyuli badi bébo Yesu kudɔ bébeye-nwu banii, “Bi ɔsu na ƒula batɛyane ama belélie kɔka aani kalɛ na Yohane badi ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ beelie kɔka?”
Yesu údie kenye na úbo-ma lɛgba ɔnii, “Uleku ɔgya bakpana beení adila na uleku ketikɔ? Munuu útalɛka ebiti ada-ma ka uleku ɔgya ɔkya-ma akɔ?
Nsu limeyi lɛdi ni, badubuti-nwu bɔtɔlɔku nwuna bakpana kudɔ na bakpana bammɔ badubunyimi kenye ku kɔnyana.
Ukyuli ɔdi ulétile kɔdi kɔkukudi liƒi ku lɛdiku lɛwɔdi. Lɛdiku lɛwɔdi lɛmmɔ lɛdubɔni kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kugyingya si báƒɔ-ku. Na ɔdubɔya na liƒi lɛkukudi lɛmmɔ liibómo litulo kalɛ na lise kudeedi.

Na lɛnɔ ni, beléti ntɛ bɔwɔdi teewi ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔni kemo béewi ntɛ dii. Ntɛ bɔwɔdi bɔdubuƒuƒuo na bɔya ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kɔbwɛ na ntɛ ku koƒo lɛnɔ kulálɛ kɔsia. Mmomu ni, ntɛ bɔwɔdi beeti teewi ɔku koƒo kɔwɔdi kemo.”
Uwi ɔdi ka Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bási baaví anta kemo kadi kemo na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, báƒɛ anta amɛni adi na baakun.
Anwuɔsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi básu Yesu banii, “Bi ɔsu na ƒula batɛyane baabla lɛni? Bula ɔda bubo útete kuƒi ka babla lɛni na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ.”

Mmɔ ni, Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bítaka Katɔti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo bítenu lɛla lɛni na Ɔga Dawid ɔ́bla? Uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔɔda anwu ku nwuna bakpana ni, Dawid úsie útéduo Katɔti kakpakɔ na lebo lɛni na ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Abiatar ɔdi ɔkpane unengudi. Údie bodobodo kedee ɔni nse nte bakpane lɛti pɛ na kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔ́di, na úti ɔdi lɛnɔ úte nwuna bakpana na bádi. Ɔmɛni lɛnɔ na nka ɔda bubo bútéte kuƒi, nsu bátasu-ma lɛla lɛdi.”
Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Katɔti úse lɛnwunameyi úte ukyuli lɛbuni. Na ɔɔɔdi ukyuli na úse úte lɛnwunameyi.
Anwuɔsu ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndi lɛnwunameyi lɛnɔ Unwoti.”
Nwuna kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ. Na mmɔ ni, útánu ukyuli ɔni na kɔnu kunwi kɔ́gogolo-nwu.
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bakya kasalakɔ kammɔ. Na benye baanu si ɔdubɔbwi ɔnana ɔmmɔ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ na bawia-nwu litemi.
Yesu ɔ́lɔ ɔnana ɔni na kɔnu kunwi kɔ́gogolo-nwu mmɔ ɔnii ubenye bekyuli ƒui anumi.

Amu na únwini anumi ɔ́tina bekyuli bammɔ na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔdia ka ukyuli ɔbla lɛbuni na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ? Munuu lɛnwunameyi ɔdi limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na ukyuli ubile lɛla? Ɔdi limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ baaƒɔ́ ngba, munuu ɔdi limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na beebile ngba?” Nsu bátakana-nwu lɛla lɛdi bɔsu.

Yesu únwini ɔ́nu bana ƒui na kɔnyi kemo, ɔsika livo líƒi-nwu na bana ukyulikpana kebunku tete ɔsu. Amu na ɔ́su ɔlɛne ɔmɛni ɔnii, “Nene kɔnu boku.” Únene kɔnu. Na kɔnakunwi ni, nwuna kɔnu kɔ́ba-nwu.
Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ bátɔlɔ na bátása ku Herode lɛkpa badi na básusu Yesu bɔdu lɛlɔ.

Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bésie Galilea Ɛpu kudɔ. Na bekyuli lisu pim bani nási Galilea ku Yudea ku Yerusalem ku Idumea ku bani nási Yordan ketu ɔvi ku bani nási Tiro ku Sidon lɛnɔ básiaku-ma. Ɔsika nwuna akɔla bɔbla búusie ɔgyu kakaaka ƒui, na bekyuli pii baayɔ́ ka beti anumi babanu-nwu.

Lebo lɛmmɔ ka Yesu ɔ́ɔbwi bekyuli pii ɔsu ni, balɛne pii baanwanɛ lɛlɔ ka bebetuku-nwu na lɛlɔ lɛyu-ma ɔkplu. Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnii bawia ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi bebese ketudɔ kalɛ na si bekyuli bammɔ beemomo taavili ni, na ɔkɔ uduo-nwu kemo.
Bekyuli badi bakya bani na ayu ekpidi eli-ma lɛlɔ. Si bánya bánu Yesu ni, béboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na baava taasu banii, “Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubi!”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́bala-ma ka bataya bekyuli bati ukyuli ɔni na ɔdi.
Nwuna kama ni, Yesu úsie kɔbi kɔdi lɛlɔ. Na mmɔ ni, ɔ́lɔ nwuna basiakune bani na ɔɔwia.
Bekyuli bamɛni bébo-nwu kudɔ na údie leevu-inyɔ na bana akɔ, na úte-ma lɛnyi ɔnii batalane. Ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Lídie-mii nnii bɛsiaku-mi uwi biala. Na ndubɔtala-mii na bitátaasu litemi buni.
Bɛdubɔgya ayu ekpidi bɔlɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo.”

Nkyuli leevu-inyɔ bani na údie mɛni anyi ndi Simon ɔni na Yesu ɔ́sia lɛnyi ɔnii Petro ku Yakobo ku ɔnwani ɔnamudi Yohane bani ndi Sebedeo bebi ɔni na Yesu úte-ma lɛnyi ɔnii Boanerges ɔni kalɔ ndi ɔnii beetemi ku ɔyikun aani kalɛ na kayaa kabwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu. Na bakladi ndi Andrea ku Ƒilipo ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Toma ku Yakobo ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ku Tadeo ku Simon ɔni nási Kana na nka ɔ́ta únye aban lɛlɔ ku Yuda Iskariot ɔni ndubɔkya Yesu kakya.
Ka Yesu ɔ́si mmɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úbo kaduli kadi. Na bekyuli pii badi básɔ bébo-ma kudɔ mmɔ. Anwuɔsu ɔ́yu Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ɔkplu ka bakɛ kuƒi badi muedi.
Ka nwuna lɛlɔ bekyuli bénu ɔmɛni ni, bésie banii batákpanku-nwu besienku kaduli, ɔsika básu banii, “Kuli kemo muubie-nwu!”

Na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nási Yerusalem básu banii, “Kɔyu kukpidi kɔkya Yesu lɛlɔ kemo. Na ayu ekpidi ɔtɔnkune Beelsebul néte-nwu ɔyikun asa na ɔɔkana ayu ammɔ bɔbɔku taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo!”
Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma na ɔ́tɛmiku-ma na lɛgba kemo ɔnini, “Dɛ na wabla asa na Satan wabɔku anwu ɔlati walɛku ukyuli lɛlɔ kemo?
Si lɛga kadikɔ kadi kéle lɛlɔ akpa akpa na akpa ammɔ eekpóku lɛlɔ ni, lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kalakana bunye.
Si ɔtɔ ɔdi bekyuli béle lɛlɔ ati ati na beekpóku lɛlɔ ni, ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ ulakana bunye.
Anwuɔsu si Satan ɔ́ta unye uukpóku lɛlɔ na nwuna lɛga kadikɔ kéle lɛlɔ akpa akpa ni, lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kadubɔbwɛ, na nwuna lɛga bɔdi bubo kawɔlɔkɔ.
“Na sɔsɔ geen ni, ukyuli ɔdi ulakana na weduo ukyuli ɔni mbo ɔyikun ɔtɔ kemo na uti nwuna ala ɔtɔlɔku. Amu ntu ɔ́ka ɔyikune ɔmɛni buƒie bunyimi asa na wakana-nwu ɔtɔ kemo buduo buti nwuna ala.
“Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka Katɔti ɔdubuti alaekpidi biala na bekyuli bábla ku anyikpi biala ani na bálɔ Katɔti ɔkyiɛ-ma.
Nsu anyikpi ani na ukyuli ɔdi ɔdubɔlɔ Katɔti Kɔyu ni, Katɔti uleti ulakyiɛ-nwu kudi kudii. Ɔsika ɔdubuti likpidi lɛmɛni aani likpidi lɛni na ulayiƒla kudii.”
Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni ɔsika bekyuli bammɔ básu banii kɔyu kukpidi kɔkya anwu Yesu lɛlɔ kemo.
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Yesu banwani ku nwuna uni bébo mmɔ. Kalɛ bekyuli bemomo mmɔ ɔsu ni, bátala ɔtu na nwuna kudɔ ka baawia-nwu.
Amu na bekyuli bani náka bámana-nwu mmɔ básu Yesu banini, “Nu, ƒ^ini ku ƒula banwani benye keyi baawia-a banii bo!”
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔma ndi mina uni? Ɔma bene ndi mina banwani?”
Amu na únwini ɔ́nu bekyuli bani nlie bámana-nwu mmɔ na ɔ́su ɔnii, “Bɛnu, bamɛni ndi mina uni iye mina banwani!
Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ni, anwu ndi mina ɔnwani ɔnanabi iye mina ɔnwani ulekubi iye mina uni.”

Yesu ɔ́sɔ úsie Galilea Ɛpu kudɔ na úsie ɔɔtina litemi buni lɛmmɔ. Na bekyuli pii bani nábaka bámana-nwu bumomo ɔsu ni, úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na úlie ɔkɔlɔ ɔni nsia ntu anumi. Na bekyuli bammɔ bébenye utublii ka Yesu ɔɔtɛmiku-ma.
Uwi pii na nwuna ala bɔtina kemo ni, agba na uubó teeti teedie lɛla lɛni na ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔsu kalɔ taatina-ma. Ala ani na ɔ́tina-ma ndi amɛni.
Ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binu! Uwi ɔdi ni, ɔnana ɔdi úsie kemo ɔnii utágya edula adi.
Ka ɔkya ɔɔgya edula amɛni ni, adi álɛ ébo kuludɔ, na baasɛ bébo na bála-nya bádi.
Adi álɛ ébo atabi lɛlɔ, kesii kani na lɛti liiibo pii. Anwuɔsu edula amɛni ákwɛ pla.
Nsu ka ɔƒɛ ɔ́sia ni, áyɛyɛ na ékpi. Ɔsika ana lidu lítakɛ adila ɔ́si atabi ammɔ ɔsu.
Edula ammɔ adi álɛ ébo liyu akɔ. Na liyu lɛmmɔ líyi lɛ́da-nya na átakɛ lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu átama bebi.
Na adi álɛ ébo kalɔ kabuni lɛlɔ. Na ákwɛ, na ádia, na áma bebi. Na adi ánwu ebi liti ku leevu, na adi lɛnɔ ánwu ebi eti anyɔ.”
Kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Anwuɔsu, si bibo atu ni, na binu kaduɛ!”
Uwi ɔni na Yesu lɛti ulie ni, bekyuli bani nénu nwuna lɛgba lɛmmɔ badi ku nwuna leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ na béye-nwu banii udie lɛgba lɛmmɔ kalɔ ute-ma.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Katɔti úti nwuna lɛga bɔdi abɛla ani na bekyuli pii baaagyi ɔ́tina-mii. Na bakladi bani nkya kama ni, ama agba kemo kani na badubunu etemila.

Anwuɔsu úbo aani kalɛ na Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi únweni úse ɔnii, “ 'Badubo bɔnu, nsu balanu baláti. Badubo bunu, nsu belénu kalɔ. Ɔsika ina ka beenú na baanu ni, belénu kalɔ na benwini anumi besienku Katɔti kudɔ na uti bana alaekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma.' ”
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bilenu lɛgba lɛmɛni kalɔ? Dɛ na bɛdubɔbla asa na binu lɛgba lɛbambadi biala kalɔ?
Ala ɔgyane ɔmɛni ɔɔgya Katɔti litemi.
Bekyuli badi bese aani ebi ani nálɛ ébo na kuludɔ. Ka bánya bénu kani na Satan ɔ́da-ni údie-ma kuli kemo ɔ́tɔlɔku.
Bekyuli babambadi lɛnɔ bese aani ebi ani nálɛ ébo atabi akɔ. Na si uwi ɔni na beenú-ni ni, ebiti aada-ma.
Nsu litemi lɛmmɔ lidu lítada kalɔ kaduɛ. Báƒɔ bádi uwi blii suɛ kani. Nsu si lɛsɛ lɛdi iye bukpoku bɔdi búbo-ma lɛlɔ na litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, badubunwini baasɔ teesie kama.
“Na bekyuli badi lɛnɔ bese aani ebi ani nálɛ ébo liyu akɔ. Na ama ndi bekyuli bani nénu litemi buni lɛmɛni,
nsu kayawi liƒu bɔda ku lɛnungyie likpidi na sika lɛlɔ ku ɔlɔna ɔkwɛ adala akya-ma kayi kemo. Ala amɛni ényimi litemi lɛmmɔ na litanwu ebi.

“Na bekyuli badi lɛnɔ bénu Katɔti litemi aani egyiibi ani nálɛ ébo kalɔ kabuni lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bammɔ báƒɔ-ni ku kayi kemo ƒui. Na uwi ndi uwi ni, baalɛ́ lili na baanwu kɔyu kemo ebi. Badi bese aani edula ani nánwu ebi aavlatɛ, iye liti ku leevu, iye eti anyɔ.”
Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-ma úsienku anumi ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔtu asogya taakya kagyigyɛ iye nwuna atɛla kalɔ? Ɔɔɔdi asogya kasiakɔ na beeti asogya taasia?
Lɛla biala lɛni na bekyuli béti babala lɛdubɔlɛ keyi, na Katɔti ɔdububimi lɛla biala na bébi-ni ala.
Anwuɔsu si bibo atu ni, na binu kaduɛ!”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bise atu kaduɛ na lɛla lɛni biinú lɛlɔ! Ɔsika kalɛ na aakɔ́ku bekyuli bamba taanu ni, lɛni kani na Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔku-ɔ bɔnu, utulo muedi!

Lɛni básu bése ka ukyuli ɔni mbo lɛla lɛdi ni, anwu na Katɔti ɔsɔ ɔdubute ubunku-nwu. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo lɛla lɛdi na ute ni, ubliidi ɔni na ubo muedi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ nwuna ƒui ɔsiku-nwu kudɔ.”
Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kese aani ɔnana ɔni nágya egyiibi.
Ɔɔtɛ taata emeyi biala, na ebi ammɔ aakwɛ́ na aalɛ́ lili. Nsu ɔɔɔgyi kalɛ na ɔ́bla asa na úbo lɛni.
Kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na báva ala kani mɔɔtumini ebi ammɔ lɛni. Kudeedi, si kɔ́kwɛ ni, kɔdubudie lili asa na nwuna kugyii kɔlɛ. Na si kɔɔlɛ́ lili ni, na kɔɔnwu ebi pii.
Si ebi ammɔ ábi lɛlɔ ni, na béede-nya. Ɔsika na edula udewi úudu.”
Yesu úye ɔnini, “Bi na ndubuti Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ bɔkɔku? Bi lɛgba na meti medie-ni kalɔ?
Use aani si ukyuli úti kegyiibi kebliidi ƒui na kayawi útáva.
Uwi uletu asa na kaakwɛ́ na kaabla kugyii. Na kugyii kɔmɛni muubómo teetulo na lɛku egyii ƒui akɔ. Kɔɔta kɔgba pii na kɔɔbla ɔyuli. Na baasɛ baabla ayu taakya kugyii kɔmmɔ lili.”
Yesu ɔ́su-ma etemila buni na agba amɛni udu kemo kalɛ na baakana kalɔ bunu.
Útetemi útete-ma ɔni na útebo agba. Nsu si uwi ɔni na anwu ku nwuna batɛyane lɛti belie ni, na uudie-nya kalɔ taatina-ma.
Limeyi lɛmmɔ kani useyi uwi ni, Yesu ɔ́lɔ nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛya na busie ɛpu ɔmɛni ɔvi ɔni ngye.”
Anwuɔsu bátɔlɔ bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni kudɔ na bétéduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi ɔni kemo na Yesu úuduo úlie kalɔ kemo, na bétiku-nwu báviaku. Lɛkɔlɔ lɛbambadi lɛnɔ lisie mmɔ.
Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ubendi ɔdi úse kalɔ uukpó, na uubó ntu teewi ɔkɔlɔ lɛlɔ na buuduo-nwu kemo ɔni na ubu blii na nka ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ uyi na ɔnyi.
