Ɔ́ya na bekyuli bani na kɔka kɔɔda ƒui bémo ku ala abuni sɔɔn, na balakɛne bénwini ku enukplu.
Nwuna anumi asia kenye kani na ɔ́su bula bati kuuku úse lɛlɔ, na úbo ɔnii ubebunku Israel kadi bekyuli ƒui.
Únyimo ka uti kɔnyana bɔnu ute Abraham ku nwuna bawɔ úsela ƒui!”
Amu na Maria ɔ́sɔ ɔkya Elisabet kudɔ aani abuli atɛ sɔɔn asa na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie ɔma.
Uwi úbedu Elisabet ka ɔwɔ. Na ɔ́wɔ ɔnanabi.
Na Elisabet bekutene ku banwa ƒui bénu akɔla ebendi ani na Katɔti ɔ́bla úte-nwu. Na bana ƒui bákɛku-nwu ebiti kaduɛ.
Ka ɔnamu ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɔ emeyi maane ni, bébo banii bebekulo-nwu lego na báwia ka basia-nwu ɔti lɛnyi banii Sakaria.
Nsu uni útatunaku-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛsia-nwu lɛnyi bɛnii Yohane.”
Amu na bákyaku-nwu unyeƒi banii, “Na ka balálɔ ƒula ɔtɔ kemo ukyuli ɔdi banii Yohane nɔɔ?”
Amu na bébo ɔti enu béye-nwu bénu lɛnyi lɛni na ɔɔwia ka basia ubidi.
Mmɔ na Sakaria ɔ́ƒɔ lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na beenweni ala taasia na únweni ɔnii, “Nwuna lɛnyi ndi Yohane.” Na ɔ́bla bana ƒui dɛye dɛye.
Mmɔ kani na Sakaria úse kalɔ ku butemi na uumwi Katɔti.
Liƒu bonwu lɛdi lɛ́da nwuna bekutene ɔni náya na litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́kya lɛma lɛni nkya Yudea abi lɛlɔ ƒui kemo.
Bekyuli bani ƒui nénu ala amɛni béti kasusu kadi na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi ukyuli udu na ɔnamu ɔmɛni ɔdubo bunwini geen tɔ?” Béye lɛlɔ lɛni ɔsika use nwaa ka Katɔti ɔyikun ɔsiaku-nwu.
Mmɔ na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ ubi ɔmmɔ ɔti Sakaria lɛlɔ kemo na ɔ́su úse ɔnini,
“Bɛya na bumwi Blɔti, Israel Unwoti, ɔsika úbo úbebunku nwuna kadi na ɔƒɔ-ma na bakɛ bɔnwuna.
Úti Ɔƒɔne Ɔyikune ɔdi úte-bu ɔni na ɔdi anwu ɔlati kabla ɔblane Dawid kaba kemo ubi.
Úse kenye kamɛni úse kukuuku ɔkɛ nwuna kenye bediene kedee lɛlɔ ka ni,
ɔdubudie-bu ɔlɛku ekpidi bablane ku ama bani na muukisi-bu ƒui enu kemo.
Ɔ́su ka ɔdubɔnu bula bati kuuku kɔnyana na wenyimo bunyimi kedee bɔni nkya ama ku-nwu ntɛ.
Na ɔ́su bula ɔti Abraham kenye kpakplaa kamɛni úse ka ni,
ɔdubudie-bu na bula bekisine enu kemo, na ɔdubɔya na bɔbla-nwu kabla na liƒu lɛsɔ lɛɛɛdubo-bu bɔda.
Na ɔdubɔbla-bu kedee na buse siin na nwuna anumi na bula ngba emeyi kemo ƒui.
Na awɔ, mina ubi ni, badubɔlɔ-ɔ banii Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui Kenye Udiene. Awɔ ndubo bɔgyu bɔtɔ na Blɔti lɛtɔtɔ kalɛ na aklibi ulu ese ete nwuna bubo.
Na aya nwuna bekyuli bati ka badubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ na bana ekpidi buti taakyiɛ ɔsu.
Bula Katɔti use buɛɛ, na ɔɔnu kɔnyana. Ɔdubɔtala Ɔƒɔne ɔkya-bu ɔni muukeye aani kalɛ na ɔƒɛ ɔɔtu.
Na ɔya na bukeye bɔmɛni bɔsi katɔ buwi bekyuli bani nli kasuudikɔ na kukpi liƒu lɛɛda-ma kalɛ na ɔkpanku-bu ɔvinku keyi buɛɛ ulu lɛlɔ.”
Amu na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɛ lili na kayi kasia Katɔti lɛlɔ kpakplaa. Na ketele ntɛ kani na úlie úti útédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ Israel kadi anumi.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare Augusto úte ɔyikun ɔnii benweni bekyuli bani ƒui nkya Roma lɛga bɔdi kalɔ anyi.
Na bekyuli anyi bunweni budeedi bɔmɛni kemo ni, aban unengu ɔni baalɔ banii Kirenio mɔɔdi Siria kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu ukyuli biala úsie nwuna ɔma úténweni lɛnyi.
Amu na Yoseƒ lɛnɔ ɔ́ta ɔ́si Nasaret ɔma na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ úsie Betlehem na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ kesii kani na báwɔ Ɔga Dawid. Yoseƒ úsie mmɔ ɔsika ɔdi Dawid kaba kemo ubi.
Útiku Maria ɔni na bévele béte-nwu na ɔda kaƒɔ lɛnɔ.
Na uwi ɔni na bakya Betlehem mmɔ ni, uwi úbedu Maria ka ɔwɔ.
Ɔ́wɔ nwuna ubi ɔnanabi udeedi na ɔtɔ kakɛ kani na bebuo batɛ. Na únyimi-nwu ɔ́kya kɔdi kemo, na úti-nwu ɔ́va lɛla lɛni kemo na bebuo bammɔ baadi, ɔsika kakyakɔ kadi kasɔ keeebo na baƒɔ keduokɔ.
Amu na likpo lɛmmɔ na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ni, baƒonu badane badi bakya baanu bana bebuo lɛlɔ usien ƒui.
Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ na Unwoti bukeye bɔdi búkeye búbewi-ma lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu báyia geen,
nsu Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitayia. Líboku-mii linyesia lɛbuni lɛni ndubuti lɛlɔyɔ ku ebiti geen ute bekyuli ƒui.
Na ɔmwi limeyi lɛmɛni kani lɛlɔ ni, báwɔ Ɔƒɔne ɔni ndi Blɔti Kristo béte-mii na Ɔga Dawid ɔma kemo.
Na lɛla lɛni na bɛdubuti bɛnu bɛti ni, ani ndi ka bɛdubɔnu ubiwɔ ɔni bényimi bákya kɔdi kemo na ɔtɛ bebuo kadikɔ.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti batu lɛkpa bonwu lɛdi lɛ́si kayaa lɛ́da lɛ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ na líbebunku ɔtu ɔmɛni na bakya beemwi Katɔti banii,
“Ɔbu ku bumwi ute Katɔti na katɔ kakaaka ƒui, na keyi buɛɛ kasiaku bayawine ƒui bani na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́!”

Na uwi ɔni na Katɔti batu bamɛni bátɔlɔ-ma kudɔ na básɔ bénwini bésie katɔ ni, baƒonu badane bamɛni básu lɛlɔ banii, “Bɛya na busie Betlehem butánu ala ani nálɛ na Unwoti údie ɔ́tina-bu mɛni.”
Amu na bábabla bésie na bátánu Maria ku Yoseƒ ku ubiwɔ ɔni ntɛ bebuo kadikɔ mmɔ.
Na ka bánu-nwu lɛni ni, básu ala ani ƒui na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔ́si ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Amu na bekyuli bani ƒui nénu baƒonu badane bamɛni etemila ni, ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi.
Nsu Maria únyimo ala amɛni ƒui, na úti-nya lɛlɔ kasusu úsie ɔgyu.
Amu na baƒonu badane bammɔ básɔ bénwini na beemwi Katɔti na ala ani ƒui na bánu ku ani bénu lɛnɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika ana ƒui ese pɛpɛɛpɛ kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ma.
Na emeyi maane kama ka uwi úbedu ka bekulo ubi ɔmmɔ lego ni, básia-nwu lɛnyi banii Yesu aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su úse asa na badubɔda-nwu kaƒɔ.
Amu na uwi úbedu ka Yoseƒ ku Maria babla lɛlɔ bɔbla sɛɛn ɔdi aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina kenye. Na béti ubiwɔ ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ bésienku Yerusalem banii beeti-nwu bete Unwoti.
Lɛni na bénweni bákya Katɔti ɔda bubo ɔku kemo banii, “Ɔnanabi udeedi biala ku ebuo ɔgyani udeedi biala ni, ɔdi ka bedie-nwu bese bete Unwoti.”
Na bésie bátábla akpala béte Unwoti, ɔsika ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔ́tina ka beti babloduma inyɔ iye bamangbɛ inyɔ bakpa bete-nwu.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi baalɔ banii Simeon ɔkya Yerusalem. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni na ɔɔyia Katɔti na unye ɔɔnu ulu ute Israel bɔƒɔ. Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔsiaku-nwu
na kúse-nwu kayi ka ulekpi wetédu lebo lɛni na ɔ́nu ka báwɔ Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni kenye na Katɔti ɔ́su úse.
Amu na Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́tɔnku Simon kúsienku Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ka bawɔne bamɛni béti Yesu ubiwɔ béboku banii bababla ala ani ƒui na ɔdi ka babla bete-nwu na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kenye ni,
Simon ɔ́ƒɔ ubiwɔ ɔmmɔ ɔ́da, na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu ɔnini,
“Unwoti, ɔƒɛni ni, ka ásia ƒula linyese anu ɔsu ni, akana na edie ami, ƒula kabla ɔblane, ulu na nteesie ku keyi buɛɛ.
Ami ɔlati mina anumi ánu Ɔƒɔne
ɔni na áya na úbo na kadi bekyuli ƒui anumi.
Ɔdi bukeye bɔni ndubudie ƒula lɛyɔla keyi ute bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ. Na ɔdubuti ɔbu uboku ƒula kadi bekyuli Israelƒuɔ akɔ.”
Ala ani na Simon ɔ́su mɛni áya na ɔ́bla Yoseƒ ku Maria dɛye dɛye.

Na Simon úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ na ɔ́su Maria ɔnini, “Ubi ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi. Na ɔdi bɔƒɔ iye bɔyii ute Israelƒuɔ pii na kalɛ na báƒɔ-nwu kenye. Ɔdi bɔnu bɔti bɔni nási Katɔti kudɔ na bekyuli pii badubɔta benye-nwu lɛlɔ.
Na ɔdubo bekyuli bamɛni kasusu kani nábɛ keyi budie. Na ɔkɛ ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, adubunu ɔlɛ aani kalɛ na kewii kaatu ukyuli kayi.”

Amu na uleku ɔdi ɔni ndi Katɔti kenye udiene ɔkya mmɔ na baalɔ-nwu banii Hana. Na nwuna ɔti Ƒanuel ɔ́si Aser kaba kemo. Akwa maatɛ kani na úlie kɔgya asa na ɔgyani úkpi. Na ɔdi ukpinele ɔni na ɔ́ɔbi lɛlɔ geen. Ɔbla akwa liti ku aavlatɛ-ine sɔɔn mɛni. Uusié Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ uwi ndi uwi teetémwi Katɔti usien ku ɔƒɛ na ɔɔkpali katɔ na uulie kɔka lɛnɔ.
Uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, anwu lɛnɔ úbo na úti linugya úte Katɔti, na útemi ɔ́siku ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ úte bekyuli bani ƒui nnye baanu Katɔti ulu ka waƒɔ Yerusalem.
Na ka Yoseƒ ku Maria báwɔlɔ bana ɔdi bɔbla aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔda bubo ɔku ɔ́tina kalɛ ni, bénwini bésie bana ɔma Nasaret na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɛ lili na ɔ́kɛ lɛlɔ ɔkplu, na ɔ́da anu geen. Na nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́da Katɔti kubiti.
Lɛkwa ndi lɛkwa ni, Yesu bawɔne beesié Yerusalem taatádi limeyi lɛni baalɔ banii Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi.
Amu ka Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ akwa leevu-anyɔ ni, básɔ bésie Yerusalem aani kalɛ na baabla kukuuku kalɛ.
Na ka limeyi lɛmmɔ bɔdi lɛ́sa na básɔ bénwini bésela ɔma ni, Yesu anwu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kya kama na Yerusalem mmɔ. Na nwuna bawɔne bátati lɛni.
Ama bábu banii ɔkya bekyuli bammɔ akɔ ɔsu bésie ɔƒɛ umodi ulu asa na bése kalɔ baawia-nwu na bakpana ku nwuna lɛlɔ bekyuli akɔ.
Na ka bátanu-nwu ɔsu ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem bakɛ baawia-nwu.
Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ ni, bátánu-nwu na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ka anwu ku Yudaƒuɔ ala batinane badi belie. Mmɔ na ɔkya uunú bana ala ani na baasu na uuye-ma etemila ekpo ekpo teenu.
Na bani nénu-nwu ala kenye budie ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye na lɛlati bonwu lɛni udu na ɔda uudie ala ani beeye-nwu kenye ɔsu.
Ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu nwuna bawɔne ka bánu-nwu lɛni. Na uni úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ubi, bi ɔsu na ábla-bu lɛmɛni udu? Ami ku ƒula ɔti ƒui búduo lɛƒɛda kemo na bɔkɛ bɔɔví taawia-a.”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛkɛ bɛɛwia-mi taavi? Bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii mina Ɔti kesii na ɔlɛka lɛkya yoo?”
Nsu ama bétenu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su-ma mɛni kalɔ.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́siaku-ma na bátɔlɔ bésie Nasaret, na úboku lɛlɔ kalɔ úte-ma. Na ala amɛni ƒui éduo uni kasusu kemo úsie ɔgyu.
Na Yesu úbalɛ lili na lɛnunda ku ɔlɔna kemo, na ɔ́ƒɔ lɛnyi na bekyuli ku Katɔti ƒui anumi.

Na lɛkwa leevu-lɛlɔndi lɛni na Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare Tiberio ɔɔdi lɛga ni, Kenye Udiene Yohane ɔni ndi Sakaria ubidi ɔ́kɛ linyesia lɛdi ɔ́siku Katɔti kudɔ uwi ɔni na uli ketele kemo. Na Pontio Pilato ɔɔtɔnku aban na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na Herode ɔɔdi Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, Herode ɔnwani Ƒilipo lɛnɔ ɔɔdi kalɔ kani baalɔ Iturea ku Trakoniti kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ. Na Lɛlɔ Ɔdine Lisania lɛnɔ ɔɔdi Abilene kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Hana ku Kaiaƒa badi Katɔti bakpane benengudi.
Amu na Yohane ɔkɛ ɔɔví Yordan utuvi ku kalɛkɛ mmɔ bene ƒui ɔɔsu Katɔti litemi ɔnii, “Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi na bɛƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi kalɛ na Katɔti uti bina ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-mii.”
Na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔku kemo ni, lɛni na bénweni bákya banini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔva na ketele kemo ɔnini, 'Binye kagyumana bite Blɔti. Bɛklibi bina lɛlɔ kaduɛ bite nwuna bubo.
Biyile lɛbonga na bɛbwɛ abi ku abinkpo ƒui na atɛ kalɔ. Na binyene lilu lɛni nábu. Na kesii kani nse kpukplo kpukplo ni, bɛbla-nwu suɛlɛ suɛlɛ.
Mmɔ na bekyuli ƒui badubɔnu Ɔƒɔne ɔni na ɔ́tala!' ”

Bekyuli pii bálɛ bébo banii Yohane ɔkpila-ma ntu. Nsu Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo likyulikpi aani balakpi! Bitatɔlɔ lɛlɔ bɛnii si bákpila-mii ntu kani ni, ɔ́sa na bɛ́lɛ Katɔti kɔtu kɔni na ɔdubɔni bekyuli bekpidi kemo.

Bɛtina na bina ɔbladu kemo ka bínwini kama bɛ́kya bina alaekpidi. Na bitakali ka Abraham kaba kemo bebi bɛdi ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔɔɔdubo-mii kɔtu bɔni. Mɔɔsu-mii nnii Katɔti ɔkana udie kaba ɔsiku atakpɛ amɛni kemo ute Abraham.
Bɛɛnu ka bada kadadi benye kugyii lɛlɔ na bada-ku ku ligyiitu. Kugyii biala naaanwu ebi buni ni, badubɔmɛnɛ-ku bakya lɛgyavonku kemo!”
Amu na bekyuli bammɔ béye-nwu banii, “Na bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla ɔƒɛni?”
Amu na údie kenye ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔni mbo awu ɔkyadi na údu inyɔ ni, ti unwi te ukyuli ɔni neeebo ɔdi. Na ukyuli ɔni mbo adila lɛnɔ ni, na ule-nya lɛni kani.”
Kuyi baƒɔne badi lɛnɔ bébo banii ɔkpila-ma ntu. Ama béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?”
Amu na Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitaƒɔ kuyi bitetulo lɛla lɛni na ɔda bubo búte ulu bɔ́wɔ.”

Bekpone badi lɛnɔ béye-nwu banini, “Na abu nɔɔ? Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?” Amu na ɔ́su ama lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Bɛya na bina lɛyuƒɔla lɛda-mii ebiti. Na bɛsɔ bitasia ɔmɛni kama bitanya ukyuli ɔdi bitamana na bɛƒɔ-nwu egulabi adi iye bitadu ukyuli ɔdi kɔtɔ na ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ.”
Bekyuli bamɛni lɛnunsia lɛ́kɔ katɔ líbu na bákali ka Yohane ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na benye bagya.

Anwuɔsu Yohane ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Ntu na ami líti mɔɔkpila-mii. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ɔsia-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni na utulo-mi ƒui! Ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni ndubuti Katɔti Kɔyu ku ogya ɔkpila-mii.
Ɔda nwuna kɔɔlɛ kɔni na ɔdubɔƒɛ nwuna edula udie na uti uwi unwu kemo. Nsu ɔdubɔkyula aƒaƒa ku lɛmuyɔ lɛkladi na ogya ɔni naaadubo buni kudii!”
Na Yohane ɔ́su Katɔti litemi na lilu pii lɛlɔ úte bekyuli, na ɔ́su-ma geen ka bavumana udu ku bana ngba bulie.
Na ka aban lɛga ɔdine Herode úƒie ɔnwani ulekudi ɔni baalɔ Herodia ɔ́ƒɔ ku udunkpi ala bamba pii ani na ɔ́bla ɔsu ni, Yohane ɔ́dɔnku-nwu.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu Herode ɔ́sɔ ɔ́bla lɛla lɛni návi ntu lítulo ƒui ɔni na ɔ́ya na béti Yohane bátákya ɔtɔ kemo.
Ka Yohane ɔ́kpila bekyuli ƒui ntu ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kpila Yesu lɛnɔ ntu. Na uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ ni, katɔ kálɛmi.
Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kúbo kúbelie-nwu lɛlɔ aani abloduma kalɛ. Amu na bénu Katɔti lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ lɛnini, “Awɔ ndi mina Ubi Ɔyɔne. Aaƒɔ́-mi anu geen.”
Yesu ɔ́ƒɔ aani akwa aavlatɛ uwi ɔni na úse nwuna kabla kalɔ. Bekyuli kasusu kaatina-ma ka nwuna ɔwɔne ndi Yoseƒ ɔni ɔti ndi Eli
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mattat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lewi ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melki ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yanai ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoseƒ
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matatia ɔni ɔti ɔdi Amos ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahum ɔni ɔti ɔdi Hesli ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nagai
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mahat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matatia ɔni ɔti ɔdi Semein ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yosek ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoda
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yohanan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Resa ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sorobabel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sealtiel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Neri
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melki ɔni ɔti ɔdi Adi ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kosam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Elmadam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Er
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yesu ɔni ɔti ɔdi Elieser ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yorim ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matat ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lewi
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Simeon ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yuda ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yoseƒ ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yonam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Eliakim
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Melea ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mena ɔni ɔti ɔdi Matata ɔni ɔti ɔdi Natan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Dawid
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yisai ɔni ɔti ɔdi Obed ɔni ɔti ɔdi Boas ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sala ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahson
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Aminadab ɔni ɔti ɔdi Admin ɔni ɔti ɔdi Arni ɔni ɔti ɔdi Hesron ɔni ɔti ɔdi Peres ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yuda
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yakob ɔni ɔti ɔdi Isak ɔni ɔti ɔdi Abraham ɔni ɔti ɔdi Tera ɔni ɔti ɔdi Nahor
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Serug ɔni ɔti ɔdi Reu ɔni ɔti ɔdi Peleg ɔni ɔti ɔdi Eber ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sala
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kainan ɔni ɔti ɔdi Arƒaksad ɔni ɔti ɔdi Sem ɔni ɔti ɔdi Noa ɔni ɔti ɔdi Lamek
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Metusala ɔni ɔti ɔdi Henok ɔni ɔti ɔdi Yared ɔni ɔti ɔdi Mahaleel ɔni ɔti ɔdi Kainan
ɔni ɔti ɔdi Enos ɔni ɔti ɔdi Set ɔni ɔti ɔdi Adam ɔni ɔti ɔdi Katɔti.
Ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ni, Yesu únwini ɔ́si Yordan mmɔ. Na Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́tɔnku-nwu kúsienku ketele kemo.
Mmɔ na Satan útékpoku-nwu ɔ́nu emeyi aavlene sɔɔn. Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, Yesu útadi lɛla lɛdi ɔsu kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu na kawɔlɔkɔ.
Amu na Satan ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si Katɔti ubi na adi ni, na asu lɛtabi lɛmɛni na linwini adila.”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii ɔɔɔdi lɛdila lɛti pɛ muute ukyuli ngba geen.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Satan ɔ́sɔ útiku-nwu útényene kesii kani nákuku. Na ɔ́tina-nwu kayawi ala ku kana lɛga kadikɔ ƒui.
Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ndubuti kayawi ƒui ɔyikun ɔmɛni ku kana akɛla amɛni ƒui lite-ɔ, ɔsika béti-nya béte-mi, na lɛkana liti-nya lite ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́.
Anwuɔsu ala amɛni ƒui adubunwini awɔdi si ákya lili kalɔ ete-mi.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ka ni, 'Unwoti Katɔti lɛti pɛ kani na ukyuli ɔdubumwi na ɔbla-nwu kabla.' ”
Nwuna kama ni, Satan útiku Yesu úsienku Yerusalem na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ɔtɔ katɔ ƒui, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si Katɔti ubi na adi ni, da lɛlɔ nyonu siku mɛni na atáƒiɛmi kalɔ.
Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu ɔnii, 'Katɔti ɔdubɔya na nwuna batu benye-ɔ kagyumana.'
'Badubukeyi-ɔ ɔni na eleti lɛlɔ alaƒiɛmi lɛtabi lɛdi muedi.' ”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔɔsu ka ni, 'Takɔku Unwoti Katɔti aanu.' ”
Ka Satan úkpoku Yesu ɔ́nu lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́da-nwu únyene mmɔ asa.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Galilea na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo. Na nwuna lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kúgyingya kɔ́kya mmɔ ku amadɔ mmɔ ƒui.
Ɔ́tina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na ukyuli biala úmwi-nwu ala bɔtina.

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úsie Nasaret kesii kani na bátumini-nwu ɔ́si lɛnamu uwi. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ aani kalɛ kani na ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla. Na ɔ́ta únye utaaka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala.
Amu na béti Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia ɔku béte-nwu. Ɔ́ƒɛnimi ɔku ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ka kesii kani na bénwini banii,

“Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, ɔsika Katɔti náƒuna-mi ɔnii nti litemi buni lɛmɛni mboku bawabane. Na ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii nkɔ lɛsa nte bekyuli bani na béƒie kalɛ na bakɛ bɔnwuna. Na bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma ni, bataanu. Na bekyuli bani na baanya taakya ku lɛbibo ni, bakɛ bɔnwuna.
Na lɛya bati ka Katɔti uwi ɔni na weti waƒɔ nwuna bekyuli údu.”
Na Yesu únyimi kakunkɛ kammɔ na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úte ala ammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune, na ɔ́yu úlie kalɔ. Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui béti anumi bálɛ-nwu lɛlɔ, na benye baanu-nwu kpoo.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bunweni Kedee likpo lɛni na bínu ka lɛ́ka mɛni ni, líbo líte lɛni ɔmwi kadi.”
Na nwuna etemila ani na ɔɔsu áda-ma kayi geen, na kalɛ na unyemi lɛnɔ ɔɔta-nwu útakɔsi na ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔɔɔdi Yoseƒ ubidi ɔmmɔ na ɔdi mɛni yoo?”

Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ngyi ka bɛdubo-mi lɛgba lɛmɛni bunyimene bɛnii, 'Uvone, bwi awɔ ɔlati ƒula lɛlɔ.' Na bɛsɔ bɛdubo-mi bɔsu lɛnɔ bɛnii, 'Ala ani udu na búnu ka ábla na Kapernaum ni, bla-nya na awɔ ɔlati ƒula ɔma.' ”
Na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Nsu mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, balábu Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi na anwu ɔlati nwuna ɔma.
Ɔdi litemi geen ka bekpinele pii bákya Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ na lebo lɛni na Elia ɔ́kya. Na ɔnantu úbada akwa atɛ ku kakɛ. Na kɔka bonwu kɔdi kúbo kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ.
Nsu ni, Katɔti útatala Elia ɔnii utébunku Israel ukpinele ɔdi. Mmomu ɔ́tala-nwu ɔ́kya ukpinele ɔdi na Sarep na Sidon kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Lɛnɔ ni, bekyuli pii bákya béteeƒi ɔlɛgyie na Israel kalɔ na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elisa uwi. Nsu ɔɔɔdi bana akɔ ɔdi na bábwi, amu ntu Naeman ɔni nási Siria kalɔ lɛlɔ lɛti pɛ.”
Ka bekyuli bani nkya kasalakɔ mmɔ bénu ɔmɛni ni, béti kɔnyi geen.
Na báta bénye na bátákpɛ Yesu bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bétényene kɔyuɛ kɔdi kɔtu ku kasusu ka bebo-nwu batákya kɔyuɛ kemo.
Nsu Yesu úsie ɔ́vi-ma ntɛ na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Kapernaum ɔmankemo na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Mmɔ ni, úse kalɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli ala na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ.
Na nwuna butemi ku ɔyikun ɔsu ni, nwuna ala bɔtina bɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ dɛye dɛye.
Amu na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ mmɔ ɔni lɛlɔ na kɔyu kukpidi kulie. Na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini,
“Ao! Bi na aawia-bu kudɔ mɛni, Yesu Nasareni? Bubo na ébo mɛni anii abakyula-bu? Ngyi ukyuli ɔni na adi! Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ɔtalane Kedee!”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ba lɛsɛ! Na avi alɛ ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo!” Amu na kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ kúƒwimi ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒiɛmi kalɔ na bana anumi, na kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo kɔ́tɔlɔ. Nsu ukyuli ɔmmɔ útaƒɔ ɔlɛ ɔdi.
Ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui yaa na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Bi etemila udu na adi mɛni? Ukyuli ɔmɛni ubo kuƒi na uuti ɔyikun taabɔku ayu ekpidi na aaví taalɛ bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo.”
Na ala ani baasu taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ mɛni égyingya ákya ekpo ani ƒui na amadɔ mmɔ.
Yesu ɔ́lɛ Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Simon kesii. Na Simon ɔmɛni uleni ɔtɛ ɔlɛ ɔni na lɛlɔ lɛ́ƒɔ ogya geen. Na báya na Yesu ɔ́ti.
Amu na úsie uténye-nwu kudɔ na kesii kani na ɔtɛ, na ɔ́bɔku ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu na ɔ́ta únye na úsie kalɔ ɔɔnwá teete-ma.
Na ka kadi kábla buɛɛ ni, bekyuli bani ƒui na lɛlɛ lidu lidu lɛda bana bakpana ni, béti-ma béboku Yesu kudɔ. Na úti enu ɔ́sia-ma lɛlɔ unwi unwi na ɔ́bwi-ma ƒui.

Ayu ekpidi lidu pii lɛnɔ lɛ́vi lɛ́lɛ bekyuli kemo na baava taasu banii, “Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubidi!” Nsu Yesu ɔ́bala ayu ekpidi ammɔ na útete-ma ulu ka basu lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika báti ka anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
Kadi kégye ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsie kesii kani nábɛ. Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bése kalɔ baawia-nwu taavi. Na ka bánu-nwu ni, bákya ɔkplu ka betile-nwu kuƒi kalɛ na ulatɔlɔ.
Nsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka lisie ntásu Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi buni lɛmɛni na lɛma bamba lɛnɔ kemo, ɔsika ɔmɛni na Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii mbabla.”
Anwuɔsu ɔ́su Katɔti litemi na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ ƒui na kalɔ kammɔ kemo.
Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu unye ɛpu ɔni baalɔ banii Genesaret kɔtu, na bekyuli baanwanɛ lɛlɔ kalɛ na bakpɛ bede-nwu na benu Katɔti litemi lɛni na ɔɔsu.
Yesu ɔ́nu ka lɛkɔlɔ inyɔ linye ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ na lɛsawu bewine bammɔ bátɔlɔ bésie baaƒɔ bana lɛsawu.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́kɔ úduo unwi kemo ɔni ndi Simon ɔdi, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnii udi ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ usienku ntu anumi blii. Ɔkɔlɔ kemo mmɔ na úlie ɔ́tina bekyuli bammɔ ala.
Ka ɔ́tina-ma ala ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Di ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ sienku kesii kani na ntu bɔmmɔ bɔ́gyu blii, na awɔ ku ƒula bakpana biwi bina lɛsawu na bidie lɛna.”
Na Simon údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati, usien umodi ɔmɛni bɔ́bla kabla ku lɛnungyie na bútedie lɛla lɛdi. Nsu ni, ndubɔya na buwi lɛsawu lɛmmɔ aani kalɛ na ásu.”
Béwi lɛsawu lɛmmɔ na bédie lɛna pii ɔni náya na bana lɛsawu líse kalɔ liikúlo.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bébo bana bakpana enu na ɔkɔlɔ unyɔdi kemo banii bebo bebebunku-ma. Bébo na bédie lɛna béwi lɛkɔlɔ inyɔ lɛmɛni kemo tɛtɛɛtɛ ɔni blii nébu na lɛkɔlɔ lɛmmɔ lɛnyi ntu kemo.
Ka Simon Petro ɔ́nu lɛla lɛni nálɛ mɛni ni, ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na Yesu anumi na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, takpɛ tede-mi, ɔsika alaekpidi ɔblane na ndi.”
Lɛna pii lɛni na bédie mɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla anwu ku nwuna badi kalɛ kadi.
Lɛni kani na ɔ́bla Simon bakpana Yakobo ku Yohane bani ndi Sebedeo bebi lɛnɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Tayia. Ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, bɛdubuteedie bekyuli teete Katɔti.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, báni lɛkɔlɔ lɛmmɔ ƒui bétéwi utublii na bányonu lɛla biala béwi na bésie bátásiaku Yesu kama.

Uwi ɔdi ni, Yesu úsie ɔma ɔdi kemo ɔni na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya úteeƒi ɔlɛgyie. Amu ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́nu Yesu ni, ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ kalɔ na Yesu anumi na úvele-nwu ɔnii, “Ati, si aayɔ́ ni, akana na aya na ɔlɛ ɔmɛni ɔba-mi.”
Yesu únene kɔnu útuku-nwu. Na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́ lɛni. Anwuɔsu ɔlɛ ɔmɛni ɔba-a.” Mmɔ kani ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu.

Amu na Yesu úbo-nwu ɔda ɔnini, “Tasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛdi. Mmomu teesie siin na eti lɛlɔ atátina Katɔti ɔkpane. Na ɔdubɔnu-ɔ kaduɛ na wedie-ɔ kenye wete ukyuli biala ka sɔsɔ ni, ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-a. Na abla akpala aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina.”
Nsu Yesu lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kuugyingya teesie ɔgyu kakaaka. Na bekyuli pii beebo kalɛ na benu-nwu ala bɔtina na ɔbwi-ma lɛlɛ lɛni nda-ma.
Nsu uwi ndi uwi ni, ɔɔlɛ́ teesie kesii kani nábɛ taatákpali katɔ.

Limeyi lɛdi ka Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina ala ni, Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bási Galilea ku Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ekpo ekpo ƒui bébo bélie mmɔ. Na Katɔti ɔyikun ɔni Yesu uti ɔbwi balɛne lɛnɔ ɔkya-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
Na mmɔ ni, bekyuli badi béti ukyuli ɔni na lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi kékpi-nwu béboku. Na báwia ulu ɔni na beti-nwu beduoku ɔtɔ kemo na beti-nwu batáva Yesu anumi.

Nsu bekyuli bumomo ɔsu ni, bátakana ulu bɔkɛ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu béti-nwu bákɔliku lɛsa. Na bátu liƒi na kugyiikɛ akɔ mmɔ na báyula-nwu ku nwuna atɛla bátáva Yesu anumi na bekyuli bammɔ ntɛntɛ na ɔtɔ kemo mmɔ.
Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu bana bɔƒɔtaadi ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ!”
Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bákya anumi ku lɛlɔ buye banii, “Ɔma na ɔdi mɛni na úti lɛlɔ ɔɔkɔ́ku Katɔti lɛni! Katɔti lɛti pɛ kani ndubɔkana na uti ukyuli ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-nwu!”
Amu ka Yesu ɔ́nu-ma kasusu ɔ́ti ɔsu ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛkali ala amɛni udu?
Ɔmani bɔsu mbo ɔkplu ntulo na amɛni kemo, 'Ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ' munuu 'Ta nye na esie'?

Ndubudie lɛtina-mii ka Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ubo kuƒi na kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ na uti ekpidi ɔkyiɛ.” Anwuɔsu únwini na ɔ́su lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi ukpine ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii ta na eti ƒula atɛla na eteesie kaduli!”
Mmɔ kani ni, ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta únye bekyuli bammɔ anumi na úti nwuna atɛla ani lɛlɔ na ɔtɛ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kaduli na uumwi Katɔti.
Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui dɛye dɛye! Na ka liƒu lɛ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, bémwi Katɔti na básu banii, “Bi akɔla budie taatina adi na bɔ́nu mɛni ɔmwi?”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo na útánu kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔdi baalɔ banii Lewi ka ɔkya nwuna kabla kablakɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na asiaku-mi.”
Lewi ɔ́ta na ɔ́siaku-nwu na ɔ́da lɛla biala úwi.
Lewi ɔ́ya na bánwa adila abuni ɔnii uuti ɔkya Yesu kubiti na nwuna kaduli. Na bekyuli pii bébo mmɔ ku kuyi baƒɔne bamba lɛnɔ.
Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bani nkya kasalakɔ mmɔ bákyaku Yesu basiakune unyeƒi banii, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛdi na bɛɛní ku kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bablane babambadi bamɛni?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani mbo lɛlɔ ɔkplu baláwia uvone, amu ntu balɛne lɛti.
Ɔɔɔdi bekyuli bani nse siin na líbo mbalɔ nnii benwini kayi, mmomu alaekpidi bablane.”
Bekyuli badi béye Yesu banii, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla na Yohane basiakune béteelie kɔka bulie bulie na baakpali katɔ, na Ƒarisiƒuɔ basiakune lɛnɔ baabla lɛni, nsu ƒula badi ama bɔdi kani na baadi na baaní?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛkali ka bekyuli bani na bálɔ béboku uleku ketikɔ badubulie kɔka lebo lɛni na uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ ɔmua ɔkya-ma kudɔ? Kudi kudii! Ulakana bubo bute lɛni!
Nsu ni, limeyi lɛdi lɛdubo lɛni na badubuti uleku ɔgya ɔmmɔ batɔlɔku-ma kudɔ. Na mmɔ ni, ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔdi nsɔ ndubo-ma bɔsu asa na badubulie kɔka.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ulabwɛ awu awɔdi taaka taada ɔkukudi liƒi. Si ɔdi ɔ́bla lɛni ni, agyi anii úbile awu ɔwɔdi ɔmmɔ. Na ɔkukudi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ku ɔwɔdi ɔmmɔ ulamanku lɛlɔ.
Na beleti ntɛ bɔwɔdi teewi ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔni kemo béewi ntɛ dii. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ntɛ bɔwɔdi bɔmmɔ bɔdubuƒuƒuo na bɔya ɔku koƒo kɔkukudi kɔmmɔ kɔbwɛ, na ntɛ bɔmmɔ lɛnɔ buwiakun.
Nsu beeti ntɛ bɔwɔdi beewi ɔku koƒo kɔwɔdi kemo.
Na ɔƒɛni lɛnɔ ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́sɔ uláwia ntɛ bɔwɔdi si ɔ́ɔni bɔkukudi úmo. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, bɔsu na ɔdubɔsu ɔnii, 'Budeedi bɔdia butulo bɔmɛni!' ”
Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ku nwuna basiakune bakɛ ulu ɔni ntɛ ɔ́vi edula kemo kadi. Amu na basiakune bammɔ bakya baaƒɛ edula ammɔ taavumi taakun.
Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi béye-ma banini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛbla lɛla lɛni na bula ɔda bubo bútete-bu kuƒi ka bɔbla na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ?”
Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bítaka Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala bítenu lɛla lɛni na Dawid ɔ́bla uwi ɔni na kɔka kɔɔda anwu ku nwuna bekyuli?

Dawid útéduo Katɔti ɔtɔ kemo na útéti adila ani na béti bákpa béte Katɔti ɔ́di. Na úte nwuna badi lɛnɔ na bádi ɔdi ina ka ɔdi bɔƒiɔ na bula ɔda bubo kenye ka ukyuli bamba ɔdi adila ammɔ. Amu ntu Katɔti ɔkpane lɛti pɛ.”
Amu na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ni, anwu ndi Unwoti ute lɛnwunameyi.”
Na lɛnwunameyi lɛbambadi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na útátina ala. Na mmɔ ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya ɔni na nwuna kɔdianu kɔ́gogolo-nwu.
Na ka ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi baawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia na bada Yesu kenye ka ɔɔƒiɔ́ ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, básia-nwu anumi kaduɛ banii baanu si wabwi ɔlɛ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ.
Nsu ka Yesu ɔ́nu bana kasusu ɔ́ti ɔsu ni, ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ta nye, na alɛ ebo anumi mɛni.” Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta úbenye-ma anumi.

Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bula ɔda bubo búte-bu ulu ka bɔbla na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ? Ɔdia ka bɔbla lɛbuni na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ munuu ka bɔbla likpidi? Iye ni, ɔdia ka bɔƒɔ bekyuli ngba munuu bɔyila-mu?”
Yesu ɔ́tɛ anu ɔ́mana-ma na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Nene ƒula kɔnu.” Únene-ku, na mmɔ kani ni, nwuna kɔnu kɔ́sɔ kɔ́bla-nwu kaduɛ.
Kɔnyi kɔ́kɔ bana ƒui ɔsu bése kalɔ beeti kasusu na lɛla lɛni na badubɔkana Yesu bɔbla lɛlɔ.
Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ usien ɔmmɔ ƒui.
Ka kadi kégye ni, ɔ́lɔ nwuna basiakune ƒui úbasala nwuna kudɔ na ɔ́ƒuna leevu-inyɔ bani na ɔ́sia-ma lɛnyi ɔnii nwuna batalane.
Ama ndi Simon ɔni na ɔ́sia lɛnyi ɔnii Petro ku ɔnwani Andrea ku Yakobo ku Yohane ku Ƒilipo ku Bartolomeo
ku Mateo ku Toma ku Alƒeo ubidi Yakobo ku Simon ɔni bátaalɔ banii ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ nwuna ɔma
ku Yakobo ubidi Yuda ku Yuda Iskariot ɔni nébenwini kakya ɔkyane.

Uwi ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna basiakune báyu bási kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bébo bébenye kesii kani na nse ƒiaa. Na nwuna basiakune pii badi bakya mmɔ ku bekyuli lisu bonwu lɛni nási Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ku Yerusalem ku lɛma lɛni nde ɛpu kɔtu lɛni ndi Tiro ku Sidon.
Bébo banii bebenu ala ani na Yesu ɔɔtina na ɔbwi-ma lɛlɛ lidu lɛni na beeƒi. Bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku lɛnɔ bébo na ɔ́bwi-ma.
Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bákya ɔkplu ka betuku Yesu na bana lɛlɛ lɛba-ma, ɔsika ɔyikun ɔdi udu útaalɛ Yesu lɛlɔ kemo na ɔɔbwi bekyuli ƒui.
Yesu ɔ́sia nwuna basiakune anu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bawabane, ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadi bina ɔdi!
Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bani na kɔka kɔɔda ɔƒɛni, ɔsika amii ndubumo! Lɛlɔ litaayɔ amii bani muuwulo ɔƒɛni, ɔsika bɛdubɔma!
Lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii si bekyuli beekisi-mii na beení-mii na beedumi-mii na baasu-mii banii bibo likyulikpi na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ɔsu!
“Bɛkɛ ebiti si amɛni ƒui aalɛ́ na bɛtɔ ku ebiti, ɔsika Katɔti ɔdubute-mii lɛyuƒɔla bonwu na katɔ. Ɔsika ala amɛni udu na béti bábla Katɔti kenye bediene bani nákya ƒui.
“Nsu bɔbwɛ muute amii balakɛne, ɔsika bɛ́ɛkɛ bina ngba ebiti mɛni!
Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani némo ɔƒɛni, ɔsika kɔka kɔdubo-mii bɔda! Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani mɔɔmá ɔƒɛni, ɔsika bɛdubo kɔnyana ku keku buwulo!
Bɔbwɛ muute amii bani na bekyuli ƒui beemwi ɔƒɛni, ɔsika lɛni kani na bana bati kuuku bémwi bekyuli bani nátɔlɔ bekyuli ka badi Katɔti kenye bediene.
“Nsu amii bani muunú-mi butemi ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii bɛyɔ bina bekisine na bɛbla lɛbuni bite-ma.
Na bekyuli bani mɔɔkpali ala taakya-mii ni, bite-ma kusɛ kusɛ. Na bekyuli bani mɔɔbla-mii kalala ni, bɛkpali katɔ na bana lili.
Na si ɔdi ɔƒiɛmi-ɔ kɔnu ɔtugya unwi ni, ya na ɔƒiɛmi-ɔ ɔtugya unyɔdi lɛnɔ. Na si ukyuli ɔdi úti ƒula awu ɔni na aakya taasia ɔtɔdi lɛlɔ ni, ya na uti ɔtɔdi lɛnɔ si ɔɔyɔ́.
Ukyuli biala ɔni mevele-ɔ lɛla lɛdi ni, te-nwu. Na si ɔdi úti-ɔ lɛla lɛdi ni, tasu anii aasia-ni kama.
Lɛla lɛni na aayɔ́ anii babla bete-ɔ ni, ani kani na awɔ lɛnɔ ɔlɛka abla ete bekyuli.
“Si bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ kani na awɔ lɛnɔ aayɔ́ ni, bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane muedi ni, baayɔ́ bekyuli bani mɔɔyɔ́-ma.
Na si bekyuli bani nábla-a lɛbuni kani na awɔ lɛnɔ aabla lɛbuni teete ni, bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane lɛnɔ baabla lɛni.
Na si bekyuli bani na masɔku mete-ɔ lɛti pɛ na eevó ƒula ala teete ni, bi ɔsu na aawia ka bemwi-ɔ? Alaekpidi bablane lɛnɔ beevó teete bana bakpana kalɛ basɔku bete-ma!

Mmomu ni, bɛyɔ bina bekisine na bɛbla-ma lɛbuni. Bivo ala bite-ma, na bina anu atasia ka badubɔsɔku bete-mii kokooko. Si bɛ́bla lɛni ni, bɛdubɔkɛ lɛyuƒɔla bonwu. Na bɛdubɔlɔ-mi banii Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui bebi. Ɔsika Katɔti ubo kaƒɔ buni ute bani ala alaƒɔ-ma anu ku belikplune lɛnɔ muedi.
Bitaanu kɔnyana aani kalɛ kani na bina Katɔti ɔɔnu kɔnyana.
“Bitababla bitatɛku bekyuli litemi, na Katɔti lɛnɔ ulatɛku-mii litemi. Bitadu bekyuli kɔtɔ, na Katɔti lɛnɔ uládu-mii kɔtɔ. Biti bɛkyiɛ bekyuli, na Katɔti lɛnɔ weti wakyiɛ-mii.

Bite bekyuli ala, na Katɔti lɛnɔ wete-mii ala. Geen ni, Katɔti ɔdubuyile-mii kɔvumi tɛtɛɛtɛ na nwuna lɛƒɔndia kenye. Keyile kani udu na ákɔku éte ukyuli ni, kana udu kani na Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔku ute-ɔ.”
Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba ɔnini, “Ɔnumbwɛne ulakana ɔnumbwɛne ɔkpana bɔtɔnku. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, bana inyɔ ƒui badubɔnu beduo ubu kemo.
Ala ɔtɛyane biala uletulo nwuna ɔtinane. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ala bɔtɛya ni, ɔɔbla aani nwuna ala ɔtinane kalɛ.
“Bi ɔsu na aanu lɛlakpi lɛni nkya ƒula ɔnwani lɛnumi na alánu kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi ani?

Dɛ na ɔ́bla na aasu ƒula ukyulikpana anii, 'Buvele, ya na lidie-ɔ lɛlakpi lɛnumi.' Na átakana na anu kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi? Anumi lɛlɔ ukyuli na adi! Ka kegyiikɛ kani nsia-a lɛnumi bɔtimi asa na anu nwaa na edie ƒ^ɔnwani lɛlakpi lɛnumi.
“Kugyii kɔbuni kulánwu ebi ekpidi, na kugyii kukpidi lɛnɔ kulanwu ebi buni.
Kugyii biala ni, kuna ebi lɛlɔ na baanu-ku taati. Belede kɔnwingyie ebi na liyu kugyii lɛlɔ, na belede atoo na lɛnyɛ kɔbuli lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.

Ukyuli ɔbuni ni, ala abuni na uudie taalɛku nwuna akɛla abuni ani nkya nwuna kayi kemo. Na ukyuli ukpidi lɛnɔ uuboku akɛla ekpidi ani nkya-nwu kayi kemo. Ɔsika ala ani néyi ukyuli kayi kemo ni, anya na nwuna kenye kaasu.
“Bi ɔsu na bɛɛlɔ-mi bɛnii Blɔti, nsu bilábla taasiaku lɛla lɛni na lɛ́su-mii lɛlɔ?
Ukyuli biala ɔni muubo-mi kudɔ na uubo teebenu lɛla lɛni mɔɔsu na ɔɔbla taasiaku-ni lɛlɔ ni, ndubɔtina-mii kalɛ na ukyuli ɔmmɔ use.

Use aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtú ɔtɔ na ɔ́ka awodu libu budie, na ɔ́nwu lɛti ku atabi kpakplaa úti ɔ́kya lɛtakpɛ lɛlɔ asa na ɔ́tu ɔtɔ ɔ́sia-nwu lɛlɔ. Ka ketu kéyi na kágba kávi awodu ammɔ kalɔ ni, ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ útabla lɛla lɛdi, ɔsika ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kabuni.

Nsu ukyuli biala ɔni muunú-mi litemi na uleti-ni taada ni, use aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtú ɔtɔ na ɔtɔ kalɔ katayu ɔkplu. Ɔsu si uwi ɔni na ketu kéyi na kágba kávi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, ɔɔƒɛ teewi kalɔ ku kɔku bonwu!”
Ka Yesu ɔ́su bekyuli bamɛni ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Kapernaum.
Mmɔ ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone unengu ɔdi ɔkya ɔni na mbo kabla ɔblane ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ geen. Kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni úbo uuƒi kpakplaa ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ ukpi muedi.
Amu ka unengu ɔmɛni únu Yesu kɔku ni, ɔ́tala Yudaƒuɔ benengu badi ɔnii batásu-nwu na ubo, na ubabwi nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔmɛni ute-nwu.
Bébo Yesu kudɔ na bébevele-nwu kpakplaa banii, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́manku ka ete-nwu kebunku,
ɔsika ɔɔyɔ́ bula kadi. Na anwu ɔlati ɔ́tu Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ úte-bu.”

Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-ma. Yesu útagyunku kaduli kammɔ pii ɔdi asa unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́tala nwuna bakpana ɔnii batásu-nwu banii, “Ati, sɔ tebo abi. Ami ni, ntamanku ka awɔ ebo-mi kudɔ na mina kaduli.
Na ntamanku lɛnɔ ka ami lɛda lɛlɛ-ɔ anumi. Anwuɔsu su ƒula kenye litemi kani, na mina kabla ɔblane lɛlɔ lɛyu ɔkplu.

Ami lɛnɔ ndi unengu ɔdi ɔni na nsɔ nkya benengu betulone bamba ɔyikun kalɔ. Na mbo bekpone na bakya-mi kalɔ. Mɔɔsu ɔdi nnii, 'Sie mɛni' na uusié. Na mɔɔsu ɔbambadi lɛnɔ nnii, 'Bo mɛni' na uubo. Na mɔɔsu mina kabla ɔblane nnii, 'Bla lɛni' na ɔɔbla.”
Ka ɔ́su lɛni ni, ɔ́bla Yesu kalɛ kadi. Amu na únwini na ɔ́su bekyuli lisu lɛni nsiaku-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔyá-mii bɛti ka ni, ńtanu bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmɛni udu na Israelƒuɔ akɔ muedi dii!”
Amu na bekyuli bani na bátala mmɔ básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli na bátánu ka kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úsie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Nain kemo, na nwuna basiakune ku bekyuli pii badi bakɛ basiaku-nwu.

Uwi ɔni na údu ɔma ɔmmɔ kabanye ni, ɔ́siaku kekwa bablane otogyi ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔɔlɛ́. Ukpinele ɔdi ubi ɔnanabi unwi pɛ ndi ukpine ɔni na beti béselaku. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli pii báka bámana ukpinele ɔmɛni.
Ka Yesu ɔ́nu uleku ɔmɛni ni, nwuna lɛlɔ lɛ́bla-nwu kɔnyana. Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Da buwulo ya.”
Amu na Yesu úsie ɔ́vi-ma ntɛ na útétuku ukpine adaka ɔmmɔ. Amu na bekyuli bani nti ukpine ɔmmɔ bédi bénye. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Okloƒu! Mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii ta nye!”
Na ukpine ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta úlie na úse kalɔ ku butemi. Amu na Yesu úti-nwu úte uni.
Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui báyia geen, na bémwi Katɔti. Ɔmɛni ɔsu básu banini, “Katɔti kenye udiene ɔni náƒɔ kuye geen ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-bu akɔ! Katɔti ɔ́yu úbo ɔnii ubedie nwuna bekyuli!”
Yesu lɛlɔ litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́ku lɛ́vi Yudea kalɔ kammɔ ku amadɔ ƒui.
Amu uwi ɔni na Yohane basiakune básu Yohane ala amɛni ni, ɔ́lɔ bana akɔ inyɔ badi,
na ɔ́tala-ma ɔ́kya Blɔti ɔnii betéye-nwu banini, “Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni mebo munuu butaasia ukyuli bamba anu?”
Amu ka bébo Yesu kudɔ ni, básu banini, “Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane nátala-bu ɔnii bubeye-ɔ bɔnii, 'Awɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni na ndububo munuu butaanu ukyuli bamba ulu?' ”
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, Yesu ɔ́bwi bekyuli pii lɛlɛ na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi, na ɔ́ya na banumbwɛne pii bánu.

Amu na údie kenye na ɔ́su Yohane batalane ɔnini, “Bɛsɔ binwini na bitásu Yohane ala ani na bɛ́nu na bínu bɛnii banumbwɛne baanu, bani na báƒɛ bewi kalɔ beesié, ɔlɛgyie beƒine lɛlɛ lɛ́ba-ma, batutine beenú, bekpine baata teelie ngba, na mɔɔsu bawabane Katɔti litemi buni.
Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni nátanu linyeyɔla lɛdi na mina lɛlɔ.”

Ka Yohane batu bátɔlɔ kama ni, Yesu úse kalɔ uutemi taasiku Yohane lɛlɔ teete kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Uwi ɔni na bɛ́lɛ bísie Yohane kudɔ na ketele kemo ni, bi na bɛ́sia anu ka bɛdubo bɔnu? Ukyuli ɔni nse aani livete lɛni na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uubó taavinku?
Bi geen ndi lɛla lɛni na bɛ́lɛ bísie bitánu? Ukyuli ɔni nálɛ bɔkpi ku adala? Bekyuli bani na báda lɛlɔ lɛni na belie ebiti kemo ni, bagadine lɛgbanya na beelie.
Bɛsu-mi lɛla lɛni na bísie bitánu! Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi bɔnu na bísie? Sɔsɔ na ɔdi, na mɔɔsu-mii nnii utulo Katɔti kenye udiene.
Ɔsika Yohane lɛlɔ litemi na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Ndubɔtala ɔtu ɔdi na ƒula lɛtɔtɔ, na ɔdubɔgyu ɔtɔ-ɔ ɔni ndubɔklibi ulu use ute-ɔ.' ”
Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Yohane utulo ukyuli biala ɔni na báwɔ na kayawi kamɛni kemo. Nsu ukyuli ɔni na uuubo lɛnyi lɛdi muedi na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ni, utulo Yohane.”
Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bénu Yohane litemi buni bɔsu, na ama ku kuyi baƒɔne muedi báƒɔ lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia taasiku-ma kudɔ ku bana kɔyi kemo, na ɔ́kpila-ma ntu.
Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane béni lɛla lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛyɔla, na bátatuna ka Yohane ɔkpila-ma ntu.
Yesu úsie anumi ku nwuna butemi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni ni, bi na ɔlɛka liti ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli lɛkɔku geen tɔ? Dɛ na bese?
Bese aani banamu wɛlɛ wɛlɛ bani mɔɔƒia na kuyeya. Badi baava taasu bakpanadi banini, 'Búdie uleku buti lɛnu búte-mii, nsu bítatɔ! Búdie lɛkwanu búte-mii, na bítewulo.'
Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo na anwu úlie kɔka, na ntɛ lɛnɔ bútetuku-nwu kenye, nsu bɛnii, 'Kɔyu kukpidi kɔsiaku-nwu!'
Na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo lɛnɔ na anwu ɔ́di na ɔ́ni ntɛ. Na bɛnii, 'Bɛnu ɔdivone ku ntɛkpine ɔmɛni! Ɔdi kuyi baƒɔne ku alaekpidi bamba lidu bablane ɔkpana!'
Nsu bekyuli bani ƒui nsiaku Katɔti lɛnunda kama ni, beedie taatina ka lɛdi lɛnunda geen.”
Ƒarisini ɔdi ɔ́lɔ Yesu ɔnii ubadi na nwuna kesii. Na Yesu úsie na útádi.
Uleku ɔyalɛ ɔdi ɔkya ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Amu ka únu banii Yesu úbo Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ kesii ɔnii ubadi ni, úti ɔsii ku inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ bɔdi úboku.
Úbenye Yesu kudɔ na uuwulo teewi-nwu lɛgba lɛlɔ. Na uleku ɔmmɔ úti nwuna lili linwini úni imii bɔni néwi Yesu lɛgba mmɔ, na ɔ́dada-nwu lɛgba. Na úti inɔmii bɔmmɔ úwi Yesu lɛgba lɛnɔ.

Ka Ƒarisini ɔni nálɔ Yesu bɔdi ɔ́nu ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́bla kasusu ɔnii, “Si ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene geen ni, nka ɔlɛka ɔnu ɔti uleku ɔni udu nébo uutuku-nwu mɛni, na ɔti lɛyalɛ ngba bɔni lɛnɔ na ulie!”
Amu na Yesu údie ɔ́lɛ-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Simon, mbo lɛla lɛdi na ndubo-ɔ bɔsu.” Amu na Simon ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, taasu-mi lɛla lɛmmɔ.”

Amu na Yesu úse kalɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni muuvó egulabi teete bekyuli, na nkyuli inyɔ badi bada-nwu kayu. Unwi ɔda egulabi bumomo ɔni mabla aani kɔbuli kunwi lɛyuƒɔla kayu. Na unyɔdi ɔda abuli leevu lɛyuƒɔla kayu.
Bekyuli bamɛni ƒui ɔdi útakana na ɔƒɔ-nwu kayu kamɛni. Anwuɔsu úti kayu kɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́kyiɛ-ma. Na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ni, ɔmani na aabu anii ɔdubɔyɔ ɔlakɛne ɔmɛni utulo?”
Amu na Simon ɔnini, “Mɔɔbu nnii ukyuli ɔni na úti kayu kenengudi ɔ́kyiɛ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ásu na ɔ́tɛ.”

Mmɔ na Yesu únwini útánu uleku ɔmmɔ na ɔ́su Simon ɔnini, “Aanu uleku ɔmɛni? Ka líbo-ɔ kudɔ ni, étete-mi ntu anii nƒɔ lɛgba. Nsu uleku ɔmɛni úti nwuna imii ɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛgba, na úti nwuna lili linwini úni-ni.
Átaƒɔ-mi ku kubiti na akya-mi kɔgbu. Nsu ɔ́si uwi ɔni mbeduo ni, anwu útada tɔ mina lɛgba bɔdada útaya.
Awɔ étete-mi inɔmii bɔdi anii nkya lili. Nsu anwu úti inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ úwi-mi lɛgba ƒui.
Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ni, na bɔyɔ bɔni na údie ɔ́tina-mi ɔsu ni, ɔ́kɛ nwuna ekpidi pii ani na ɔ́bla ƒui buti taakyiɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni na blii na béti bákyiɛ-nwu ni, nwuna bɔyɔ lɛnɔ buse blii.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ákɛ ƒula ekpidi buti taakyiɛ.”
Ka bekyuli bani lɛnɔ nlie kadikɔ mmɔ bénu Yesu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su ni, béye lɛlɔ banii, “Ɔma na ɔdi mɛni ɔni mɔɔkana na uuti bekyuli ekpidi muedi taakyiɛ-ma?”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su uleku ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi búdie-ɔ, ɔsu teesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”
Na uwi ɔdi kama ni, Yesu ɔ́vi ɔgbami úsie lɛma ku akpaklɔ kemo. Na ɔkɛ ɔɔsu litemi buni taasiku Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ. Leevu-inyɔ banii na ɔ́ƒuna lɛnɔ basiaku-nwu.

Beleku bani na Yesu ɔ́bwi na bana lɛlɛ lidu ku bani na ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi ɔ́lɛku-ma lɛlɔ kemo badi lɛnɔ basiaku-nwu. Na bana akɔ ɔdi ndi Maria ɔni bátaalɔ banii Magdalene ɔni lɛlɔ kemo na Yesu ɔ́gya ayu ekpidi maatɛ ɔ́lɛku.

Uleku ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔni baalɔ banii Yohana na ɔgyani baalɔ Kusa na útaabla kabla na Ɔga Herode litemi katɛkɔ aani ɔkutine unengu ɔdi kalɛ. Beleku bamba pii ku ɔni baalɔ Susana lɛnɔ básiaku Yesu na béteeti bana akɛla teebunku anwu ku nwuna batɛyane.
Bekyuli pii bátaasi lɛma bun bun teebo Yesu kudɔ. Na uwi ɔni na bekyuli pii bábasala ni, Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini,
“Edula ɔkyane ɔdi úsie utágya edula. Amu ka ɔɔgya edula amɛni teewi kemo ni, adi álɛ ébo ulu kudɔ na bekyuli bánya-nya, na baasɛ bála bádi.
Adi álɛ ébo atakpɛ lɛlɔ. Na ka ákwɛ ni, átakɛ ntu ku lɛti buni. Anwuɔsu ákwi na ékpi.
Edula ammɔ adi éduo liyu livo akɔ. Na livo lɛ́tu libi edula ammɔ lɛlɔ, na ényimi-nya ƒui.
Na akladi anya álɛ ébo kalɔ buni lɛlɔ. Na ka ákwɛ ni, ánwu ebi eti anyɔ anyɔ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibimi atu, na binu kaduɛ!”
Yesu basiakune béye-nwu lɛgba lɛmɛni kalɔ bénu.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Katɔti úti nwuna lɛga bɔdi lɛnunda abɛla ɔ́tina-mii. Nsu bekyuli bakladi ama ni, agba na muubó-ma kalɛ na 'si ina baanu ni, balanu baláti. Na ina beenú ni, belénu kalɔ.'
“Lɛgba lɛni na líbo kalɔ bunu ndi ɔmɛni. Edula ammɔ ndi Katɔti litemi.
Na edula ani nálɛ ébo ulu kɔtu ese aani bekyuli bani muunú, nsu ukisine uubo taabada litemi lɛmmɔ teedie-ma kayi kemo. Na ɔ́ya-ma na balakana bɔƒɔ bɔdi na Katɔti ɔƒɔ-ma ngba.

Na ani nálɛ ébo atakpɛ lɛlɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani na bénu litemi lɛmmɔ na báƒɔ-ni ku ebiti mmɔ kani, nsu líteduo-ma lɛlɔ kemo geen. Anwuɔsu baaƒɔ́ taadi uwi klukui kemo kani. Na si uwi ɔni na bukpoku taanu bɔdi búbo ni, baayuɛ.
Edula ani nálɛ ébo liyu livo akɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ, nsu kayawi lɛƒɛda ku lɛlakɛ ku kayawi kamɛni ebiti aatú taabali-ma, na alaya na ebi ammɔ egyie na baƒɛ-nya.
Na edula ani nálɛ ébo kalɔ kabuni lɛlɔ ni, ese aani bekyuli bani muunú litemi lɛmmɔ teeti-ni taada ku kayi nwaa. Na beeboku lɛlɔ kalɔ na beenye momoomo teetédu kawɔlɔkɔ kalɛ na banwu ebi pii.

“Ukyuli ɔdi ulátu asogya teebi-nwu ala iye uti-nwu utábɛla ɔkya lɛla lɛdi kalɔ. Mmomu ɔɔkɔliku asogya ɔmmɔ taasia katɔ likpo lɛni maya na wekeye wewi kesii biala. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuduo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ɔnu nwaa.
Lɛla biala lɛni na bábala bákya kesii biala ni, lɛdubɔda lɛlɛ keyi. Na lɛla lɛni na bébi ala ni, badubudie-ni beboku bukeye kemo.

“Bɛnu lɛlɔ kemo kaduɛ na kalɛ na biinú etemila lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni muunú na únu kalɔ ni, ɔdubunu kalɔ ubu. Na ukyuli ɔni neeese atu ni, libliidi lɛni na ɔɔbu ɔnii únu muedi ni, badubɔƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.”
Yesu banwani ku bana uni bébo-nwu kudɔ, nsu bátakana Yesu bɔkpɛ bude ɔkɛnku bekyuli bammɔ bumomo ɔsu.
Amu na ukyuli ɔdi útásu Yesu ɔnii, “Ƒula uni ku ƒula banwani benye keyi baawia-a.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Mina uni ku mina banwani ndi bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti litemi na baadi-ni lɛlɔ.”
Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ku nwuna batɛyane. Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛya na bɔvia busie ɛpu ɔvi ɔni ngye.” Anwuɔsu ama lɛnɔ bése kalɔ ku ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ buku.
Ka bakɛ ntu anumi bésela ni, Yesu ɔ́lɛɛ. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa ɔdi úbo uukpó na ntu anumi mmɔ ɔni na ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ƒui kadaku ntu bɔƒɔ ɔsu bakya kukpi ku ngba ntɛ.

Batɛyane bammɔ bésie na bátágyila Yesu na básu-nwu banini, “Ati! Bɔdaku bukpi!” Amu na Yesu ɔ́ta únye na údie lɛdi ɔ́bɔku ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ mmɔ, na ana ƒui kenye káyɔ na ɔ́bla buɛɛ.

Na úye batɛyane bammɔ ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na biiibo bɔƒɔtaadi?” Nsu bunye kani na benye yaa, na liƒu lɛnɔ lɛ́da-ma. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ukyuli ɔmani na ɔdi mɛni bɔdi? Ɔɔtɛmi teete ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ku ɛpu ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ na beenú-nwu litemi!”
Amu na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bávia bésie bétédu kalɔ kani baalɔ Gerase na ɛpu ɔvi si ási Galilea.

Ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔɔlɛ́ ɔkɔlɔ kemo kani na ukyuli ɔdi na ayu ekpidi eli-nwu lɛlɔ úsie úbasiaku-nwu. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́si ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Ɔbla uwi pii ɔdi mɛni ni, kasɔngya kani na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔkɛ. Na ulátuna ɔnii uulie nwuna kaduli amu ntu bekyuli kɔƒiɔtɔ akɔ.
Uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu Yesu ni, ɔ́va momoomo na úƒwimi lɛlɔ ɔ́va kalɔ na Yesu lɛgba kudɔ. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Yesu, Katɔti Ɔni Ntulo Ƒui Ubi! Bi na aawia mina kudɔ mɛni? Muuvele nda-a, tani-mi kɔtu.”

Ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔmɛni, ɔsika Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ mmɔ, na ɔ́su-ku ɔnii, “Vi lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo!” Uwi pii kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔɔdi ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔni na si ina bényimi-nwu enu na bébo-nwu kɔgba muedi ni, ɔɔƒɛ abuala ammɔ na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kuukeliku-nwu taatákya ketele kemo.
Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na baalɔ-ɔ lɛnyi?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami baalɔ banii Lisu.” Ɔ́su lɛni ɔsika ayu ekpidi pii néduo akya-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
Amu na ayu ammɔ évele Yesu anii utabɔku-ma utatákya ayu ekpidi abi kebokɔ.
Mmɔ ni, baplakuo pii badi bakɛ kataku kadi lɛlɔ baadi. Amu na ayu ekpidi ammɔ évele Yesu anii ɔya na betéduo baplakuo bammɔ lɛlɔ kemo. Amu na Yesu úte-ma kuƒi.
Anwuɔsu bávi bálɛ ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo bétéduo baplakuo bammɔ kemo. Na bana ƒui békeli báyu kataku kammɔ lɛlɔ na bátányina lɛlɔ bákya ɛpu kemo na báyii ku udu.
Ka bekyuli bani mɔɔnu baplakuo bammɔ lɛlɔ bánu ala ani nálɛ ni, békeli bésie ɔmankemo na bátásu bekyuli bávi ku akpaklɔ lɛnɔ ƒui.

Na bekyuli bammɔ bálɛ bésie banii batánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ. Amu ka bébedu Yesu kudɔ ni, bánu ɔnana ɔni lɛlɔ kemo na Yesu ɔ́bɔku ayu ekpidi ɔ́lɛku mmɔ ka ulie Yesu lɛgba akɔ ku kasusu sɛɛn na ɔda adala na ulie kpoo. Amu na bana ƒui báyia.
Na bekyuli bani nánu kalɛ na ala ammɔ álɛ ni, básu bakladi kalɛ na ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ayu ekpidi amɛni élie lɛlɔ lɛ́bla nwaa.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu Gerase kalɔ kammɔ ku kana amadɔ bekyuli básu Yesu banii ɔtɔlɔ bana kalɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika baayia. Anwuɔsu Yesu úduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo ka ɔtɔlɔ.
Amu na ukyuli ɔni na Yesu ɔ́bwi mɛni úvele Yesu ɔnii, “Ya na lɛsiaku-ɔ.” Nsu Yesu útatuna na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini,
“Teesie kaduli na atásu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́bla úte-ɔ.” Amu na ukyuli ɔmɛni úsie útávi ɔmankemo na ɔ́su ɔ́vi ƒui lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́bla úte-nwu.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie ɛpu ɔvi ɔni ngye ni, bekyuli bammɔ báƒɔ-nwu kaduɛ, ɔsika bana ƒui benye bagya-nwu.
Amu na ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Yairo na ɔdi Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ benengu akɔ unwi ɔ́da úbalɛ. Na ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ Yesu lɛgba kalɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnii ɔsiaku-nwu na besie nwuna kaduli,
ɔsika ubidi ulekubi unwi ɔni na ɔdubɔƒɔ aani akwa leevu-anyɔ ni, ɔtɛ ɔlɛ ɔdaku bukpi. Ka Yesu ɔkɛ úsela ni, lɛni na bekyuli baanwanɛ lɛlɔ ka bani bede-nwu.
Na bekyuli bamɛni akɔ ni, uleku ɔni na ubugya uuwi na ɔbla akwa leevu-anyɔ sɔɔn lɛnɔ ɔ́kya-ma akɔ. Uleku ɔmɛni úubile nwuna egulabi ƒui ɔnii ɔɔbwi ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ, nsu úutuku ɔ́nɔ.
Amu na ɔkɛ buɛɛ útávi Yesu kama na bekyuli akɔ na útuku-nwu awu kɔtu. Mmɔ kani ni, ubugya ɔmmɔ kenye kékulo.
Amu na Yesu úye ɔnii, “Ɔma nétuku-mi?” Nsu ukyuli biala úni. Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, nu kalɛ na bekyuli ƒui bɛ́mua basiaku-ɔ!”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ti ka ukyuli ɔdi útuku-mi, ɔsika ɔyikun ɔdi ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ-mi lɛlɔ kemo.”

Ka uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ulakana bɔbɛ ɔsu ni, lɛlɔ lɛɛtɔ́-nwu na ɔ́yu ɔ́tɛ Yesu lɛgba kalɔ. Amu na ɔ́sɔku lɛla biala kalɔ údie na bekyuli bammɔ ƒui anumi. Na údie ɔ́su lɛla lɛni ɔsu na útuku-nwu awu ku kalɛ na ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ba-nwu kɔnakunwi.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mina ubi uleku, ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bɔ́bwi-ɔ. Teesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”

Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔmua ɔdaku litemi lɛmɛni bɔsu ni, anwu kani na ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́da úbalɛ na ɔ́si Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ unengu ɔni baalɔ Yairo mmɔ kesii. Na úbasu-nwu kenye ɔnini, “Ƒ^ubidi ulekubi ɔmmɔ úukpi ɔsu da ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ bɔlɔ ya.”
Nsu Yesu únu litemi lɛmmɔ na ɔ́su Yairo ɔnini, “Tayia. Awɔ ƒɔ di ka ubi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyu ɔkplu.”
Uwi ɔni na bétéduo Yairo kaduli mmɔ ni, útete kuƒi na ukyuli ɔdi uduo ɔtɔ kemo ntu Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo ku ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔti ku uni kani.
Na bekyuli pii benye mmɔ beewulo kɔnyana ku keku na ubi ɔmmɔ ɔsu. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛsɔ bitewulo. Ubi ɔmmɔ útekpi. Bɔlɛɛ na ɔda.”
Amu na bana ƒui béti-nwu báma, ɔsika ama bagyi ka úkpi.
Amu na Yesu úƒie-nwu kɔnu ɔ́da na ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔnini, “Ubi, ta nye!”
Ulekubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba na ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnii bawia lɛla lɛdi bete ulekubi ɔmmɔ na ɔdi.
Ala amɛni ƒui ábla nwuna bawɔne dɛye dɛye, nsu Yesu úbo-ma ɔda ɔnii batasu ukyuli ɔdi lɛla lɛni nálɛ mɛni.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́lɔ nwuna batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ ɔ́sala na úte-ma kuƒi ku ɔyikun ɔni na beti bagya ayu ekpidi ƒui na babwi lɛlɛ lidu lɛnɔ.
Amu na ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii beteesie na batásu Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ etemila bete bekyuli na babwi balɛne.

Asa na badubɔgyu ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteti lɛla lɛdi bitada na bina ulu busie kemo aani ugyii ɔdadi iye ala bevelene koƒo iye adila iye egulabi. Na awu ɔbambadi muedi ni, bitasu bɛnii biiti ɔdi.
Kesii biala na báƒɔ-mii ni, bɛsɔ bɛkya kaduli kammɔ kemo utédu uwi ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛtɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
Na kesii kani na bátaƒɔ-mii ni, bɛtɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na biveli bina lɛgba kalɔ ɔtumu muedi biwi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo aani Katɔti kɔtu bɔni kati bute.”
Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bátɔlɔ na bátávi akpaklɔ ani ƒui kemo na baasu Katɔti litemi buni na baabwi balɛne lɛnɔ.
Ka Herode ɔni mɔɔdi Galilea lɛlɔ únu ala ani ƒui mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni ni, úbeƒu ɔsika bekyuli badi baasu ka Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane násɔ ɔ́ta úbo uli ngba.
Na babambadi lɛnɔ baasu banii Elia násɔ únwini úbo. Na badi lɛnɔ banii Katɔti kenye bediene bakukudi bammɔ akɔ unwi násɔ úbo uli ngba.
Amu na Herode ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ya na békulo Yohane lili, na ɔma na ɔdi nsɔ nkɛ mɔɔbla ala amɛni na muunú-nwu kɔku?” Anwuɔsu Herode ɔkya ɔɔwia ulu ɔni na ɔsia na ɔnu Yesu.
Batɛyane bammɔ bénwini bébo na bábasu Yesu ala ani ƒui na bábla. Amu na útiku-ma na bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Betsaida kakɛ.
Ka bekyuli pii bénu lɛni ni, básia-nwu kama bésie mmɔ. Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na ɔ́tɛmi úte-ma ɔ́si Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ, na ɔ́bwi bani na ɔlɛ ɔda.

Lebo lɛni na ɔƒɛ úsela bɔnu ni, Batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bébo Yesu kudɔ na básu-nwu banini, “Ya na bekyuli bamɛni batɔlɔ na beteesie akpaklɔ ani nde amadɔ mɛni kemo, kalɛ na bakɛ adila ku keduokɔ, ɔsika mɛni ɔdi ketele ntɛ.”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii alati bite-ma lɛla lɛdi na badi.” Mmɔ na básu-nwu banii, “Adila ani ƒui na bɔda mɛni ndi bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔbɛ inyɔ. Aawia ka busie butéye adila bute bekyuli pii bamɛni?”
Na banana bammɔ babla mpimu ɛlɔ na mmɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bɛya na bekyuli bammɔ belie esu esu aani nkyuli liti liti.”
Na ka batɛyane bábla lɛni ni,
Yesu úti bodobodo ɛlɔ ku kɔbɛ inyɔ bɔmmɔ na ɔ́kɔliku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ. Amu na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu úte-ma, na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úti úte nwuna batɛyane ɔnii beti bele bete bekyuli bammɔ.
Na bana ƒui bádi bémo na batɛyane bammɔ básala kɔkɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ kɔni nébu na kúyi kɔgyigyɛ leevu-inyɔ.
Ka Yesu lɛti ɔkya ɔɔkpali katɔ limeyi lɛdi ni, nwuna batɛyane bébo-nwu kudɔ. Amu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔma na bekyuli baasu banii anwu na ndi?”

Amu na bédie kenye banii, “Badi baasu banii awɔ ndi Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane. Na badi lɛnɔ banii awɔ ndi Elia. Na badi lɛnɔ baasu taatina banii Katɔti kenye bediene bakukudi bammɔ akɔ unwi násɔ únwini úbo uli ngba.”
Amu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Na amii nɔɔ? Ɔma na bɛɛsu ka anwu na ndi?” Mmɔ na Petro údie kenye ɔnii, “Awɔ ndi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.”
Amu na Yesu úbo-ma ɔda kpakplaa ɔnii batasu ukyuli ɔdi kenye kamɛni.

Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ɔlɛka ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, libo abi geen na kadi benengu ku bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane enu kemo na beni-mi, na badu-mi. Nsu na emeyi atɛ kama ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila-mi ɔlɛku bekpine akɔ mbelie ngba.”
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔsiaku-mi ni, ɔlɛka udie lɛlɔ atu na ubo abi limeyi ndi limeyi na ɔsiaku-mi kama.
Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔƒɔ nwuna lili ngba ute lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba ka ɔsiaku-mi ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba geen.
Bi kɔsia na ukyuli ɔdubɔkɛ si ɔ́kɛ kayawi ala ƒui na ɔ́yila ngba geen bɔmmɔ?
Si ami ku mina ala ani mɔɔtina ƒui ékpo ukyuli ɔdi kɔƒa ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔdubukpo ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi kɔƒa uwi ɔni na mebo na mina bukeye ku Katɔti ku nwuna batu kedee ƒui bukeye kemo.
Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii bina akɔ badi na mɛni ni, belekpi wetédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti wedie nwuna lɛga bɔdi ɔyikun keyi na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.”
Ɔ́bla aani Kwasida unwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni kama ni, útiku Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo na bákɔ bésie kɔbi lili batákpali katɔ.
Ka ɔdaku katɔ bɔkpali ni, nwuna anumi bɔnu bɔ́vumana na nwuna adala eekeye na aatu anumi.
Na kɔnakunwi ni, banana inyɔ badi bébenye-nwu kudɔ bani ndi Mose ku Elia na baatɛmi.
Báda bálɛ na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma bukeye kemo na bátɛmi ku Yesu na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔsia na ɔwɔlɔ lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔwia na nwuna kukpi na Yerusalem kemo.
Petro ku nwuna bakpana béduo lɛlɛɛ kemo geen, nsu bágyinya bábanu lɛlɔyɔ bukeye bɔni kemo na Yesu ɔkya ku bekyuli inyɔ bani nnye-nwu kudɔ.

Ka bekyuli bammɔ baagyú ni, Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ati, bula mɛni bubo bɔdia geen! Ya bɔtu nvo ɛtɛ na mɛni. Kenwi kadi ƒula kadi, kenwi kadi Mose kadi, na kenwi kadi Elia lɛnɔ kadi.” Na ala ani na ɔɔsu mɛni ƒui ni, tati tati kemo na ɔ́su-nya.
Lebo lɛni na ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, uyɔlɔ ɔdi ɔ́yu úbewi-ma lɛlɔ. Na batɛyane bammɔ báyia uwi ɔni na uyɔlɔ ɔmɛni ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-ma lɛlɔ.
Amu na bénu Katɔti lɛdi na uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ka lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi mina Ubi Ɔƒunadi. Binu-nwu litemi!”
Amu ka lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́da bɔtɛmi lɛ́ya ni, bánu ka Yesu lɛti nébu unye. Amu na batɛyane bammɔ béti ala ani na bánu mmɔ bábala, na bátasu-nya ukyuli ɔdi uwi ɔmmɔ.
Ka kadi kégye ni, Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane ɛtɛ bammɔ bási báyu kɔbi kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na bábasiaku bekyuli pii badi.
Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́va momoomo ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane! Muuvele nda-a, nu mina ubi! Anwu kani ndi-mi ubi!

Kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kuukpóku-nwu na kɔɔyá na ɔɔva momoomo kɔnakunwi. Ɔɔsinsi lɛlɔ na uuti lɛlɔ taaƒiɛmi kalɔ na avlɔvɔ aalɛ́-nwu kenye. Lɛni na ɔɔbla-nwu laa ɔkplu kemo asa na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔɔnyonu-nwu.
Lívele ƒula batɛyane nnii bagya kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ bete-mi, nsu bátakana-ku bɔgya.”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii, ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli, bi ɔsu na bilaƒɔ-mi taadi na bɛɛyu atu ɔkplu? Uwi ɛlɛ sɔɔn na ndubɔkɛku-mii kayi? Na uwi ɔmani na ndubɔda-mii ntálɛ?” Amu na ɔ́su ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ti ƒ^ubidi boku mɛni.”
Ka ɔnamu ɔmmɔ ɔ́si ɔdubo ni, anwu kani na kɔyu kɔmmɔ kúbo-nwu kɔ́va kalɔ na ɔ́sinsi. Amu na Yesu ɔ́bɔku kɔyu kukpidi kɔmmɔ na ɔ́bwi ɔnamu ɔmmɔ, na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úte ɔti.
Katɔti ɔyikun bonwu ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui dɛye dɛye. Yesu ala bɔbla átakɔsi na aabla-ma dɛye dɛye uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,
“Bitayiƒla lɛla lɛni na líse kalɔ ndaku-mii bɔsu! Badubo Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi buti bɔkya bekyuli enu kemo.”
Nsu batɛyane bammɔ bétenu ɔmɛni kalɔ. Ɔdi lɛla lɛni na béti bábala-ma, nsu baayia-nwu lɛla lɛdi buye bɔsiku litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Unyeƒi ɔdi úbeduo batɛyane bammɔ ntɛ ɔni ndi bana akɔ ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo lɛlɔ.
Amu ka Yesu ɔ́ti-ma kasusu ɔsu ni, úti ɔnamu ɔdi úbenyene-ma anumi na nwuna kudɔ.

Mmɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ ɔnamu ɔmɛni na mina lɛnyi kemo ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ami lɛnɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɔ́-mi ni, ɔ́ƒɔ ukyuli ɔni nátala-mi. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ƒui na bina akɔ ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo ƒui.”
Amu na Yohane ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bɔ́nu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya ɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi na ƒula lɛnyi kemo na bɔ́su-nwu bɔnii ɔda ɔya, ɔsika ɔɔɔdi bula akɔ unwi.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bitabala-nwu. Ɔsika si ukyuli ɔdi útata útenye-mii lɛlɔ ni, bɛti bɛnii unye-mii kama.”
Amu ka uwi ɔni na ɔlɛka Katɔti uti Yesu usienku katɔ ɔdaku budu ni, ɔ́lɛ ugyii ka uteesie Yerusalem.
Ɔ́tala batu badi ɔnii bagyu batɔ lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi kemo na Samaria na batáklibi lɛla biala bese bete-nwu.
Nsu ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli báti ka bɔvi na ɔ́vi úsela Yerusalem ɔsu ni, bétenu kalɔ.
Amu na ka batɛyane bani ndi Yohane ku Yakobo bánu lɛni ni, béye Yesu banii, “Ati, aawia ka bɔkpali ogya bɔsi katɔ bubewi-ma lɛlɔ na ɔkyula-ma?”
Mmɔ na Yesu únwini na ɔ́dɔnku-ma, na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bilenu Kɔyu kɔni mɔɔdi-mii lɛlɔ kalɔ! Ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ńtebo nnii mbakyula bekyuli, mmomu líbo nnii mbaƒɔ-ma ngba.”
Na anwu ku batɛyane bammɔ bébo bávi bésie lɛkpaklɔ bamba.
Ka bakɛ bésela ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ndubɔsiaku-ɔ kesii biala na ésela.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Beƒiebuo bebo libu lɛni kemo na baatɛ, na baasɛ lɛnɔ bebo ayu. Nsu Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ni, anwu uuubo katɛnkɔ muedi.”
Na Yesu ɔ́su ukyuli bamba ɔnini, “Siaku-mi.” Nsu ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Ati, ya na lɛka mina ɔti busie butáva asa.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ya na ama bani neeebo Katɔti ngba geen bɔmmɔ bataava bana bekpine. Na awɔ eteesie na atásu Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi.”
Ukyuli bamba lɛnɔ ɔnii, “Blɔti, masiaku-ɔ. Nsu ya-mi lɛka mina lɛlɔ bekyuli busie butákada asa.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni naaabla nwuna kabla ku kayi ƒui ni, útamanku Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Blɔti ɔ́ƒuna banana liti ku aavlanyɔ-inyɔ babambadi na ɔ́tala-ma inyɔ inyɔ ɔnii besie lɛma ku akpaklɔ ani kemo na nka ɔlɛka usie.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Edula pii éedu bɔƒɛ, nsu nkyuli ɛlɛɛ badi kani nnye kabla kamɛni lɛlɔ. Bɛkpali katɔ na bivele kemo ɔlati na umene bekyuli bani maƒɛ-nya masala.
Biteesie! Mɔɔtala-mii aani baƒonu na begiti akɔ.
Na biteti egulabi kavumi iye koƒo iye lɛgbanvuo, na bitedi bitenye ulu bɛnii biigyele ukyuli ɔdi.
“Kaduli biala na bítéduo ni, bɛka bɔsu bɛnii, 'Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku kaduli kamɛni bekyuli.'
Na si ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ keyi buɛɛ ɔdi ɔkya mmɔ ni, bɛya na bina keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-nwu. Nsu si ɔdi uuubo ni, bɛsɔku bina keyi buɛɛ kegye bɛtɔlɔku.

Bɛsɔ bɛkya kaduli kani kemo na báƒɔ-mii. Na lɛla biala lɛni na badubuti bete-mii ni, bɛdi na bɛni-ni. Ɔsika kabla ɔblane biala ni, ɔlɛka bete-nwu nwuna lɛyuƒɔla. Bitatáka bitamana ɔ́si kaduli kani úsie kani.
“Na ɔma biala ɔni kemo na báƒɔ-mii ni, bɛdi lɛla biala na bákɛ béte-mii.
Bɛbwi balɛne na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Na bɛsu ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli bɛnii, 'Uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bula kɔyi kemo ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde.'
Nsu si bísie ɔma ɔdi kemo na bátaƒɔ-mii ni, bɛlɛ bisie kuyeya na bɛsu bɛnii,
'Bina ɔma ɔtumu ɔni mma-bu lɛgba kalɔ muedi ni, búveli búwi-mii. Nsu binyimo ka uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔdi lɛga na bina kɔyi kemo ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde-mii!'
Na mɔɔsu-mii kede kede nnii na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔnu Sodom ɔma kɔnyana utulo ɔma ɔmmɔ!

“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Korasin! Na bɔbwɛ muute amii Betsaida! Si Tiro ku Sidon lɛma likpidi kemo na lɛ́bla akɔla budie taatina ani lɛ́bla na bina akɔ ni, nka badubɔyu belie kalɔ kukuuku na beti aƒɔ ekuku bada lɛlɔ na bawɛɛ ntɔ ɔni mɔɔtina ka béni bana ekpidi!
Katɔti ɔdubɔnu Tiro ku Sidon lɛma kɔnyana butulo amii na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi.
Na awɔ Kapernaum ni, bɔkali na bɛda bɛnii bɛdubɔkɔliku lɛlɔ bitédu katɔ? Badubɔyula-mii na bɛyii udu!”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Ukyuli biala ɔni muunú bina litemi ni, ɔɔtina ka uunú ami lɛnɔ litemi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuní-mii ni, ɔɔtina ka uuní ami lɛnɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muuní-mi ni, ɔɔtina ka uuní Katɔti ɔni nátala-mi lɛnɔ.”
Nkyuli liti ku aavlanyɔ-inyɔ bammɔ básɔ bénwini bébo ku ebiti. Na bábasu-nwu banii, “Blɔti, ayu ekpidi muedi énu-bu litemi ɔni bɔ́bɔku-ma na ƒula lɛnyi kemo.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu Satan ka ɔ́si katɔ úbanu aani ogya bɔtu kalɛ.
Binu kaduɛ! Líte-mii ɔyikun ɔni na bɛkana na bɛkɔ bɛnya balakpi ku batamlukpa lɛlɔ. Na bɛkana bɛdi ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔyikun ƒui lɛlɔ ɔni na lɛla lɛdi lilabla-mii.
Nsu ni, lɛlɔ litayɔ-mii ka ayu ekpidi eenú-mii litemi ɔsu. Mmomu ebiti ada-mii ka Katɔti únweni-mii anyi ɔ́kya Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”

Uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti Kɔyu ebiti áƒɔ Yesu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, katɔ ku kalɔ Unwoti, mɔɔgyá-a enu ɔsika lɛla lɛni na éti ábɛla bakutine ku banundane ni, ani na éti átina bekyuli bani na baaagyi lɛku ku badɔlɔdi. Sɔsɔ na ɔdi, Ati, lɛni geen na aayɔ́ anii ɔlɛ.”

Amu na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mina Ɔti úti ala ƒui úte-mi. Ɔdi biala ɔɔɔgyi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔdi, ntu Katɔti lɛti pɛ. Na ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔɔɔgyi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi, ntu Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛti pɛ ku bekyuli bani na Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒuna ka udie Ɔti ɔmmɔ ɔtina kani.”
Amu na Yesu únwini útánu nwuna batɛyane bammɔ na ɔ́su-ma na bɔbɛ kemo ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ litaayɔ-mii geen ka bɛɛnu ala ani na bɛdaku bɔnu mɛni!
Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, Katɔti kenye bediene pii ku baga lɛnɔ báwia ka banu lɛla lɛni bɛɛnu ɔƒɛni, nsu bátanu. Na báwia ka benu lɛla lɛni na amii biinú mɛni, nsu bétenu.”
Mmɔ na ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔdi úbo ku kasusu ka ɔkɔku Yesu ɔnu. Na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa lɛkɛ ngba ƒui?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔɔsu? Na dɛ na awɔ eenú litemi lɛmmɔ kalɔ?”
Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnii, “Yɔ Unwoti Katɔti ku ƒula kayi ƒui, ku ƒula kɔyu ƒui ku ƒula ɔyikun ƒui ku ƒula kasusu ƒui lɛnɔ, na ayɔ ƒula ukyulikpana aani ƒula lɛlɔ kalɛ.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ásu na ɔ́tɛ. Bla lɛni na adubɔkɛ ngba ƒui.”
Nsu ka ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmɛni ɔɔwia ka ute lɛlɔ ubo ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔma ndi mina ukyulikpana?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni nási Yerusalem úsela Yeriko, na beyune bátáda-nwu ulu. Na bébo-nwu na bédie-nwu lɛlɔ ala na bányonu-nwu báva na ɔɔyɔ́ ukpi.
Úbebo úte ka Katɔti ɔkpane ɔdi úbo ɔɔví ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ka ɔ́nu ukyuli ɔmɛni na kuludɔ ni, ɔ́sia ɔ́vi ɔbambadi ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Lɛni kani na Lewini ɔdi lɛnɔ úbo ɔɔví. Na ka ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔmmɔ ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́sia ɔ́vi ɔbambadi ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Nsu Samariani ɔdi ɔni nábasia mmɔ úsela ulu ɔdi ni, úbasiaku ukyuli ɔmmɔ. Na ka ɔ́nu-nwu ni, kaƒɔ kákywi-nwu.
Amu na úsie útédu-nwu kudɔ na úti inɔmii ku ntɛ úwi-nwu lɛlɛ lɛmmɔ kemo na únyimi-ni ƒui. Na ɔ́gyu ɔnana ɔmmɔ útásia anwu ɔlati ebuo lɛlɔ. Na úti-nwu úsienku baƒɔ keduokɔ na ɔ́nu-nwu lɛlɔ.
Kadi kégye ni, údie egulabi adi úte keduokɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ ɔnii, 'Taanu-nwu lɛlɔ. Na si lɛ́si líbo mɔɔví mɛni ni, ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛla biala lɛni na adubɔsɔ ebile na nwuna lɛlɔ.' ”
Amu na Yesu úye ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Na ƒula kasusu kenye ni, nkyuli ɛtɛ bamɛni akɔ ɔmani nátina lɛlɔ aani ukyulikpana na ukyuli ɔni néduo beyune enu kemo mɛni lɛlɔ?”
Mmɔ na ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔni nánu-nwu kɔnyana.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛnɔ teesie na atábla lɛni.”
Amu na ɔni na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane básia bana ulu bátɔlɔ bésela ni, bébedu ɔma ɔdi. Mmɔ na uleku ɔdi baalɔ Marta ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu úsienku nwuna kaduli.
Marta ɔmɛni ubo ɔnwani ulekubi ɔni baalɔ Maria. Anwu ɔ́yu úlie Yesu kudɔ na uunú-nwu ala ani na ɔɔtina.

Kaduli ablala ani nsia Marta lɛti pɛ lɛlɔ ékpoku-nwu kayi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu úbo na úbasu Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ulábla-a lɛla lɛdi ka mina ɔnwani ulekubi ɔ́da kaduli ablala amɛni ƒui ɔ́sia-mi lɛlɔ? Su-nwu na ubo ubebunku-mi!”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Marta! Nu kalɛ na eekpóku lɛlɔ na ala pii lɛlɔ.
Nsu lɛlakpa linwi kani námanku baawia. Na lɛbuni lɛmmɔ na Maria ɔ́ƒuna. Na basɔ baláƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.”

Limeyi lɛdi ni, Yesu ɔkya likpo lɛdi ɔɔkpali katɔ. Ka ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane akɔ unwi ɔdi úbo-nwu kudɔ, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, tina-bu kalɛ na butaakpali katɔ aani kalɛ na Yohane ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si bɛɛkpali katɔ ni, na bɛsu bɛnii, 'Ati, balɔ-ɔ lɛnyi buni. Ƒula lɛga kadikɔ kebo-bu akɔ. Babla ƒula lɛƒɔyɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na use na katɔ.
Te-bu bula limeyi adila limeyi ndi limeyi.
Na eti bula alaekpidi akyiɛ-bu, ɔsika abu lɛnɔ buuti taakyiɛ ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔƒiɔ́-bu. Na taya na buduo bukpoku taanu kemo. na edie-bu alɛku alaekpidi akɔ.' ”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Si banii bina akɔ ɔdi úsie nwuna ɔkpana ɔdi kudɔ usien ntɛ útásu-nwu ɔnii, 'Ɔkpana, vo-mi bodobodo ɛtɛ ɔdi,
ɔsika mina ɔkpana ɔdi ɔ́si ulu úbeduo-mi ɔƒɛni kani. Na liiibo lɛdila lɛdi na lite-nwu!'
“Na banii ƒula ɔkpana ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-ɔ ɔnii, 'Tebete-mi lɛƒɛda lɛdi! Ami ku mina bebi bɔ́ɔtɛ na bɔ́kalɛ ɔtɔ. Nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo bɔkana bɔta ɔƒɛni bubete-ɔ lɛla lɛdi.'
Si úbo úte lɛni ni, bi na adubo bɔbla? Mɔɔsu-mii nnii si nka kɔkpana kenye lɛti ɔsu ni, ulata. Nsu kalɛ na enye eevele-nwu taasia kama ɔsu ni, ɔdubɔta na ute-ɔ lɛla biala lɛni na aawia.
“Anwuɔsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii bivele Katɔti na ɔdubuti ute-mii, bɛwia na bɛdubɔkɛ, bibo kɔnu kegbuta na ɔdubɔlɛmi ute-mii.
Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni muuvele Katɔti ni, uute-nwu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia lɛla lɛdi ni, ɔɔkɛ́-ni. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muubó kɔnu kegbuta ni, Katɔti ɔɔlɛmi teete-nwu.
“Na amii bani ndi bebi bati ni, bute na ɔdi ɔdubuti kɔlakpi ute ubidi si úye-nwu kabɛ?
Munuu, katamlukpa na adubuti ete-nwu si úye-nwu akɔkɔ lɛvala?
Ina ka bɛdi alaekpidi bablane ni, bɛgyi kalɛ na biti ala abuni bite bina bebi. Amu na Ati ɔni nkya katɔ nɔɔ? Bi ɔsu na uleti nwuna Kɔyu ulete bekyuli bani muuvele-nwu?”
Uwi ɔdi ni, Yesu ɔkya ɔɔgyá kɔyu kɔdi na kulákana butemi. Amu ka kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ ukyuli ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kemo ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ úse kalɔ ku butemi. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ dɛye dɛye.
Nsu bana akɔ badi básu banini, “Ayu ekpidi ƒui unengu ɔni baalɔ banii Beelsebul muute-nwu ɔyikun ɔmmɔ ɔnii utaagya-ma taalɛku.”
Na babambadi lɛnɔ báyɔ ka bakywɛ Yesu kakpagyuɛ ɔsu básu-nwu banii ɔbla akɔla adi na uti udie ɔtina ka Katɔti náƒuna-nwu.

Nsu Yesu ɔ́ti lɛla lɛni na badanku na bana kasusu kemo. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Kalɔ kani muule lɛlɔ akpa akpa na beenye teekpoku lɛlɔ ni, kalɔ kammɔ kelétu uwi. Na kaduli kenwi bekyuli bani muule lɛlɔ na beekpóku lɛlɔ ni, bugyingya na beegyingya.
Anwuɔsu si Satan lɛga kadikɔ kebo akpa akpa ani muukpóku lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kadubunye? Bɛɛsu ka mɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku ka Beelsebul uute-mi ɔyikun ɔnii mbla lɛni ɔsu.
Na si Beelsebul lɛlɔ na mɔɔgyá-ma ni, ɔma lɛlɔ na bina basiakune ama baasia taagya ayu ekpidi taalɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo? Amii alati bina basiakune muudie taatina-mii ka bɛɛnyi ɔkɔ.
Oowo! Katɔti ɔyikun kemo mmomu na mɔɔgyá ayu ekpidi taalɛku. Na ɔmɛni uudie taatina-mii nwaa ka ni, Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kéebo kébeduo-mii kudɔ.
“Si ɔyikune ɔdi ɔ́klibi nwuna ekpola na unye ɔɔgyumana nwuna kaduli ni, agyi anii nwuna akɛla adi alayi.
Nsu si ukyuli ɔni mbo ɔkplu utulo-nwu úbo úbekpoku-nwu na ɔ́di-nwu lɛlɔ ni, uuƒie nwuna ekpola ani lɛlɔ ɔ́sia anu taaƒɔ na anwu ku nwuna bakpana beti ukyuli ɔmmɔ akɛla ani na béyu bele.
“Ukyuli ɔni neeenyeku-mi ni, agyi anii ɔ́ta únye-mi lɛlɔ geen. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebunku-mi na bɔsala ni, agyi anii bugyingya na uugyingya.

“Si kɔyu kukpidi kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ ukyuli lɛlɔ kemo ni, kɔɔkɛ taavi ekpo ekpo ani nákwi taawia kesii kani na kulie. Na si útakɛ kadi ni, ɔɔsu lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Ndubɔsɔ linwini lisie mina kaduli kani na lɛ́tɔlɔ mmɔ.'
Anwuɔsu ɔɔsɔ teesie taatánu ka bákpala ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo sɛɛn na béni ala ƒui.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, ɔɔsɔ teenwini teesie na utákpanku ayu ekpidi maatɛ ani mbo kalala ntulo-nwu na bebo bebelie mmɔ. Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ablala eebie teetulo kalɛ na úse kudeedi muedi.”
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́su ala amɛni ni, uleku ɔdi ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo na bekyuli akɔ mmɔ na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛlɔ lɛyɔ uleku ɔni náwɔ-ɔ na úte-ɔ lɛnyi na ányimi!”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti litemi na baabla taasiaku-ni lɛlɔ mmomu na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ!”

Amu ka bekyuli bammɔ beemomo Yesu kudɔ teebu ni, úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu kalɛ na ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli bebo likyulikpi! Akɔla budie bɔtina na baawia banu, nsu balanu budie bɔtina bɔdi uti utulo Yona bɔdi.
Kalɛ kani na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yona ɔdi likposela ute Niniweƒuɔ ni, lɛni kani na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ wenwini likposela wete ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli.

Na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi ni, Uleku Ɔga ɔni nási kada kakɛ ɔdubɔta unye na ubo-mii lɛnimi enwu, ɔsika ɔ́ta ɔ́si nwuna kalɔ úsie ɔgyu kakaaka ɔnii úténu Ɔga Salomo lɛnunda ala bɔtina. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii ukyuli ɔni ntulo Salomo ɔkya mɛni.

Niniweƒuɔ badubɔta benye na bebo-mii lɛnimi enwu na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na Yona ɔ́su-ma Katɔti litemi ni, bávumana udu na bénwini bana ekpidi kudɔ. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya-mii akɔ mɛni na utulo Yona!
“Ukyuli ɔdi ulátu asogya na uuti taabɛla iye ubi-nwu ala. Mmomu buti na uuti taasia likpo lɛni na bekyuli bani muuduo mmɔ banu nwaa.

Buse na ukyuli anumi ese aani asogya ute nwuna ɔlɔna. Si anumi aanu-ɔ kaduɛ ni, awɔ ukyuli umodi ɔmmɔ ni, use-ɔ nwaa ɔ́ka ɔ́mana. Nsu si ƒula anumi aaadia ni, agyi anii awɔ ukyuli ɔmmɔ akya lɛdisa kemo.
Anwuɔsu sia lɛlɔ anu na ati ka bukeye bɔni na bɔkya-a lɛlɔ kemo bɔɔɔdi lɛdisa.
Si bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ ƒui na ƒula kakɛ kadi kaaakya lɛdisa kemo ni, agyi anii kesii biala kadubo bukeye kalɛ kani na si asogya ɔɔda na nwuna bekeye buuwi-ɔ na use kalɛ.”
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ butemi ni, Ƒarisini ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-nwu bɔdi na nwuna kaduli. Amu na úsie útélie kalɔ na ɔtɔ kemo na baadi.
Ɔ́bla Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ dɛye dɛye ka ɔ́nu ka Yesu útaƒɔ kɔnu kalɛ na ɔdi ɔmmɔ ɔɔtina asa na úse kalɔ ku bɔdi.
Anwuɔsu Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔƒaani ni, amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ bɛɛƒɔ bina akyami ku lɛɛƒɛɛ kama, nsu bina lɛlɔ kemo geen anwu ni, likyulikpi ku kalala bɔbla bɔ́ƒɔ-ni ƒui.
Badɔlɔdi! Ɔɔɔdi Katɔti ɔmmɔ kani na ábla ala ƒui kemo ku kama yoo?
Biti ala ani ƒui nkya bina akyami ku lɛɛƒɛɛ kemo mmɔ bite bawabane kalɛ na bina lɛla biala lɛbla sɛɛn.

“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Biiti bina edula lɛkpa leevudi ku kevoma kutu akyala ƒɛƒɛɛ aani evete lidu lidu teete Katɔti. Nsu biiní ka utalɛka bɛnu bekyuli anumi bɛbla ala, na bilayɔ Katɔti lɛnɔ. Amɛni na ɔdi ka bɛbla bibunku ala ani na bɛdaku, na ɔɔɔdi ka bɛda ɔdi bise.
“Bɔbwɛ muute amii Ƒarisiƒuɔ! Ɔsika bɛɛwia ka bilie kuliekɔ kunengudi na bina kasalakɔ. Na bɛɛwia ka bekyuli bataakya-mii kenye ku ɔbu na kuyeya.
“Bɔbwɛ muute-mii, ɔsika bise aani kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔni na bétese-ku likpo, na bekyuli beesié taavi-ku lɛlɔ ɔsika baaagyi.”
Amu na ɔda bubo ala batinane akɔ unwi ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, si ásu ɔmɛni ni, eedumi abu lɛnɔ.”

Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bɔbwɛ muute amii ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛnɔ. Etila ani na bekyuli balakana buti ni, anya bɛɛtɛ taasia bekyuli kama. Na bilábla kasusu bɛnii biibunku-ma na bakana etila ammɔ buti.
“Bɔbwɛ muute-mii geen, ɔsika bɛɛtú kɔƒiɔtɔ kɔbuni teete Katɔti kenye bediene. Nsu Katɔti kenye bediene bammɔ geen na bina bati kuuku bádu.
Na amii alati bɛɛƒɔ́ ɔmɛni enu ka lɛla lɛni na bina bati bammɔ bábla lɛdia-mii. Ama bádu Katɔti kenye bediene na amii bɛ́tu bana kɔƒiɔtɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti lɛnunda lɛ́su lɛnii, 'Ndubɔtala Katɔti kenye bediene ku batu lɛkya-ma na badubɔdu badi na badubukpoku bakladi.'
Anwuɔsu ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli ƒui ni, badubo-ma kɔtu bɔni na Katɔti kenye bediene bani ƒui na bádu ɔ́si kayawi kamɛni kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ɔsu.
Ɔ́si ɔni bádu Abel úbedu Sakaria ɔni na bádu na lɛkpabi ku kesii kani na baalɔ banii likpo kedee ntɛ. Lɛni geen mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, Katɔti ɔdubo ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli kɔtu bɔni na bana ƒui ɔsu!
“Bɔbwɛ muute amii ɔda bubo ala batinane! Ɔsika ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na lɛnunda lɛkya ni, bɛ́kalɛ kayakun kammɔ bíse. Nsu amii alati bini bɛnii bileduo. Na biitile bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔwia beduo lɛnɔ kuƒi.”
Ka Yesu ɔ́tɔlɔ likpo lɛmmɔ ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bese kalɔ ku Yesu litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnyi buti, na beedie-ni bɔƒiɔ taasu ala lidu lidu.
Na bakya baawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia bakya-nwu litemi kenye na ɔbla likpidi lɛdi.
Ka bekyuli mpimu mpimu badi bábasa mmɔ ɔni na baanya lɛlɔ muedi ni, Yesu ɔ́ka nwuna batɛyane bɔsu ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana kaduɛ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ɔkɔ ablala ani muuƒú bekyuli mmɔ lɛlɔ.
Ala ani ƒui na bekyuli bábla bábɛ ni, adubo bɔda bɔlɛ keyi nwaa.
Anwuɔsu lɛla biala na bɛ́su na kasuudikɔ ni, ɔdubɔlɛ keyi. Na kabɛsɛ iye katɔma kɔtɛ biala na bɛ́su ni, ɔtɔ katɔ na badubo-ku lɛsa bɔkɔ.
“Bakpana, mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, bitayia bekyuli bani na ɔlɔna kani na badubɔkana bɔdu na ɔmmɔ kama na basɔ balakana lɛla lɛdi bɔbla.

Ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛyia ni, ndubo-mii bɔtina. Bɛyia Katɔti ɔni na si ɔ́du-ɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, na ɔsɔ ubo ɔyikun na uti-ɔ ubo ɔkya lɛgyavonku lɛni mɔɔda uwi ƒui kemo. Bɛƒɔ-mi bɛdi ka ni, anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na ɔlɛka bɛyia.
Ɔɔɔdi kaplɛ inyɔ kani na beeyé baasɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ ɛlɔ? Nsu Katɔti anu alávia ɔdi lɛlɔ.
Bula lili linwini muedi ni, Katɔti ɔgyi-ni bumomo. Anwuɔsu ni, bɛda bɔyia bɛya ɔsika bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bitulo baasɛ pii.
“Mɔɔsu-mii nwaa ka ni, ukyuli ɔni masu na kadi anumi ka ɔdi mina ɔdi ni, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ ɔdubɔsu lɛni kani na Katɔti batu anumi na nwuna lɛlɔ.
Nsu ukyuli ɔni meni-mi na kadi anumi ni, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛnɔ weni-nwu na Katɔti batu ƒui anumi.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni masu lɛla lɛdi na wata wenye Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti ɔkyiɛ-nwu. Nsu ukyuli ɔni matɛmi enyekpi Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti uleti ulakyiɛ-nwu.
“Si bákpanku-mii bésienku Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ iye batɔnkune iye bagadine anumi banii baatɛku-mii litemi ni, ɔƒɛ utada-mii bɛnii bi na bɛdubo bɔsu iye dɛ na bɛdubudie lɛlɔ kenye.
Ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kɔdubɔtina-mii na uwi ɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ lɛla lɛni na bɛdubo bɔsu.”
Ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya bekyuli akɔ mmɔ na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane, su mina ɔnwani na ule bula ɔti kadikɔ kani na ɔ́da úse-bu ute-mi.”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ɔma néte-mi kuƒi ɔnii nle ala iye ntɛ litemi na bina inyɔ ntɛ?”
Amu na ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnini, “Bɛsia lɛlɔ anu na binye lɛlɔ kagyumana na ɔdivo udu biala bɔdi lɛlɔ, ɔsika ukyuli ngba geen bɔɔɔkɛnku ala ani nse-nwu lɛlɔ ina dɛ na ɔdi ɔlakɛne.”
Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya dii ɔni na ubo kalɔ buni kani náya na nwuna edula ádia geen.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔ́bla kasusu ɔnii, 'Ka liiibo kesii kani makya mina edula amɛni ni, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla?
“ 'Lɛla lɛni ndubɔbla ndi ɔnii ndubugyingya mina edula kakyakɔ kakukudi na lɛbla kawɔdi kani na kébomo kétulo kamɛni. Mmɔ na ndubɔkɛ kesii kani na makya mina edula ƒui.
Na ndubɔsu lɛlɔ nnii kuli kɔdia-mii. Ala buni ani ƒui ása-mi ute akwa pii. Ndubɔnwuna, na lɛdi, na lɛni, na lɛkya lɛlɔ ebiti.'
“Nsu Katɔti anwu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Awɔ ɔdɔlɔdi! Usien ɔmɛni kani na adubo ƒula ngba bɔda buse. Na ɔma ndubɔdi ala ani na áwia ése éte lɛlɔ mɛni?' ”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ nwuna kɔtɛ ɔnini, “Lɛni na use ute bekyuli bani mɔɔwia akɛla batɛ bese lɛlɔ, na beeebo lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti anumi.”
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Anwuɔsu na mɔɔsu-mii nnii bitekpoku lɛlɔ na lɛla lɛni na bɛdi bilie ngba lɛlɔ iye ɔlɔna adala lɛlɔ.
Ngba bɔ́ƒɔ kuye butulo adila, na ɔlɔna lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ kuye utulo adala.
Bɛnu baasɛ na kayaa ka balágya na baláƒɛ edula lɛnɔ. Beeebo linwu iye edula kakyakɔ. Nsu Katɔti uute-ma bɔdi! Na amii bɛ́ƒɔ kuye bitulo baasɛ kukuuku.
Bɛɛkali ka ɔdi wakana ngba bulie gyɔlɔɔ butulo nwuna uwi ina blii suɛ na nwuna lɛlɔ bukpoku ɔsu?
Na si bɛɛɛdubo lɛla lɛdi bɔkana bɔbla na ala wɛlɛ wɛlɛ amɛni lɛlɔ ni, bi ɔsu na biikpóku lɛlɔ na ala bamba lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
“Bɛnu kalɛ na anwula ani mɔɔdia bɔnu aalɛ́ lili. Balábla kabla kadi iye beledi adi teete lɛlɔ. Nsu mɔɔsu-mii nnii Ɔga Salomo muedi ku nwuna lɛkɛ ƒui ni, útakɛ adala ani ndia édu anwula amɛni.

Katɔti muute livo lɛmɛni bɔdia bɔmɛni udu. Livo lɛmɛni linye ɔmwi na uwi bamba na bekulo-ni bakya ogya na bakyula-ni na livongu kemo. Bute na Katɔti ɔmmɔ ulete-mii adala uletulo livo lɛmmɔ? Bi ɔsu na bina bɔƒɔtaadi buse blii suɛ lɛni?
Anwuɔsu bitayia na anumi eteegyie-mii na biteeye bɛnii bi na bɔdubɔdi iye bi na bɔdubɔni.
Ɔsika bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ Katɔti bátadi ni, ama mɔɔsia ala amɛni anu uwi ndi uwi. Bina Ɔti ɔgyi ka ala amɛni ƒui adi ala ani na bɛɛwia.
Mmomu ni, biteeti kasusu na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ na ɔdubuti ala amɛni ƒui ute-mii.
“Mina basiakune lisu libliidi, bitayia. Ɔsika ɔdi Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ka ute-mii nwuna lɛga kadikɔ.

Biti bina lɛlɔ ala biye na bile egulabi ammɔ bite bawabane. Na bɛwia egulabi kɔvumi kɔni na bɛgyi ka kulatɔ bise katɔ bite lɛlɔ. Mmɔ na bina akɛla adubuse kpoo na alaƒana kudii. Ɔsika uyune ɔdi ulakana mmɔ buduo, na kubweyi kɔni muubile ala lɛnɔ kulakana-nya bubile.
Ɔsika kesii kani na bina akɛla ese ni, mmɔ na bina kɔyi lɛnɔ kɔdubɔkya.
“Bɛklibi lɛlɔ bise bite lɛla biala mebo, na bɛtu akpagya. Na bina likpo liteni.
Na binye lɛni aani kabla bablane bani nnye bagya bana Unwoti ka ɔsi uleku ketikɔ ɔda ubalɛ. Na si úbo na uubó kɔnu kegbuta ni, na balɛmi bete-nwu kɔnakunwi.

Kabla bablane bammɔ badubɔkɛ ebiti geen si bana Unwoti úbanu-ma ka benye kagyumana bete nwuna bɔsɔ bubo! Mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, ɔdubɔsabla kɔdi lɛlɔ use, na ɔya na belie kalɔ na anwu alati ute-ma adila na badi.
Na ina usientɛ iye kadi ƒulu ƒulu na webo na wabanu-ma ka benye kagyumana ni, nu ebiti ani udu na wabla-ma!
Ɔƒɛni ni, bɛdubɔnu bɛti ka si bɔti na kaduli ɔlati wati uwi na uyune webeyu-nwu ni, nka ulete-nwu kuƒi na wabwɛ weduo-nwu ɔtɔ.
Anwuɔsu na ɔlɛka amii lɛnɔ binye kagyumana, ɔsika ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndububo mbeyu-mii lɛtu.”
Amu na Petro úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, abu na lɛgba lɛmɛni lɛdanku, munuu ukyuli biala na ada?”

Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kabla ɔblane ɔni náda anu na ɔɔbla ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu na nwuna Unwoti uuti teenyene kabla bablane bakladi kenye. Na anwu ndubute kabla bablane bakladi bana lɛdila kalɛ na ɔ́manku na uwi ɔbuni kemo.
Nu, si kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔbla ɔmɛni kaduɛ asa na nwuna Unwoti úbo ni, ɔdubɔbla ebiti bonwu geen ute kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ!
Geen geen ni, mɔɔsu-mii nnii Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubuti kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ unyene nwuna ala ƒui kenye.

Nsu si kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Mina Unwoti úsela útákya ulu na uwi utu,' ɔsu na úse kalɔ ɔɔdi na ɔɔní ntɛ teekpi na uubó kabla bablane bakladi bani ndi banana ku beleku ƒui na ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni,
nwuna Unwoti ɔdububo ubeyu-nwu ɔtu ɔni na ɔɔɔgyi uuuse. Mmɔ ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔni-nwu kɔtu kpakplaa kɔni námanku batuɔkplune bammɔ udu.
“Kabla ɔblane ɔni ngyi lɛla lɛni na nwuna Unwoti ɔɔwia ka nka ɔbla ute-nwu nsu uuní-ni bɔbla ka útada lɛlɔ útese ɔsu ni, bubo na badubo-nwu bubo na ebola eduo-nwu lɛlɔ.

Nsu kabla ɔblane ɔni naaagyi lɛla lɛni na nwuna Unwoti ɔɔwia ka ɔbla nsu ɔ́bla lɛla lɛni na bani-nwu kɔtu ni, nwuna kɔtu bɔni bɔɔbla blii suɛ. Si ukyuli ɔni na béte-ɔ ala pii ni, lɛni kani na ɔlɛka abla ala pii. Na ukyuli ɔni na béte-ɔ ala pii betulo ni, lɛni kani na ɔlɛka abla kabla pii etulo.
“Líti Katɔti kɔtu bɔni líboku bekyuli akɔ ɔni nse aani ogya kalɛ. Na mɔɔwia geen ka nka ogya ɔmmɔ úuse kalɔ ɔdaku bɔda.
Lɛƒɛda bonwu lɛdi lɛdubo-mi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ketu keeti ukyuli. Na liiibo bɔnwuna bɔdi úti utédu uwi ɔni na lɛƒɛda lɛmɛni líbo líbavi.
Bɔkali bɛda bɛnii keyi buɛɛ na líti líboku kayawi? Oowo! Ɔɔɔdi keyi buɛɛ, mmomu lɛlɔ bugyingyaku na bɔdi.
Na ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, kaduli kani kemo na nkyuli ɛlɔ bakya ni, badubo lɛlɔ bule. Inyɔ bata benye ɛtɛ lɛlɔ.

Ubi ɔti wata wenye bananabi lɛlɔ, na bananabi bata benye bana ɔti lɛlɔ. Bebi beni badubɔta benye bana belekubi lɛlɔ, na belekubi lɛnɔ bata benye bana beni lɛlɔ. Na begyieni badubɔta benye bana bebi bele lɛlɔ, na bebi bata benye bana begyieni lɛlɔ.”
Yesu ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Si bɛ́nu ka uyɔlɔ úminime lɛlɔ ɔ́si ɔƒɛ kanukɔ na kayaa ni, bɛɛsu kɔnakunwi ka ɔnantu ɔdubo bɔna. Na ɔɔlɛ́ lɛni.
Na si bɛ́nu bɛ́ti ka kada kakɛ ɔƒɛƒɛɛ uukpó ni, bɛɛsu ka liwulu lɛdubo. Na ɔɔlɛ́ lɛni.
Anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli, ka bɛɛnu kalɔ ku kayaa na bɛɛtí uwi taatina ni, bi ɔsu na bilenu uwi ɔmɛni anwu kalɔ?
“Bi ɔsu na bileduo ala kemo taanu lɛbuni lɛni na ɔlɛka bɛbla bɛti?

Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-ɔ katɛ na litemi katɛkɔ ka awɔ ku-nwu bɛ́kɛ lɛla lɛdi ni, sia ulu biala lɛlɔ na bɛklibi litemi lɛmmɔ asa na biduo litemi katɛkɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ɔdubuti-ɔ ute litemi batɛne ku beƒiene na bakya-a ɔtɔ.
Na mɔɔyá-a na ati ka mmɔ na adubo bɔkya wetédu uwi ɔni na áƒɔ ƒula kɔtu bɔni kayu étédu kawɔlɔkɔ.”
Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, bekyuli badi bakya mmɔ bani násu Yesu kalɛ na Pilato ɔ́du Galileaƒuɔ badi uwi ɔni na bákya bátaabla akpala teete Katɔti.
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛɛbu bɛnii ka bádu Galileaƒuɔ bammɔ lɛni ɔsu ni, ama ndi alaekpidi bablane benengudi ntulo Galileaƒuɔ bakladi ƒui?
Oowo, ɔɔɔdi lɛni kudii! Nsu bɔsu nda-mii nnii si bítada bina ala ekpidi bɔbla bítaya ni, lɛni kani na amii lɛnɔ bɛdubo bukpi.
Na nkyuli leevu-maane bani na Siloa ɔtɔ ubendi ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɛ úbo na békpi nɔɔ? Bɛɛkali ka ɔmɛni ɔsu ama ndi bekyuli bekpidi ntulo ama bani nli Yerusalem mmɔ ƒui?
Oowo, ɔɔɔdi lɛni kudii! Mɔɔsu-mii ka si bítavumana udu ni, lɛni kani na bina ƒui bɛdubo bukpi aani ama kalɛ.”
