Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na ubo kɔdingyii kɔdi na nwuna kemo. Úsie ɔnii utáwia kugyii kɔmɛni ebi, nsu útakɛ adi.
Amu na ɔ́su nwuna kemo kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔnii, 'Nu! Akwa atɛ sɔɔn mɛni ka muubo mɛni taabawia kugyii kɔmɛni ebi taanɔ. Da-ku va kalɔ, ɔsika kuuubo lɛblakula na kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na kunye mmɔ.'
“Nsu kemo lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ati, nyonu-ku na kɔsɔ kunye lɛkwa linwi pɛ bɔnu. Ndubuku-ku kalɔ na lɛkya-ku ala ani ndubɔya na kalɔ kammɔ kelie lɛmwi na bɔnu.
Na si kɔ́kana ebi bonwu ni, ɔdia. Nsu si útakana bɔnwu ni, akana na ada-ku ava kalɔ.' ”
Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina ala na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi.
Na uleku ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́kya mmɔ ɔni na kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi kuukpóku akwa leevu-maane sɔɔn. Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́ya na kalɔ kani na uleku ɔmmɔ úbo ɔkɛ uwi biala ɔni na ulakana na unye ligeen.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́kpali-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, ƒula ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-a!”
Na Yesu úti nwuna enu ɔ́sia uleku ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na kɔna kunwi ni, uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́ta únye ligeen na úmwi Katɔti.

Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔnune úti kɔnyi geen sɔsɔ na ɔni na Yesu ɔ́bwi ɔlɛne na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ɔsu. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ƒui ɔnini, “Bubo emeyi aku ani buti bɔbla bula kabla. Anwuɔsu bibo na emeyi amɛni kemo si lɛla lɛdi lɛda bina akɔ ɔdi na babwi-nwu, na ɔɔɔdi lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ!”
Mmɔ na Blɔti údie kenye na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Amii, anumi lɛlɔ bekyuli, biidie bebuo bani mɔɔbla-mii kabla iye beeti-mii ala lɛbuli na bɛɛkpanku-ma teesienku ntu kanikɔ.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, bɛɛnu Abraham kaba kemo ubi nnye mɛni ɔni na Satan úbo lɛkpu akwa leevu-maane sɔɔn mɛni. Ɔɔɔdia ka baƒɛnimi-nwu abuli ammɔ na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ?”
Kenye kani na Yesu údie mɛni ɔ́ya na kɔƒa kúkpo nwuna bekisine, na bekyuli bakladi bákɛ ebiti na akɔla budie taatina ani ƒui na ɔ́bla ɔsu.
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛgyi kalɛ na Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse? Na bi na ɔlɛka buti-mu bɔmanku?
Bɛnu! Ɔnana ɔdi úti edula kebi blii suɛ kadi útáva nwuna kemo. Ka edula kebi kamɛni kákwɛ ni, kébenwini kugyii bonwu na baasɛ bábatu ayu bákya-ku kɔgba akɔ.”
Yesu ɔ́sɔ úbo-ma lɛgba lɛbambadi ɔnini, “Katɔti lɛga bɔdi litemi bugyingya buse aani ɔmɛni.
Uleku ɔdi úti bɔnyii ɔ́salaku ɔlaaƒɔ koƒo kunwi, na ɔ́nwu ɔ́sala útédu uwi ɔni na bɔnyii bɔmmɔ bɔ́ƒɔ ɔlaaƒɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui na úƒu.”
Yesu úsie ɔ́vi lɛma ku akpaklɔ kemo na ɔ́tina bekyuli ala uwi ɔni na úsela Yerusalem.
Mmɔ na ukyuli ɔdi úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bekyuli bani na ndubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ ni, baaadubo bumomo yoo?” Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini,
“Kya ɔkplu na asia kayakun kani nse blii suɛ kemo eduo. Ɔsika bekyuli pii badubɔwia geen banii baasia mmɔ beduo, nsu balakana.

Uwi ɔdubo ubedu ɔni na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔta na ɔkalɛ kayakun kammɔ. Na amii bani nébu binye keyi bɛdubo kɔnu kayakun buteebo bɛnii, 'Ati, lɛmi-bu!' “Nsu Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔdubudie kenye ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛgyi-mii!'
“Na bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Abu ku-ɔ nádi na bɔ́ni, na átina ala na bula ɔma!'
“Nsu anwu ɔdubɔsɔ udie kenye ɔnii, 'Lɛɛɛgyi-mii! Bɛkpɛ bisie-mii lɛlɔ, amii bekyuli bekpidi.'
“Mmɔ na keku ku animi bɔdu bɔdubɔkya uwi ɔni na bɛdubɔnu Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob ku Katɔti kenye bediene ƒui na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma uwi ɔni kemo na Katɔti ɔ́gya-mii ɔnii biteduo.
Bekyuli badubɔsi ɔƒɛ katukɔ ku kanukɔ bebo. Na basi katɔ kakɛ ku kada kakɛ babasala na badi na bani na Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.
Na bekyuli bani ndi bekplodi ni, badubunwini bedeedi. Na bani ndi bedeedi ni, badubunwini bekplodi.”
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi bébo Yesu kudɔ na bábasu-nwu banii, “Babla na avi alɛ mɛni kɔnakunwi eteesie likpo bamba, ɔsika Ɔga Herode ɔɔwia ka ɔdu-ɔ.”

Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bisie na bitásu uƒukutu ɔmmɔ ka lɛ́su lɛnii, 'Ɔmwi ni, ndubo ayu ekpidi bɔgya na lɛbwi bekyuli lɛlɛ lɛni na beeƒi utálɛ kɔnaadi. Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ ni, ndubɔwɔlɔ mina kabla.'
Anwuɔsu ɔ́bla bi ɔ́bla dɛ ni, ndubusie anumi ɔmwi utálɛ kɔnaadi ku keegye. Ɔsika útalɛka badu Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi na likpo bamba si ɔɔɔdi Yerusalem ɔma kemo.

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Awɔ mɔɔdú Katɔti kenye bediene, na awɔ muubó Katɔti batalane bani na ɔ́tala ɔ́kya-a atabi. Kɔlɛ kɔlɛ sɔɔn mɛni ka líbimi mina enu nnii mɔɔsála-mii aani kalɛ na akɔkɔ uledi uuti nwuna avwi teebi nwuna bebi lɛlɔ, nsu étenu kalɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ɔma ɔmɛni atu. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, bɛsɔ bɛɛɛdubo-mi bɔnu wetédu uwi ɔni na bɛdubɔsu bɛnii, 'Bimwi anwu ɔni ndubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo!' ”
Na lɛnwunameyi lɛdi lɛlɔ ni, Yesu úsie Ƒarisiƒuɔ benengu akɔ unwi ɔdi kesii likpo lɛni na bálɔ-nwu banii ubadi. Na bekyuli bakya baatú-nwu kpakplaa.
Mmɔ na ɔnana ɔdi na lɛgba ku enu eeƒu-nwu úbo-nwu kudɔ.
Amu na Yesu úye ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ ɔnini, “Bula ɔda bubo búte-bu ulu ka bɔbwi ukyuli na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ, munuu bútete-bu ulu?”
Nsu bátakana kenye bubimi bɔsu lɛla lɛdi. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ ukyuli ɔmɛni úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ na ɔ́bwi-nwu na ɔ́ya-nwu na ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bina ɔdi ubo ubi iye ebuo ɔni muuti ala na ɔ́nu libiɔ lɛdi kemo na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bɛɛɛdubo-nwu budie na lɛnwunameyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnakunwi?”
Nsu bátakana-nwu kenye budie.
Ka Yesu ɔ́nu ɔ́ti kalɛ na bekyuli bani na bálɔ-ma béboku likpo lɛdi bakya baanwanɛ kuliekɔ kɔni na kɔ́ƒɔ kuye ni, úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi ɔnini,
“Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́lɔ-ɔ ɔnii bo-nwu uleku ketikɔ ni, tetélie likpo lɛni na lɛ́ƒɔ kuye litulo. Ɔsika ɔƒɛni kalɛ ɔ́lɔ ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ kuye utulo-ɔ lɛnɔ na mmɔ.
Na ukyuli ɔni nálɔ bina inyɔ ƒui úboku mmɔ ulasu-ɔ ɔnii, 'Ya na ukyuli ɔmɛni ubelie mmɔ.' Na alata eletélie likpo lɛni nátaƒɔ kuye ku kɔƒa.

Mmomu si bálɔ-ɔ bésienku likpo lɛdi ni, sie télie likpo lɛni nátaƒɔ kuye. Na si ukyuli ɔni nálɔ-ɔ úboku mmɔ úbo ni, na ubasu-ɔ ɔnii, 'Ɔkpana, ta mmɔ na ebelie likpo lɛni náƒɔ kuye mɛni.' Na ɔmɛni ɔdubɔkɔliku-ɔ katɔ na bekyuli bakladi bani na bálɔ béboku mmɔ ƒui anumi.
Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni makɔli lɛlɔ katɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdububoku-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni meboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔliku-nwu katɔ.”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su ukyuli ɔni nálɔ-nwu ɔnii ubo kadikɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Si álɔ bekyuli anii bebo na babadi na ƒula kesii ni, talɔ bakpana iye ƒula banwani iye lɛlɔ bekyuli iye ƒula bekutene bani ndi balakɛne. Ɔsika ama lɛnɔ badubɔlɔ-ɔ lɛni kani banii bo na abadi. Na si úbo lɛni ni, agyi anii lɛla lɛni na ábla éte-ma lɛyuƒɔla na básɔku beete-ɔ mmɔ.
Mmomu si aadi limeyi lɛmɛni udu ni, lɔ bawabane ku bekyuli bani naaakana busie kaduɛ ku bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ ku bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma.
Ɔmɛni ɔdubɔya na Katɔti ute-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ. Ɔsika bekyuli bammɔ baaadubo-ɔ kayu kadi bɔkana bɔƒɔ. Katɔti ndubɔƒɔ-ɔ kayu na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekyuli babuni badubɔsɔ bata bási bekpine akɔ.”
Ka bekyuli bani nlie kadikɔ mmɔ akɔ unwi únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Kubiti geen ndubɔda bekyuli bani ndubo babadi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́lɔ bekyuli pii badi na limeyi libendi lɛdi kadikɔ.
Ka uwi údu ka bese bɔdi ku bɔni kalɔ ni, ɔ́tala nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii batásu nwuna bekyuli bani ƒui na ɔ́lɔ na bebo. Ɔsika lɛla biala lɛ́ɛsadi!
“Nsu bana ƒui bése kalɔ atɔ asia ku kuƒi buvele. Ukyuli udeedi ɔ́su kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔnii, 'Líye kalɔ kadi na ɔdi ka lisie ntánu-ka. Anwuɔsu su-nwu anii, “Buvele, naaakana bubo.” '
“Ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔnii, 'Líye ɔmantɛ bakɔ leevu bani mebunku-mi na kemo. Na ulu ndaku bɔyu ntábla-ma lɛnu kalɛ na badubo bɔkana bɔtuma. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, su-nwu anii, “Buvele, naaakana bubo.” '
“Ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔnii, 'Ɔƒɛni kani na búti lɛlɔ na báwɛɛ-bu ɔgya ku ule, anwuɔsu naaakana bubo.'

“Kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie útásu nwuna Unwoti ala amɛni ƒui. Mmɔ ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ úti kɔnyi geen na ɔ́su nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔnini, 'Babla na esie lilu lɛlɔ ku ekpo ani ƒui na akpanku bawabane ku bekyuli bani naaakana busie kaduɛ ku bani na anumi ábwɛ-ma ku bani ƒui náƒɛ bewi kalɔ eboku.'
“Amu na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ úsie útábla lɛni. Na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbasu nwuna Unwoti ka ɔ́lɔ-ma, nsu kuliekɔ pii kɔ́sɔ kúbu.
“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Sie na asia umolu ku akpaklɔ lilu na akya ɔkplu na akpanku bekyuli ƒui eboku kalɛ na mina ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ƒui keyi.
Na mɔɔsu-ɔ nwaa nnii bekyuli bani ƒui na lɛ́lɔ nnii bebo kadikɔ ni, ɔdi biala ulétuku mina adila amɛni kenye ulanu!' ”
Uwi ɔdi ka bekyuli pii badi basiaku Yesu ni, únwini na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
“Ukyuli biala ɔni muubo-mi kudɔ ni, ulakana-mi bɔtɛya si ulayɔ-mi teetulo ɔti ku uni ku ulekudi ku bebi ku nwuna banwani bananabi ku belekubi ku anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ muedi.
Si ukyuli ɔni naaadubo bɔkana na ubo abi aani ami kalɛ na ɔsiaku-mi kama ni, ulakana-mi bɔtɛya.
“Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔtu ɔtɔ bonwu ɔdi ni, ɔɔka kalɔ bulie na ɔɔbu atula ammɔ ƒui kuye taanu si ubo egulabi ammɔ udu ɔyikun kalɛ na wakana ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bɔwɔlɔ asa na use kalɔ.
Na si útakana ɔmɛni bɔbla ni, ulakana ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bɔwɔlɔ, ina ɔ́nwu lɛti ku atabi kpakplaa ɔ́kya awodu kalɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ. Na si bekyuli bani nnye amadɔ bánu ɔmɛni báti ni, badubo-nwu butaama banii,
'Ukyuli ɔmɛni úse ɔtɔ bɔtu kalɔ, nsu útakana bɔwɔlɔ.'

“Si ɔga ɔdi ɔ́ta kekpo ku nwuna bekpone mpimu leevu na útásiaku ɔga ɔbambadi ɔni mbo bekpone mpimu aavlanyɔ ni, ɔɔsɔku lili kemo taabu kaduɛ si nwuna ɔyikun ɔni na ubo ɔdubɔya na unye ɔsiaku nwuna ukisine ɔmmɔ.
Na si ɔ́nu ka uuubo ɔyikun ɔmmɔ udu ni, ɔdubɔtala nwuna batu na besie batásiaku ɔga ɔmmɔ na bevele-nwu na basɔ belékpo na benwini bakpana mmomu asa na ɔga ɔmmɔ ɔda ɔlɛ muedi.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́wɔlɔ nwuna kɔtɛ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni kani na bina akɔ ɔdi ulakana-mi bɔtɛya si útada atu útedie lɛla biala lɛlɔ.
“Mma bubo emini. Nsu si emini ása mma kemo ni, ulu ɔdi biala ɔsɔ uuubo na bakya-mu emini lɛnɔ.
Ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛni na beti bakya kalɔ lɛmwi na útamanku kebu muedi. Buwiakun na beewiakun-mu. “Anwuɔsu bibimi atu na binu-mi kalɔ kaduɛ!”
Limeyi lɛdi ni, kuyi baƒɔne pii ku alaekpidi bablane babambadi bébo Yesu kudɔ banii bebenu-nwu litemi.
Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bése kalɔ beetemi teewi-nwu na bana lɛlɔ kemo banii, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔƒɔ́ alaekpidi bablane na anwu ku-ma baadi muedi!”
Anwuɔsu Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini,

“Si banii bina akɔ ɔdi ubo baƒonu eti anyɔ na bana akɔ unwi ɔ́yii ni, bi na adubo bɔbla? Adubɔda liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi bammɔ enyene kadikɔ mmɔ na atásia kɔni náyi mmɔ kama wetédu uwi ɔni nánu-ku.
Na si ánu-ku ni, adubɔkɛ kubiti geen, na agyu-ku asia amangba.
Na eti-ku eboku kaduli. Na adubɔlɔ ƒula bakpana ku bekutene na asu-ma anii, 'Ebiti aada-mi geen, ɔsika lɛ́nu mina koƒonu kɔni náyii ɔsu bɛkɛku-mi ebiti!'

Na mɔɔsu-mii ka ni, lɛni na ebiti enengudi adubɔda Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma badi ƒui na alaekpidi ɔblane unwi pɛ ɔni nénwini kayi ɔsu utulo ebiti ani bebo na nkyuli liti ku aavlene-yaalenwi babuni bani naaawia kayi bunwini.

“Na si uleku ɔdi ubo sika ɔƒualadi ebi leevu ani ndubɔƒɔ nkyuli leevu limeyi kayu na ɔ́yila unwi ni, bi na ɔdubo bɔbla? Ɔdubɔtu asogya na ɔkpala nwuna ɔtɔ kemo ƒui na ɔwia lɛkɔkɔ lɛmmɔ ƒui kaduɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu sika ubi ɔmmɔ.
Na si ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔdubɔlɔ nwuna bakpana ku bekutene ɔsala, na ɔsu-ma ɔnii, 'Ebiti aada-mi geen, ɔsika lɛ́nu mina sika ubi ɔni náyii ɔsu bɛkɛku-mi ebiti.'
Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, lɛni kani na Katɔti batu lɛnɔ baakɛ́ ebiti na alaekpidi ɔblane unwi ɔni nénwini kayi ɔsu.”
Yesu úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni mbo bebi bananabi inyɔ.
Amu na ɔnamudi ɔ́su ɔti ɔnini, 'Ati, ti mina kadikɔ kani na adubo-mi bute te-mi gyɔnkɔ.' Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔnana ɔmmɔ úti ala ammɔ úle akpa anyɔ úte nwuna bebi inyɔ bammɔ.
“Na emeyi alɛɛ adi kama ni, ɔnamudi ɔmmɔ úti nwuna ala ammɔ ƒui úye na úti egulabi ammɔ na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie ɔlɔgyu kakaaka kesii kani na útélie ngba basa basa na úbile egulabi ammɔ ƒui.
Ɔ́di lɛla biala lɛni na ɔda ɔ́wɔlɔ. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, kɔka kubendi kɔdi kúbo na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ɔsu kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu na ɔsɔ uuubo lɛla lɛdi na ɔdi.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu úti lɛlɔ útése ɔkpa úte ɔnana ɔdi ɔnii utaabla kabla udu biala na wakɛ ute-nwu. Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úti-nwu útákya nwuna baplakuo kanyuɛkɔ na nwuna lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi.
Kɔka ɔsu ni, ɔ́yɔ ka nka ɔkɛ baplakuo adila ani na beete-ma mmɔ adi ɔdi, ɔsika ɔ́nu aani bekyuli lɛnɔ bakana-nya bɔdi, nsu ukyuli ɔdi útete-nwu adi.

“Kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo lɛlɔ kemo na ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Bekyuli bani nése lɛlɔ ɔkpa béte mina ɔti na baabla nwuna kabla ni, baakɛ́ adila taadi na eebú muedi. Na ami nlie mɛni na kɔka kɔdubo-mi bɔdu!
Ndubo bɔta na lɛsɔ linwini nteesie mina ɔti kudɔ, na ntásu-nwu nnii, “Ati, lɛ́bla likpidi na lɛ́ƒiɔ Katɔti ku awɔ lɛnɔ.
Ńsɔ ńtamanku ka alɔ-mi anii ƒula ubi. Mmomu bla-mi aani bekyuli bani néti lɛlɔ bése ɔkpa béte-ɔ akɔ ɔdi.” '
Amu na ɔ́ta kɔnakunwi na úti ala na ɔ́yu ulu úsela ɔti kudɔ. “Ka ɔti ɔ́nu-nwu ɔ́ti ɔni na ubidi ɔmɛni ɔmua ɔkɛ ɔgyu ɔdubo ni, ubidi lɛlɔ lɛ́bla-nwu kɔnyana, na úkeli útátu ɔda-nwu ku kubiti.
“Mmɔ na ubidi ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́bla likpidi lɛ́ƒiɔ Katɔti, na lɛ́ƒiɔ awɔ lɛnɔ. Na ńsɔ ńtamanku ka alɔ-mi anii ubi lɛnɔ!'
“Nsu ni, ɔti ɔ́kpali nwuna kabla bablane ɔnii, 'Bɛbabla na biti adala abuni bibakya-nwu. Na biti asɛɛ ku lɛgbanvuo lɛbuni lɛnɔ bɛkya-nwu enu ku lɛgba.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, bisie na bitéƒie ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi kaduɛ na bɛdu-nwu. Na bɛya na bɔdi limeyi.
Ɔsika mina ubi ɔmɛni ni, búti-nwu bɔnii úkpi. Nsu ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba. Ɔ́yii na bɔ́sɔ bɔ́nu-nwu.' Ɔmɛni ɔsu bése kalɔ ku limeyi bɔdi.
“Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, ubidi unengudi úsie ɔɔví taanu bana imo. Ka ɔ́si ɔdubo na ɔ́kpɛ uudé kaduli ni, únu kɔgya ku katɔ kani nda.
Amu na ɔ́kpali kabla bablane bammɔ akɔ unwi na úye-nwu ɔnini, 'Bi mɔɔlɛ́ kaduli?'
Mmɔ na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ƒ^ɔnwani násɔ únwini úbo ɔma na ƒ^ɔti ɔ́ya na bádu ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi, ɔsika ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo úbeduo ɔni na lɛla lɛdi lɛɛɛda-nwu.'
“Ɔmɛni ɔ́ya na livo líƒi ɔnwani unengudi ɔmmɔ kaduɛ ɔni na úni ɔnii ɔsɔ uleduo kaduli muedi. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔti ɔ́vi ɔlɛ úbo-nwu kudɔ mmɔ, na úbevele-nwu ɔnii ubo ubeduo kaduli.

Nsu ubidi ɔmmɔ únwini na ɔ́su ɔti kɔnakunwi ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na nnye mɔɔbla kabla akwa pii amɛni kemo teete-ɔ aani ƒula kabla ɔblane na ńtata ńtenye ƒula ɔda bubo ɔdi lɛlɔ kudii, na étete-mi lɛla lɛdi ina ese muedi étete-mi anii ndi limeyi ku mina bakpana.
Nsu ka ƒ^ubidi ɔni nébile ƒula lɛkɛ na ɔkɛ ɔsiaku bayalɛ mɛni ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ɔma ni, ádu ebuo ɔni nélie lɛmwi éte-nwu!'
“Mmɔ na ɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Mina ubi, awɔ akya-mi kudɔ uwi biala na ala ani na mbo ƒui ni, awɔ adi na adi.
Nsu ni, ɔlɛka bɔdi limeyi na bɔkɛ ebiti, ɔsika búti-nwu bɔnii bukpi na ƒ^ɔnwani úkpi na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ngba. Bɔyii na ɔ́yii na bɔ́sɔ bɔ́nu-nwu.' ”
Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔkya ɔni mbo kabla ɔblane ɔni mɔɔnu-nwu ala lɛlɔ. Amu na bábasu ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ka nwuna ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni uubile-nwu egulabi.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɔ nwuna ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Bi ndi lɛla lɛni udu na línu lɛ́siku-ɔ lɛlɔ mɛni? Bu akunta na kalɛ na éti aanu mina ala lɛlɔ ƒui boku-mi, ɔsika asɔ alakana mina ala lɛlɔ bɔsɔ bɔnu lɛnɔ.'
“Mmɔ na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Mina Unwoti ɔdubo-mi bɔgya na mina kabla kemo. Bi na ndubo bɔbla? Liiibo ɔyikun na makana kalɔ bubeyi. Na ala buvele lɛnɔ buukpó-mi kɔƒa.
Ɛhɛɛn! Lɛ́ɛti lɛla lɛni mabla! Na si mina kabla kálɛ-mi enu kemo muedi ni, na mina bakpana baƒɔ-mi na banu-mi lɛlɔ na bana kɔduli.'
“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔ́lɔ bekyuli bani nda nwuna Unwoti kayu unwi unwi. Úye udeedi ɔnini, 'Ɛlɛ kayu na ada mina Unwoti?'
“Ɔyune ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Inɔ kutubwi bonwu eti anyɔ.' “Amu na ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Aanu ƒula kayu ɔku mɛni. Sɔ lie kalɔ na enweni liti kani ese.'

“Lɛni kani na úye ɔyune ɔbambadi ɔnii, 'Awɔ nɔɔ? Ɛlɛ kayu na ada?' “Ɔyune ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Ɔbla aani antabi aƒɔ apimu unwi.' “Mmɔ na ala lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Aanu ƒula kayu ɔku mɛni. Nweni eti leevu-maane se.'

“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Unwoti ɔmmɔ úmwi kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ na lɛkwɛ lɛni na ɔ́bla mmɔ ɔsu. Sɔsɔ ni, bekyuli bani nli nte kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ ala ni, baasia anu taabla bana lɛlɔ ala teetulo ama bani mɔɔsia Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ anu.”
Mmɔ na Yesu úse anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biti bina kayawi lɛlakɛ bibunku bekyuli. Na si lɛkɛ lɛmmɔ lɛ́sa ni, na Katɔti waƒɔ-mii wakya nwuna ɔma kemo.
“Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔda ala ani nse blii suɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔda ala enengudi lɛnɔ na ulu lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni naaasia ulu lɛlɔ ku ala ani nse blii suɛ ni, ulasia ulu lɛlɔ ku ala enengudi lɛnɔ.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu si bítada kayawi kamɛni kemo lɛlakɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na wabla asa na ukyuli waƒɔ-mii wadi ka bɛdubɔda kɔyu kemo lɛlakɛ lɛni ndi Katɔti etela na ulu lɛlɔ?
Na si átanu ukyuli bamba ala ani nse-ɔ kudɔ lɛlɔ na ulu lɛlɔ ni, dɛ wabla asa na banyonu awɔ ɔlati adi bete-ɔ?

“Kabla ɔblane ɔdi ulakana benwoti inyɔ kabla bɔbla. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ɔdubɔyɔ unwi na ukisi ɔkladi. Lɛnɔ ni, ɔdubunu unwi litemi na weni ɔkladi lɛdi. Bilakana Katɔti bɔsiaku na bɛsɔ bɛsiaku lɛlakɛ lɛnɔ.”
Uwi ɔni na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénu ala ani na Yesu ɔ́su ni, báma-nwu ɔsika baayɔ́ egulabi geen.

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii ndi bekyuli bani mɔɔtina lɛlɔ aani bekyuli babuni na bakladi anumi. Nsu Katɔti ɔgyi bina ƒui kayi kemo. Ɔsika ala ani náƒɔ kuye na bekyuli anumi ni, aaadi lɛla lɛdi na Katɔti anumi.

“Mose ɔda bubo ɔku ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala ani na bénweni bése ni, ábla kabla ábawɔ Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane lebo. Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, biinú ka baasu litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ ka ɔkɛ nwuna ulu uduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kemo.
Nsu ni, use kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ ka katɔ ku kayawi kakana na kavi utulo ɔni na bada ɔda bubo bɔmɛni litemi blii suɛ lɛdi muedi bedie.
“Ɔnana biala ɔni manyonu uleku na weti ɔbambadi ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ. Na ɔnana ɔni meti uleku ɔni na bányonu ni, ɔ́di kɔsɔnɔ.
“Dii ni, ɔnana ɔlakɛne ɔdi ɔkya ɔni mɔɔda adala ani náƒɔ kuye, na ebiti kemo sɔɔn na ɔ́kya nwuna ngba emeyi kemo ƒui.
Na ɔwabane ɔdi na baalɔ banii Lasaro lɛnɔ ɔ́kya. Alɛbi áƒɔ ɔwabane ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ƒui ɔni na béteeti-nwu taabava ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔtɔ kayakun.
Ubo lɛnunsia ka si ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔɔdi ni, kɔkɛ wɛlɛ wɛlɛ kɔni muuwi kalɔ kɔdubudu-nwu na ɔ́la ɔdi. Bakpɛwe muedi beebo taabayalɛ-nwu alɛbi ammɔ.
“Ɔwabane ɔmmɔ úbekpi na Katɔti batu bébetiku-nwu bétésie Abraham kudɔ, na baadi limeyi na katɔ. Ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ úbekpi na báva-nwu.
Na kekpine mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu ka ɔkya abi kebokɔ. Mmɔ ka ɔ́talaku anumi katɔ ni, ɔ́nu Abraham na katɔ kakaaka ka Lasaro ulie-nwu kudɔ.
Amu na ɔ́kpali ɔnii, 'Ati Abraham! Nu-mi kɔnyana na aya na Lasaro uti lɛnimi ɔkya ntu bɔdi kemo na udu ubo-mi unyemi lɛlɔ na lɛlɔ lɛbla-mi buɛɛ. Ɔsika lɛlɔ lɛɛkywí-mi na ogya ɔmɛni kemo!'
“Nsu Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ubi, nyimo ka na ƒula ngba bɔni na élie kemo ni, ala abuni sɔɔn na áƒɔ. Na Lasaro anwu ni, ala ekpidi sɔɔn na ɔ́ƒɔ. Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ɔɔkɛ́ ebiti na awɔ eebó abi.
Na ɔni mbunku ɔmmɔ ni, ubu bonwu ɔdi ɔkya abu ku-ɔ ntɛ. Na si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔwia ka ɔvia ubo mmɔ ni, ulakana. Na lɛni kani na ɔdi lɛnɔ ulakana bɔvia bɔsi mmɔ bubo bula kudɔ mɛni.'
“Mmɔ ni, ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati Abraham, muuvele nda-a nnii tala Lasaro na usie mina ɔti kesii.
Mmɔ ni, mbo banwani bananabi ɛlɔ. Ya na utébo-ma ɔda kaduɛ kalɛ na ama belebo likpo lɛni na lɛbibo lɛkya mɛni.'
“Amu na Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ƒula banwani bebo ala ani na Mose ku Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni bése. Na ɔdi ka benu na badi-nya lɛlɔ.'
“Mmɔ na ɔlakɛne ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Ati Abraham, belénu-ma litemi! Nsu si banii ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́si kekpine mɛni úsie-ma kudɔ ni, badubunu-nwu litemi na benwini kama bakya bana ekpidi.'
“Nsu Abraham ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Si bétenu Mose ku Katɔti kenye bediene litemi ni, si ina ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́ta ɔ́si kekpine mɛni úsie-ma kudɔ muedi ni, baláƒɔ-nwu litemi!' ”
Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Ala ani mɔɔyá na ukyuli ɔɔbla likpidi ni, adubo bɔkya. Nsu bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ala amɛni adubɔsia asa na eduo bekyuli akɔ!
Si béti kukɔ bonwu kɔdi báƒala-nwu ɔkwɛ na bányina-nwu bákya ɛpu kemo muedi ni, ɔdia-nwu utulo kɔtu kɔni na Katɔti ɔdubɔni anwu ɔni maya na likpidi lɛsia-nwu lɛlɔ liduo mina banamu akɔ.
Anwuɔsu bɛsia ala ani na bɛɛbla anu. “Na si ƒula ɔkpana ɔ́bla-a likpidi lɛdi ni, dɔnku-nwu. Na si úkpi kɔtɔ ni, na eti akyiɛ-nwu.
Si ɔ́bla lɛla lɛdi ɔ́ƒiɔ-ɔ maatɛ na limeyi linwi kemo na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ubekpi-ɔ kɔtɔ maatɛ ɔmmɔ ni, ti kyiɛ-nwu.”
Yesu batalane bévele Yesu banii, “Blɔti, ya na bula bɔƒɔtaadi bumomo bubu.”

Amu na Blɔti ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bibo bɔƒɔtaadi na búdu aani lɛla lɛdi kebi kani nse blii suɛ ntulo ƒui ni, nka bɛdubɔkana na bɛsu kugyii kɔmɛni bɛnii, 'Gyu likpo lɛmɛni na etéduo ɛpu kemo ngye.' Na kɔdubɔbla lɛni kani.
“Bɛbu ɔmɛni bɛnu. Si bina ɔdi ubo kabla ɔblane ɔni mɔɔtuma kemo teete-nwu iye ɔɔnu-ɔ baƒonu lɛlɔ na ɔ́si kemo úbeduo ni, bɔsu na adubɔsu-nwu anii ɔbabla na utélie kalɔ utaadi nwuna adila?
Oowo! Mmomu adubɔsu-nwu anii, 'Klibi lɛlɔ na asabla kɔdi, na anwa, na eti mina adila ese-mi na lɛdi lɛwɔlɔ asa na awɔ lɛnɔ adi.'
Útalɛka agya-nwu enu ka ɔ́bla nwuna kabla ɔblane kabla ɔsu.
Lɛni kani na use ute amii lɛnɔ. Si bɛ́bla ala ani ƒui na lɛ́su-mii nnii bɛbla ni, bɛsu bɛnii, 'Kabla bablane kani na bɔdi. Na bɔ́bla lɛla lɛni kani na ɔdi ka bɔbla.' ”
Amu ka Yesu ɔkɛ úsela Yerusalem ni, ɔ́vi Samaria ku Galilea ɔmii lɛlɔ.
Na ka ɔdaku lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi buduo ni, banana leevu badi na beeƒi ɔlɛgyie bábasiaku-nwu. Balɛne bamɛni bénye ɔgyu.
Na báva ku lɛdi momoomo banii, “Ati Yesu, nu-bu kɔnyana!”
Yesu ɔ́nu-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie na biti bina lɛlɔ bitátina Katɔti bakpane na banu-mii kaduɛ.” Ka bakɛ bésela ni, bánu báti ka bana ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-ma.
Nsu ka bana unwi ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka nwuna ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-nwu ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini na uumwi Katɔti ku lɛdi momoomo.
Na úbo úbalɛ akɔnkɔ na Yesu anumi na ɔ́gya-nwu enu. Na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔdi Samariani.
Mmɔ na Yesu úye ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi banana leevu na lɛ́bwi yoo? Wɛ na yaalenwi bakladi básia?
Dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na ukyuli ɔni naaadi Yudani ɔmɛni kani násɔ únwini úbo ɔnii ubagya Katɔti enu?”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye, na eteesie. Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi náya na ƒula ɔlɛ ɔ́ba-a.”
Amu na Ƒarisiƒuɔ badi béye Yesu banii baawia bati uwi ɔni geen na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadububo. Mmɔ na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kelebo na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bekyuli bakana-ka bɔnu.
Ɔdi ulasu ɔnii, 'Bɛnu! Aanu-ka mɛni!' iye 'Aanu-ka ngye'. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kakya bina akɔ.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bɛdubɔwia bɛnii bɛɛnu limeyi lɛni na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, mebo. Nsu bilanu!
Bekyuli badi badubo-mii akɔ bɔkya bani ndubɔsu-mii banii, 'Bɛnu-nwu ngye!' iye 'Bɛnu-nwu mɛni!' Nsu bitesie bitatáwia-mi mmɔ!
Ɔsika kalɛ na kayaa kaabwɛ ogya taasi ɔƒɛnyi unwi teesie ɔkladi ni, lɛni geen na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdubo buse.
Nsu ni, ɔlɛka lɛka abi bubo geen na ɔmwi limeyi bekyuli beni-mi.
“Ala ani nálɛ na Noa uwi ni, anya kani na ndubo bɔlɛ na uwi ɔni na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, masɔ mebo.
Bekyuli baadi na baaní. Na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ úti útédu limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na Noa úduo ɔkɔlɔ ubendi ɔmmɔ kemo. Na ɔnantu ɔ́na na ntukpa búyi bɔ́ƒɔ kalɔ ƒui na ɔ́du bekyuli ƒui.
“Lɛni na ɔdubo buse aani kalɛ na úse na Lot uwi lɛnɔ. Bekyuli baadi na baaní, na baadi kuye lɛnɔ. Badi benye baakya edula, na badi benye baatú lɛtɔ.
Na limeyi lɛni na Lot ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ Sodom ni, ogya ku agyabi ani muunwenyi ku ɔnyi gbagbangba ási katɔ ébewi ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na ɔ́kyula-ma ƒui.
“Lɛni kani na ɔdubo buse na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubɔda lɛlɛ.
Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ukyuli ɔni nnye nwuna ɔtɔ lɛsa ni, ɔsɔ utayu ɔnii utéduo ɔtɔ kemo uti nwuna ala adi. Lɛni kani si kemo na ɔdi ɔkya ni, ɔsɔ utasu ɔnii uunwíni usie kaduli.
Binyimo lɛla lɛni nálɛku Lot ulekudi!
Ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ka ɔƒɔ nwuna lili ngba ute lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔyila-mu. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nányonu nwuna ngba ni, ɔdubɔsɔ ɔkɛ-mu.
Na usien ɔmmɔ ni, nkyuli inyɔ badubɔtɛ lɛtala linwi lɛlɔ, na Katɔti ɔdubuti unwi na ɔda ɔkladi ɔva.
Beleku inyɔ badubunye bataakɔ ɔlaaƒɔ na kukɔ lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti ɔdubuti unwi na ɔda ɔkladi unyene.
Banana inyɔ badubunye bataatuma na ɔkpanku unwi ɔtɔlɔku na ɔnyonu ɔkladi unyene.”
Mmɔ na batɛyane bammɔ béye Yesu banini, “Blɔti, na wɛ?” Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Kesii kani na lɛla líkpi lɛ́tɛ ni, mmɔ na begbini baasa.”
Yesu úbo nwuna batɛyane lɛgba lɛdi ɔ́tina-ma ɔnii ɔlɛka bataakpali katɔ uwi biala na ɔɔɔdi ka enu aƒɛ-ma.
Ɔ́su ɔnini, “Litemi ɔtɛne ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔma ɔdi kemo ɔni na uláyia Katɔti na uláƒalɛ ukyuli lɛnɔ.
Na ɔma ɔmmɔ kani kemo ni, ukpinele ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni muusié teebo-nwu kudɔ teebevele-nwu ɔnii, 'Bunku-mi na mina ukisine ɔsu.'
“Ɔbla uwi pii ni, litemi ɔtɛne ɔmmɔ úni na útabla lɛla lɛdi na litemi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ɔ́su nwuna lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Ina ka naaayia Katɔti na naaaƒalɛ ukyuli ni,
na lɛƒɛda lɛni na ukpinele ɔmɛni uute-mi ɔsu ni, ndubɔnu ka líkpo nwuna ukisine líte-nwu. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ulada bubo uláya na ulete-mi bɔnwuna.' ”
Mmɔ na Blɔti úsie anumi na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binu lɛla lɛni na litemi ɔtɛne ukpidi ɔmmɔ ɔ́su.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, bɔtɛ na Katɔti ulatɛ litemi uledie nwuna bekyuli bani muuwulo taakpali-nwu usien ku ɔƒɛ banii ubunku-ma? Munuu bɛɛkali bɛnii ɔdubɔkpɛ kama ku bana bɔƒɔ?
Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii Katɔti ɔdubɔtɛ litemi na ute-ma ubo kɔnakunwi. Nsu ni, si Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi úbo ni, ɔdubɔnu bekyuli bani mbo bɔƒɔtaadi?”
Yesu úbo lɛgba lɛmɛni úte bekyuli bani mɔɔkali banii ama bana udu kani ndia na basɔ balánu ukyuli bamba ɔdi aani bana kalɛ.
Na ɔ́su ɔnii, “Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, nkyuli inyɔ badi bésie Katɔti kakpakɔ banii batákpali katɔ. Unwi ɔdi Ƒarisini na ɔkladi ɔdi kuyi ɔƒɔne.

Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ ɔ́tu anwu lɛti na útákpali katɔ ɔnini, 'Katɔti mɔɔgyá-a enu, ɔsika liiibo egulabi lɛnungyie, na liiibo likyulikpi, na naaadi kɔsɔnɔ aani bekyuli bakladi kalɛ. Na mɔɔgyá-a enu lɛnɔ, ɔsika liiise aani kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔni ngye lɛnɔ kalɛ.
Muulie kɔka emeyi anyɔ na Kwasida unwi kemo. Na muuti mina lɛkɛ lɛkpa leevudi teeboku-ɔ.'
“Nsu kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ anwu únye ɔgyu ɔgyu na uláwia ɔnii ɔɔkɔliku nwuna lili muedi katɔ. Nsu úti nwuna enu úwi kayi na ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Katɔti, nu ami alaekpidi ɔblane kɔnyana!' ”

Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ka básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli ni, kuyi ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ ɔ́bla sɛɛn na Katɔti anumi na ɔɔɔdi Ƒarisini ɔmmɔ. Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni na ɔ́bla nwuna lɛlɔ ukyuli ubendi ni, Katɔti ɔdububoku-nwu kalɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni na weboku lɛlɔ kalɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔkɔliku-nwu katɔ.”
Bekyuli badi béti bana bebi béboku Yesu banii uti nwuna enu ɔsia-ma eli. Ka Yesu batalane bánu ɔmɛni ni, bádɔnku bekyuli bammɔ na ɔmmɔ ɔsu.
Nsu Yesu ɔ́lɔ banamu bammɔ úboku na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛya na banamu bebo-mi kudɔ na bitetile-ma kuƒi. Ɔsika Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kese kete bekyuli bani néboku lɛlɔ kalɔ aani banamu bamɛni udu kalɛ.
Na binyimo ɔmɛni bɛnii ukyuli biala ɔni naaadubo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ bɔƒɔ aani ɔnamu blii kalɛ ni, uleduo-ka kemo kudi kudii.”
Yudani ɔtɔnkune ɔdi úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ala ɔtinane buni, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na lɛkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii?”
Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na aalɔ-mi aani ɔbuni? Ukyuli biala ɔdi ɔɔɔdia ntu Katɔti lɛti pɛ.
Ngyi ka agyi ɔda bubo bɔni mɔɔsu bɔnii, 'Tadi kɔsɔnɔ, tadu ukyuli, teyu, tada ƒula ukyulikpana kenye, na abu ƒula ɔti ku ƒula uni.' ”
Amu na ukyuli ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔ́si mina lɛnamu uwi ƒui ni, mɔɔdi ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ kaduɛ.”

Ka Yesu únu-nwu litemi lɛmmɔ ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Lɛla linwi lɛ́sɔ líbu-ɔ na abla. Ti ala ani nse-ɔ ƒui ye, na eti egulabi ammɔ ete bawabane. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya-a na akɛ akɛla ese ete lɛlɔ na katɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama na ebo abasiaku-mi.”
Nsu uwi ɔni na ɔnana ɔmmɔ únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, lɛlɔ lɛ́yuɛ-nwu ɔsika ubo lɛlakɛ geen.
Yesu ɔ́nu kalɛ na lɛlɔ lɛ́yuɛ-nwu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ubo ɔlakɛne ɔkplu asa na weduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ!
Na kalɛ na ɔlakɛne uduo Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ni, ubo ɔkplu utulo kalɛ na ebuo ɔni nébomo utulo ƒui ɔvili udila liƒi.”
Mmɔ na bekyuli bani nénu lɛla lɛmɛni béye Yesu banii, “Na ɔma geen ndubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na ukyuli ulakana bɔbla kudii ni, lise Katɔti anwu kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ ka ɔbla-ni.”
Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Nu, abu bɔ́da bula kɔduli ala ƒui búwi na búbo bɔsiaku-ɔ.”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Na mɔɔyá-mii bɛti bɛnii ukyuli biala ɔni náda nwuna kaduli úwi iye ɔ́da ulekudi iye banwani bananabi iye nwuna bawɔne iye bebi úwi na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ɔsu ni,
ɔdubɔkɛ ala ammɔ udu ɔsia kama na ngba bɔmɛni kemo ku ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii na uwi ɔni mebo lɛnɔ kemo.”

Yesu útiku batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ úsienku kɔmadɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binu! Búsela Yerusalem, kesii kani na ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni básiku ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, lɛlɔ adububo ete lɛni.
Bekyuli badubuti-mi bakya bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ enu kemo na beti-mi babla lɛmala. Badubo-mi budumi na betuo lisuo bewi-mi lɛlɔ.
Badubo-mi bubo na badu-mi. Nsu na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ndubɔsɔ lɛta lɛsi bekpine akɔ.”
Na ala amɛni ƒui ni, batɛyane bammɔ bétenu-nya kalɔ. Etemila amɛni kalɔ bunu lɛnɔ ɔdi lɛla lɛni nábɛ-ma. Na bétenu lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-ma mmɔ kalɔ.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde Yeriko ni, ɔnumbwɛne ɔdi ulie ulu kɔtu mmɔ uuvele ala.
Ka únu bekyuli pii bani mɔɔví kɔku ni, úye ɔnii, “Bi na ɔdi mɔɔlɛ́?”
Amu na básu-nwu banii, “Yesu Nasareni nási ɔɔví.”
Mmɔ na ɔ́va momoomo ɔnii, “Yesu, Ɔga Dawid Uwɔ! Nu-mi kɔnyana!”
Amu na bekyuli bani ntɔ lɛtɔtɔ bádɔnku-nwu banii ɔba ku lɛsɛ. Nsu ɔƒɛni geen na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́talaku lɛdi katɔ úbu ɔnii, “Dawid Uwɔ, nu-mi kɔnyana!”
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Yesu údi únye na ɔ́su ɔnii bakpanku ɔnumbwɛne ɔmmɔ beboku-nwu kudɔ. Ka úbedu-nwu kudɔ ni, Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini,
“Bi na aawia-mi anii mbla nte-ɔ?” Ɔnumbwɛne ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati, mɔɔyɔ́ ka lɛsɔ ntaanu.”
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Amu sɔ taanu! Ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bɔ́bwi-ɔ.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kana na ɔɔnu na ɔ́siaku Yesu na ɔkɛ uumwi Katɔti. Na ka bekyuli pii bammɔ bánu ɔmɛni ni, bana ƒui bémwi Katɔti.
Yesu úsie útéduo Yeriko, na ɔ́sia ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo úsela.
Mmɔ na kuyi baƒɔne unengu ɔdi baalɔ banii Sakeo ɔ́kya, na ubo egulabi geen.
Ɔ́kya útaawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na ɔnu ukyuli ɔni geen na Yesu ɔdi. Nsu ka anwu ɔlati ɔdi ukyuli klukui ɔsu ni, útakana na ɔkɛ ulu ɔdi ka bekyuli bemomo ɔsu.
Anwuɔsu úkeli ɔtɔ bekyuli bammɔ lɛtɔtɔ na útákɔ kugyii kɔni nákuku kalɛ na ɔnu Yesu, ɔsika ɔgyi ɔnii ɔdubo ubasia mmɔ.
Ka Yesu úbedu kugyii kɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, údi únye na ɔ́kɔliku anumi katɔ na ɔ́su Sakeo ɔnini, “Sakeo, babla na ayu ebo kalɔ, ɔsika ƒula kudɔ na ndubo buduo ɔmwi.”
Sakeo ɔ́babla ɔ́yu úbo kalɔ na úte Yesu eduo ku ebiti geen.
Bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bése kalɔ beetemi-nwu na Yesu lɛlɔ kalɔ kalɔ banii, “Ɔnana ɔmɛni úsela utéduo ukyuli ɔni ndi alaekpidi ɔblane ɔmɛni kudɔ.”

Amu na Sakeo ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su Blɔti ɔnini, “Ati! Buvele, nu! Ndubuti mina lɛkɛ kakɛ kenwi ƒui lite bawabane. Na bekyuli bani ƒui na líti lɛnungyie kemo lɛ́ƒɔ-ma ala litulo kalɛ na ɔdi ka lɛƒɔ ni, ndubɔƒɔ-ma kayu kammɔ akpa ene.”
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔmwi ni, ngba bɔƒɔ búbo búbedu kaduli kamɛni kemo. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔdi Abraham kaba kemo ubi.
Na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, líbo nnii mbedie bekyuli bani ƒui náyii ulu geen ɔmmɔ.”
Amu na bekyuli bammɔ bakɛ beenú ala ani na Yesu ɔkɛ ɔɔsu-ma. Na úsie anumi na úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi, ɔsika ɔ́ɔkpɛ úde Yerusalem na bákali banii Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kéede geen ɔƒɛni.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔbune ɔdi ɔkya ɔni náta úsie kalɔ ɔgyu kakaaka ɔdi kemo kalɛ na betése-nwu lɛga. Na ɔ́bla kasusu ka ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔdubɔsɔ unwini ubo ɔma.
Asa na watɔlɔ ni, ɔ́lɔ nwuna kabla bablane leevu ɔ́sala. Na úte ɔdi biala egulabi koƒo kunwi. Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Biti egulabi ammɔ bɛdi kuye na bɔnu kɔsia kɔni na ɔdi biala wakɛ.'
“Nsu ɔnana ɔmɛni ɔma bekyuli béteekisi-nwu, anwuɔsu bátala batu badi na básia-nwu kama banii batásu Ɔga Unengudi banii, 'Bulayɔ ka ɔnana ɔmɛni unwini-bu ɔga.'
“Nsu Ɔga Unengudi úse ɔnana ɔmmɔ lɛga na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo ɔma. Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́ya na bálɔ nwuna kabla bablane bábasala na nwuna anumi ɔnii uunú kɔsia kɔni na bákɛ.
“Kabla ɔblane udeedi úbo na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́kɛ egulabi aƒo leevu lɛ́sia unwi ɔni na éte-mi mmɔ lɛlɔ.'
“Mmɔ na Unwoti ɔmmɔ úte-nwu mbo ɔnii, 'Ábla-nwu kaduɛ! Kabla ɔblane ɔbuni na adi! Ka áda kabla blii suɛ kamɛni ulu lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, ndubuti-ɔ linyene lɛma linengudi leevu kenye.'
“Kabla ɔblane unyɔdi lɛnɔ úbo na úbasu-nwu ɔnini, 'Ati, lɛ́kɛ egulabi aƒo alɔ lɛ́sia unwi ɔni néte-mi lɛlɔ!'
“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Awɔ adubunye lɛma ɛlɔ kenye!'
“Kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi úbo na anwu ɔnini, 'Ati, aanu ƒula egulabi koƒo kunwi kɔni néte-mi. Líti-ku lɛ́bɛla na mina lɛdiku kemo.
Mɔɔyia-a ɔsika ƒula udu ubo ɔkplu. Na eeti lɛla lɛni naaadi awɔ lɛdi teenwini awɔ lɛdi. Na edula ani na átakya muedi aaƒɛ-nya.'

“Mmɔ na Unwoti ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Kabla ɔblane ukpidi na adi! Awɔ ɔlati ƒula kenye etemila na ndubuti lɛdu-ɔ kɔtɔ! Agyi ka udu ubo-mi ɔkplu. Na muuti lɛla lɛni naaadi ami lɛdi teenwini ami lɛdi. Na mɔɔƒɛ edula ani na ńtakya.
Na si agyi lɛni ni, bi ɔsu na éteti mina egulabi átatákya egulabi kesekɔ? Mmɔ ni, ngyi ka nka ndubɔkɛ kɔsia lɛsia-nwu lɛlɔ si lɛ́si líbo.'
“Amu na ɔ́su bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ ɔnii, 'Bɛda egulabi ammɔ bɛƒɔ-nwu kudɔ bite kabla ɔblane ɔni mbo egulabi aƒo leevu.'
“Nsu bekyuli bammɔ básu-nwu banini, 'Ati, kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ anwu ubo egulabi aƒo leevu use!'

“Amu na Unwoti ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, 'Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ni, ukyuli ɔni mbo lɛla lɛdi ni, anwu na Katɔti ɔdubute ɔsia. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo lɛla lɛdi ni, libliidi lɛni na úbo muedi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ-ni na nwuna kudɔ.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, mina bekisine bani na banii nka baláwia ka bese-mi lɛga ni, bɛkpanku-ma biboku mɛni na bɛdu-ma na mina anumi.' ”
Ka Yesu ɔ́su-ma ala amɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔ-ma Yerusalem.
Uwi ɔni na ɔ́kpɛ uudé Betƒage ku Betania na Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi kudɔ ni, ɔ́tala nwuna batɛyane inyɔ ɔnii bataatɔ.

Mmɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie ɔma ɔni nkya-mii lɛtɔtɔ mmɔ kemo. Na si biiduo-nwu kemo ni, bɛdubɔnu ebuo ala utine ubi ɔdi ka bébo-nwu báda mmɔ. Na ukyuli ɔdi útelie-nwu lɛlɔ kudii. Bɛƒɛnimi-nwu na biti-nwu biboku mɛni.
Si ukyuli ɔdi úye-mii lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bɛɛƒɛnimi-nwu ni, bɛsu-nwu bɛnii, 'Blɔti mɔɔwia-nwu.' ”
Batɛyane bammɔ báyu ulu bésie na bátánu lɛla biala aani kalɛ kani na Yesu ɔ́su-ma.
Na uwi ɔni na benye baaƒɛnimi ebuo ɔmmɔ ni, ebuo ɔmmɔ balati béye-ma banii, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛƒɛnimi-nwu?”
Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bédie kenye banii, “Blɔti mɔɔwia-nwu.”
Na béti ebuo ɔmmɔ béboku Yesu. Mmɔ na béti bana adi béwi ebuo ɔmmɔ kama na bébunku Yesu na ɔ́kɔ úlie-nwu kama.
Ka ulie-nwu lɛlɔ na bésela ni, bekyuli badi béti bana adi béwi kalɔ na ulu lɛlɔ.

Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kpɛ úde Yerusalem na likpo lɛni na ulu ɔmmɔ úti ɔ́yu Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane pii bammɔ bése kalɔ baagyá Katɔti enu na beete yiidu ku kɔvanu momoomo na ala ebendi ani na bánu ɔsu.
Na básu banii, “Bimwi Ɔga ɔni nási ɔdubo na Blɔti lɛnyi kemo! Na keyi buɛɛ kaƒɔ Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ƒui! Hosiana!”
Mmɔ na Ƒarisiƒuɔ bani nkya otogyi ɔmmɔ kemo básu Yesu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, bɔku ƒula batɛyane na baba ku lɛsɛ!”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii si bába lɛsɛ ni, atabi amɛni alati adubuse kalɔ ataava.”
Ɔni na Yesu ɔ́ni úde Yerusalem úbu na ɔ́nu ɔma ɔmmɔ ni, úwulo na nwuna lili.
Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́ geen ka nka bɛnu bɛti ɔmwi limeyi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛla lɛni námanku-mii asa bɛkɛ keyi buɛɛ! Nsu ku ɔƒɛni ni, bilánu taati!
Uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bina bekisine badubɔka-mii bakya ekpo ekpo ƒui. Na badubutile eƒi ƒui na lɛla biala lɛsɔ lilakana buduo iye lɛlɛ keyi.
Bekyuli badubo ɔma ɔmɛni bɔyila ku udu na badu bekyuli bani nkya-nwu kemo ƒui. Na lɛtabi lɛdi muedi lɛsɔ lilése nina keliekɔ. Ɔsika bíni na bítanu bítati uwi ɔni na Katɔti úbo ɔnii ubedie-mii!”
Yesu úsie útéduo Katɔti kakpakɔ na úse kalɔ ɔɔgyá beyedine bani nkya mmɔ taalɛku.

Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Benweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Mina kaduli ni, bekyuli badubɔlɔ-ka banii kaduli kani bekyuli baakpali katɔ.' Na amii bíti mmɔ bínwini beyune kabɛkɔ!”
Limeyi ndi limeyi ni, Yesu ɔ́tina ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku bekyuli batɔnkune báwia ka badu-nwu.
Nsu bátakɛ ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia, ɔsika bekyuli pii bakya mmɔ na bana atu asia nwuna etemila ammɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa.
Limeyi lɛdi ka Yesu ɔkya ɔɔtina bekyuli ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ na ɔɔsu-ma litemi buni ala ni, bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane ku ɔma benengu bébo mmɔ.
Amu na bábasu-nwu banini, “Su-bu kenyekɔ kani na ebo asa na aabla ala amɛni udu? Na ɔma néte-ɔ kenyekɔ kammɔ?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛya na liye-mii lɛla lɛdi linu na bɛsu-mi.
Kenyekɔ kani na Yohane ɔ́kɛ asa na ɔ́bla ntu bɔkpila ɔdi úte bekyuli ni, Katɔti kudɔ na kási munuu ukyuli kudɔ na kási?”
Mmɔ na bese kalɔ ku unyeƒi bɔkya ama alati bana akɔ banii, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔsu? Si bɔ́su bɔnii Katɔti kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku ni, ɔdubuye-bu ɔnii, 'Bi ɔsu na bítaƒɔ Yohane bítadi?'
Na si bɔ́su bɔnii ukyuli kudɔ na ɔ́kɛ-ka ɔ́siku ni, kasalakɔ bekyuli bamɛni ƒui badubo-bu atabi bubo, ɔsika bana ƒui báƒɔ bádi ka Katɔti kenye udiene na Yohane ɔdi.”
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu bédie kenye banii, “Bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na ɔ́kɛ kenyekɔ kammɔ ɔ́siku.”
Mmɔ na Yesu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdubo-mii bɔsu kenyekɔ kani mbo asa na mɔɔbla ala amɛni udu.”

Amu na Yesu úbo bekyuli bammɔ lɛgba lɛmɛni ɔnini, “Dii ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́bla adingyii kemo kadi. Ka úsela ulu ɔdi utákya na uwi utu ɔsu ni, úti-ka ɔ́kya bekyuli badi enu ɔnii bataanu-ka lɛlɔ teete-nwu.

Ka uwi údu ka bese kalɔ ku ebi ammɔ bude ni, ɔ́tala nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔdi ɔnii usie na utáƒɔ nwuna kadikɔ na kemo kammɔ lɛlɔ banune kudɔ uboku. Nsu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ na bábɔku-nwu, na bétete-nwu lɛla lɛdi.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ɔ́tala kabla ɔblane ɔbambadi. Nsu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo anwu lɛnɔ na béwi-nwu anumi kalɔ, na béti-nwu bémene, na bétete-nwu lɛla lɛdi.
Ɔ́tala kabla ɔblane ɔtɛdi. Na kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bébo-nwu na bákya-nwu ɔlɛ lɛlɔ na bábɔku-nwu bálɛku mmɔ.
“Mmɔ na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ úye lɛlɔ ɔnii, 'Bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla? Ndubɔtala mina ubidi ɔyɔne na lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka badubɔƒalɛ-nwu.'
“Nsu ka kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bánu ubi ɔmmɔ ni, básu lɛlɔ banii, 'Aanu kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ubi geen mɛni. Bɛya na bɔdu-nwu na nwuna ala amɛni ƒui enwini abu adi!'
Anwuɔsu báni-nwu bálɛku ɔba ɔmmɔ kemo na bádu-nwu.” Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na kemo ɔlati ɔmmɔ ɔdubo kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ bɔbla?
Mɔɔyá na bɛti ka ɔdububo ubadu kemo lɛlɔ banune bammɔ ƒui na uti kemo kammɔ ɔkya lɛlɔ banune babambadi lɛkɔkɔ.” Ka bekyuli bammɔ bénu lɛni ni, básu banii, “Oowo! Utebo lɛni!”

Yesu ɔtɛ anu ɔ́nu-ma na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na Bunweni Kedee bɔmɛni kalɔ bɔɔtina bɔni mɔɔsu bɔnii, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na batune béni báva banii lɛɛɛdia ni, ani mmomu nébenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye litulo na atabi ƒui akɔ'?
Ukyuli biala ɔni mebuli mebo lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubo-nwu bukulo eku eku. Na si lɛtabi lɛmmɔ lɛnɔ lɛlɛ libo ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, lɛdubo-nwu bɔbwɛ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ.”
Ɔda bubo ala batinane ku Katɔti bakpane benengu bákya ɔkplu banii beeƒie Yesu na mmɔ, ɔsika bánu báti ka bana lɛlɔ geen ɔsu na úbo lɛgba lɛmmɔ. Nsu baayia bekyuli bammɔ.

Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, báwia ulu ɔbambadi ɔni lɛlɔ basia na beƒie-nwu. Béte bekyuli badi ala na bɔbɛ kemo. Na bása ku-ma lili banii besie Yesu kudɔ. Na babla lɛlɔ aani si litemi lɛmmɔ geen na ama alati baawia bati bete lɛlɔ. Na bátala-ma banii batákywɛ Yesu kakpagyuɛ ku etemila adi. Na bakɛ ulu ɔni na beti-nwu bakya Roma aban unengu enu kemo.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu kenye bewine bamɛni bésie Yesu kudɔ. Na béye-nwu banini, “Ɔtinane, bɔgyi ka ala ani na aasu ku ani na aatina ƒui adi etemila geen. Na bɔgyi lɛnɔ ka alánu ukyuli anumi taabla ala. Mmomu aatina litemi geen lɛni na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ ka bekyuli babla.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu bɔɔwia ka bɔti si ɔdia ka buteeyi kuyi teete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi iye ɔɔɔdia?”
Nsu Yesu ɔ́ɔnu bana lɛkwɛ likpidi ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
“Biti sika ɔƒualadi ubi ɔmmɔ bɛtina-mi. Ɔma bɔtaa ku lɛnyi nsia mɛni?”

Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare ɔdi na ɔdi.” Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ lɛla biala lɛni ndi Ɔga Unengudi ɔdi bite Ɔga Unengudi. Na bɛƒɔ lɛla biala lɛni ndi Katɔti lɛdi bite Katɔti.”
Na bekyuli anumi mmɔ ni, bátakana na beƒie-nwu na lɛla lɛdi lɛlɔ. Bana kenye kékpi-ma na bábla yaa na kenye kani na Yesu údie ɔsu.
Amu na Sadukiƒuɔ bani mɔɔsu banii ukpine ɔsɔ ɔɔɔdubo bɔta ni, bébo Yesu kudɔ na bábasu-nwu banini,

“Ala ɔtinane, Mose únweni ɔda bubo bɔmɛni úte-bu ɔnini, 'Si ɔnana ɔdi úkpi na ɔ́da ulekudi úse na beeebo bebi ni, na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔnwani uti uleku ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ku ukpinele ɔmmɔ bawɔ. Na bebi bammɔ ni, bekyuli badubɔnu-ma aani ɔnana ɔni nsɔ neeebo mmɔ bebi.'
Na uwi ɔdi ni, banwani banana maatɛ bákya. Ɔnanabi unengudi úbeti uleku na úbekpi na anwu ku ulekudi bátawɔ.
Ɔnwani unyɔdi lɛnɔ úbeti ukpinele ɔmmɔ.
Ɔtɛdi lɛnɔ lɛni kani. Na lɛla lɛmmɔ kani nálɛku banwani maatɛ bamɛni ƒui. Bana ƒui békpi ɔni na ɔdi útawɔ.
Kawɔlɔkɔ ƒui ni, uleku ɔmmɔ ɔlati úbekpi.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na bekpine badubɔsɔ bata ni, ɔmani uleku na uleku ɔmmɔ wadi wenwini ka bana ƒui béti-nwu dii?”
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Ngba bɔmɛni kemo kani na banana ku beleku beeti lɛlɔ.
Nsu banana ku beleku ƒui bani námanku ka bata basi bekpine akɔ na ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii kemo ni, basɔ beleti lɛlɔ.
Badubuse aani kalɛ na Katɔti batu bese, na basɔ belekpi lɛnɔ. Badi Katɔti bebi ɔsika báta bálɛ kekpine.

Ɔmmɔ kalɔ geen na Mose údie na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka bekpine basɔ baata teelie ngba. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na unye kugyii kɔni mɔɔda anumi ni, ɔ́lɔ Katɔti aani Abraham Katɔti ku Isak Katɔti ku Yakobo lɛnɔ Katɔti.
Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka ama bani néekpi ni, bamua beli ngba. Anwuɔsu ɔdi ama lɛnɔ Katɔti.”
Mmɔ ni, ɔda bubo ala batinane bammɔ badi bédie kenye banini, “Ala ɔtinane, édie kenye kammɔ geen!”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔdi ɔ́sɔ útese kayi na uye lɛla bamba lɛdi lɛnɔ.
Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Dɛ na ɔ́bla asa na bekyuli básu banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔsi Dawid kaba kemo?
Na Dawid ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔ́su na kɔgya ɔku kemo ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su mina Ɔti ɔnii, “Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ
wetédu uwi ɔni na meti ƒula bekisine makya-a lɛgba kalɔ.” '
Na si Dawid ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnii Ɔti ni, dɛ na ɔ́bla na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔɔbla Dawid kaba kemo ubi?”
Uwi ɔni na bekyuli ƒui benye beenú ala ani na Yesu ɔɔsu ni, ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini,

“Binye kagyumana bite lɛlɔ kaduɛ na ɔda bubo ala batinane lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bamɛni baayɔ́ busie taavi na bakya bana lɛwu bonwu bonwu. Na baayɔ́ ka bekyuli beteeboku kalɔ teegyele-ma na kuyeya. Ama mɔɔyɔ́ kuliekɔ kunengudi bulie na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ ku kuliekɔ kɔbuni na emeyi kadikɔ.
Beesié bekpinele kudɔ ka betébunku-ma, nsu baatɔ́lɔ-ma taaƒɔ-ma ala. Na baakpali katɔ gyɔlɔɔ taabu bekyuli kɔdɔlɔ. Anwuɔsu bana kɔtu bɔni bɔdubɔkɔ katɔ butulo ƒui!”
Na kakpakɔ mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́talaku anumi na ɔ́nu kalɛ na balakɛne beeti bana etela taabakya kakpakɔ kavumi kemo.
Na ɔ́nu lɛnɔ kalɛ na ukpinele ɔwabane ɔdi úti kɔplɛ inyɔ bɔdi úbakya kavumi kammɔ kemo.
Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ukpinele ɔwabane ɔmɛni ni, úte lɛla útulo bakladi ƒui.
Ɔsika bakladi ama ni, lɛla lɛni kani na baayɔ́ na bana lɛkɛ kemo kani na béte. Nsu uleku ɔmmɔ ku nwuna kɔwaba ni, lɛla lɛni ƒui na nse-nwu na nka wadi ni, ani na úti úte mɛni.”

Uwi ɔmɛni ni, batɛyane badi bakya baatɛmi taasiku Katɔti kakpakɔ lɛlɔ. Na básu kalɛ na kakpakɔ kammɔ kaadia bɔnu ku kalɛ na atabi ammɔ aadia bɔnu ku etela ani na bekyuli béti báklibi Katɔti kakpakɔ kammɔ. Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
“Ala ani ƒui na bɛɛnu mɛni ni, uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na lɛtabi lɛdi lɛsɔ lɛɛɛdubo buse nina keliekɔ. Mmomu bekyuli badubo ɔdi biala bugyingya búwi kalɔ.”
Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Ala ɔtinane, uwi ɔmani na ɔdubɔlɛ lɛni? Na bi na bɔdubuti bɔnu bɔti bɔnii uwi ɔni na ala amɛni alɛ údu?”

Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana na ukyuli ɔdi utatɔlɔ-mii. Bekyuli pii bani mɔɔsu banii ami mina kenye na beedie ni, badubo na bábasu banii, 'Ami na ɔdi,' na 'Uwi ɔmmɔ úudu'. Nsu bitasiaku-ma kama.
Bitayia si biinú kekpo kɔku ku bekyuli lɛlɔ bɔta bunye. Ala amɛni udu adubɔka bɔlɛ, nsu ɔɔɔdi nwuna kalɔ ndi ɔnii kawɔlɔkɔ kéede.”
Yesu ɔ́sɔ úsie anumi na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Kɔlɔ kɔdubukpoku lɛlɔ, na lɛga kɔdikɔ kɔdubukpoku lɛlɔ.
Kalɔ bɔkunku kpakplaa bɔdubɔkya. Na kɔka bonwu lɛnɔ kɔdubo bɔkya. Na lɛlɛ lidu lidu lɛnɔ lɛdubɔƒɔ ekpo ekpo ƒui. Na liƒu ala adubo butaalɛ na kayaa.

“Na asa na ala amɛni adububo abalɛ ni, bekyuli badubo-mii buƒie na bekpoku-mii. Bekyuli badubuti-mii bete na batɛku litemi na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na bakya-mii ɔtɔ. Na badubo-mii buti buboku baga ku lɛlɔ badine anumi na batɛku-mii litemi na ami ɔsu.
Na uwi ɔmɛni kemo geen na ulu ɔ́lɛmi úte-mii ka bɛsu Katɔti litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
Bɛklibi lɛlɔ bise kalɛ na bilékpoku lɛlɔ na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛdubuti bidie bina lɛlɔ ɔsu.
Ɔsika ndubuti kenye ogya etemila ku lɛnunda lite-mii kalɛ na bina bekisine badi balakana bunye bɔsiaku-mii iye batɛmi bedie-mii kudii.
Bina bawɔne ku banwani bananabi ku bina lɛlɔ bekyuli ku bina bakpana ndubo-mii buti bute. Na badubɔdu bina badi.
Ukyuli biala ɔdubo-mii bukisi na ami ɔsu.
Nsu alɔlɔ muedi ulelie ɔdi lɛlɔ.
Binye kpakplaa, na bɛdubɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
“Si uwi ɔni na bɛ́nu ka bekpone báka bámana Yerusalem ni, bɛdubɔti ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bɔbwɛ uwi údu.

Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bani ƒui nkya Yudea ni, ɔdi ka bekeli besie abi lɛlɔ. Na bekyuli bani ƒui nkya ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔdi ka batɔlɔ. Na bekyuli bani ƒui nkya akpaklɔ ku lɛma lɛni na amadɔ ni, betesie ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo.
Ɔsika uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ndi kɔtu bɔni emeyi ani nálɛ ka ebo aani kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila átina kalɛ.
Ɔdubɔyu ɔkplu geen ute beleku bani nda kaƒɔ ku bebi beni bani muute bebi lɛnyi. Lɛbibo bonwu lɛdi lɛdubo kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti kɔtu bɔni bɔdubo bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ.
Badubo badi bɔdu ku kewii. Na badubo badi buƒie bɔtɔlɔku busienku kɔlɔ bamba lɛlɔ ƒui. Na bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ badubɔdi Yerusalem lɛlɔ úti útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tunaku-ma.

“Akɔla ala budie taatina adubo butaalɛ na ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi anumi. Na kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli ƒui badubɔyila lɛnunsia biala. Na bɔyia bonwu bɔdubɔkya bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo na kalɛ na ɛpu uudie lɛdi na uukpóku lɛlɔ ɔsu.
Bekyuli badubo butaayila na liƒu ɔsu uwi ɔni na béti benye bagya lɛla lɛni ndubɔlɛku kayawi kemodi kammɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ala ani nkya kayaa asɔ elenye ana kenyekɔ, na lɛla biala ɔbladu ɔvumana.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ndubɔda lɛlɛ kayaa na uyɔlɔ kemo na mina ɔyikun bonwu ku bukeye kemo.
Si uwi ɔni na ala amɛni ése kalɔ aalɛ́ ni, bɛklibi lɛlɔ na bitaasia anu, ɔsika bina bɔƒɔ uwi úude.”
Amu na Yesu úbo-ma lɛgba lɛdi ɔnini, “Bɛbu kɔdingyii ku egyii abambadi lɛlɔ bɛnu.
Si bɛ́nu ka evete awɔdi ése kalɔ aalɛ́ ni, bɛgyi bɛnii ketudi kéede.
Lɛni kani na si bɛ́nu ka ala amɛni aalɛ́ ni, bɛgyi bɛnii Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ bubo uwi úudu.
“Mɔɔsu-mii geen ka ala amɛni ƒui adubɔlɛ asa na bina akɔ badi na mɛni bɛdubɔsa bukpi.
Katɔ ku kalɔ kadubɔvi, nsu mina etemila anya aaadubo bɔvi kudii.
“Bɛnu kaduɛ na bileti bina uwi bilete bɔdi ku bɔni ebiti sɔɔn. Na ɔdi uléteekpoku nwuna lɛlɔ na kayawi kamɛni ala lɛlɔ. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdubo-mii buyu bɔtu.
Na ɔdubɔbla aani kalɛ na kakpagyuɛ keedie ebuo. Na ukyuli biala ulálɛ-nwu kemo.
Anwuɔsu binye kagyumana na bitaakpali katɔ uwi biala kalɛ na bɛkɛ ɔyikun na bɛlɛ sɛɛn na ala ani ƒui ndubɔlɛ mɛni kemo ku kalɛ na bɛkana ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, litemi bɔtɛ kenye bunye.”
Na emeyi ammɔ kemo ƒui ni, Yesu úti útaatina bekyuli bammɔ ala na Katɔti kakpakɔ. Na useyi uwi ni, ɔɔtɔlɔ teesie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ.
Na ɔdigyewi biala ni, bekyuli bammɔ baata teesie kakpakɔ teeténu-nwu ala bɔtina.
Uwi údu ka Yudaƒuɔ badi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu na limeyi lɛni baalɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi lɛlɔ.
Nsu ka Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane baayia bekyuli bammɔ ɔsu ni, bátaawia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na basia badu Yesu na bɔbɛ kemo.
Amu na Satan úduo Yuda ɔni baalɔ lɛnɔ banii Iskariot lɛlɔ kemo. Na ɔdi Yesu batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi.
Anwuɔsu Yuda úsie Katɔti bakpane benengu ku Katɔti kakpakɔ lɛlɔ banune benengu kudɔ. Na bátɛmi básiku ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔdubɔvi asa na beƒie Yesu lɛlɔ.
Ebiti áda-ma, na básu-nwu ka badubɔƒɔ-nwu kayu kadi.
Na Yuda lɛnɔ únu kalɔ lɛni. Anwuɔsu úse kalɔ ɔɔwia uwi ɔbuni ɔni lɛlɔ na weti Yesu wakya-ma enu.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, limeyi lɛni na badu baƒonu bebi bete Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi líbedu na bodobodo ɔni néteƒu emeyi bɔdi kemo.
Na Yesu ɔ́tala Petro ku Yohane ku kenye kamɛni ɔnini, “Bisie na bitáklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila bise kalɛ na bɔdi.”
Mmɔ na béye-nwu banini, “Wɛ na aayɔ́ ka bɔklibi-nya buse?”
Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Si biiduo Yerusalem ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔdubo-mii bɔsiaku ɔni nti ntu ku ketubwi. Bɛsiaku-nwu na bitéduo kaduli kani kemo na weduo.
Na bɛsu ɔtɔlati ɔmmɔ bɛnii, 'Ala ɔtinane ɔnii buye-ɔ bɔnii, “Ɔtɔ ɔmani kemo na ami ku mina batɛyane bɔdubo Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila bɔdi?” '
Ɔdubɔtina-mii katu taasia lɛgbanya lɛdi ka báklibi-nwu na bése kuliekɔ bése-nwu kemo. Bɛklibi adila ammɔ bise mmɔ.”
Amu na báyu ulu na bésie bátánu lɛla biala pɛpɛɛpɛ aani kalɛ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma. Na báklibi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila ammɔ bése mmɔ.
Ka uwi ɔmmɔ údu ni, Yesu ku nwuna batalane bésie bétélie kalɔ kalɛ na badi.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔdi-mi bɔyɔ ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui ka lɛdiku-mii Kukpi Lili Bɔvia adila amɛni asa na libo abi.
Na mɔɔsu-mii kede kede nnii nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo-nya bɔdi úti útédu uwi ɔni na lɛla lɛni na adila amɛni bɔdi bɔdanku lɛdubɔlɛ na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu úti ɔɔƒɛɛ na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu. Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ ɔmɛni na bɛni bite lɛlɔ.
Mɔɔsu-mii nnii ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo ntɛ bɔmɛni udu bɔni amu ntu uwi ɔni na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kammɔ kébo.”

Amu na úti bodobodo ɔdi na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu. Na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kɔkɛ kɔkɛ na úti úte-ma. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi mina ɔlɔna ɔni na ndubuti lɛkpa lite Katɔti na bina lili. Bɛbla ɔmɛni na biti bitaakali-mi.”
Lɛni kani na úti ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔni kemo na ntɛ buwi úte-ma na adila ammɔ kama na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti bunyimi bɔwɔdi bɔni na úse likpo ku mina ubugya ɔni ndubuwi kalɔ na amii ɔsu.
Nsu ni, bɛnu bɛti bɛnii ukyuli ɔni ndubuti-mi ute badu ni, ulie ɔɔdiku-mi na kadikɔ mɛni.
Na ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, ndubo bukpi aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse. Nsu ni, bɔbwɛ muute ukyuli ɔni makya-mi kakya.”
Mmɔ na bese kalɔ ku lɛlɔ buye teenu bana akɔ ɔni geen ndubo udu ɔmɛni bɔbla.
Unyeƒi ɔdi úbeduo batɛyane bammɔ akɔ ɔ́si bana akɔ ɔni baakali banii anwu ntulo ƒui lɛlɔ.

Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ni, bana baga bebo ɔyikun na bana bekyuli lɛlɔ. Na lɛlɔ badine bamɛni bebo lɛnyi lɛni na baayɔ́ ka bekyuli bammɔ bataalɔ-ma lɛni ndi Bekyuli Bakpana.
Nsu ɔɔɔdi lɛni na ɔlɛka use na bina akɔ. Mmomu ukyuli ɔni ntulo ƒui na bina akɔ ni, ɔlɛka ɔbla lɛlɔ ubliidi ƒui na bakladi akɔ. Na ɔdi ka ɔtɔnkune unwini kabla ɔblane.
Ɔma ndi ukyuli ɔni ntulo, ukyuli ɔni nlie kalɔ ɔɔdi, munuu ukyuli ɔni néti adila úse-nwu? Use nwaa ka ukyuli ɔni nlie kalɔ ɔɔdi ntulo. Nsu ami nkya-mii akɔ aani ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla-mii kabla.
Bíise kayi bɛ́siaku-mi na mina uwi kpakplaa ƒui kemo.
Na aani kalɛ na mina Ɔti úte-mi kenyekɔ ka lɛdi bekyuli lɛlɔ ni, lɛni kani na ndubo-mii kenyekɔ kammɔ udu bute.
Bɛdubɔdi na bɛni na mina adila kadikɔ na mina lɛga kadikɔ. Na bɛdubulie bagaboku lɛlɔ na bɛdi Israel kaba leevu-inyɔ kɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.”
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su Simon Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Simon! Se atu! Katɔti úte Satan kuƒi ka ɔkɔku-mii ɔnu na ule bani ndia ku bani naaadia ntɛ aani kalɛ umonsene ɔɔƒɛ́ kamu ebi taalɛku ligyɔ kemo.
Nsu ni, Simon, lɛ́ɛkpali katɔ na ƒula lili kalɛ na ƒula bɔƒɔtaadi bulayuɛ. Na uwi ɔni na adubunwini ebo-mi kudɔ ni, na akya ƒula banwani ɔkplu.”
Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Blɔti, nnye kagyumana ka ami ku awɔ ƒui bɔtɛ ɔtɔ, na bukpi muedi!”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Petro, mɔɔsu-ɔ nnii usien ɔmɛni asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi.”

Amu na Yesu úye nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Uwi ɔdi návi ka lɛ́tala-mii na bɛɛɛda kavumi iye koƒo iye lɛgbanvuo lɛdi ni, bɛ́yaki lɛla lɛdi?” Amu na bédie kenye banii, “Bútayaki ina lɛlakpa linwi muedi.”

Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Nsu ɔƒɛni ni, ukyuli ɔni mbo kavumi kadi iye koƒo kɔdi ni, uti ɔda. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo kewii kadi ni, ɔdi ka uti nwuna awu ɔni na ɔɔkya taasia ɔtɔdi lɛlɔ uye, na usie utéye kewii kadi.

Na mɔɔsu-mii nnii Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo litemi lɛni mɔɔsu lɛnii, 'Baka-nwu bákya bekyuli bekpidi akɔ' ni, ɔlɛka libo-nwu kemo lɛni na mina lɛlɔ. Ɔsika lɛla lɛni na bénweni básiku-mi lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛka ubo-nwu kemo lɛni sɔsɔ.”
Mmɔ na batɛyane bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Blɔti, nu! Aanu kuwii inyɔ mɛni!” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔmmɔ ɔ́bɔ.”
Yesu ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla. Na batɛyane bammɔ lɛnɔ básiaku-nwu.
Ka údu likpo lɛmmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su nwuna batɛyane ɔnini, “Bitaakpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kemo.”
Amu na ɔ́da-ma úse na ɔ́kpɛ ɔ́lɛ-ma kudɔ úsie sɛsɛɛ na útálɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ.
Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, si átuna ni, na aƒɔ lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmɛni na mina kudɔ. Nsu ni, tabla mina lɛyɔla, mmomu bla ƒula lɛdi.”
Mmɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́si katɔ ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ-nwu anumi na ɔ́kya-nwu ɔyikun.
Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali katɔ úbu kpakplaa ɔni na únu ɔlɛ geen. Na ewulu ani nátuku-nwu ese aani ubugya na eedú teewi kalɔ.
Ka Yesu ɔ́ta na kesii kani na ɔɔkpali katɔ mmɔ ni, únwini úsie batɛyane bammɔ kudɔ. Na útánu ka batɛ baalɛɛ na kɔnyana kɔni néƒie-ma ɔsu.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛtɛ bɛɛlɛɛ? Bɛta na bitaakpali katɔ kalɛ na bileduo bukpoku taanu kemo.”
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔmua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, bekyuli pii badi bábalɛ-nwu lɛlɔ. Na Yuda ɔni ndi batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ntɔnku-ma. Úsie úbo Yesu kudɔ na ɔ́kya-nwu kɔgbu.
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su Yuda ɔnini, “Yuda, kɔgbu na ébo aakya ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, na eti-mi akya bekyuli enu kemo?”
Uwi ɔni na batɛyane bani nkya mmɔ ku Yesu bánu lɛla lɛni ndubo bɔlɛ ni, béye Yesu banini, “Blɔti, buteebeyi-ma ku bula kuwii?”
Amu na batɛyane bammɔ akɔ unwi úbeyi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔdianu kɔtu úkulo.
Nsu Yesu ɔ́bala-ma ɔnini, “Ɔdi ɔsɔ utabla lɛla lɛdi na ɔmmɔ kama.” Amu na útuku kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ kɔtu na nwuna kɔtu kɔ́sɔ kúnwini kúbese kalɛ kani na kuse.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su bakpane benengu ku kakpakɔ lɛlɔ banune benengu ku kadi benengu bani nébo mmɔ banii bebeƒie-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na ɔlɛka biti ligyii ku lɛkɛɛ bibo aani si ɔkantankpine na ndi?
Lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ limeyi ndi limeyi na bitákya ɔkplu bɛnii biiƒie-mi. Nsu ni, Katɔti néte-mii kuƒi kɔmɛni. Na Satan ɔyikun ɔdi lɛlɔ ɔƒaani.”
Bakpane benengu ku lɛlɔ badine bammɔ béƒie Yesu, na béti-nwu bésienku ɔkpane unengudi kaduli. Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔsiaku-ma na kama kama.
Bekyuli badi básula ogya ɔdi na kaduli kammɔ kemo, na Petro lɛnɔ úsie unye ɔɔwaaku-ma.
Ka beleku kabla bablane bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́nu Petro ka ulie mmɔ ni, ɔ́kywɛ-nwu lɛnimi kɔnakunwi na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔsiaku Yesu.”
Nsu Petro úni ɔmɛni na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Uleku lɛɛɛgyi-nwu muedi!”
Na uwi klukui ɔdi kama ni, ɔnana ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́nu Petro ɔ́ti na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛnɔ bana akɔ unwi na adi?” Nsu Petro ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, ɔɔɔdi ami na ɔdi!”
Amu na ɔbla aani ɔdɔ unwi bubo kama ni, ɔnana ɔbambadi ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́sɔ úbo unye ɔɔsu kpakplaa ɔnii, “Unyeƒi ɔdi biala uuubo ɔmɛni kemo banii ɔnana ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku Yesu, ɔsika Galileani na ɔdi!”
Nsu Petro údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔnana, lɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni na aasu mɛni kula kula!” Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔni na ɔ́mua unye ɔɔtɛmi ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.
Mmɔ na Blɔti únwini na ɔ́nu Petro ɔnusɛ. Amu na Petro únyimo ka Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Asa na akɔkɔ wete kenye usien ɔmɛni ni, adubɔsu kɔtɛ ƒui ka aaagyi-mi.”
Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ na útéwulo momoomo.
Bekyuli bani mɔɔgyumana Yesu na mmɔ ni, bákya-nwu lɛlɔ lɛma na bébo-nwu.
Bényimi-nwu anumi na bébo-nwu, na béye-nwu banini, “Su-bu ukyuli ɔni nébo-ɔ.”
Na bédumi-nwu na lilu bamba pii lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
Uwi ɔni na kadi káda ni, kadi benengu ku Katɔti bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bábasa lisu. Na béti Yesu béboku bana anumi.
Amu na kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ béye Yesu banini, “Su-bu si awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Si ina lɛ́su-mii lɛla lɛdi ni, bɛɛɛdubo bɔƒɔ bɔdi.
Na si líye-mii litemi lɛdi ni, bɛɛɛdubo kenye budie bɔsu-mi lɛla lɛdi.
Nsu ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ni, Katɔti ɔdubuse ami, Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi, liboku na nwuna kɔdianu.”
Amu na bana ƒui béye-nwu banini, “Amu ni, Katɔti Ubidi na adi?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Amii alati mɔɔsu bɛnii anwu na ndi.”
Amu na básu banini, “Bɔsɔ buláwia ka ukyuli bamba ɔdi udie kenye kadi na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Abu alati búnu ala ani na ɔ́su!”
Amu na bana ƒui báta na bétiku Yesu bésienku Pilato kudɔ.

Mmɔ na bése baadá-nwu kenye banini, “Búƒie ukyuli ɔmɛni ka ɔ́kpanku bula kadi ɔɔvínku ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ. Na ɔɔsu-ma ɔnii basɔ bataƒɔ kuyi betete Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi. Na ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnii anwu ndi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi na ɔnii ɔdi ɔga lɛnɔ.”
Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?” Na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Awɔ mɔɔsu.”
Mmɔ na Pilato ɔ́su bakpane benengu ku bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Ńtanu lɛla lɛdi na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kɔtɔ kɔdi.”
Nsu bénye kpakplaa bébu na básu banii, “Nwuna ala ani na ɔɔtina éti lɛsɛ éboku Yudea bekyuli ƒui akɔ. Úse ɔmɛni kalɔ na Galilea, na úubo úbedu mɛni lɛnɔ.”
Uwi ɔni na Pilato únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Galileani na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi?”
Anwuɔsu ka ɔ́ti ka Yesu ɔ́si Galilea kalɛkɛ kani lɛlɔ na Herode ɔɔdi ɔsu ni, úti-nwu úmene Herode. Na Herode ɔmɛni úsie ɔkya Yerusalem uwi ɔmmɔ kemo.
Ebiti áda Herode geen uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu Yesu, ɔsika úunu-nwu kɔku na ɔɔwia ka ɔnu-nwu ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui. Na ubo lɛnunsia ka ɔdubɔnu Yesu na ɔbla akɔla budie taatina bɔdi.
Anwuɔsu Herode úye Yesu etemila pii, nsu Yesu útedie lɛdi kenye.
Mmɔ na bakpane benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane bálɛ bébo animi na báda kenye bonwu bonwu básia Yesu.
Herode ku nwuna bekpone báma Yesu na bédumi-nwu. Na béti awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔbuni ɔdi bákya-nwu aani ɔga kalɛ, na básɔku-nwu bémene Pilato.
Limeyi lɛmmɔ kani na Herode ku Pilato bénwini bakpana, na nka badi bekisine.
Pilato ɔ́lɔ bakpane benengu ku batɔnkune ku bekyuli bammɔ ɔ́sala.

Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́kpanku ukyuli ɔmɛni biboku-mi bɛnii ɔɔkpanku bekyuli taavinku ulu ukpidi lɛlɔ. Na ɔƒɛni ni, líye-nwu ala na amii alati anumi. Na ńtanu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na amii bɛ́da-nwu kenye.
Na Herode lɛnɔ útanu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ, ɔsika na ɔ́sɔku-nwu úmene-bu. Ukyuli ɔmɛni útabla lɛla lɛni na bɔdu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ.
Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na bebo-nwu kugyiimi na lɛda-nwu lɛnyonu.”
Na Kukpi Lili Bɔvia bɔdi emeyi biala kemo ni, ɔdi Pilato kabla ka ɔnyonu ɔtɔ batɛne akɔ unwi ute-ma.
Amu na bana ƒui báva momoomo banii, “Du-nwu! Na anyonu Baraba ete-bu!”
Na Baraba ɔmɛni ni, bákya-nwu ɔtɔ na lɛsɛ lɛdi na ɔ́kya na ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ kemo ku ukyuli bɔdu ɔsu.
Na ka Pilato ɔ́yɔ ka ɔnyonu Yesu ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ útemi úte bekyuli bammɔ.
Nsu ama báva básialaku-nwu litemi lɛlɔ banii, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!”
Mmɔ na Pilato ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma kɔtɛdi ɔnini, “Na bi likpidi na ɔ́bla? Ńtanu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla na mɔɔdú-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ! Ndubɔya na bebo-nwu kugyiimi na lɛnyonu-nwu.”
Nsu bunye kani na benye baava momoomo banii, “Ɔdi ka aya na bɔkana Yesu bɔmana ugyii lɛlɔ.” Na kawɔlɔkɔ ni, bádi lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu Pilato úkulo litemi lɛmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bekyuli bammɔ baawia.
Na ɔ́nyonu ukyuli ɔni na baayɔ́ úte-ma. Na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na litemi batɛne bákya ɔtɔ na lɛsɛ ku ukyuli bɔdu ɔsu. Na ɔ́nyonu Yesu ɔ́kya-ma enu kemo na batáblaku-nwu kalɛ na baayɔ́.

Bekpone bákpanku Yesu bátɔlɔku. Na ɔni bakɛ ulu bésela ni, bátásiaku Kireneni ɔdi baalɔ Simon ka ɔ́si lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi ɔdubo Yerusalem. Bédi-nwu bényene na bénye-nwu lɛlɔ banii uti ɔƒɔ ugyii ɔni na Yesu uti mmɔ na ɔsiaku-nwu kama.
Bekyuli pii badi basiaku Yesu kama. Na beleku badi bakya bana akɔ bani nkɛ muuwulo teete-nwu.
Amu na Yesu únwini na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Yerusalem beleku, bitewulo bitete-mi. Mmomu biteewulo na amii ku bina bebi lili.
Ɔsika uwi ɔdi ɔdubo ɔni na bekyuli badubɔsu banii, 'Lɛlɔ litaayɔ bedinkɔ ku kaƒɔ kani kemo na ubi útalɛ tɔ kudii ku anyi ani na bátanyimi kudii!'
Uwi ɔmmɔ ndi uwi ɔni na bekyuli badubɔsu abi banii, 'Ƒɛ beewi-bu lɛlɔ!' Na badubɔsu abinkpo banii, 'Bɛla-bu!'
Ɔsika si bákana na báni ukyuli ɔni na útabla lɛla lɛdi kɔtu lɛni ni, bɛti bɛnii bekyuli bekpidi kɔtu bɔni bɔdubutulo ɔmɛni ƒui.”
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekpone bétiku banana bekpidi inyɔ badi bésela batádu ku Yesu.
Ka bébedu likpo lɛni baalɔ banii Opokuo ni, bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ. Na banana bekpidi inyɔ bammɔ lɛnɔ ni, bákana-ma bámana ligyii lɛlɔ na Yesu kɔmii ku kɔdianu kakɛ.
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, ti kyiɛ-ma, ɔsika baaagyi lɛla lɛni na baabla.” Ɔmmɔ kama ni, bekpone bammɔ béle Yesu adala aani kalɛ na ɔdi biala egulabi ani na ɔ́tu ádi kalɛ.

Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bammɔ ƒui benye mmɔ baanu. Na Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ benye baamá Yesu taasu banini, “Ɔ́ƒɔ bekyuli bamba ngba, anwuɔsu ɔlɛka ɔƒɔ anwu ɔlati bɔdi lɛnɔ si anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na Katɔti úse likpo úse na bɔnu ɛ-ɛ!”
Lɛni kani na bekpone bammɔ lɛnɔ báma Yesu. Na bésie-nwu kudɔ na béti ntɛ bɔni nányi béte-nwu banii ɔni.
Na básu-nwu banini, “Si Yudaƒuɔ ɔga na adi ni, na ekpo aƒɔ lɛlɔ!”
Na nwuna eli kakɛ ni, bunweni bɔdi bɔsia na bɔɔsu bɔnii, “Ɔmɛni ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.”
Bekyuli bekpidi bani lɛnɔ na bákana bámana ligyii lɛlɔ mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔkya uudumi Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ? Kpo die lɛlɔ, na edie abu lɛnɔ!”
Mmɔ na ukyuli unyɔdi ɔ́dɔnku-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ aláyia Katɔti yoo? Kɔtu bɔni bunwi pɛ na bekpone béti béte awɔ ku anwu ƒui.
Na abu bula kɔtu bɔni ni, bɔdi ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika lɛla lɛni námanku-bu ni, ani na béti béte-bu. Nsu anwu útabla lɛla likpidi lɛdi.”
Amu na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Yesu, nyimo-mi si éduo ƒula lɛga kadikɔ.”
Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mɔɔsu-ɔ geen nnii ɔmwi ɔmɛni kani ni, ami ku awɔ ƒui bɔdubo buduo Paradiso kemo.”
Uwi ɔmmɔ ka ɔ́bla aani ɔƒiiwi lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da bɔlɛ ɔ́ya na kadi kábla suu na kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ úti útédu lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.
Na Katɔti kakpakɔ kɔdi kɔni nƒa mmɔ kɔ́bwɛ na kúle akpa anyɔ.
Na Yesu ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Ati, líti mina kɔyu lɛ́kya-a enu kemo.” Ka ɔ́su ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́yula.
Bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmmɔ ɔ́nu lɛla lɛni nálɛ na úmwi Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ geen na ɔdi ka ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni.”
Ka bekyuli bani nébo banii babanu ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ bánu lɛla lɛni nálɛ ni, bénwini bésie kɔduli na béti enu béwi lili.
Na bekyuli bani ƒui ngyi Yesu ku beleku bani nsiaku-nwu bási Galilea ni, bédi bénye ɔgyu sɛsɛɛ baanu ala amɛni.
Ɔnana ɔdi ɔkya ɔni baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Arimatea na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni na bekyuli baabu geen. Na unye ɔgya uwi ɔni na Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ kadububo.
Ina ka ɔ́kya Yudaƒuɔ litemi batɛne bammɔ akɔ ni, útatunaku-ma na lɛla lɛni na bálɛ ugyii ku lɛla lɛni na bábla lɛlɔ.
Úsie Pilato anumi na útévele-nwu Yesu ukpine.
Amu na ɔ́ƒami ukpine ɔmmɔ na úti kɔdi kɔƒualadi únyimi-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na úti-nwu útáva lɛtabi ubu kaƒiɔtɔ ɔdi kemo ɔni bátáva ukyuli ɔdi nwuna kemo kudii.
Limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdi limeyi lɛni na baaklibi lɛlɔ asa na lɛnwunameyi kadi kegye.
Na beleku bani nsiaku Yesu ɔ́si Galilea ni, básiaku Yoseƒ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ kesii kani na báva Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ.
Na básɔ bénwini bésie kaduli na bátákɔ ala ƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni na beeti taawɛɛ ukpine lɛlɔ bése. Amu na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bánwuna aani kalɛ na ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ bɔɔtina.
Na Kwasida ɔtanta tutuutu ni, beleku bammɔ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kɔtu na bada ala ani ƒui na báklibi bése.
Mmɔ ni, bánu ka kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kenye kewi na lɛtabi bonwu lɛni na béti bákalɛ mmɔ lɛlɛ kɔmadɔ.
Anwuɔsu béduo bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo, nsu bátanu Blɔti Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na kɔnakunwi ni, nkyuli inyɔ badi báda bálɛ-ma lɛlɔ. Na bakya lɛwu lɛni muukeye na lɛɛtu anumi.
Liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen ɔni na béboku lɛlɔ kalɔ béte bekyuli bammɔ. Na bekyuli bammɔ béye-ma banini, “Bi ɔsu na bɛɛwia ukyuli ɔni nli ngba na bekpine akɔ?
Uuubo mɛni. Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu! Binyimo lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su-mii uwi ɔni na ɔkya Galilea ɔnii
ɔlɛka bekyuli beti Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi bakya bekyuli bekpidi enu kemo. Na bakana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ. Na emeyi atɛ kama ni, ɔdubɔsɔ ɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ.”
Mmɔ ni, beleku bammɔ bényimo nwuna etemila ammɔ.
Na básɔ bénwini bási kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ na bátásu batalane leevu-unwi bammɔ ku bakladi ƒui lɛnɔ ala amɛni.
Beleku bammɔ ndi Maria Magdalene ku Yohana ku Maria ɔni ndi Yakobo uni. Ama ku beleku babambadi násu batalane bammɔ ala amɛni.
Nsu batalane bammɔ bákali banii ala ani na beleku bammɔ básu-ma adi kɔdɔlɔ etemila. Na bátaƒɔ bátadi.

Nsu Petro ɔ́ta na úkeli úsie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ. Na ka úbo kalɔ ɔ́nu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo ni, ɔ́nu ukpine kɔvadi, nsu ɔ́sɔ útanu lɛla lɛdi. Na ɔ́sɔ únwini ɔni na ɔ́bla-nwu dɛye dɛye na ala ani nálɛ ɔ́su.
Na limeyi lɛmmɔ kani lɛlɔ ni, Yesu basiakune inyɔ badi bakɛ ulu bésela lɛkpaklɔ lɛdi baalɔ banii Emaus kemo. Na ɔdubɔbla aani eluku maatɛ ɔ́si mmɔ útédu Yerusalem.
Na bakya baatɛmiku lɛlɔ na ala ani ƒui nálɛ lɛlɔ.
Ka bakɛ baatɛmi na béduo atɛ amɛni kemo ni, Yesu ɔlati úsie útásiaku-ma na anwu ku-ma bakɛ.
Bánu-nwu, nsu bátati banii anwu na ɔdi.
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bɛkɛ bɛɛsu na ulu?” Na bédi bénye. Na bana anumi aatina ka bana lɛlɔ lɛ́ɛkywi kaƒɔ.
Na bana akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ banii Kleopa úye Yesu ɔnini, “Awɔ lɛti pɛ ndi ɔƒɔ na Yerusalem na átati ala ani nátaalɛ mmɔ emeyi klukui amɛni kemo yoo?”

Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi ala?” Na bédie kenye banii, “Ala ani nálɛku Yesu Nasareni. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene ɔni na Katɔti ku bekyuli ƒui bánu ka ubo ɔyikun geen na nwuna ablala ku ala ani na ɔ́su ƒui kemo.
Yudaƒuɔ Katɔti bakpane benengu ku bula lɛlɔ badine béti-nwu bákya Roma aban unengu enu kemo na ɔ́du-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ na bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ.
Nsu abu bɔ́kya bútaasia anu bɔnii anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni ndubɔƒɔ Israel bekyuli ƒui. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔmwi ndi limeyi lɛtɛdi ka ala amɛni álɛ.
Bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni akɔ beleku badi báya na bula kayi kábla kalɛ kadi. Ɔsika bésie nwuna kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ ɔtanta tutuutu ɔmɛni.
Nsu bátatánu ukpine ɔmmɔ. Na bénwini bábasu-bu banii Katɔti batu badi bédie lɛlɔ bátina-ma. Na básu-ma banii Yesu uli ngba.
Bula badi akɔ badi bésie kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ na bátánu kalɛ na beleku bammɔ básu pɛpɛɛpɛ, nsu bátanu-nwu.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́dɔlɔ! Na bina bɔƒɔtaadi na ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene básu-mii lɛlɔ bɔba!
Bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii ɔlɛka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ubo abi amɛni udu asa na uduo nwuna lɛga bɔdi bukeye kemo?”
Na Yesu údie ala ammɔ kalɔ úte-ma ɔ́si ala ani na bénweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ɔ́si Mose ɔku ku ala ani ƒui na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni ɔkɛnku anwu Yesu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Ka badaku lɛkpaklɔ lɛmmɔ budu ni, Yesu ɔ́bla aani si ɔ́vi úsela anumi.
Nsu bábala-nwu básu banini, “Kadi káasa ɔsu ni, sɔ kya-bu kudɔ mɛni.” Anwuɔsu úsie útéduo-ma kudɔ mmɔ.
Úlie kalɔ ɔnii ɔɔdiku-ma. Na úti bodobodo na ɔ́gya Katɔti enu, na ɔ́bwɛ-nwu kemo na úti úte-ma.
Mmɔ na bana anumi ébimi na bánu-nwu báti. Nsu ɔ́yii-ma anumi.
Amu na básu lɛlɔ banii, “Uwi ɔni na ɔkya ɔɔtɛmiku-bu na uudie Bunweni Kedee Ɔku etemila kalɔ teete-bu na ulu lɛlɔ ni, ebiti adi udu áda-bu kayi kemo.”
Mmɔ na báta kɔnakunwi na básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem. Na bátánu batalane leevu-unwi bammɔ ka básala lɛlɔ ku bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ.
Na básu-ma banini, “Blɔti ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kekpine sɔsɔ, na údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina Simon.”
Amu na nkyuli inyɔ bammɔ lɛnɔ bédie kalɔ básu-ma ala ani nálɛ na ulu lɛlɔ ku kalɛ na bánu-nwu báti uwi ɔni na ɔ́bwɛ bodobodo ɔmmɔ úte-ma.
Ka nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni badaku bana litemi bɔsu ni, kɔnakunwi Yesu úbo úbenye-ma ntɛ. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
Liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen, na básu banii ukpine kɔyu na baanu.
Nsu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Liƒu litada-mii lɛni! Na bina kasusu lɛnɔ keteƒu.
Bɛnu-mi enu ku lɛgba. Na bituku-mi na bɛnu bɛti ka ami na ɔdi. Ɔsika ukpine kɔyu kuuubo ɔlɔna ku ekubi aani kalɛ na bɛɛnu-mi ka mbo mɛni.”
Ka ɔ́su lɛni ni, úti nwuna enu ku lɛgba ɔ́tina-ma.
Ebiti áda-ma geen na ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi ɔni na bátati kalɛ baƒɔ badi muedi! Mmɔ na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Adila adi ese?”
Amu na béti kakpaku keƒidi kadi béte-nwu.
Na ɔ́ƒɔ-ka ɔ́kun na bana anumi.

Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ala amɛni lɛlɔ kɔtɛ geen na lɛ́tɛmiku-mii ɔni na lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ. Ala ani ƒui na bénweni na Mose ɔda bubo ɔku kemo ku Katɔti kenye bediene ala ani bénweni ku kɔgya ɔku kemo ni, ɔlɛka ebo-nwu kemo lɛni.”
Mmɔ na ɔ́lɛmi-ma kasusu kalɛ na benu Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ammɔ kalɔ.
Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛni na bénweni banii Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ɔdububo abi na ɔdubɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ.
Na nwuna basiakune badubɔkɔ lɛsa na nwuna lɛnyi kemo bete kalɔ ƒui bekyuli banii benwini kayi kalɛ na Katɔti uti bana ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma. Na lɛsa bɔkɔ bɔmmɔ bɔdubuse kalɔ bɔsi Yerusalem.
Amii na ɔlɛka bidie litemi lɛmɛni kenye kesii biala.
Na ami ɔlati ndubuti lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́su-mii úse limene-mii. Nsu ɔlɛka binye bɛgya Katɔti ɔyikun ɔmɛni na Yerusalem wetédu uwi ɔni na ɔyikun ɔmmɔ ɔsi katɔ ubeduo-mii lɛlɔ kemo.”
Amu na ɔ́tɔnku-ma na bálɛ Yerusalem ɔmankemo bésie Betania. Mmɔ na ɔ́kɔliku nwuna enu katɔ na úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ.
Na uwi ɔni kani na uute-ma kusɛ kusɛ mɛni ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ na Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ.
Amu na bémwi-nwu na bénwini bésie Yerusalem ku ebiti sɔɔn.
Na beesié Katɔti kakpakɔ busie busie taatágya Katɔti enu uwi biala.
Kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui ni, Anwu ɔni ndi Katɔti Litemi mmɔ ɔkya. Na Litemi lɛmɛni ku Katɔti nkya. Na Litemi lɛmɛni ɔlati ku Katɔti badi unwi. Na ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ni,
Anwu ku Katɔti nli uwi ƒui.
Ɔkɛ Anwu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́sia údie lɛla biala. Na lɛla lɛdi liiibo ɔni na ɔɔɔdi nwuna lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́sia údie-ni.
Na Litemi lɛmmɔ kemo na ngba geen bɔɔsí. Na ngba bɔmɛni muute bekyuli Katɔti bukeye geen.
Bukeye bɔmɛni muukeye na bɔ́ɔyila lɛdisa. Na lɛdisa lítakana na linye bukeye bɔmɛni kenye.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Katɔti ɔ́tala ukyuli ɔdi aani kenye udiene kalɛ, na baalɔ-nwu banii Yohane.
Úbo ɔnii ubedie kenye na ukyuli ɔni ndi bukeye bɔmɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na ukyuli biala unu linyesia lɛmɛni na ɔƒɔ ukyuli ɔni ndi bukeye mmɔ ɔdi.
Ɔɔɔdi Yohane ɔmɛni ndi bukeye bɔmmɔ. Mmomu kenye kani na úbo ubedie na bukeye bɔmɛni lɛlɔ.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bukeye geen bɔni muuti bukeye teete ukyuli biala ɔ́si ɔdubo kayawi.
Nsu geen ni, ɔkya kayawi. Na ina ka nwuna lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́kɛ asa na údie kayawi ni, bekyuli bátanu-nwu bátati.
Úbo anwu badi akɔ, nsu bétegyingya enu bátaƒɔ-nwu.
Nsu ɛlɛɛ badi báƒɔ-nwu. Na bani ƒui náƒɔ-nwu mmɔ aani Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, úte-ma ɔyikun ɔni náya na benwini Katɔti bebi.

Na ubi bɔdi bɔmɛni bɔɔɔkɛnku kaba kemo kɔwɔ lɛlɔ. Na bɔɔɔdi ɔnana ku uleku kɔwɔ kemo na bɔ́si. Na bútasi ɔnana ubi bɔwia kasusu kemo lɛnɔ. Mmomu ni, Katɔti ubi bunwini bɔmɛni bɔ́si Katɔti ɔlati kudɔ.

Na Katɔti Litemi lɛmɛni líbo aani ukyuli ɔyawine, na úlie kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni na bula akɔ. Na Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ku litemi geen lɛ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na abu bɔ́nu kalɛ na uukeye ka ɔdi Katɔti ubidi unwi pɛ ɔsu.

Yohane údie-nwu ɔ́tina bekyuli uwi ɔni na ɔ́kɔ lɛsa úte kasalakɔ ƒui ɔnini, “Ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ńtaatɛmi taasiku ɔni lɛ́su nnii ukyuli ɔdi ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni ntulo-mi ƒui, ɔsika ɔkya kukuuku asa na báwɔ-mi.”
Na Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ku litemi geen lɛni náƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla bula ƒui lɛƒɔndia ɔ́sia kama.
Ɔsika kudeedi ni, Katɔti ɔkɛ Mose lɛlɔ úte-bu nwuna ɔda bubo. Nsu ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ úte-bu lɛƒɔndia lɛmɛni ku litemi geen.
Ukyuli ɔdi útanu Katɔti nwaa dii. Nsu Katɔti ubidi unwi pɛ ɔni mma-nwu lɛlɔ ni, anwu nédie-nwu nwaa ɔ́tina bekyuli.
Yohane údie kenye kadi úte Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bani nátala bakpane ku bana bebunkune básiku Yerusalem bákya-nwu. Bébo bébeye-nwu banini, “Ɔma geen na aasu anii adi tɔ?”
Amu na Yohane údie ala kalɔ úte-ma mmɔ kani ɔnini, “Lɛɛɛdi Katɔti Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni na básu bése ka webo.”

Bakpane bammɔ básɔ béye-nwu banini, “Amu ɔma na adi? Katɔti Kenye Udiene Elia na adi?” Údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi anwu na ndi.” Béye-nwu banii, “Na awɔ ndi Kenye Udiene ɔni básu bése ka ɔdubo?” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Oowo.”
Anwuɔsu básu-nwu banini, “Su-bu lɛla lɛdi kalɛ na bɔkana kenye budie bute bekyuli bani nátala-bu! Ɔma na adi? Bi na aasu taasiku ƒula lɛlɔ?”
Údie kenye ɔ́su-ma aani kalɛ na Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni úse ɔnini, “Ami ndi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔva na ketele kemo nnii bɛklibi ulu bise bite Blɔti bubo.”
Na bekyuli bani na bátala mɛni ni, bási Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ banii Ƒarisiƒuɔ kemo.
Anwuɔsu béye-nwu banini, “Si aaadi bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́su úse ka badubo akɔ unwi aani Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi, iye Elia, iye Kenye Udiene ɔmmɔ ni, bi ɔsu na aabla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni?”
Yohane ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ntu kani na muuti taabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni. Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ɔkya bina akɔ na bɛɛɛgyi-nwu.
Anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni nkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo, na ami ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.”
Lɛla lɛmɛni lɛ́lɛ na ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Betania na Yordan Ketu ɔvi. Mmɔ na Yohane útaabla ketu kemo ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni.
Kadi kégye ni, Yohane ɔ́nu ka Yesu ɔ́si ɔdubo. Amu na ɔ́su bani nnye-nwu kudɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Lɛkpa Koƒonu Ubi ɔni ndubo bayawine ekpidi buni budie-ma lɛlɔ.
Anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na ńtaatɛmi taasiku uwi ɔni na lɛ́su nnii ukyuli ɔdi ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo ɔni ntulo-mii ƒui, ɔsika ɔkya kukuuku asa na báwɔ-mi.
Ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛgyi nnii anwu ndi ukyuli ɔmmɔ. Nsu nwuna bubo ɔsu na líbo mɔɔbla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni kalɛ na lidie-nwu lɛtina bula kadi bekyuli Israelƒuɔ.”
Amu na Yohane ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kɔ́si katɔ aani kalɛ na abloduma ɔɔyu, na kúbelie-nwu lɛlɔ.

Kudeedi ni, ńtati-nwu. Nsu uwi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii ntaabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni ni, ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Si ánu ka mina Kɔyu kɔ́yu kuulie ukyuli ɔdi lɛlɔ ni, adubɔnu ati ka anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni muuti Katɔti Kɔyu taabla bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ.'
Na lɛ́nu ka ɔ́lɛ lɛni na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Na mɔɔsu-mii geen ka anwu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ.”
Limeyi lɛni nsɔ nsia ni, ka Yohane ku nwuna basiakune inyɔ benye ni,
Yesu úsie úbavi. Amu ka Yohane ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ɔmɛni ndi Katɔti Lɛkpa Koƒonu Ubi!”
Ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, Yohane basiakune inyɔ bammɔ bátu bénwini na básiaku-nwu. Yesu únwini ɔ́nu ka basiaku-nwu, na úye-ma ɔnini, “Bi na bɛɛwia?”
Mmɔ na bédie kenye banini, “Rabi,” ɔni kalɔ ndi ala ɔtinane, “Buvele, wɛ na eli?”
Ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo na bibanu.” Anwuɔsu anwu ku-ma bakɛ bétédu kesii kani na ɔ́kya, na bélie-nwu kudɔ useyi uwi ɔmmɔ ƒui ɔ́si lɛdɔ ine.
Na bekyuli bamɛni akɔ unwi ɔdi Andrea ɔni ndi Simon Petro ɔnwani.
Lɛla lideedi lɛni na Andrea ɔ́bla ndi ka úsie útáwia ɔnwani Simon na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Abu bɔ́nu Mesia ɔmmɔ!” iye Kristo. Na anyi ammɔ kalɔ budie ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.
Na Andrea ɔ́tɔnku Simon úsienku Yesu kudɔ. Na ka Yesu ɔ́nu Simon ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yohane ubidi Simon, nsu bekyuli badubɔlɔ-ɔ banii Keƒas,” iye Petro. Na anyi ammɔ kalɔ budie ndi lɛtakpɛ.
Kadi kégye ni, Yesu ɔ́bla kasusu ka uteesie kalɔ kani baalɔ banii Galilea. Na ka ɔkɛ ulu ni, ɔ́nu ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Ƒilipo, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bo, na abasiaku-mi.”
Na Ƒilipo lɛnɔ ɔ́si Betsaida ɔni ndi Andrea ku Simon ɔma.

Ɔƒɛni ni, Ƒilipo ɔ́gyu ɔ́tɔlɔ útáwia Natanael. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Abu bɔ́nu ukyuli ɔni geen lɛlɔ na Mose ku kenye bediene bénweni ala básiku-nwu lɛlɔ bése na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo! Anwu ndi Yoseƒ ubidi Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret!”
Natanael údie kenye ɔnini, “Dɛ! Bɔsi na lɛla lɛbuni lɛdi lɛdubɔsi Nasaret ntu?” Ƒilipo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ bo, na abanu!”
Ka bákpɛ beedé na Yesu ɔ́nu ka Natanael ɔdubo ni, ɔ́su-nwu lɛlɔ kɔtɛ ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔdubo na ulatɔlɔ bekyuli. Ɔdi Israelni geen!”
Natanael úye-nwu ɔnini, “Dɛ na ábla na agyi ukyuli ɔni udu na ndi?” Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Mɔɔnu-ɔ kukuuku na kɔdingyii kɔni kalɔ na eli asa na Ƒilipo úbo úbalɔ-ɔ.”
Natanael ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Rabi, awɔ ndi Katɔti Ubidi. Awɔ ndi Israelƒuɔ Ɔga.”
Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Áƒɔ ala amɛni ƒui ádi ɔsika lɛ́su-ɔ nnii lɛ́nu-ɔ na kɔdingyii kɔmmɔ kalɔ ɔsu? Adubɔnu budie bɔtina bunengudi butulo bɔmɛni.
Litemi geen na mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ni, adubɔnu ka katɔ kálɛmi na Katɔti batu baakɔ́ teesie katɔ taayu teebo ami Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi lɛlɔ.”
Na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛni nsia ni, bekyuli badi baawɛɛ uleku ɔdi na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Kana na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ. Mmɔ ni, Yesu uni Maria lɛnɔ ɔ́kya bebunkune bammɔ akɔ.
Na bálɔ Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane lɛnɔ banii bebo uleku ketikɔ mmɔ.
Uwi ɔni na ntɛ bɔni básala bɔ́sa ni, Yesu uni úbo Yesu kudɔ úbasu-nwu lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni ɔnini, “Ntɛ bɔmmɔ bútedu.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, ɔɔɔdi awɔ masu-mi lɛla lɛni mabla. Uwi ɔni na mete kebunku útedu tɔ.”
Mmɔ na Yesu uni ɔ́su kabla bablane bani nnye mmɔ ɔnini, “Binye kagyumana na bɛbla lɛla lɛni na wasu-mii ɔnii bɛbla.”
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, atabi kutubwi bonwu aku alɛ mmɔ. Na kadi biala kadubɔƒɔ aani alɔkumbwi ene iye aku. Aku na Yudaƒuɔ béteeti taabla bana lɛlɔ bɔƒɔ ɔdi.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su kabla bablane bammɔ ɔnii bedu ntu bewi-ku kemo. Anwuɔsu bédu ntu béyile-ku tɛtɛɛtɛ utédu atu.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bidu bɔdi bisienku ukyuli ɔni muubo ntɛ ɔda.” Na bédu-mu bésienku-nwu.
Ka unengu ɔmɛni útu ntu bɔni nénwini ntɛ mɛni ɔ́nu ni, útati kesii kani na ntɛ bɔmmɔ bɔ́si. Nsu kabla bablane bani nédu ntu bɔmmɔ ama báti. Anwuɔsu unengu ɔmmɔ ɔ́lɔ uleku ɔgya,
na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na ábla mɛni? Ntɛ bɔbuni na bekyuli pii beeti teese kalɔ na si uwi ɔni na báani na búdu-ma ɔkwɛ asa beeti bukpidi teeboku. Nsu awɔ ni, ɔƒɛni édie ntɛ bɔbuni keyi!”
Lɛla lɛni nálɛ na Kana na Galilea mɛni ni, ani ndi akɔla budie taatina edeedi ani na Yesu ɔ́bla. Na ka údie nwuna ɔyikun ɔ́tina lɛni ni, nwuna batɛyane báƒɔ-nwu bádi.
Na uleku buti kama ni, Yesu ku uni ku Yesu banwani ku batɛyane bammɔ bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Kapernaum. Na bélie mmɔ emeyi alɛɛ adi.
Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, uwi ɔdaku budu ka badi Yudaƒuɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi, na Yesu lɛnɔ úsie Yerusalem.
Ka údu Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔtɔ anumi ni, ɔ́nu ka beyedine belie beeyé ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku baƒonu ku babloduma bete lɛkpa. Na egulabi bavumanane lɛnɔ belie bana egulabi kasiakɔ.
Anwuɔsu Yesu úlii kɔbuli kɔdi ɔ́sala na ɔ́bɔku-ma ku baƒonu ku ɔmantɛ bakɔ bammɔ ɔ́lɛku mmɔ. Amu na úgyingya egulabi ammɔ úwi kalɔ na únwini bana ala kasiakɔ úbi kalɔ.
Amu na úsie bekyuli bani muuyé babloduma kudɔ na ɔ́bɔku-ma ɔnini, “Bɛda ala amɛni bidie mɛni, na biteti mina Ɔti ɔtɔ bitenwini kuye kadikɔ!”
Mmɔ ni, nwuna batɛyane bényimo lɛla lɛni nkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔ́su Katɔti ɔnini, “Ƒula ɔtɔ lɛlɔ bɔnu anumi adubo-mi bugyie na ɔya na bekyuli bekpoku-mi.”
Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bádɔnku Yesu banini, “Ɔma nátala-a lɛla lɛmɛni udu bɔbla? Akɔla budie bɔtina bɔmani na adubɔbla na eti atina-bu kenyekɔ kani na ebo ɔsu na aabla lɛni?”
Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛƒɛ Katɔti ɔtɔ ɔmɛni, na ndubɔtalaku-nwu linyene limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ!”
Amu na báva básu banini, “Bi na aasu? Bábla kabla akwa aavlene-aku sɔɔn asa na bátu ɔtɔ ɔmɛni! Na awɔ aasu anii adubɔtalaku-nwu enyene emeyi atɛ kemo?”
Nsu bátati ka Yesu ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́siku nwuna ɔlɔna lɛlɔ aani Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ.

Kama ƒui ka Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ úboku ngba ni, asa na nwuna batɛyane bényimo ka ɔ́su lɛni. Anwuɔsu báƒɔ ala ani na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ku ala ani na Yesu ɔ́su mmɔ bádi.
Uwi ɔni na Yesu ɔ́kya Yerusalem na Kukpi Lili Bɔvia uwi kemo ni, bekyuli pii bánu akɔla lidu lidu lɛni na ɔ́bla na báƒɔ-nwu bádi ka ubo Katɔti ɔyikun.
Nsu Yesu útanyonu lɛlɔ útete bekyuli bammɔ, ɔsika ɔgyi bekyuli ƒui.
Anwuɔsu uláwia ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔtina-nwu lɛla lɛdi na ukyuli lɛlɔ, ɔsika anwu ɔlati ɔgyi ukyuli ɔyawine udu geen.
Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Yudaƒuɔ ɔtɔnkune ɔdi ɔkya ɔni nkya lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ Ƒarisiƒuɔ, na baalɔ-nwu banii Nikodemo.
