Yesu ɔ́ti ka nwuna batɛyane bammɔ baayɔ́ beye-nwu lɛla lɛdi basiaku ɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́su nnii kébu uwi blii ɔdi na bɛsɔ bilanu-mi. Na ɔmmɔ kama blii lɛnɔ na bɛdubɔsɔ bɛnu-mi. Ɔmɛni lɛlɔ litemi na biiye lɛlɔ teenu?
Mɔɔsu-mii geen nnii bɛdubo kɔnyana buwulo na biwulo keku. Nsu kayawi bekyuli badubo ebiti bɔkɛ mmomu. Na amii ni, bɛdubɔbla kɔnyana, nsu bina kɔnyana kɔdubunwini lɛlɔyɔ.
Si uleku ɔɔyɔ́ ɔwɔ ni, ubo kɔnyana, ɔsika uwi ɔni na uubo abi údu. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ɔ́wɔ ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔɔyiƒla abi ani na úbo. Ɔsika ɔɔkɛ́ ebiti ka ɔ́wɔ ubi ɔ́kya kayawi.

Lɛni geen na use ute amii lɛnɔ. Ɔƒaani ni, bina lɛlɔ libo kɔnyana. Nsu ndubɔsɔ mbanu-mii. Na mmɔ ni, lɛlɔyɔ lɛdubɔƒɔ-mii kayi kemo ƒui. Lɛlɔyɔ lɛmɛni udu na ukyuli ɔdi biala ulakana bɔƒɔ bɔsiku-mii kudɔ kudii!
“Si uwi ɔni na limeyi lɛmmɔ líbo líbedu ni, bileye-mi lɛla lɛdi. Ɔsika mɔɔsu-mii geen ka lɛla biala na bɛdubɔkpali-mi lɛnyi bivele mina Ɔti ni, ɔdubute-mii.
Úti úbedu uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, bítakpali-mi lɛnyi bítevele tɔ Katɔti lɛla lɛdi. Bivele-nwu na ɔdubute-mii, na bina ebiti adubudu awɔlɔ.
“Agba kemo sɔɔn na lɛ́su-mii ala amɛni ƒui. Nsu uwi ɔdubo ɔni na nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo agba bubo. Mmomu ndubo-mii bɔtɛmiku nwaa bɔsiku mina Ɔti lɛlɔ.
Na si limeyi lɛmmɔ lídu ni, bɛdubo-mi lɛnyi bɔkpali bivele-nwu ala. Naaasu nnii ami ndubo-nwu ala buvele bute-mii.
Ɔsika Ati ɔlati ɔɔyɔ́-mii. Ɔɔyɔ́-mii ɔsika amii lɛnɔ bɛɛyɔ́-mi, na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di ka Katɔti kudɔ na lɛ́si líbo.
Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka Ati kudɔ na lɛ́si líbo kayawi. Na ɔƒɛni mɔɔtɔlɔ kayawi kamɛni kemo nteesie Ati kudɔ.”
Mmɔ na Yesu batɛyane bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Ɔƒɛni na aatɛmi nwaa, na asɔ elebo lɛgba.
Na ɔƒɛni na bɔ́ti ka agyi lɛla biala, na ɔ́sɔ útalɛka ukyuli ɔdi uye-ɔ litemi lɛdi. Ɔmɛni lɛti pɛ ɔ́ya na bɔ́ti ka Katɔti kudɔ na ási ébo.”
Amu na Yesu úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di ɔƒɛni kani?
Uwi ɔdubo, na úudu lɛnɔ ɔni na bɛdubo bugyingya bɛtɔlɔ-mi kudɔ, na ɔdi biala uteesie nwuna kaduli na bɛda ami lɛti binyene. Nsu geen ni, ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti nnye. Ɔsika mina Ɔti unye-mi kudɔ.
Ala amɛni na lɛ́su-mii kalɛ na kayi kasɔ kelékpoku-mii si biliku-mi. Kayawi bekyuli badubo bɔya na bibo abi. Nsu binye kpakplaa! Ɔsika lɛ́ɛdi kayawi kamɛni lɛbibo biala lɛlɔ.”
Ka Yesu ɔ́su-ma ala amɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kɔliku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ati, uwi ɔmmɔ údu. Kɔliku ami ƒ^ubidi katɔ kalɛ na ami lɛnɔ lɛ́kɔliku ƒula lɛnyi katɔ.
Ɔsika éti ɔyikun unengudi éte-mi na kayawi bekyuli ƒui akɔ kalɛ na lɛya na bani ƒui na éti éte-mi ni, belie ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Na ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii mɛni kalɔ ndi ka bekyuli bamɛni bati awɔ, na bati ka awɔ lɛti pɛ ndi Katɔti geen ɔmmɔ, na bati ami Yesu Kristo ɔni na átala.
Lɛ́kɔliku ƒula lɛnyi katɔ na bekyuli akɔ na kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na lɛ́wɔlɔ kabla kani na éte-mi ka mbabla.
Ɔƒɛni ni, Ati, sɔ kɔliku mina lɛnyi katɔ na ƒula anumi aani kalɛ na nse ɔni na lɛ́kya-a kudɔ asa na édie kayawi.
“Lɛ́ɛya na bekyuli bani na áƒuna álɛku kayawi bekyuli akɔ éte-mi báti-ɔ. Awɔ ɔdi na badi, na éti-ma éte-mi. Bádi ƒula etemila ƒui lɛlɔ.
Na bagyi ɔƒɛni ka lɛla biala na éte-mi ni, ƒula kudɔ na lɛ́si.
Kenye kani na ásu-mi ka mabasu-ma ni, bégyingya enu báƒɔ-ka. Na bagyi ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka ƒula kudɔ na lɛ́si, na awɔ nátala-mi.
Mɔɔkpali katɔ na bana lili, na ɔɔɔdi kayawi bekyuli ƒui lili. Mmomu ɔdi bani na éti éte-mi lili, ɔsika awɔ ɔdi na badi.
“Bani ƒui na mbo ni, awɔ badi na badi. Na bani ƒui na ebo ni, ami badi na badi. Na bekyuli baakɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ ɔkɛnku ama ɔsu.

Na ɔƒɛni ni, lɛ́tɔlɔ ndubo-ɔ kudɔ. Na nsɔ lɛɛɛkya kayawi kamɛni kemo. Nsu ama bamua bakya kayawi. Ati Kedee, gyumana-ma ɔkɛnku ɔyikun ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ si bákpali-ɔ lɛnyi. Na lɛnyi lɛmmɔ kani na éti éte-mi. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na babla unwi aani kalɛ na ami ku awɔ bɔdi benwi.

Uwi ɔni na nkya-ma kudɔ ni, lɛ́da-ma kɔkɔɔkɔ na lɛgyumana-ma ɔkɛnku ɔyikun ɔni nkya lɛnyi lɛni na éte-mi kemo. Ńtayila bana akɔ ɔdi, amu ntu anwu ɔni muusié na ayila-nwu udu. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ebo-nwu kemo kalɛ na básu.
“Na ɔƒaani ni, lɛ́tɔlɔ ndubo-ɔ kudɔ na muuvele-ɔ ɔmɛni lite-ma na kayawi kalɛ na mina ebiti aƒɔ-ma kayi kemo ƒui na edu awɔlɔ.
Líboku-ma ƒula linyesia na kayawi bekyuli békisi-ma, ɔsika ɔɔɔdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi na badi kalɛ kani na ami lɛnɔ lɛɛɛdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi.
“Na ɔɔɔdi buvele na nda-a nnii da-ma die kayawi kamɛni kemo. Mmomu buvele na nda-a ka agyumana-ma alɛku ukisine ɔmmɔ enu kemo.
Kalɛ kani na lɛɛɛdi kayawi kamɛni ɔdi ni, lɛni kani na ama lɛnɔ baaadi kayawi kamɛni badi.
Bla-ma kedee te ƒula lɛlɔ ɔkɛnku ƒula etemila geen ani na bénu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ƒula litemi lɛdi litemi geen.
Lɛ́tala-ma mɔɔkya kayawi bekyuli aani kalɛ kani na átala-mi ákya kayawi bekyuli.
Na ama ɔsu ni, lɛ́bla lɛlɔ kedee lite-ɔ kalɛ na akana abla ama lɛnɔ kedee.
“Ɔɔɔdi ama lɛti lili na mɔɔkpali-ɔ teevele lɛla lɛdi. Mmomu ku bekyuli bani ƒui ndubɔƒɔ-mi badi ɔkɛnku ƒula litemi buni lɛni badubɔsu-ma kemo lili lɛnɔ na muuvele.
Ati, muuvele ka aya na bana ƒui babla unwi aani kalɛ kani na awɔ eliku-mi na ami lɛnɔ nliku-ɔ. Ya na belieku-bu kalɛ na kayawi bekyuli baƒɔ badi ka awɔ nátala-mi.
“Líte-ma lɛnyi buni lɛni na éte-mi kalɛ na bana ƒui babla unwi kalɛ kani na ami ku-ɔ bɔdi unwi.
Ami nliku-ma, na awɔ eliku-mi. Ya na babla unwi bawɔlɔ kalɛ na kayawi bekyuli banu bati ka awɔ nátala-mi, na aayɔ́-ma kalɛ kani na aayɔ́-mi.

“Ati, awɔ néti-ma éte-mi. Na mɔɔwia ka belie-mi kudɔ na kesii kani na nkya kalɛ na banu kalɛ na ákɔliku-mi lɛnyi katɔ. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛnyi lɛni na éte-mi. Ɔsika aayɔ́-mii kukuuku asa na édie kayawi ku kana lɛla biala.
“Ati, ese siin. Na kayawi bekyuli baaagyi-ɔ, nsu ami ngyi-ɔ. Na ƒula badi lɛnɔ bagyi ka awɔ nátala-mi.
Lídie-ɔ lɛ́tina-ma. Na ndubo butaabla lɛni kalɛ na bagyi ka aayɔ́-ma aani kalɛ na aayɔ́-mi, na bagyi ka nliku-ma.”
Ka Yesu ɔ́kpali katɔ lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, anwu ku nwuna batɛyane bátɔlɔ mmɔ. Na bávia Kedron Obonka bétédu inɔ egyii kemo kadi. Na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane béduo kemo kammɔ kemo.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, kakya ɔkyane Yuda Iskariot ɔgyi likpo lɛmmɔ. Ɔsika mmɔ na Yesu ku nwuna batɛyane bátaayɔ bɔsa bɔsa.
Anwuɔsu Yuda lɛnɔ útiku Romaƒuɔ bekpone ku kakpakɔ bagyumanane bani na bakpane benengu ku Ƒarisiƒuɔ bátala. Bekyuli bamɛni bada lɛlɔ ku ekpola ku lɛsogya ku likpo.
Na ka Yesu ɔ́ti ala ani ndubo-nwu bɔlɛku ɔsu ni, ɔ́lɛ úbo anumi na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔma na bɛɛwia?”
Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Yesu Nasareni bɔɔwia.” Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu-mi mɛni.” Na kakya ɔkyane Yuda lɛnɔ unye-ma akɔ.
Na uwi ɔni na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu-mi mɛni” ni, bédi bésie kama na bébuli.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-ma kunyɔdi ɔnini, “Ɔma na bɛɛwia?” Na ama lɛnɔ básɔ bédie kenye banini, “Yesu Nasareni.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lɛ́ɛsu-mii nnii bɛɛnu-mi mɛni.” Na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si ami na bɛɛwia bɔdi ni, bɛya na bekyuli bakladi bamɛni batɔlɔ.”
Na Yesu ɔ́su ɔmɛni kalɛ na ala ani na ɔ́su úbavi ebo ete lɛni uwi ɔni na ɔ́su ɔnii, “Ati, bekyuli bani ƒui na éte-mi ni, ńtayila bana akɔ ɔdi.”
Na mmɔ ni, Simon Petro ɔda kewii kadi. Amu na ɔ́ni-ka ɔ́kpa livuo kemo, na ɔ́nwi ɔkpane unengudi kabla ɔblane kɔdianu kɔtu úkulo. Na kabla ɔblane ɔmmɔ baalɔ Malkus.
Nsu Yesu ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, “Sɔku ƒula kewii kya livuo kemo! Aakali anii lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔni na mina Ɔti úte-mi ɔnii nni ni, naaani-nwu?”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone ku bana ɔtɔnkune ku Yudaƒuɔ bagyumanane badi béƒie Yesu, na bényimi-nwu.
Na báka-nwu buti busienku Hana kudɔ. Na Hana ɔmɛni ɔdi Kaiaƒa ulekudi ɔti. Na Kaiaƒa ɔmɛni mɔɔbla ɔkpane unengudi kabla na lɛkwa lɛmmɔ kemo.
Na Kaiaƒa ndi anwu ɔni násu Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bammɔ ka ɔdia ka ukyuli unwi ukpi na kadi ƒui lili.
Simon Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi básiaku Yesu kama. Na ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔkpane unengudi ɔmmɔ ɔgyi-nwu, anwuɔsu na ɔ́siaku Yesu na bétéduo ɔkpane unengudi ɔmmɔ kaduli.
Nsu uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Petro anwu ɔsɔ unye kayakun. Amu na ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ únwini úbo úbatɛmiku ulekubi ɔni nnye ɔba kenye mmɔ, na ɔ́ya na Petro lɛnɔ uduo kaduli kammɔ.
Mmɔ na ulekubi ɔmmɔ úye Petro ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi ɔnana ɔmmɔ batɛyane akɔ unwi na adi?” Amu na Petro údie kenye ɔnini, “Oowo, lɛɛɛdi bana akɔ ɔdi.”
Ɔƒɛni ni, ka kɔyɔ kɔɔda-ma ɔsu ni, kabla bablane bammɔ ku bagyumanane bammɔ básala ogya ɔdi na benye baawaa. Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔ́gyu úsie unye-ma kudɔ mmɔ ɔɔwaa ogya ɔmmɔ.
Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔkpane unengudi ɔkya uuye Yesu ala taasiku nwuna basiakune ku ala ani na ɔɔtina lɛlɔ.

Amu na Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛ́tina ukyuli biala ala na kadi ƒui anumi uwi biala kemo. Na ala ani na lɛ́tina mmɔ lɛnɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na lɛ́tina-nya na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ uwi ɔni na bana ƒui bábasa. Na ńtasu lɛla lɛdi na bɔbɛ kemo.
Na bi ɔsu na eeye-mi lɛla lɛdi na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ? Ye bekyuli bani nénu-mi. Ama ngyi ala ani na lɛ́su-ma.”
Ka Yesu ɔ́su-nwu lɛla lɛmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, bagyumanane bammɔ akɔ unwi úbo-nwu kɔnu ɔtugya na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Ɔkpane Unengudi na eedie kenye lɛni?”
Amu na Yesu úye-nwu ɔnini, “Si lɛ́su lɛla lɛni naaadia ni, su ukyuli biala na mɛni lɛla lɛmmɔ. Na si ńtasu lɛla likpidi lɛdi bɔdi ni, bi ɔsu na ébo-mi kɔnu ɔtugya?”
Mmɔ na Hana úti Yesu ɔni na bámua bényimi bada úmene Ɔkpane Unengudi Kaiaƒa.

Uwi ɔmmɔ ni, Simon Petro ɔmua unye ogya kudɔ mmɔ ɔɔwaa ogya. Mmɔ na bekyuli bammɔ béye-nwu banini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ ndi ɔnana ɔmmɔ kama basiakune akɔ unwi iye?” Mmɔ ni, Petro ɔ́tuala ɔnini, “Oowo, lɛɛɛdi bana akɔ ɔdi!”
Amu na ɔkpane unengudi nwuna kabla ɔblane ɔdi ɔni na ɔnwani ndi okloƒu ɔni kɔtu na Petro ɔ́nwi ɔ́mami ni, úye Petro ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ na lɛ́nu na inɔ egyii kemo mmɔ ka enye-nwu kudɔ iye?”
Mɛni lɛnɔ ni, Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔtuala ɔnini, “Oowo!” Na mmɔ mmɔ ni, akɔkɔ úte kenye.

Amu na ɔtanta tutuutu ni, bákpanku Yesu básiku Kaiaƒa kudɔ mmɔ, na béti-nwu bésienku Romaƒuɔ aban unengudi kaduli. Nsu Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ béteduo mmɔ, ɔsika na bana ɔda bubo kenye ni, bátayɔ ka beduo mmɔ na ɔya bana lɛlɔ lise lɛlɔ ka badubo Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi ɔsu.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Pilato ɔ́lɛ úbo-ma kudɔ na ɔba kenye mmɔ, na úye-ma ɔnini, “Likpidi lɛmani na ɔ́bla?”
Amu na bédie kenye banini, “Si ɔɔɔdi likpidi bonwu lɛdi na ɔ́bla ni, nka bulakpanku-nwu buleboku ƒula kudɔ.”

Anwuɔsu Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amu na amii alati bitiku-nwu na bitátɛku-nwu litemi ɔkɛnku bina ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.” Mmɔ na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Roma aban útete-bu kuƒi ka abu alati bɔdu ukyuli kukpi kɔtɔ.”
Na ala amɛni álɛ lɛni kalɛ na litemi lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su ɔ́siku kukpi kɔni udu na ɔdubo bukpi lɛlɔ ubo ute lɛni sɔsɔ.
Amu na Pilato únwini útéduo kaduli mmɔ, na ɔ́lɔ Yesu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ndi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?”
Mmɔ ni, Yesu únwini na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔlati muuye-mi kenye kamɛni, munuu bekyuli bamba násu-ɔ banii ye-mi nu?”
Amu na Pilato údie kenye ɔnini, “Aabu anii Yudani na ndi? Awɔ ɔlati ƒula kadi bekyuli ku bakpane benengu néti-ɔ abakya-mi kɔnu. Bi na ábla?”

Mmɔ na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Mina lɛga bɔdi bútasi kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ. Si banii kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ lɛga bɔdi na lɛdi ni, nka mina basiakune badubukpo bete-mi kalɛ na neeeduo Yudaƒuɔ benengu enu kemo. Nsu ni, ɔɔɔdi lɛni na use. Mina lɛga bɔdi lɛ́si kesii bamba.”

Ka ɔ́su-nwu lɛni ni, Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Anwuɔsu ɔga na adi?” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ mɔɔsu ka ɔga na ndi. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu geen na báwɔ-mi. Na líbo kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ kalɛ na mbedie litemi geen lɛtina. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nkɛnku litemi geen lɛmmɔ ni, uunú lɛla lɛni na mɔɔsu.”
Mmɔ ni, Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ndi litemi geen?” Mmɔ kani na Pilato ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie keyi na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ kudɔ na útásu-ma ɔnini, “Naaanu likpidi lɛni ɔsu na lɛdu ukyuli ɔmɛni kɔtɔ.
Nsu na bina ɔda bubo bɔni na bibo kenye ni, si údu Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi uwi ni, uwi biala mɔɔnyonu batɔntɛne akɔ unwi. Anwuɔsu ni, bɛɛwia ka lɛnyonu Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga?”
Amu na bana ƒui báva básu banini, “Oowo! Ɔɔɔdi anwu, mmomu Baraba!” Na Baraba ɔmɛni ɔdi bekyuli ɔdune.
Anwuɔsu ni, Pilato ɔ́ya na bagyumanane béti kɔbuli kɔni na bélii básala na bébo Yesu kaduɛ.
Na bekpone bammɔ béti liyu kagba bédi kabwa na béti bébi-nwu lili. Na béti awu ugyiedi gyɔlɔɔ ɔdi aani ɔga kalɛ bákya-nwu.
Na beesié teebo-nwu kudɔ taabasu-nwu banini, “Yiidu! Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga ɔ́si ɔdubo o-o!” Na si básu-nwu lɛni ni, na bébo-nwu kɔnu ɔtugya.

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Pilato ɔ́sɔ ɔ́lɛ úbo bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ kudɔ úbasu-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ndubo-nwu bɔkpanku buboku bina anumi na mbatina-mi ka ńtanu likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kukpi kɔtɔ.”
Anwuɔsu Yesu ɔ́lɛ úbo keyi mmɔ, na liyu kabwa kammɔ kebi-nwu lili na ɔkya awu ugyiedi gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ. Mmɔ ni, Pilato ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Ukyuli ɔmmɔ na ɔdi mɛni!”

Amu na uwi ɔni na bakpane benengu ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ bánu-nwu ni, báva básu banini, “Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!” Mmɔ ni, Pilato ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Amii biti-nwu na bitákana-nwu bɛmana ugyii lɛlɔ. Ami ńtanu likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ kalɛ na lɛdu-nwu kɔtɔ.”
Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmmɔ básu banini, “Bubo ɔda bubo bɔni mɔɔtina ka ɔlɛka ukpi. Ɔsika ɔ́su ɔnii ɔdi Katɔti Ubidi.”
Uwi ɔni na Pilato únu-ma kenye kamɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́sɔ lɛ́da-nwu libu.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́sɔ únwini útéduo kaduli mmɔ na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Wɛ na ási?” Nsu Yesu útedie kenye kadi.
Amu na Pilato úye-nwu ɔnini, “Eledie lɛla lɛdi kenye alasu-mi? Aaagyi ka mbo kenyekɔ na lɛnyonu-ɔ, na mbo kenyekɔ na lɛya na bakana-a bamana ugyii lɛlɔ?”
Mmɔ ni, Yesu údie kenye ɔnini, “Nka alákɛ ɔyikun ɔdi na mina lɛlɔ si ɔɔɔdi Katɔti néte-ɔ kuƒi kɔmmɔ. Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni néti-mi ɔ́kya-a kɔnu kemo ni, ɔ́bla likpidi útulo-ɔ.”

Ka Pilato únu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́wia ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔsia na ɔnyonu Yesu. Nsu bekyuli bammɔ bakya baava taasu banini, “Si ányonu-nwu ni, asɔ aaadi Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare kabla ɔblane! Na ukyuli biala ɔni meti lɛlɔ mabla ɔga ni, ɔ́ta únye Kaesare ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ!”
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ka Pilato únu etemila amɛni ni, ɔ́kpanku Yesu ɔ́lɛku na útélie litemi bɔtɛ liboku lɛlɔ kesii kani baalɔ banii Atabi Kasalakɔ. Na Hebri lɛdi kemo banii Gabata.
Uwi ɔmmɔ ɔbla aani ɔƒiiwi. Na lɛdi limeyi lɛni kadi kegye ndi Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi lɛmmɔ. Na Pilato ɔ́su bekyuli bammɔ ɔnini, “Bɛɛnu bina Ɔga!”

Amu na báva básu banini, “Gyunku-nwu! Gyunku-nwu! Kana-nwu mana ugyii lɛlɔ!” Mmɔ na Pilato úye-ma ɔnini, “Bɔkana na nkana bina Ɔga mmana ugyii lɛlɔ?” Amu na bakpane benengu bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Buuubo ɔga ɔdi buuutulo Romaƒuɔ Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare!”
Ka básu lɛni ni, Pilato úti Yesu úte-ma ɔnii batákana-nwu bamana ugyii lɛlɔ.

Anwuɔsu bekpone bammɔ bákpanku Yesu bátɔlɔku. Na báya na anwu ɔlati uti ugyii ɔni lɛlɔ na badubo-nwu bɔkana bɔmana mmɔ. Na báyu ulu bésie kesii kani baalɔ banii Opokuo kalɔ. Na Hebri lɛdi kemo ndi Golgota.
Mmɔ na bákana-nwu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ. Na mmɔ lɛnɔ ni, bákana nkyuli inyɔ bamba badi bámana ligyii lɛlɔ na Yesu kɔmii ku kɔdianu.
Pilato ɔ́ya na bénweni ala adi básia kalɛkɛ kadi lɛlɔ na úti-ka ɔ́mana Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na etemila ammɔ ndi amɛni. Yesu Nasareni, Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.
Yudaƒuɔ pii báka ala amɛni, ɔsika kesii kani na bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ ude ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ. Na Pilato únweni ala ammɔ lɛnɔ na Hebri ku Roma ku Griki lɛdi kemo.
Lɛla lɛmɛni lítayɔ Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu bammɔ kaƒɔ. Anwuɔsu bátásu Pilato banini, “Útalɛka enweni anii Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga, mmomu ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnii ɔdi Yudaƒuɔ Ɔga.”
Amu na Pilato údie kenye ɔnini, “Lɛla lɛni na línweni ni, líinweni lɛ́wɔlɔ.”

Uwi ɔni na bekpone bammɔ bákana Yesu bámana ugyii lɛlɔ báwɔlɔ ni, béti nwuna adala na béle-nya akpa ene. Na ɔdi biala úti lɛkpa linwi. Na Yesu awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔmmɔ ni, bétele-nwu. Na awu ɔmmɔ ni, bátaka-nwu kesii kadi, mmomu budi sɔɔn na bédi-nwu ɔ́si limɔ útédu lɛgba.

Na bekpone bammɔ básu lɛlɔ banini, “Buláni awu ɔmɛni bulabwɛ. Mmomu bɛya na bɔtu egulabi bɔnu bula akɔ ɔni menwini mewi na buti awu ɔmmɔ bute-nwu.” Na ɔkɛnku ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ébo éte lɛni sɔsɔ uwi ɔni na básu bése banii, “Béle-mi lɛlɔ ala béte lɛlɔ. Na bátu egulabi na mina awu lɛlɔ.” Na lɛni geen lɛnɔ na bekpone bammɔ bábla.
Na Yesu ugyii ɔmmɔ kalɔ ni, Yesu uni ku uni ɔnwani ulekubi ku Klopa ulekudi Maria ku Maria Magdalene benye.
Yesu ɔ́nu uni ku nwuna ɔtɛyane ɔni na ɔɔyɔ́ geen ka benye. Anwuɔsu ɔ́su uni ɔnini, “Nna, aanu ƒ^ubidi.”
Amu na ɔ́su ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Aanu ƒ^ini.” Anwuɔsu ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ ni, ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu úsienku kaduli na ɔɔnu-nwu lɛlɔ.
Yesu ɔ́ti ka ɔƒaani ni, ɔ́ɔwɔlɔ lɛla biala na ɔlɛka ɔbla. Na kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ala ani bénweni bése ebo ete lɛni ɔsu ni, Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Utukwɛ ɔɔda-mi.”

Amu na kesii kani na ala amɛni aalɛ́ mmɔ ni, kalaku bonwu kadi kese na ntɛ bɔni nányi buwi. Anwuɔsu béti unwo bátu ugyii ɔdi baalɔ banii hisope lɛlɔ na bánwu bákya ntɛ bɔmmɔ kemo, na bákɔliku bátu-nwu kenye.
Ka Yesu ɔ́ni ntɛ bɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔƒɛni kani ɔ́sa!” Ka ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́kya lili kalɔ na ɔ́yula.

Amu na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ básu Pilato banii ute-ma kuƒi na bekyuli bani na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ ni, na bebo-ma lɛgba ekubi baƒɛ na baƒami-ma na ugyii lɛlɔ mmɔ. Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ báwia ka babla ɔmɛni ɔsika limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛdi Ƒida. Na bátayɔ ka bekyuli bammɔ ɔlɔna ɔƒa ligyii lɛlɔ mmɔ utédu kadi kégye kani ndi bana lɛnwunameyi. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛni ndubo mmɔ lɛnɔ lɛdi limeyi linengudi geen lɛni nse kedee ƒui lite-ma.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu bekpone bammɔ bésie na nkyuli inyɔ bani na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ bébunku Yesu mmɔ ni, bébo-ma lɛgba báƒɛ.
Nsu ka bébedu Yesu kudɔ ni, bánu ka úukpi. Anwuɔsu anwu ni, bátaƒɛ-nwu lɛgba.
Mmomu ukpone unwi ɔ́tu-nwu ɔƒɛnyi ɔ́ƒuala ku nwuna lɛtula. Na mmɔ mmɔ ni, ubugya ku ntu bɔ́lɛ.
Ukyuli ɔni nánu ala amɛni ni, anwu muunweni-nya kalɛ na amii lɛnɔ bɛƒɔ bɛdi. Na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́su lɛnɔ ni, sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Na ɔgyi nwaa ka litemi geen na ɔɔsu.
Bábla ala amɛni ƒui kalɛ na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila ebo ete lɛni ɔni na bénweni banini, “Nwuna likubi linwi muedi balaƒɛ-ni.”
Na bénweni lɛla bamba lɛnɔ banini, “Bekyuli badubɔnu anwu ɔni na bátu-nwu lɛtula ɔƒɛnyi mmɔ.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yoseƒ ɔni nási ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Arimatea ni, úvele Pilato ɔnii ɔnyonu Yesu ukpine ute-nwu. Na Yoseƒ ɔmɛni ɔdi Yesu kama basiakune akɔ unwi. Nsu útabla na bekyuli bati, ɔsika ɔɔyia Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ ɔsu. Na ka Pilato ɔ́tuna ni, úbo úbaƒɔ ukpine ɔmmɔ ɔ́tɔlɔku.
Na Nikodemo ɔni nábɛ útánu Yesu usien ɔdi ni, anwu lɛnɔ ɔsiaku Yoseƒ ɔmɛni. Na evogyii ani na beeti taaklibi ukpine ni, Nikodemo ɔ́ya na béti-nya pii geen basiaku-ma.
Amu na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni béti Yesu ukpine ɔmmɔ na bátáwɛɛ-nwu evogyii ammɔ ƒui na béti adi aƒualadi abuni bényimi bada-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui aani kalɛ na Yudaƒuɔ baaklibi ukpine asa na baavá-nwu.
Na kesii kani na bádu Yesu mmɔ ni, likpo blii lɛdi lɛkya mmɔ. Na mmɔ ni, béku kaƒiɔtɔ kawɔdi kadi bése na bátava tɔ ukyuli kana kemo kudii.
Ɔƒɛni ka kadi kegye kani ndi lɛnwunameyi na kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ lɛnɔ kede mmɔ ɔsu ni, béti Yesu bátáva mmɔ.
Na Kwasida ɔtanta tutuutu uwi ɔni kemo na kadi kátabla tɔ nwaa ni, Maria Magdalene úsie kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kudɔ na útánu ka lɛtabi lɛni na béti bébi ubu ɔmmɔ kenye lɛsɔ liiibi.

Anwuɔsu úkeli úsie Simon Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ kudɔ. Na útásu-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli badi bétédie Blɔti na kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo bátɔlɔku. Na bɔɔɔgyi kesii kani na béti-nwu bétése!”
Amu na Petro ku ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ bátɔlɔ bésie kaƒiɔtɔ mmɔ.
Bana inyɔ ƒui bakɛ beekeli usi, nsu ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔmmɔ ɔ́vi Petro na ɔ́ka-nwu kaƒiɔtɔ kudɔ mmɔ budu.
Úbo kalɔ na ɔ́nu adi aƒualadi abuni ammɔ, nsu úteduo kaƒiɔtɔ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo.
Simon Petro ɔni nkpɛ kama lɛnɔ úubo úbeduo, na anwu ɔ́vi úduo kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo na ɔ́nu adi aƒualadi ammɔ ka ewi.
Na kɔdi kɔni na béti bamana Yesu lili lɛnɔ kɔtɛ mmɔ. Nsu kɔɔɔtɛ adi aƒualadi ammɔ kudɔ. Mmomu báƒɛ aku lɛti báva kɔmadɔ.
Mmɔ ni, ɔtɛyane ɔbambadi ɔni náka bukeli butédu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kɔtu lɛnɔ úduo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo. Na útánu ala ammɔ lɛni kani, na ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di.
Nsu úti úbeduku uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bétenu tɔ kalɔ ka Yesu ɔdubɔta bɔlɛ kekpine aani kalɛ na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo.
Amu na batɛyane bammɔ bénwini bésie kaduli.
Nsu Maria úbo unye kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ anumi na uuwulo. Nsu uwi ɔni na unye uuwulo ni, ɔ́sɔ úbo kalɔ ɔ́nu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ kemo.
Mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu Katɔti batu inyɔ badi ka bakya lɛwu lɛƒualadi belie mmɔ. Unwi ulie kesii kani na Yesu ɔ́tɛ lili kakɛ, na ɔkladi lɛnɔ ulie úsie lɛgba kakɛ.
Amu na béye-nwu banini, “Uleku, bi ɔsu na eewulo?” Mmɔ ni, Maria lɛnɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Bekyuli badi bébeti mina Ati bátɔlɔku. Na lɛɛɛgyi kesii kani na béti-nwu bésienku!”
Amu ka ɔ́tu únwini ni, ɔ́nu ka Yesu unye. Nsu Maria útati ɔnii Yesu na ɔdi.

Amu na Yesu lɛnɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Uleku, bi ɔsu na eewulo? Ɔma na aawia?” Nsu Maria ɔ́kali ɔnii anwu mɔɔnu kaƒiɔtɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, buvele, si awɔ nédie-nwu átɔlɔku mɛni ni, na atina-mi kesii kani na éti-nwu étése, na lisie ntéti-nwu mmɔ.”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔnini, “Maria!” Mmɔ ni, Maria únwini ɔ́nu-nwu, na ɔ́su na Hebri lɛdi kemo ɔnini, “Rabuni!” Na nwuna kalɔ ndi Ala Ɔtinane.

Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Tatu tada-mi, ɔsika ńtenwini tɔ ńtesie Katɔti kudɔ. Mmomu teesie mina banwani kudɔ na atásu-ma anii línwini lísela mina Ɔti ɔni ndi Katɔti kudɔ. Na anwu ndi amii lɛnɔ Ɔti ku bina Katɔti.”
Anwuɔsu ni, Maria Magdalene úsie na útásu batɛyane bammɔ ka anwu ɔ́nu Blɔti. Na lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ni, ɔ́sɔku-ni ɔ́su batɛyane bammɔ.
Na Kwasida kadi kammɔ useyi ni, batɛyane bammɔ básala na bákalɛ lɛlɔ bákya ɔtɔ kemo ka baayia Yudaƒuɔ benengu bammɔ ɔsu. Amu na Yesu úbo úbenye-ma ntɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
Ka ɔ́su-ma ɔmɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, Yesu úti nwuna enu ku ɔƒɛnyi ɔ́tina-ma. Na lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ batɛyane bammɔ ka bánu Blɔti ɔsu.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii. Kalɛ na Ati ɔ́tala-mi ni, lɛni kani na ami lɛnɔ mɔɔtala-mii.”
Mmɔ ni, ɔ́nwuna úwi-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
Na si bíti bekyuli ekpidi bɛ́kyiɛ-ma ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti lɛnɔ úti ɔ́kyiɛ-ma. Nsu si bíteti bítakyiɛ-ma ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti lɛnɔ úteti útakyiɛ-ma.”
Uwi ɔni na Yesu úbo-ma kudɔ mmɔ ni, batɛyane leevu-inyɔ bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Toma na basɔ baalɔ-nwu Nta Ubi ni, uuubo-ma akɔ.

Anwuɔsu ka úbebo ni, batɛyane bakladi bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abu bɔ́ɔnu Blɔti!” Amu na Toma ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si ńtanu kɔbwɛlɛ eƒi lɛtaala na nwuna enu na liti mina lɛnimi lɛkya-nya kemo na liti mina kɔnu lɛkya-nwu ɔƒɛnyi ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔƒɔ bɔdi.”

Amu na Kwasida unwi kama ni, batɛyane bammɔ básɔ bása belie ɔtɔ kemo, na Toma lɛnɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ. Básɔ bákalɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ lɛni kani. Nsu Yesu úbo na úbenye-ma ntɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii.”
Amu na ɔ́su Toma ɔnini, “Bo, na ebeti ƒula lɛnimi akya mɛni. Na anu mina enu. Na eti ƒula kɔnu akya-mi ɔƒɛnyi. Na ada ƒula taƒɔ tadi aya. Na aƒɔ adi ɔƒɛni kani!”
Ka Yesu ɔ́su-nwu lɛni ni, Toma údie kenye ɔnini, “Mina Ati ku Katɔti!”
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Áƒɔ ádi ka ánu-mi ɔsu. Bekyuli bani náƒɔ bádi asa na bánu-mi ni, badubɔkɛ lɛlɔyɔ teetulo!”
Yesu ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina pii na nwuna batɛyane anumi. Nsu ńtenweni-nya ńtakya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo.
Na amɛni kani na línweni líse kalɛ na bɛƒɔ bɛdi ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ. Na anwu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔni na si bɛ́ƒɔ-nwu bɛ́di ni, na ɔya na bilie ngba na nwuna ɔyikun kemo.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane kunwi na Tiberia Ɛpu kudɔ. Na kalɛ na úbalɛ na ndubo bɔsu mɛni.
Limeyi lɛdi ni, Simon Petro ku Toma ɔni baalɔ Nta Ubi ku Natanael ɔni nási Kana na Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ ku Sebedeo bebi ku Yesu batɛyane inyɔ babambadi badi benye.

Amu na Simon Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Lísela ntédie kɔbɛ.” Mmɔ kani na ama lɛnɔ básu-nwu banini, “Abu lɛnɔ bɔdubo-ɔ bɔsiaku.” Anwuɔsu bana ƒui béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bátɔlɔ. Nsu usien umodi ɔmmɔ ni, bétedie kɔbɛ kɔdi.
Amu uwi ɔni na ɔƒɛ ɔ́tu ɔdubo ni, batɛyane bammɔ bánu ukyuli ɔdi ka unye ɛpu kɔtu. Nsu bátati banii Yesu na ɔdi.
Amu na ɔ́kpali-ma ɔnini, “Bakloƒu, bítedie kɔbɛ kɔdi?” Mmɔ na ama bédie kenye banii, “Oowo!”
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biwi bina asawu ɔmmɔ na ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kɔdianu kakɛ. Na bɛdubɔkɛ lɛla lɛdi.” Anwuɔsu béwi asawu ɔmmɔ. Na bátakana-nwu bɔni bɔlɛku, ɔsika bédie kɔbɛ pii.

Amu na ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ ɔ́su Petro ɔnini, “Blɔti na ɔdi!” Ka Simon Petro únu ka ɔtɛyane ɔmmɔ ɔ́su ɔnii Blɔti na ɔdi ni, Petro úti nwuna awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔ́bala lɛlɔ, ɔsika ɔ́da-nwu údie. Na ɔ́ƒulu úduo ntu bɔmmɔ kemo, na úti úsela Blɔti kudɔ.

Na batɛyane bakladi béti ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ na básia ntu lɛlɔ bébedu ɛpu kɔtu. Na báni asawu ku kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ béboku. Na ɔ́si kesii kani na bédie kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ útédu ɛpu kɔtu ni, útagyu. Ɔ́bla aani lɛgba budie eti anyɔ.
Ka báyu ɔkɔlɔ kemo bébo kalɔ ni, bánu aƒɛ ogya ɔdi na ɔdaku bɔda. Na kɔbɛ kɔdi kɔsia ogya ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, na bodobodo ɔdi lɛnɔ use mmɔ.
Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biti bina kɔbɛ kɔni na bídie ɔƒaani mmɔ kɔdi biboku.”

Amu na Simon Petro ɔ́kɔ úduo ɔkɔlɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́da asawu ɔmmɔ na ɔ́ni úbewi ɛpu kɔtu. Na kɔbɛ kubendi kúyi-nwu kemo tɛtɛɛtɛ. Na kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ ƒui bumomo bɔbla eti atɛ ku ɛtɛ. Nsu ina ka kɔbɛ kɔmmɔ kúmomo lɛni ni, asawu ɔmmɔ útabwɛ.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bibo bibadi.” Nsu ɔni na ala amɛni ƒui aalɛ́ ni, ɔdi útakana kayi buse na uye-nwu ɔnii, “Ɔma na adi?” Ɔsika báti ka Blɔti na ɔdi.
Na ka Yesu ɔ́lɔ-ma ɔnii babadi ni, ɔ́kpɛ úde adila ammɔ na úti bodobodo ɔmmɔ na úti úte-ma. Lɛni kani na ɔ́bla kabɛ kammɔ lɛnɔ.
Na ɔmɛni ndi kɔtɛdi kɔni na Yesu údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batɛyane ɔni na ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ kekpine.

Uwi ɔni na bádi báwɔlɔ ni, Yesu úye Simon Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubi, aayɔ́-mi geen teetulo batɛyane bakladi bamɛni?” Amu na údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɛɛn! Awɔ ɔlati agyi ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonubi lɛlɔ.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubidi, aayɔ́-mi geen?” Na Petro lɛnɔ ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, agyi ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.” Mmɔ ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonu lɛlɔ.”

Kɔtɛdi ni, Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye Petro ɔnini, “Simon, Yohane ubidi, aayɔ́-mi?” Amu ka Yesu ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu kɔtɛdi ɔnii, “Aayɔ́-mi?” ɔsu ni, Petro lɛlɔ lɛ́bla anwu ɔlati kɔnyana, na ɔ́su Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, agyi lɛla biala. Na agyi lɛnɔ ka mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ!” Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taanu mina baƒonu lɛlɔ.

Mɔɔsu-ɔ litemi geen ka ni, uwi ɔni kemo na adi ɔnamu ni, aata na aklibi lɛlɔ na esie kesii biala na aayɔ́. Nsu si uwi ɔni na ábi lɛlɔ ni, adubo enu bunene na ukyuli bamba maklibi-ɔ na ɔkpanku-ɔ usienku kesii kani na alawia ka esie.”
Lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu mɛni ni, bɔtina na ɔda Petro kukpi kɔni udu na ɔdubo bukpi na uti ɔkɔliku Katɔti lɛnyi katɔ. Amu na Yesu ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Taasiaku-mi.”

Amu ka Petro ɔ́tu únwini ni, ɔ́nu ɔtɛyane ɔni na Yesu ɔɔyɔ́ mmɔ. Anwu ndi ɔtɛyane ɔni nábu úsie Yesu kudɔ uwi ɔdi návi ɔni na baadiku-nwu adila ekplodi na úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, ɔma ndubo-ɔ kakya bɔkya?”
Anwuɔsu uwi ɔni na Petro ɔ́nu-nwu ni, úye Yesu ɔnini, “Blɔti, na bi ndubo ƒula ɔtɛyane ɔmɛni anwu bɔlɛku?”
Amu na Yesu údie kenye na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Si mɔɔyɔ́ nnii anwu ɔsɔ ɔkya ngba wetédu uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo ni, bi nkɛ-ɔ? Awɔ ni, taasiaku-mi.”

Ɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́vi Yesu basiakune ƒui akɔ ka ɔnii ɔtɛyane ɔmɛni anwu ulekpi. Nsu ɔɔɔdi bɔsu na Yesu ɔ́su ɔnii ulekpi. Mmomu bɔsu na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Si mɔɔyɔ́ nnii anwu ɔsɔ ɔkya ngba wetédu uwi ɔni na masɔ mebo ni, bi nkɛ-ɔ?”
Ɔtɛyane ɔni lɛlɔ litemi na bɔɔsu mɛni ndi ami ɔni násu ala amɛni. Na línweni-nya líse lɛnɔ. Na baƒɔtaadine ƒui bagyi ka ala ani kenye na muudie mɛni adi litemi geen.
Na ala pii abambadi akya ani na Yesu ɔ́bla. Na si banii bénweni ala ani ƒui na ɔ́bla bése unwi unwi ni, nka kayawi bekyuli balákɛ lɛku lɛmmɔ kesekɔ.

Ɔnwa Tioƒilo, na mina ɔku udeedi kemo ni, línweni lɛ́su ala ani ƒui na Yesu ɔ́bla na ɔ́tina úti ɔ́si uwi ɔni na úse nwuna kabla kalɔ úti útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti úti-nwu úsienku katɔ. Asa na ɔdubuti-nwu usienku katɔ ni, Yesu ɔkɛ Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ ɔ́tina nwuna batalane ala.
Na emeyi aavlene kemo na nwuna kukpi kama ni, údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-ma kɔlɛ kɔlɛ ɔni na ɔ́tina geen ka ɔ́kya ngba. Ama bani nánu-nwu ni, ɔ́tɛmiku-ma ɔ́siku nwuna Ɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ.
Uwi ɔni na bábasa lisu ni, úbo-ma ɔda ɔnini, “Bitatɔlɔ Yerusalem, mmomu binye bɛgya Katɔti Kɔyu bubo bɔni lɛlɔ na lɛ́su-mii lɛ́siku ka mina Ɔti ɔ́su úse ka wete-mii.
Ɔsika Yohane anwu ni, ntu na úti ɔ́bla Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ úte bekyuli. Nsu na emeyi klukui adi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti nwuna Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.”
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka batalane bamɛni ku Yesu básɔ bása ni, béye-nwu banini, “Unwoti, ɔƒaani na aawia ka asɔku Israel lɛga kadikɔ ese yoo?”
Na Yesu ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Útalɛka bɛti uwi iye emeyi ani na mina Ɔti ɔ́su úse ka lɛla lɛdi lɛdubɔlɛ.
Nsu si uwi ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu kúbo-mii kudɔ ni, kɔdubɔƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na kɔdubɔkya-mii ɔyikun na bɛdubɔsu-mi lɛlɔ litemi na Yerusalem ku Yudea ku Samaria wetéduku kalɔ kawɔkɔ.”
Na ɔmɛni bɔ́su kama ni, Katɔti úti-nwu ɔ́kɔliku katɔ na benye baanu-nwu útédu ka úduo uyɔlɔ kemo na ɔ́yii-ma anumi.
Na ɔni benye baanu kayaa ni, kɔnakunwi nkyuli inyɔ badi bani nnyimi ala aƒualadi bédie lɛlɔ bátina-ma,

na básu-ma banini, “Galileaƒuɔ, bi ɔsu na binye bɛɛnu katɔ lɛni? Yesu ɔni na Katɔti úti ɔ́siku-mii kudɔ úsienku katɔ mɛni ni, ɔsɔ ɔdubɔsi katɔ ubo-mii kudɔ aani kalɛ na bɛ́nu ka ɔ́si bina kudɔ úsie katɔ kalɛ kani.”
Nwuna kama ni, batalane bammɔ bénwini bási kɔbi kɔni baalɔ Inɔ Egyii Kɔbi lɛlɔ mmɔ, bésie Yerusalem ɔmankemo. Na ɔ́si mmɔ útédu ɔmankemo mmɔ ni, wabla liluku linwi.

Ka bétéduo ɔmankemo ni, bésie bétéduo bana kakyakɔ. Na bekyuli bani nli mmɔ ndi Petro ku Yohane ku Yakobo ku Andrea ku Ƒilipo ku Toma ku Bartolomeo ku Mateo ku Yakobo ɔni ndi Alƒeo ubidi ku Simon ɔni basɔ baalɔ Selote ku Yakobo ubidi Yuda.
Bekyuli bamɛni bátaasala lɛlɔ taakpali katɔ uwi biala ku beleku badi ku Yesu uni Maria ku Yesu banwani bananabi.
Amu na emeyi ammɔ kemo kani ni, ama bani náƒɔ bádi mmɔ bábasa, na bana bumomo bɔbla aani nkyuli eti anyɔ ku aavlanyɔ. Na mmɔ Petro ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
“Mina banwani, lɛla lɛni na bénweni na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ni, ɔlɛka libo-nwu kemo aani kalɛ na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́kɛnku Dawid lɛlɔ kútemi kɔ́siku Yuda ɔni nátɔnku bekyuli bani néƒie Yesu lɛlɔ.
Yuda ɔdi bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni kemo unwi, na Blɔti ɔ́ƒuna-nwu ka nka wabla batalane kabla.
“Nsu ɔ́bla likpidi na ɔ́ƒɔ egulabi ani na béti bétéye kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na útékpi. Mmɔ ka úbuli ni, ɔ́bwɛ na nwuna aƒɔla ƒui álɛ éwi keyi.
Nwuna kukpi kɔmɛni litemi líbegyingya na Yerusalem, na ukyuli biala únu nwuna kukpi kɔmɛni lɛlɔ litemi. Anwuɔsu ni, kesii kani na úkpi mmɔ na baalɔ Hakeldamak ɔni kalɔ ndi Ubugya Lɛku.”

Amu na Petro ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnini, “Bénweni na Dawid kɔgya ɔku kemo banini, 'Bɛsia nwuna liku mmɔ kɔnu bise, na ɔdi biala utelie mmɔ.' Básɔ bénweni banii, 'Bɛya na ukyuli bamba unye nwuna kalabla kenye.'

Anwuɔsu ni, ɔlɛka ukyuli ɔdi uduo-bu akɔ aani litemi kama unyene kalɛ ute Blɔti Yesu bɔta bɔlɛ bekpine akɔ. Na ɔlɛka ɔbla ukyuli ɔni nákya bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni kemo na uwi ɔni kemo ƒui na abu ku Yesu bɔkɛ, na ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Yohane ɔ́kɔ lɛsa na Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi lɛlɔ útédu uwi ɔni na Katɔti úti Yesu úsienku katɔ.”
Anwuɔsu bédie nkyuli inyɔ bani ndi Matia ku Yoseƒ ɔni baalɔ Barsaba na basɔ baalɔ-nwu Yusto.

Na bákpali katɔ banini, “Blɔti, awɔ ngyi ukyuli biala kasusu kemo. Anwuɔsu tina-bu nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni akɔ unwi ɔni na áƒuna, ka unye ɔtalane kenyekɔ kani na Yuda ɔ́da úse na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie kesii kani néduku-nwu.”
Na ka bátu egulabi bánu na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni lɛlɔ ni, Matia ɔdi nénwini úwi na béti-nwu bébunku nkyuli leevu-unwi bammɔ.
Amu ka limeyi lɛni baalɔ Pentekoste limeyi lídu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ƒui bátása na likpo linwi pɛ.
Kɔnakunwi ni, bénu kɔku kɔdi aani ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ubendi ɔdi muukpó. Na kɔku kɔmɛni kúbeyi ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na bákya mmɔ.
Na lɛla lɛdi lígyingya aani agyakpabi kalɛ, na líbelie-ma lɛlɔ.
Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, na bése kalɔ baasu bumwi etemila na adi lidu kemo aani kalɛ na kúte-ma kalɛ.
Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo kani ni, Yudaƒuɔ bani nási kayawi ekpo ƒui ni, bébo bakya Yerusalem.
Amu ka bénu kɔku bonwu kɔmɛni ni, bekyuli pii békeli bésie mmɔ. Na ka bénu ka baƒɔtaadine bamɛni benye beetemi kadi biala ɔma lɛdi ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye!
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-ma, na béƒu na bése kalɔ beeye lɛlɔ banini, “Bekyuli bamɛni ƒui ni, ɔɔɔdi Galileaƒuɔ badi yoo?
Na dɛ na ɔ́bla na buunú bana butemi na bula kɔlɔ adi kemo?

Abu bɔdi Partiƒuɔ ku Mediaƒuɔ ku Elamƒuɔ ku bani nási Mesopotamia ku Yudea ku Kapadokia ku Ponto ku Asia ku Ƒrigia ku Pamƒilia ku Egyipte ku Libia ɔvi ɔni nkya Kirene ku baƒɔ bani nási Roma na badi Yudaƒuɔ ku bekyuli bani néduo Yudaƒuɔ lɛkpa kemo
ku Kretaƒuɔ ku Arabiƒuɔ. Na bula ƒui buunú ka beebó Blɔti ablala ebendi kudu na bula adi kemo.”
Amu ka béƒu benye mmɔ ni, bakya beeye lɛlɔ banini, “Bi litemi, lɛdi mɛni?”
Amu na ama bani nnye mmɔ badi básu banini, “Ntɛ mɔɔda-ma, ɔɔɔdi lɛla lɛdi biala lɛdi.”
Mmɔ na Petro ɔ́ta únye na bana leevu-unwi bammɔ akɔ na ɔ́talaku lɛdi katɔ ɔnini, “Amii Yudaƒuɔ ku amii bani nli Yerusalem ƒui, mɔɔyɔ́ ka lidie ala amɛni ƒui kalɔ, anwuɔsu binu kaduɛ.
Ɔɔɔdi ntɛ mɔɔda bekyuli bamɛni. Amii ɔlati bɛɛnu ka ɔtanta lɛdɔ yaalenwi kemo kani bɔkya mɛni.
Mmomu lɛla lɛni na bɛɛnu mɛni ni, ani ndi lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yoel ɔ́su úse kukuuku.

Ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su ɔnii, “ ' “Na emeyi ekplodi kemo ni, Ndubɔtala mina Kɔyu na kɔƒɔ mina bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ kemo. Na bina bebi badubudie-mi kenye, na bina bakloƒu badubɔnu katɔ abɛla, na bina benengu lɛnɔ badubo ana buteegye.
Sɔsɔ ni, mina Kɔyu kɔdubɔƒɔ bina kɔduli beleku ku banana ƒui lɛlɔ kemo. Na emeyi ammɔ kemo ni, badubudie-mi kenye.
Na ndubɔya akɔla budie taatina ataalɛ na kayaa ku kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui. Bɛdubɔnu ubugya ku ogya ku uyɔ pii.
Ɔƒɛ ɔdubɔbla suu, na kɔbuli anumi adubugyie aani ubugya, asa na Katɔ Ɔyikune limeyi bonwu lɛmmɔ lɛdubo.
Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ukyuli biala ɔni makpali Blɔti na wevele-nwu kɔnyana bɔnu ni, ɔdubɔkɛ ngba.” ' ”
“Ati bene biinú? Yesu Nasareni ɔdi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔkɛ údie nwuna ɔyikun ku akɔla bɔbla keyi ɔ́tina-mii aani kalɛ na amii alati lɛnɔ bɛgyi.
Nsu na Ɔti bɔyɔ ku kakali kemo ni, ɔ́nyonu-nwu úte-mii na bɛ́kɛ ekpidi bablane lɛlɔ na bɛ́du-nwu uwi ɔni na bɛ́kana-nwu bɛ́mana ugyii lɛlɔ.
Nsu Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ na ɔ́lɛ kukpi enu kemo, ɔsika kukpi kulakana-nwu lɛkpu bubo buse.
Na Ɔga Dawid ɔ́su úse ɔ́siku-nwu lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Lɛ́nu ka Unwoti unye-mi anumi uwi ƒui. Na ka unye-mi kɔdianu aani mina lɛkpa kalɛ ɔsu ni, lɛɛɛdubo bɔgbanta.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, mina kayi kemo kéyi ku lɛlɔyɔ, na ndubuti kenye nteemwi-nwu uwi ƒui! Ina ka ɔlɔna ndi muedi ni, ndubulie na lɛnunsia kemo.
Na alanyonu mina kɔyu alakya kekpine. Na lɛnɔ ni, alaya ƒula Ubi Kedee ɔlɔna webu.
Átina-mi ƒula ngba lilu, na ƒula kudɔ bɔkya bɔya na mɔɔkɛ́ ebiti geen.'
“Anwuɔsu ni, banwa, mɔɔsu-mii nwaa ka ni, bula Nana Dawid úkpi, na báva-nwu, na nwuna kaƒiɔtɔ kamua kakya bula akɔ mɛni ɔmwi ɔmwi.
Nsu ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene. Na Unwoti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse ka wabla Dawid kaba kemo ubi na wadi lɛga aani Dawid ɔmmɔ kalɛ kani.
Ka Dawid ɔgyi ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́su úse ka ni, Kristo ɔdubɔta ɔlɛ bekpine akɔ. Ɔ́su ɔnii balada-nwu balakya kekpine, na nwuna ɔlɔna lɛnɔ ulebu na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.
Yesu ɔmɛni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ, na litemi geen lɛmɛni lɛlɔ ɔsu na bɔdi kenye bediene.

Na ɔƒaani ni, Katɔti úte-nwu kenyekɔ kenengudi na nwuna kɔdianu, na úti nwuna Kɔyu úte-nwu aani kalɛ na ɔ́su úse. Lɛni na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́tala-ku ɔ́kya-bu. Anwuɔsu na bɛɛnu na biinú lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni.
Ɔɔɔdi Dawid náta úsie katɔ mmɔ. Mmomu ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Unwoti ɔ́su mina Unwoti ɔnii, “Sɔ lie-mi kɔdianu kakɛ wetédu uwi ɔni na meti ƒula bekisine makya-a lɛgba kalɔ.” '
Anwuɔsu mɔɔyá na amii Israelƒuɔ bɛti ka ni, Katɔti nábla Yesu ɔni na amii bɛ́du mɛni ɔnii unwini Blɔti ku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.”
Amu ka bekyuli bamɛni bénu Petro etemila amɛni ni, ékpoku-ma na kayi kemo. Anwuɔsu béye-nwu ku batalane bakladi banii, “Banwa, bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla?”

Amu na Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka bina akɔ ɔdi biala ɔda ekpidi bɔbla ɔya na unwini ubo Blɔti kudɔ, na ɔƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo kalɛ na Katɔti uti nwuna ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-nwu, na ukyuli ɔmmɔ wakɛ Katɔti Kɔyu aani kalɛ na Blɔti ɔ́su úse.
Ɔsika linyese lɛmɛni lise lite amii ku bina bebi ku bani nási ɔgyu ku bekyuli bani ƒui na Katɔti walɔ weboku nwuna kudɔ.”
Amu na Petro ɔ́tɛmiku-ma laa na ɔ́lɛ-ma ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛda lɛlɔ bidie kɔtu bɔni bɔmɛni kemo, bɔni mebo bekyuli bekpidi bamɛni ɔnwa lɛlɔ.”
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bana akɔ pii báƒɔ Petro litemi bádi, na bákpila-ma ntu na Yesu lɛnyi kemo, na bana bumomo bɔbla aani nkyuli mpimu ɛtɛ. Na ama lɛnɔ béti lɛlɔ bebunku baƒɔtaadine bammɔ limeyi lɛmmɔ.
Amu na béti bana uwi ƒui béte batalane bammɔ, na baatina-ma ala, na baakpali katɔ, na baadi taasala lɛnɔ.
Amu na ka batalane bammɔ bábla akɔla budie taatina pii ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla bekyuli bammɔ ƒui yaa na béti ɔbu béte Unwoti.
Na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni bátaasa uwi ndi uwi na beele bana lɛlɔ ala.
Na si béti bana lɛlɔ ala adi béye ni, beeti egulabi ammɔ teele kalɛ na ɔdi biala ɔɔwia.
Na béteesie Katɔti kakpakɔ limeyi ndi limeyi, na bátaasa esu esu lɛnɔ taadi na bana kɔduli na kubiti ku lɛlɔyɔ kemo.
Na baagyá Blɔti enu na beemwi-nwu lɛnɔ. Na bekyuli ƒui baabu-ma. Na limeyi biala ni, Unwoti uuti bekyuli babambadi bani na ɔɔƒɔ́ teebunku-ma lɛlɔ.
Limeyi lɛdi ni, Petro ku Yohane bésie Katɔti kakpakɔ uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ beesié taatákpali katɔ. Ɔbla aani lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo.

Ka bédu kakpakɔ mmɔ na kayakun kani baalɔ banii Kayakun Buni kenye ni, mmɔ na bánu ɔnana ɔdi, ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ ɔ́si nwuna bɔwɔ. Na nwuna bekyuli beeti-nwu taabava mmɔ limeyi ndi limeyi kalɛ na uteevele bekyuli bani muusié mmɔ egulabi.
Ɔni na Petro ku Yohane bási baaví ni, úye-ma ɔnii bete-nwu egulabi adi.
Amu na bédi bénye na bánu-nwu kpoo, na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Nu mɛni!”
Amu na ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́talaku anumi ɔɔnu-ma, na ɔ́bla kasusu ka badubo-nwu lɛla lɛdi bute.
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ami liiibo egulabi adi na mete-ɔ! Nsu ni, ndubute-ɔ lɛlɛni nse-mi! Mɔɔsu-ɔ na Yesu Kristo Nasareni lɛnyi kemo ka ni, ta na esie!”
Na Petro ɔ́da ukyuli ɔmɛni kɔdianu na ɔ́ya na ɔ́ta únye. Amu na nwuna lɛgba ku kasoma ekubi ƒui áyu ɔkplu!
Na ɔ́ba lɛgyu ɔ́kɔ katɔ na úbenye lɛgba lɛlɔ. Na úse kalɔ uusié taavi na ɔɔba agyu na uumwi Blɔti. Na ɔ́siaku-ma útéduo kakpakɔ mmɔ.
Na bekyuli bani nkya mmɔ ni, bánu-nwu na bénu kalɛ na ɔkya uumwi Unwoti.
Ka bábanu-nwu báti ka anwu mɔɔyɔ́ Kayakun Buni kudɔ bulie mmɔ ni, útakɔsi na ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye.

Amu na bekyuli pii békeli bésie-ma kudɔ na kesii kani baalɔ banii Ɔga Salomo lɛgbanya kemo na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Bébo bábanu ka ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔ́tu ɔda Petro ku Yohane kpakplaa na nwuna bɔbwi bɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi!

Amu ka Petro ɔ́nu bekyuli bammɔ ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ, bi mɔɔbla-mii dɛye dɛye pii taasiku lɛla lɛmɛni lɛlɔ lɛni? Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛnu-bu aani bekyuli kedee badi na bɔdi. Bitakali bɛnii abu alati ɔyikun kemo na búti bɔ́bwi ukyuli ɔmɛni!

Ɔsika Unwoti úti ɔbu úte Ubidi Yesu. Na Unwoti ɔmɛni ndi Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob lɛnɔ Ɔti. Na anwu kani ndi bula bati kuuku lɛnɔ Unwoti. Ubidi Yesu ɔmmɔ na amii bíti bíte bɛnii badu. Na bíni-nwu na Pilato anumi bɛnii bɛɛɛgyi-nwu ina ka Pilato ɔ́yɔ ka ɔnyonu-nwu.
Bíni ukyuli ɔbuni mmomu, na bɛ́tuna bɛnii ɔnyonu bekyuli ɔdune na ukyuli ɔbuni ɔmmɔ kenye.
Amii bɛ́ya na bádu ukyuli ɔni muute bekyuli ngba. Nsu Unwoti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ! Na abu alati bɔ́nu-nwu ku bula anumi!
Ɔkɛnku Yesu lɛnyi kemo ɔsu na ɔnana ɔni na bɛgyi na bɛɛnu mɛni ɔ́kɛ lɛlɔkplu. Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ Yesu ɔ́di ɔsu ni, Blɔti ɔ́bwi-nwu na bina anumi.”
“Banwa, ngyi ka tati tati ɔsu na amii ku bina benengu bɛ́bla lɛla lɛmɛni udu.
Nsu ni, Unwoti ɔ́su ka nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi webo abi lɛni. Na ɔmɛni ndi kalɛ na ɔ́ya na nwuna kenye bediene linyese líbo líte.

Anwuɔsu ni, binwini kama bɛkya ekpidi bɔbla na biti anumi bɛsia Unwoti lɛlɔ, kalɛ na waƒɔ bina ekpidi wedie-mii lɛlɔ na bɛkɛ bɔnwuna buɛɛ na Blɔti kudɔ, kalɛ watala Kristo Yesu wakya-mii aani bina Ɔƒɔne kalɛ.
Ɔlɛka Yesu ɔƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya katɔ mmɔ wetédu uwi ɔni na Ɔti wasɔku lɛla biala webese ligeen aani kalɛ na nwuna kenye bediene básu bése.
Ɔsika Mose ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Bina Unwoti Katɔti ɔdubudie kenye udiene ɔdi ɔlɛku bina akɔ aani ami kalɛ. Anwuɔsu binu litemi biala lɛni na wasu-mii.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaadubo nwuna litemi bunu ni, ɔdubukulo kɔna kɔni nkya anwu ku Blɔti bekyuli ntɛ.'
“Sɔsɔ geen ni, Katɔti kenye bediene ƒui ɔ́si Samuel úsela ni, básu ala ani mɔɔlɛ́ ɔmwi mɛni bése kukuuku.
Unwoti nényimi kenye kamɛni ku bina bati ɔkɛ nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ. Na amii ndi bunyimi bɔmɛni ala badine. Ɔ́su Abraham ɔnii ɔkɛ nwuna kaba kemo ni, ɔdubute kayawi ƒui bɔnwuna.
Anwuɔsu ka Katɔti ɔ́gyila Ubidi ni, ɔ́tala-nwu ɔnii ɔka-mii kudɔ bubo bubebunku-mii kalɛ na bɛkana kama bunwini bɔkya bina ekpidi.”
Amu uwi ɔni na Petro ku Yohane benye baatɛmi ku bekyuli bammɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ bakpane badi ku kakpakɔ bagyumanane benengu ku Sadukiƒuɔ lɛnɔ bébo mmɔ.
Ka bénu ka Petro ku Yohane bakya baasu ala taasiku Yesu bɔta lɛlɔ ɔni mɔɔtina ka ukpine ɔdubo bɔta bulie ngba ni, béti kɔnyi geen!
Anwuɔsu béƒie-ma. Na ka kadi kábɔyu ɔsu ni, bákya-ma ɔtɔ útédu lɛdigye.
Nsu bekyuli pii bani nénu bana etemila amɛni kemo ni, báƒɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni bádi. Na bana bumomo bɔbla aani banana mpimu ɛlɔ.
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, úbebo úte ka Yudaƒuɔ kadi lɛlɔ badine ku kadi benengu ku ɔda bubo ala batinane badi bása na Yerusalem.
Bábasala ku Ɔkpane Unengudi Hana ku Kaiaƒa ku Yohane ku Aleksandro ku Ɔkpane Unengudi lɛlɔ bekyuli badi lɛnɔ.
Na bédie batalane bamɛni béboku bana anumi mmɔ. Na béye-ma banini, “Ulu ɔmani lɛlɔ na bɛ́bla ɔmɛni? Ɔma lɛnyi ku ɔyikun kemo na bɛ́bla ala amɛni udu?”
Mmɔ kani ni, Petro ɔ́ta na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bula batɔnkune ku ɔma benengu,
si bɛɛwia kenye budie na lɛla lɛbuni lɛni na bɔ́bla búte ukyuli ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ mɛni ku kalɛ na búti bɔ́bwi-nwu ni,

bite-mi kuƒi na lɛsu amii ku Israel kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli ƒui lɛla lɛdi. Ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo ɔni nási Nasaret lɛnyi kemo ɔni na amii bɛ́ya na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na Unwoti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine ɔsu na ukyuli ɔmɛni lɛlɔ lɛ́yu ɔkplu.
Na Yesu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na Bunweni Kedee bɔɔsu taasiku bɔnii, 'Lɛtabi lɛni na amii batune bíni bɛ́va ni, ani nébo líbenwini lɛtabi lɛni náƒɔ kuye lítulo na atabi ƒui akɔ.'
Anwu lɛti ndi bekyuli Ɔƒɔne, ɔsika anwu kani na Unwoti úte lɛnyi ku ɔyikun na bekyuli ƒui akɔ ɔni makana waƒɔ-bu ngba.”

Ka lɛlɔ badine ku benengu bammɔ bánu kalɛ na Petro ku Yohane bábla kayi ku ɔtɔtɔ ku kalɛ na lɛkpaklɔ bekyuli badi na beeebo kenyekɔ kadi lɛnɔ na kadi akɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-ma kalɛ kadi. Na bánu báti ka ama ku Yesu ni, bavinkpana na badi.
Nsu ka bánu ukyuli ɔni na bábwi na bana anumi mmɔ ɔsu ni, bátakana lɛla lɛdi bɔsu.
Amu na báda-ma bédie kasalakɔ mmɔ, na ama lɛti lɛti bakya beeye lɛlɔ kasusu.
Badi béye banii, “Bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla ku bekyuli bamɛni? Bulakana buni bɔnii lɛla lɛni na bábla mɛni lɛɛɛdi akɔla budie taatina, ɔsika ukyuli biala na Yerusalem ɔgyi na únu litemi lɛmɛni.
Mmomu bɛya bubo-ma ɔda na bada litemi lɛmɛni bugyingya baya kalɛ na basɔ balasu ukyuli ɔdi litemi lɛdi na Yesu lɛnyi kemo.”
Na básɔ bálɔ-ma béboku bana kasalakɔ mmɔ na bábala-ma ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛni ni, basɔ batasu ukyuli ɔdi litemi na Yesu lɛnyi kemo.
Amu na Petro ku Yohane bédie kenye banini, “Amii alati bɛbu bɛnu. Bi mada Unwoti kubiti? Si bunu bina ɔda bubo munuu Unwoti bɔdi?
Lɛla lɛni na bɔ́nu na búnu ni, bulakana kenye bubile na bɔsɔ bulie kpoo.”
Amu na kasalakɔ benengu bammɔ bádɔnku-ma kaduɛ na báda-ma bányonu. Na ka bekyuli bammɔ ƒui bakya beemwi Unwoti na nwuna ablala ɔsu ni, bátakɛ lɛkwɛ lɛni lɛlɔ basia bani-ma kɔtu.
Na ukyuli ɔni na bábwi mmɔ ɔdubɔƒɔ utulo akwa aavlene.
Uwi ɔni na bánya báda-ma bányonu ni, Petro ku Yohane bésie bana badi bammɔ kudɔ na básu-ma kalɛ na kasalakɔ kammɔ bekyuli básu-ma.
Amu na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bása lisu na bákpali Unwoti banii, “O Ati, awɔ nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani ƒui nkya-nya kemo.
Akɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ na étemi ásiaku ƒula kabla ɔblane Dawid lɛlɔ anini, 'Bi ɔsu na bayawine baakya lɛsɛ, na bekyuli baasa lili kekeeke?
Kayawi baga bábla unwi na benye beekpóku awɔ ku ƒula Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi.'
Ɔdi litemi geen ka Herode ku Pontio Pilato ku Israelƒuɔ ku bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ básala lɛlɔ na ɔma ɔmɛni kemo, na báta bénye ƒ^ubidi Yesu ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi Kedee ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Nsu, awɔ, na ƒula ɔyikun ku lɛnunda kemo ni, énye ánu na básala bábla ala ani na ásu ése.
Na ɔƒaani ni, O Ati, nu liƒu lɛni na badaku-bu bɔkya, na ete abu, ƒula kabla bablane, kayi buse na bɔkana litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔsu.
Tuku bekyuli na abwi-ma, na abla akɔla pii ebu na ƒ^ubidi Yesu Kedee lɛnyi kemo.”
Ka bévele Unwoti ɔmɛni báwɔlɔ ni, ɔtɔ ɔni kemo na bakya mmɔ ɔ́kunku na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ bana ƒui lɛlɔ kemo, na bése kalɔ baasu litemi buni lɛmɛni ku kayi buse.
Na emeyi amɛni kemo ni, baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bábla unwi na udu ku kasusu kemo, na bana akɔ ɔdi biala útasusu anwu lɛti lɛkɛ. Mmomu ni, bana lɛla biala lɛdi bana ƒui lɛdi.
Na batalane bamɛni bákɔ Unwoti litemi lɛsa ku kayi geen básiku Blɔti Yesu bɔta bɔlɛ bekpine akɔ lɛlɔ. Na Unwoti keyi buɛɛ ku kusɛ kusɛ ɔkya-ma akɔ.
Na ɔdi biala ɔɔɔdi ɔwabane, ɔsika ama bani mbo lɛtɔ ku kɔlɔ ni, béti ala amɛni béye.
Na béti egulabi amɛni bátákya batalane bammɔ lɛkɔkɔ na béle-nya béte bana akɔ ɔdi biala kalɛ na ɔɔwia.
Amu na ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni baalɔ Yoseƒ na ɔ́si Lewi kaba kemo na Kipro kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na batalane bamɛni básia-nwu lɛnyi banii Barnaba ɔni kalɔ ndi Ogya Ɔkyane.
Anwu lɛnɔ úti nwuna kalɔ úye na úti egulabi ammɔ úboku batalane bammɔ.
Amu na ɔnana ɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́kya ɔni baalɔ Anania, na ulekudi ndi Saƒira. Ama lɛnɔ béti bana kalɔ kadi béye.
Na béti egulabi ammɔ adi bábala, na béti akladi béboku batalane bammɔ. Na ulekudi Saƒira lɛnɔ ɔgyi, na ɔ́tuna ka babla lɛni. Na Anania úti egulabi amɛni úboku úbakya batalane lɛkɔkɔ.
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Anania, bi ɔsu na áya na Satan ɔdi-ɔ lɛlɔ, na ɔ́ya-a na aanyi ɔkɔ taatɔlɔ Katɔti Kɔyu? Na ébu ƒula kalɔ kani na éti éye mmɔ egulabi adi ése éte lɛlɔ?
Awɔ mbo kalɔ kammɔ asa néti-ka éye, na egulabi ani na báƒɔ-ɔ kayu mmɔ lɛnɔ adi ƒ^ɔdi. Bi náya-a na ábla kakali kekpidi kamɛni udu? Ɔɔɔdi abu bekyuli na ányi ɔkɔ átina, mmomu Katɔti!”
Amu ka Anania ɔ́nya únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, anwu kani na úbuli ɔ́tɛ kalɔ, na úkpi! Na ɔmɛni ɔ́da bekyuli bani nánu ƒui liƒu.
Amu na bakloƒu bani nkya-ma akɔ mmɔ béti kɔdi bébi-nwu lɛlɔ na bágyu-nwu bátáva.
Amu na uwi klukui ɔdi kama ni, ulekudi lɛnɔ ɔ́da úbalɛ mmɔ ɔni na anwu ɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni nálɛ.
Amu na Petro úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔni na awɔ ku ƒ^ɔgyani bíti bina kalɔ bíye ni, egulabi ani na báƒɔ-mii kayu ƒui na adi mɛni?” Amu na uleku ɔmmɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, ana ƒui mmɔ.”
Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na awɔ ku ƒ^ɔgyani bɛ́kana bɛ́sa kenye bɛnii bɛɛsɔ Blɔti Kɔyu bɛnu? Aanu bakloƒu bani néti ƒ^ɔgyani bátáva. Ama kani ndubo-ɔ bɔgyu bɔlɛku.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, anwu lɛnɔ úbuli ɔ́tɛ kalɔ, na úkpi. Amu ka bakloƒu bammɔ bébo bábanu ka úkpi ɔ́tɛ ni, bágyu anwu lɛnɔ bálɛku bátáva ɔgyani kudɔ mmɔ kani.
Anwuɔsu liƒu líduo baƒɔtaadine bammɔ ku bekyuli bani nénu lɛla lɛni nálɛ na mmɔ ƒui akɔ.
Amu na uwi ɔmɛni ƒui ni, batalane bamɛni bátaabla akɔla pii na bekyuli bammɔ akɔ. Baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui baasa na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na kesii kani baalɔ banii Salomo lɛgbanya kemo.
Nsu anumi lɛlɔ baƒɔtaadine babambadi bátakana-ma kudɔ bɔkpɛ bude, ina ka baabu baƒɔtaadine bammɔ.
Na bekyuli pii, banana ku beleku, bénwini kama bákya bana alaekpidi bɔbla na báƒɔ Blɔti lɛnyi bádi.
Na bana badi béti balɛne bátáva atala lɛlɔ na keyi, kesii kani na báƒɔ bádi ka si Petro ɔ́si ɔɔví na nwuna kɔyu kúwi balɛne bamɛni lɛlɔ ni, ɔlɛ ɔni beeƒi waba-ma!
Amu na béti balɛne ku bekyuli bani na ayu ekpidi eekpóku-ma ƒui básiku lɛma lɛni nkya Yerusalem amadɔ béboku-ma kudɔ na bábwi-ma ƒui.
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ ɔkpane unengudi ku nwuna lɛlɔ bekyuli bani nási lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ banii Sadukiƒuɔ kemo ni, bése kalɔ beekpóku batalane bammɔ kogyulo.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, béƒie-ma na béti-ma bátákya ɔtɔ.
Nsu usientɛ ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbalɛmi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kayakun na ɔ́da-ma údie.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Biteesie Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na bitátaasu etemila taasiku ngba bɔwɔdi bɔmɛni lɛlɔ!”

Amu ka kadi kégye ni, bésie bétéduo kakpakɔ mmɔ na bése kalɔ ku ala bɔtina. Anwuɔsu uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔkpane unengudi ku nwuna babune bálɔ lɛlɔ ku Yudaƒuɔ kadi benengu ƒui básala, na bátala bagyumanane banii betédie batalane bammɔ na ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ beboku.
Nsu uwi ɔni na bésie mmɔ ni, bátatánu-ma! Anwuɔsu básɔ bénwini bábasu-ma banini,
“Ka búsie ni, bábala ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ bényene, na bagyumanane benye kayakun. Nsu ka bálɛmi ni, ukyuli biala ɔdi uuubo ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo!”
Uwi ɔni na kakpakɔ bagyumanane unengu ku bakpane benengu bamɛni bénu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da-ma geen sɔsɔ, ɔsika baaagyi lɛla lɛni nsɔ mebo.
Amu na ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́si úbo na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani na béƒie bákya ɔtɔ ni, aanu-ma nkya kakpakɔ baatina ala.”
Mmɔ mmɔ na bagyumanane unengu ku nwuna badi báta bésie kakpakɔ mmɔ bétéƒie-ma béboku. Nsu ka baayia ka bekyuli badubo-ma atabi bubo ɔsu ni, bátani-ma ku ɔkplu.
Amu ka béti batalane bammɔ bébenyene-ma anumi ni,

ɔkpane unengudi úye-ma ɔnini, “Bútasu-mii bɔnii bɛsɔ bitasu litemi lɛdi bitasiku Yesu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ iye? Nsu bíigyingya etemila amɛni bíyile Yerusalem ƒui. Na bɛɛwia ka biti nwuna kukpi kɔtu bɔni bɛsia-bu lɛlɔ!”
Mmɔ na Petro ku batalane bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Ɔlɛka bɔka Unwoti bɔbu asa bɔbu bekyuli bayawine.
Yesu ɔni na amii bɛ́ya na bákana bámana ugyii lɛlɔ na úkpi ni, bula bati kuuku Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo uli ngba.
Katɔti úte-nwu kenyekɔ kenengudi na nwuna kɔdianu. Na úti-nwu ɔ́bla Ɔgadine ku Ɔƒɔne kalɛ na Israelƒuɔ bakɛ kuƒi benwini bana kɔyi, na bakɛ ekpidi butitaakyiɛ.
Na abu ku Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni na Katɔti uuti teete bekyuli bani mɔɔbu-nwu ni, abu ndi ala amɛni kenye bediene.”
Ka bénu kenye kamɛni ni, ɔ́ya na básɔ bákɛ kɔnyi geen, na bábla kasusu ka badu batalane bammɔ.

Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ bammɔ kemo unwi ɔni na baalɔ Gamaliel ɔ́bala-ma. Baaƒalɛ ukyuli ɔmɛni kaduɛ, ɔsika ɔdi Mose ɔda bubo ala ɔtinane. Anwu náta únye na ɔ́su ɔnii bada-ma bedie mmɔ asa na ama bakladi bataatɛmi.
Anwuɔsu ɔ́tɛmi úte-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ, bɛnu kaduɛ na ala ani na bɛɛyɔ́ ka bɛbla bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ!

Uwi ɔdi nábavi ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔni na baalɔ Teuda ɔni nábla lɛlɔ aani si ukyuli unengudi ɔdi na ɔdi. Nkyuli eti maane básiaku-nwu kama. Amu ka bádu-nwu ni, nwuna kama basiakune bamɛni bégyingya na nwuna kasala kammɔ káyii udu.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, na bekyuli bɔka lebo ni, Yuda ɔni nási Galilea ɔ́kpanku bekyuli badi úbunku lɛlɔ aani nwuna kama basiakune. Na anwu lɛnɔ úbekpi na nwuna kama basiakune bamɛni bégyingya.
Anwuɔsu lɛla lɛni na ami mɔɔsu-mii ndi ka ni, bɛnyonu bekyuli bamɛni. Si ala ani baatina ku ala ani baabla adi ama ɔlati adi ni, uwi uletu asa na ala amɛni adubugyingya.
Nsu si Katɔti ablala na adi ni, bulakana-ma bɔbala. Si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, diɛdi bɛdubɔnu ka bunye buukpóku Katɔti ɔlati!”

Na kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ báƒɔ Gamaliel litemi lɛmɛni. Anwuɔsu ni, bálɔ batalane bamɛni béboku bana akɔ, na bébo-ma. Na básu-ma banii basɔ batasu litemi biala batasiku Yesu lɛlɔ kudii. Amu na bányonu-ma.
Na ka bésela ni, kubiti kɔ́da-ma kaduɛ, ɔsika bánu ka Katɔti ɔ́ka-ma ɔ́kya bekyuli bani muubó abi ku kɔƒa na Yesu ɔsu.
Na ɔmɛni kama ni, limeyi biala bátaasu ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ku bekyuli kɔduli.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ɔni na batɛyane bamɛni beemomo teebu ni, unyeƒi úbebo Yudaƒuɔ bani na beetemi Griki lɛdi ku Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ geen ntɛ. Ɔsika si béle adila ni, eledu Grikiƒuɔ bekpinele.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bálɔ batɛyane bammɔ ƒui na básu-ma banini, “Ɔlɛka buti bula uwi bute litemi buni bɔsu, na ɔɔɔdi adila bɔdi etemila lɛlɔ.

Na ɔƒaani ni, banwa, bɛnu bɛmana na bidie nkyuli maatɛ bani náda anu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na bɔdubuti-ma buse kabla kamɛni kenye kalɛ na abu bɔkɛ uwi bute Katɔti bɔkpali ku litemi buni bɔsu ku ala bɔtina.”

Litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́dia bana ƒui bunu, anwuɔsu bédie Steƒano ɔni ndi ukyuli ɔni mbo bɔƒɔtaadi na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na bédie Ƒilipo ku Prokoro ku Nikanor ku Timon ku Parmena ku ɔƒɔ ɔni nénwini Yudani ɔni baalɔ Nikolao ɔni nási Antiokia lɛnɔ bébunku-nwu.
Nkyuli maatɛ bamɛni na bédie bátina batalane bamɛni. Na ama lɛnɔ bákpali katɔ na bana lili. Na béti enu básia-ma lɛlɔ bévele keyi buɛɛ béte-ma.
Amu na bekyuli pii báƒɔ Katɔti litemi buni. Na baƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ bémomo na Yerusalem bébu. Na Yudaƒuɔ bakpane pii badi lɛnɔ bénwini basiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔmmɔ kama.
Amu na Steƒano ɔni na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui mɛni ni, ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina pii na bekyuli akɔ.
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bani nálɛ bekyuli bamba kabla bɔbla kalɔ na bási Kirene ku Aleksandria ku bani nási Kilikia ku Asia bákya ku Steƒano unyeƒi.
Nsu bana akɔ ɔdi biala útakana-nwu kenye bunye ɔ́si nwuna lɛnunda ku litela lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kúte-nwu ɔsu.
Anwuɔsu bátása lili ku bekyuli badi banii babanyi ɔkɔ basia-nwu basu banii, “Búnu ka Steƒano uutemi taata teenye Mose ku Katɔti lɛnɔ muedi lɛlɔ.”
Linyeda lɛmɛni lɛ́ya na bekyuli bamɛni bébeti kɔnyi geen. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune béƒie-nwu na béti-nwu bésienku bana kasalakɔ.
Amu na bekyuli bani náda-nwu kenye mɛni básɔ bábada Steƒano kenye ka ni, “Uutemi teewi kakpakɔ kamɛni uwi biala ku Mose ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.
Na búnu ka ɔ́su lɛnɔ ɔnii ukyuli ɔni nási Nasaret na baalɔ-nwu banii Yesu mmɔ ni, ɔdubɔƒɛ Katɔti ɔtɔ ɔmɛni na wavumana Mose ɔda bubo bɔni na úte-bu.”
Na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bekyuli bani nnye mmɔ bánu ka Steƒano anumi eekeye aani Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi kalɛ.
Amu na ɔkpane unengudi úye Steƒano ɔnini, “Ala ani na básu básiku-ɔ lɛlɔ mɛni ni, sɔsɔ na adi?”
Amu na Steƒano údie kenye ɔnini, “Ati bene ku mina banwa, binu kaduɛ ka ni, Katɔti údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina bula Nana Abraham na Mesopotamia kalɔ lɛlɔ asa na ɔ́ta mmɔ úsie kalɔ kani baalɔ Haran lɛlɔ.
Mmɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ta na atɔlɔ ƒula bekyuli akɔ ku ƒula kalɔ lɛlɔ na eteesie kesii kani na matina-a!'
“Anwuɔsu ɔ́ta ɔ́lɛ Kaldea kalɔ lɛlɔ na úsie útélie Haran útédu uwi ɔni na ɔti úkpi. Amu na Katɔti útiku-nwu úboku kesii kani bilie ɔmwi mɛni.

Katɔti útete Abraham kadikɔ kadi mmɔ, ina kalɔ blii suɛ muedi. Nsu ni, ɔ́su-nwu úse ka kalɔ kammɔ kadubɔbla anwu ku nwuna bawɔ bawɔ kadi diɛdi, ina ka útawɔ tɔ ubi ɔdi úti úbedu ku uwi ɔmmɔ kemo!

Lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu úse ka ni, nwuna bawɔ ƒui badubo baƒɔ bunwini na bekyuli badi kalɔ lɛlɔ, ɔni na badubunwini bekyuli bammɔ kabla bablane na bakya-ma kalɔ na lɛbibo kemo akwa eti maane sɔɔn.
Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Ndubɔtɛku bekyuli bani kalɔ na bakya baabla-ma kabla mmɔ litemi. Na nwuna kama ni, badubɔlɛ kalɔ kammɔ kemo na badubɔkpa-mi na kalɔ kani bulie mɛni lɛlɔ.'

Amu na Katɔti úti lego bukulo linyese úte Abraham uwi ɔmmɔ kemo aani lɛla lɛni makya anwu Katɔti ku Abraham bawɔ ntɛ. Na Abraham úbawɔ Isak na úkulo-nwu lego uwi ɔni na ɔ́ƒɔ emeyi maane. Isak lɛnɔ úbawɔ Yakob, na Yakob lɛnɔ ɔ́wɔ bebi leevu-inyɔ bani nábawɔ Yudaƒuɔ adua leevu-anyɔ ammɔ ƒui.
“Yakob bebi bamɛni anumi égyie na bana ɔnwani Yoseƒ lɛlɔ. Na béƒie-nwu béye béte bekyuli bani néti-nwu bésienku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́siaku-nwu,

na únyeku-nwu na ɔ́da-nwu údie nwuna lɛbibo ku kɔnyana buwulo kemo. Katɔti úte-nwu lɛnunda bonwu. Anwuɔsu Egyipte Ɔga Ƒarao ɔ́yɔ-nwu litemi na úti-nwu ɔ́bla Egyipte kalɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ɔnune ku nwuna kaduli ƒui ala lɛlɔ ɔnune lɛnɔ.
“Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, kɔka kubendi kɔdi kɔ́kya na Egyipte ku Kanaan kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui, na kɔnyana buwulo geen búbo bula bati bene lɛlɔ.
Uwi ɔni na bana adila áasa ƒui ni, Yakob únu ka adila adi akya Egyipte, anwuɔsu ɔ́tala nwuna bebi ɔnii besie betéye adi beboku-nwu.
Na ka Yakob bebi básɔ bésie mmɔ kunyɔdi banii betéye adila ni, Yoseƒ údie nwuna lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-ma, na údie-ma ɔ́tina Ɔga Ƒarao.
Amu na Yoseƒ ɔ́kada-ma ɔnii si bésie ni, na betiku ɔti Yakob ku Yoseƒ banwani ƒui ku bana lɛlɔ bekyuli beboku Egyipte. Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, bana ƒui bumomo bɔbla liti ku aavlanyɔ-ɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu Yakob ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Egyipte na úlie mmɔ útédu uwi ɔni na úkpi. Na nwuna bebi bananabi lɛnɔ bélie mmɔ bétédu uwi ɔni na békpi.
Na básɔku bana ƒui bésienku ɔma ɔni baalɔ Sekem. Na bátáva-ma mmɔ na kaƒiɔtɔ kani na Abraham úye ɔ́siku Hamor kaba kudɔ kemo.
“Uwi ɔni na linyese lɛni na Katɔti úse úte Abraham lɛdaku budu ni, bula kadi bekyuli béemomo na Egyipte.
Úbebo lɛnɔ ka Ɔga Ƒarao ɔwɔdi ɔni mɔɔdi Egyipte lɛlɔ ni, ɔɔɔgyi Yoseƒ.
Ƒarao ɔmɛni ɔ́bla bula kadi bekyuli bamɛni kalala na únye-ma lɛlɔ na beeti bana bebiwɔ teetévaakun na beekpi.
“Uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani na báwɔ Mose. Na bánu ka ɔdi ubi ɔni ndia geen. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, nwuna bawɔne béti-nwu bábala na kaduli abuli atɛ sɔɔn.
Na uwi ɔni na basɔ balákana-nwu bɔbala ni, ɔlɛka bada-nwu bedie bana kudɔ. Amu na Ƒarao ubidi ulekubi útákɛ-nwu na úti-nwu ɔ́bla aani nwuna kaƒɔ ubi.
Ɔ́da-nwu na ɔ́tina-nwu Egyipteƒuɔ ala bɔbla ku bana kɔkwɛ ƒui, na ɔ́lɛ lili úbabla ukyuli geen na butemi ku kabla lidu pii kemo.
“Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ akwa aavlene ni, úbo-nwu kasusu kemo ka ɔlɛka usie utégyele nwuna banwani Israelƒuɔ.
Amu na uwi ɔni na úsie mmɔ ni, ɔ́nu Egyipteni ɔdi ka ɔkya ɔɔbla Israelni ɔdi kalala. Na Mose ɔ́du Egyipteni ɔmɛni.
Mose ɔ́kali ka nwuna banwani badubɔkali banii Katɔti nátala-nwu ɔni ubebunku-ma, nsu bátakali lɛni.
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, ɔ́sɔ úsie-ma kudɔ na útánu Israelƒuɔ inyɔ ka bakya beekpó. Úsie útáda-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, 'Ati bene, banwani na bɛdi, anwuɔsu útalɛka biteekpoku lɛlɔ.'
“Nsu ukyuli ɔni náƒiɔ na nkyuli inyɔ bamɛni kemo ni, údi Mose na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Taatɛku awɔ lɛdi! Ɔma nédie-ɔ bula lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bula litemi ɔtɛne?
Munuu aayɔ́ ka adu-mi aani kalɛ na ádu Egyipteni ɔni kamaadi kalɛ?'
Ka Mose únu litemi lɛmɛni ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen. Anwuɔsu úkeli útábɛ na Midian kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na mmɔ na ɔ́wɔ nwuna bebi bananabi inyɔ.
“Akwa aavlene kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ogya ɔni mɔɔda na liyu kugyii blii kɔdi lɛlɔ na Sinai Kɔbi ketele kemo.
Ka Mose ɔ́nu ɔmɛni ni, útati lɛla lɛni na lɛdi. Na uwi ɔni na úsela ɔnii utánu lɛla lɛni lɛdi ni, Unwoti ɔ́lɔ-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini,
'Ami ndi ƒula bati kuuku Abraham ku Isak ku Yakob bene Unwoti.' Amu na lɛlɔ lɛ́tɔ Mose ku bɔyia ɔni na ɔsɔ útakana mmɔ bɔnu.
“Amu na Unwoti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Da ƒula lɛgbanvuo die! Ɔsika kalɔ kedee lɛlɔ na enye.
Sɔsɔ ni, lɛ́nu lɛbibo lɛni kemo na mina bekyuli bakya na Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na muunú bana keku kani na beewulo taakpali-mi. Anwuɔsu lɛ́yu líbo nnii medie-ma. Bo, na lɛtala-a Egyipte.'

“Mose ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni na bátu kenye banii, 'Ɔma nédie-ɔ bula lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bula litemi ɔtɛne?' Anwu Mose ɔmmɔ kani na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔnii usie na utábla bana lɛlɔ ɔdine ku bana ɔƒɔne ɔkɛnku Katɔti ɔtu ɔni na ɔ́nu na ketele kemo mmɔ kebunku lɛlɔ.
Anwu nédie-ma na Egyipte ɔkɛ akɔla budie taatina pii kemo ani na ɔ́bla na Egyipte mmɔ ku Ɛpu Ugyiedi kɔtu ku uwi ɔni na bakɛ ketele kemo akwa aavlene sɔɔn.
“Mose ɔmmɔ ɔlatidi násu Israelƒuɔ ɔnini, 'Katɔti ɔdubudie kenye udiene ɔdi aani ami kalɛ, na ɔdubudie-nwu ɔlɛku bina kaba kemo.'

Mose ndi ukyuli ɔni násala bula bati kuuku uwi ɔni na Israelƒuɔ bákya ketele mmɔ. Na anwu ndi ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔtu ɔ́tɛmiku na Sinai Kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na anwu náƒɔ Unwoti litemi lɛni muute ngba úboku-bu.
“Nsu ni, bula bati bénwini kama bákya Mose ɔni na báyɔ ka basɔ benwini beteesie Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Amu na bana ƒui básu Mose ɔnwani Aaron banini, 'Bla baƒiɔ bani matɔnku-bu te-bu, ɔsika bɔɔɔgyi lɛla lɛni nálɛku Mose ɔni nákpanku-bu ɔ́siku Egyipte.'
Anwuɔsu bábla baƒiɔ badi aani akɔ ubi, na baakpá-nwu, na bádi limeyi ku ebiti na lɛla lɛni na bábla mɛni ɔsu.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Katɔti únwini kama ɔ́kya-ma, na ɔ́nyonu-ma. Na bákya bátaakpa ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo banini, 'Israelƒuɔ, ɔɔɔdi ami na bíti bebuo ku baƒonu bɛ́bla akpala bíte akwa aavlene ani na bɛ́kya ketele kemo mmɔ.
Mmomu bíti Molok lɛbi ku Romƒa ayabi ani ndi baƒiɔ bani na bɛ́vɔ bíse bɛnii bitaakpa. Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na beƒie-mii besienku ɔgyu kakaaka na Babilon kama ngye ƒui.'
“Bula bati kuuku bágyu Katɔti kevo béti na ɔ́tɔnku-ma na ketele kemo. Bátu ɔtɔ ɔmɛni aani kalɛ na Katɔti údie ɔ́tina Mose mmɔ kalɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Na akwa pii kama ni, Yosua ɔ́tɔnku bula bati bani nágyu kevo kamɛni béti na bétékpo-ku bekyuli bani na Katɔti ɔ́bɔku ɔ́lɛku kɔlɔ kɔmɛni lɛlɔ. Mmɔ na kevo kamɛni káƒɔ lɛlɔ kése úti útédu Ɔga Dawid uwi.
Katɔti úbunku Dawid kaduɛ. Anwuɔsu Dawid úye Unwoti ɔnii nka ute-nwu kuƒi na ɔtu keliekɔ geen use ute anwu ɔni ndi Yakob Katɔti.
Nsu ni, Salomo geen nátu keliekɔ kammɔ.
“Nsu Katɔti ulélie ɔtɔ ɔni na bekyuli bayawine bátu kemo. Unwoti ɔ́kɛnku nwuna kenye bediene lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini,
'Katɔ ndi mina lɛgaboku, na kalɔ ndi mina lɛgba kanyakɔ. Na bi ɔtɔ udu na bɛdubɔkana-mi bɔtu bute, munuu mɔɔyaki keliekɔ kadi?
Ɔɔɔdi ami nédie ala amɛni ƒui yoo?' ”
Amu na Steƒano ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Batuɔkplune geen bɛdi! Amii lɛnɔ bɛɛda atu teedie Katɔti litemi lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na bina bati bábla kalɛ. Uwi ndi uwi bɛɛta teenye Katɔti Kɔyu lɛlɔ.
Katɔti kenye udiene ɔmani na bina bati kuuku bátawia ka badu? Bádu Katɔti kenye bediene bani muedi násu ka Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni nse siin webo. Na Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ bídie-nwu bíte na bádu.
Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka bɛgyi ƒui na bíni Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔni na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́siku Unwoti ɔtu enu kemo.”
Ka bénu etemila ani na Steƒano ɔ́su ɔ́siku-ma lɛlɔ ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da-ma geen na ɔ́ya bákya baadu anyi ku kɔnyi.
Nsu ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ Steƒano lɛlɔ kemo ƒui ɔsu ni, ɔ́talaku anumi ɔ́nu katɔ laa, na ɔ́nu Katɔti bukeye ku Yesu ɔni nnye-nwu kɔdianu.
Amu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Mɔɔnu ka katɔ kébimi na Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi unye Katɔti kɔdianu!”
Amu na báyoli momoomo na bétile bana atuƒi, na békeli bétéƒie-nwu.
Na bákpɛ-nwu bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, na bákya-nwu anumi ku atabi bubo. Na bekyuli bani nákpɛ-nwu bálɛku ni, bédie bana lɛwu béti béwi okloƒu ɔkɔdi ɔni baalɔ Saulo lɛgba lɛlɔ.
Na uwi ɔni na bakya beebó-nwu atabi ni, Steƒano ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Blɔti Yesu, ƒɔ mina kɔyu.”
Amu na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kpali katɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Unwoti, teti bɔƒiɔ bɔmɛni tete-ma, énu!” Na ka útemi ɔ́su lɛni ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́lɛ úbo kalɔ na ɔ́yula.

Na uwi ɔni na bakya baadú Steƒano ni, Saulo ɔ́kya-ma ogya. Na ɔ́si limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bése kalɔ beekpóku baƒɔtaadine bamɛni na Yerusalem. Amu na bana ƒui békeli bésie Yudea ku Samaria. Nsu batalane ama bébu bakya mmɔ.
Amu na Yesu basiakune badi béti Steƒano bátáva ku keku.
Amu na Saulo úti ɔ́sia lɛlɔ na uukpóku baƒɔtaadine bammɔ na ɔkɛ kɔduli uuƒie banana ku beleku taavinku-ma taatákya ɔtɔ.
Nsu baƒɔtaadine bani nékeli bási Yerusalem mɛni ni, bakɛ baaví kesii biala taasu Blɔti litemi buni.
Na Ƒilipo anwu ni, úsie Samaria útásu bekyuli litemi buni lɛmmɔ ɔ́siku Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi lɛlɔ.
Na bekyuli pii bénu etemila ani na ɔɔsu ɔ́si akɔla budie taatina pii ani na ɔ́bla na bánu ɔsu.
Ɔ́bɔku ayu ekpidi pii ɔ́lɛku bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo, na ayu ekpidi amɛni áva momoomo asa na ávi álɛ-ma lɛlɔ kemo. Amu na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́bwi bani na lɛlɔ kakɛ kenwi kékpi-ma ku ama bani náƒɛ bewi kalɔ lɛnɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, kubiti kɔ́kya Samaria ɔma ɔmɛni kemo geen!
Ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́kya Samaria ɔni baalɔ Simon, na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔƒɛ evo. Na nwuna evo bɔbla útaabla bekyuli kalɛ kadi. Na úteeƒu ɔnii ɔdi ukyuli ɔdi na nwuna ala bɔnu taasu ɔsu.
Samariaƒuɔ banana ku beleku ƒui baabu-nwu ɔ́si nwuna lɛlɔ bɔtina kabla kamɛni ɔsu. Anwuɔsu básu básiku-nwu lɛlɔ banini, “Anwu ndi katɔ ɔyikun ɔni baalɔ banii Ɔyikun Unengudi.”
Amu ka nwuna evo bɔbla áƒɔ-ma anu ɔsu ni, béteenu-nwu litemi.
Nsu ɔƒaani ni, báƒɔ Ƒilipo kenye bɔsu mmomu bádi ɔ́si Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ku Yesu lɛlɔ. Na banana ku beleku pii báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo.
Amu na Simon ɔmɛni ɔlati lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di. Na ka ɔ́ƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmɛni ni, útaasiaku Ƒilipo kesii biala na úsela. Na ɔkɛnku akɔla budie taatina ani na ɔ́bla ɔsu ni, ɔ́bla-nwu dɛye dɛye!
Amu na uwi ɔni na batalane bani nkya Yerusalem bénu ka Samariaƒuɔ báƒɔ Katɔti litemi bádi ni, bátala Petro ku Yohane na bana kudɔ.
Ka bétéduo ni, bákpali katɔ béte Kristoƒuɔ bawɔdi bamɛni kalɛ na baƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
Ɔsika úbalɛ uwi ɔmmɔ ni, bátaƒɔ tɔ Katɔti Kɔyu. Na ntu kani na bákpila-ma na Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi kemo.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Petro ku Yohane béti enu básia-ma eli, na ama lɛnɔ báƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.
Ka Simon ɔ́nu ka si batalane bamɛni béti enu básia-ma eli na baaƒɔ́ Katɔti Kɔyu ni, úti egulabi ɔnii uute batalane bamɛni na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini,
“Bɛya na ami lɛnɔ lɛkɛ ɔyikun ɔmɛni ɔdi kalɛ na si líti enu lɛ́sia ɔdi biala lɛlɔ ni, na ɔƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu.”
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Awɔ ku ƒula egulabi ƒui bɛdubɔnuku-ni. Takali anii adubɔkana Unwoti litela buye ku egulabi.
Alakana kalabla kamɛni kemo bɔkya, ɔsika ƒula kayi keeese siin na Katɔti anumi.
Da anumi die kasusu kekpidi kamɛni lɛlɔ na akpali katɔ. Ɔƒaalɛ Katɔti ɔdubuti ƒula likpidi ɔkyiɛ-ɔ na ƒula kasusu kekpidi kamɛni lɛlɔ.
Ɔsika ni, mɔɔnu ka ebo lɛnungyie likpidi, na likpidi bɔbla lɛnɔ lɛ́di-ɔ lɛlɔ!”
Amu na Simon ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Biveleku-mi kalɛ na ɔgbankpi ubendi ɔmɛni udu ulálɛku-mi.”

Amu uwi ɔni na Petro ku Yohane bédie Unwoti kenye na básu-ma litemi buni lɛmmɔ na Samaria ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Yerusalem, na bakɛ beedí teenye na lɛma lɛni nde Samaria kemo taasu-ma litemi buni.
Nsu Ƒilipo anwu ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbasu-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie na atásia ketele ulu ɔni nási Yerusalem ɔ́yu úsie Gasa mmɔ.”

Na ɔ́ta útásia ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ka úsela ni, útásiaku ukyuli ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔdubo. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ndi egulabi lɛlɔ ɔnune unengudi na Etiopia Uleku Ɔga ɔni baalɔ Kandake lɛga kadikɔ. Unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́si Yerusalem kesii kani na útákpali katɔ.
Na únwini ɔdubo na ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ kemo, na ɔkɛ ɔɔká Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔni na Katɔti Kenye Udiene Yesaia únweni.
Amu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Teesie na atásiaku ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ ɔmɛni.”
Ƒilipo úkeli úsie-nwu kudɔ na uunú ka unengu ɔmmɔ ɔɔká Yesaia ɔku. Amu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Eenú lɛla lɛni na aaká mɛni kalɔ?”
Amu na unengu ɔmɛni údie kenye ɔnini, “Oowo, dɛ na mabla asa na menu kalɔ ka ukyuli ɔdi uuubo na udie kalɔ ɔtina-mi?” Amu na úvele Ƒilipo ɔnii ubeduo kɛɛkɛ kemo na ɔsɔ ulie-nwu kudɔ.

Na etemila ani na ɔkya ɔɔká na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ndi ɔnii, “Báda-nwu béselaku aani koƒonu kɔni béti batádu. Na ɔkɛ aani koƒonu kɔni naaadaku-ni si beekúlo-ku linwini, na útebimi kenye lɛnɔ.
Bákya-nwu kɔƒa na útakɛ ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ-nwu kenye. Údie kaba kadi? Bi na ɔ́bla úse asa baadú-nwu na kayawi kamɛni kemo?”
Amu na unengu ɔmmɔ úye Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Yesaia ni, anwu ɔlati lɛlɔ na uutemi taasiku, munuu ukyuli bamba ɔdi lɛlɔ na uutemi taasiku?”
Amu na Ƒilipo úse kalɔ na úti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔmmɔ na uudie litemi buni lɛmmɔ kalɔ taatina-nwu ɔ́si Yesu lɛlɔ.

Amu na uwi ɔni na bakɛ bésela ni, bátánu ntu bɔdi ka bunye likpo lɛdi na ulu kudɔ mmɔ. Na unengu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su Ƒilipo ɔnini, “Aanu ntu bɔdi. Bi ɔsu na naaakana Katɔti ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔmmɔ bɔƒɔ?” Amu na Ƒilipo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Si áƒɔ ádi ku ƒula kayi ƒui ni, adubɔkana.”

Amu na unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́su ɔnini, “Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka Yesu Kristo ndi Katɔti Ubidi.” Na ɔ́ya na bédi ɔpɔnkɔ kɛɛkɛ ɔmɛni bényene na báyu bétéduo ntu bɔmɛni kemo, na Ƒilipo ɔ́kpila-nwu ntu na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo.
Amu na uwi ɔni na bávi bálɛ ntu bɔmɛni kemo ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kúti Ƒilipo kɔ́tɔlɔku, na unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́sɔ útanu-nwu. Na anwu lɛti ɔ́tɔlɔ ku kubiti.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Ƒilipo ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka unye Asoto ɔmankemo. Na ɔ́su litemi buni lɛmɛni na mmɔ bene ku lɛma lɛni nkya ulu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na úsie laa útédu Kaesarea ɔma lɛnɔ.
Lebo lɛmmɔ kemo ƒui ni, Saulo ɔ́bi ɔ́siaku Blɔti basiakune bammɔ ku lɛnungyie ɔnii ɔɔdú-ma. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ ɔkpane unengudi kudɔ.
Mmɔ na úvele-nwu ɔnii ute-nwu ɔku na uti usienku Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ na Damasko kalɛ na ɔkɛ ɔyikun na uƒie banana ku beleku bani ƒui nsiaku bɔƒɔtaadi bɔwɔdi bɔmmɔ usienku Yerusalem.
Amu na uwi ɔni na ɔ́kpɛ uudé Damasko na kasusu kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, kɔnakunwi bukeye bɔdi búkeye bɔ́si katɔ na búbewi-nwu lɛlɔ.
Na ɔ́lɛ úbo kalɔ na únu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-nwu lɛnini, “Saulo, Saulo, bi ɔsu na eekpóku-mi lɛni?”
Amu na Saulo úye ɔnini, “Ati, ɔma na adi?” Amu na lɛdi lɛmɛni lídie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ndi Yesu ɔni na eekpóku kpakplaa.
Ɔƒaani ni, ta na eteesie ɔmankemo. Badubɔsu-ɔ lɛla lɛni na ɔlɛka abla.”
Amu na bekyuli bani na ama ku Saulo bakɛ mmɔ bágyini. Bénu butemi bɔmɛni, nsu bátanu ukyuli ɔdi.
Amu ka Saulo ɔ́ta únye na úbimi anumi ni, ɔ́sɔ ulanu. Amu na bákpanku-nwu bétéduoku Damasko ɔmankemo.
Na úlie mmɔ emeyi atɛ ɔni na ulánu, uládi na ulani lɛnɔ.
Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔƒɔtaadine ɔdi ɔkya Damasko ɔni baalɔ Anania. Na Blɔti údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnii, “Anania!” Amu na ɔ́tuna-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, ami mɛni!”
Amu na Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na asia ulu ɔni baalɔ banii Ligeen lɛlɔ, na esie Yuda kesii na etéye Tarsoni ɔni baalɔ Saulo lɛlɔ. Ɔkya mmɔ ɔɔkpali katɔ teevele-mi.
Ɔsika líidie lɛ́tina-nwu ka ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Anania ɔdubo ubeti enu ɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ na ɔsɔ utaanu.”
Mmɔ na Anania údie kenye ɔnini, “Blɔti, línu na kesii biala kalala kani udu na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔɔbla baƒɔtaadine na Yerusalem!
Na búunu ka ɔ́ƒɔ ɔku ɔ́siku ɔkpane unengudi kudɔ banii ubeƒie baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Damasko ƒui!”

Nsu Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Teesie, na atábla kalɛ na lɛ́su-ɔ. Ɔsika ami lɛ́ɛƒuna Saulo aani mina ukyuli ɔni meti mina litemi buni lɛmɛni mesienku ama bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ ku baga anumi ku Israelƒuɔ ƒui kudɔ.
Na ndubɔtina-nwu kalɛ na ɔlɛka ubo abi na ami ɔsu.”

Anwuɔsu Anania úsie na útánu Saulo na úti enu ɔ́sia-nwu lɛlɔ, na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔnwa Saulo, Blɔti Yesu ɔni nédie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-a na ulu lɛlɔ ni, anwu nátala-mi ɔ́kya-a kalɛ na asɔ ataanu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔƒɔ-ɔ lɛlɔ kemo ƒui.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, ɔ́bla Saulo aani si akpa adi ámami ási nwuna anumi lɛlɔ na ɔ́sɔ ɔɔnu. Na ɔ́ta na ɔ́ya na bákpila-nwu ntu.
Na ka ɔ́di adila adi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun. Amu na Saulo úlie baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Damasko mmɔ kudɔ emeyi adi.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kani na úsie Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ útásu Yesu lɛlɔ litemi ka Katɔti Ubidi na ɔdi.

Amu na bekyuli bani ƒui nénu-nwu litemi lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye. Na béye lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔmɛni nkɛ mɔɔdú Yesu kama basiakune na Yerusalem uwi ɔni yoo? Na búnu lɛnɔ ka nka baƒɔtaadine na úbo úbeƒie úsienku bakpane benengu.”
Amu na Saulo úsie anumi geen na nwuna litemi bɔsu kemo. Na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya Damasko mmɔ ɔdi biala útakana lɛla lɛdi bɔsu. Na údie kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma ka Yesu ndi Kristo.
Emeyi adi kama ni, Yudaƒuɔ bása na bábla kasusu ka badubadu-nwu.
Nsu bekyuli badi bábasu Saulo ka baawia-nwu badu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu bekisine bamɛni baagyumana kɔyakun kɔni baasia taalɛ na beeduo ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bakɛ-nwu badu.
Amu na nwuna badi bani ndi baƒɔtaadine mmɔ béti-nwu bákya kagyigyɛ kemo na báyula-nwu básiku kowodu liƒi na ɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo usientɛ!
Amu na ɔni na útéduo Yerusalem ni, ɔ́wia ka nka uduo baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ akɔ. Nsu ama lɛnɔ báyia-nwu. Bábu ka bɔtɔlɔ na ɔda-ma.

Amu na Barnaba útiku-nwu úsienku batalane bamɛni kudɔ na ɔ́su-ma kalɛ na Saulo ɔ́nu Blɔti ɔni na úsela Damasko. Ɔ́su-ma litemi lɛni na Blɔti ɔ́su-nwu ku litemi buni lɛni na ɔ́su ku kayi buse na Yesu lɛnyi kemo na Damasko.
Amu na báƒɔ-nwu bákya bana akɔ. Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔ́kya-ma akɔ uwi biala na ɔɔsu Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi na Yerusalem.
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ banii muutemi Griki na baalɔ-ma banii Helaƒuɔ badi ku Saulo bákya unyeƒi ɔdi na báyɔ ka badu-nwu.
Amu na uwi ɔni na baƒɔtaadine bamɛni badi bénu ka bekyuli bamɛni baawia-nwu badu ni, bétiku-nwu bésienku Kaesarea na bávinku-nwu bésienku nwuna ɔma ɔni ndi Tarso.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yudea ku Galilea ku Samaria kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, bákɛ bɔnwuna na basɔ balayia. Bákɛ kayi buse ku ɔkplu bɔkya ɔkɛnku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun lɛlɔ. Na bémomo bébu na béteeti ɔbu teete Blɔti.
Amu ka Petro ɔkɛ ɔɔví taatánu Kristoƒuɔ bani ƒui na nwuna bɔvi kemo ni, úsie útánu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya ɔma ɔni baalɔ Lida.
Amu na útánu ɔnana ɔdi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo ɔni baalɔ Enea ka ɔ́ƒɛ uwi kalɔ akwa maane sɔɔn.
Na ka Petro ɔ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Enea, nu! Yesu Kristo ɔ́bwi-ɔ! Ta nye! Na abuma ƒula atɛla.” Na mmɔ kani na ɔ́ta únye ku ɔlɔkplu.
Na ka bánu ka Enea ɔkɛ uusié taavi ɔsu ni, Lida ku Saron lɛma kemo bekyuli ƒui béti lɛlɔ béte Blɔti.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, uleku ɔdi ɔkya Yopa ɔni baalɔ Tabita. Na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, anwu baalɔ banii Dorka na nwuna kalɔ ndi kaƒɛ. Ɔdi ɔƒɔtaadine ɔni na útaabla lɛƒɔndia teete nwuna bakpana uwi pii.
Amu na ɔlɛ úbebo-nwu na úkpi. Amu na nwuna bakpana bákpila-nwu na báklibi-nwu béti bétése katu taasia ɔtɔ ɔtɔdi ɔdi kemo.
Amu na uwi ɔni na bénu ka Petro úbo ɔkya Lida ni, na ka Lida ude Yopa ɔsu ni, bátala nkyuli inyɔ badi banii betévele-nwu na ɔsiaku-ma lɛgba lɛgba na ubo Yopa.

Amu na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-ma, na ka ɔ́nya úbeduo ni, bétiku-nwu bésienku kesii kani na Dorka ɔtɛ. Na bekpinele bani nkya mmɔ ƒui bábaka bámana-nwu na beewulo. Na bada lɛwu lɛni na Dorka ɔ́ka úte-ma baatina Petro.

Amu na Petro ɔ́su bana ƒui ɔnii bavi balɛ ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na ɔ́kpali katɔ. Amu na únwini anumi ɔ́tina Dorka na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Dorka, ta!” Mmɔ kani na úbimi anumi. Na ka ɔ́nya ɔ́nu Petro ni, ɔ́ta úlie.
Amu na Petro úte-nwu kɔnu na anwu lɛnɔ úƒie-ku ɔ́da na ɔ́ta únye. Amu na Petro ɔ́sɔ ɔ́lɔ baƒɔtaadine ku bekpinele bammɔ ƒui úboku. Na úti-nwu ɔ́kya-ma lɛkɔkɔ.
Amu na litemi lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́kya ɔmankemo ƒui, na bekyuli pii báƒɔ Blɔti bádi.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Petro úlie Yopa ɔma ɔmɛni kemo útu uwi na Simon ɔni mɔɔbla bebuo lɛku lɛlɔ kabla mmɔ kudɔ.
Lebo lɛmmɔ ni, ɔnana ɔdi úlie Kaesarea ɔma kemo ɔni baalɔ banii Kornelio. Ɔdi unengu úte Romaƒuɔ bekpone.
Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni, na anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui beeti ɔbu teete Katɔti. Ukyuli ɔmɛni úteete bekyuli ala ku nwuna kayi ƒui, na ɔɔyɔ́ katɔ bɔkpali lɛnɔ.
Limeyi lɛdi ɔƒiiwi lɛdɔ ɛtɛ kemo ni, ɔ́nu budie bɔtina bɔdi. Na budie taatina bɔmɛni kemo ni, ɔ́nu ka Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ɔ́si úbo-nwu kudɔ. Na ɔ́lɔ-nwu ɔnini, “Kornelio.”

Amu ka Kornelio ɔ́nu-nwu ni, liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen. Amu na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ati, bi na aawia?” Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ƒula bekyuli ala bute ku ƒula katɔ bɔkpali ni, búduo Katɔti kudɔ.
Tala bekyuli badi na besie Yopa na batákpanku ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Simon Petro beboku.
Uli Simon ɔni nli ɛpu kudɔ na ɔɔbla bebuo lɛku lɛlɔ kabla mmɔ kudɔ.”
Amu ka Katɔti ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́tɔlɔ ni, Kornelio ɔ́lɔ nwuna kaduli nkyuli inyɔ ku bekpone bani mɔɔgyumana-nwu mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔni lɛnɔ ndi ukyuli ɔbuni.
Na ɔ́su-ma lɛla lɛni nálɛ, na ɔ́tala-ma ɔnii beteesie Yopa.
Amu ka kadi kégye na bakɛ bésela na badaku ɔma ɔmɛni bɔkpɛ bude ni, Petro ɔ́kɔ úsie nwuna lɛsa lili ɔnii utákpali katɔ ɔƒiiwi.
Kɔka kúbo kɔɔda-nwu, nsu uwi ɔmmɔ na benye baanwá adila. Amu na ɔ́bla aani lɛlɛɛ kemo na úduo.
Mmɔ na ɔ́nu ka kayaa kébimi, na ɔ́nu kɔdi bonwu kɔdi ka bada kuna ekpo ene ani ƒui na kɔ́si kɔɔyu kalɔ.
Na kɔdi kɔmɛni kemo ni, bebuo lidu lidu pii ku balakpi ku baasɛ lɛnɔ bakya.
Amu na únu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-nwu lɛnini, “Petro, ta, na adu akun.”
Amu na Petro ɔ́su ɔnini, “Oowo! Kudi kudii! Blɔti, ńteti bebuo bani abu Yudaƒuɔ bukisi ńtetuku kenye kudii!”
Lɛdi lɛmɛni lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su-nwu lɛnini, “Lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na Katɔti úveli ɔ́bla kede kede ni, tasu anii liisé lɛlɔ!”
Ɔ́nu búdie bɔtina bɔmɛni kɔtɛ sɔɔn. Na kɔtɛdi kɔmɛni kama ni, béti kɔdi kɔmɛni bésienku katɔ.

Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ ni, lɛla lɛmɛni lɛkya lɛɛbla Petro dɛye dɛye, na úye lɛlɔ ɔnii, “Bi na ɔmɛni ɔɔtina?” Mmɔ kani na bekyuli bani na Kornelio ɔ́tala mmɔ bébeduo ɔma ɔmɛni kemo. Na ka bánu kaduli kani baawia ni, bébo bébenye kayakun.
Na benye beeye kesii kani na Simon Petro uli.
Amu na ɔni na Petro ulie ɔɔkali nwuna budie bɔtina bɔmɛni lɛlɔ na ulati lɛla lɛni na lɛdi ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su-nwu kɔnini, “Nkyuli ɛtɛ bébo baawia-a.
Ta, na esie atánu-ma. Tayia ka asiaku-ma eteesie. Ami nátala-ma.”
Amu na Petro úsie útánu-ma na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ami ndi ukyuli ɔni na bɛɛwia. Bi nébo?”

Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Batu na bɔdi, bɔ́si Kornelio ɔni ndi Romaƒuɔ kekpo unengu kudɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni na ɔɔbu Katɔti. Na Yudaƒuɔ ƒui baayɔ́-nwu litemi geen. Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi násu-nwu ɔnii ɔtala na babalɔ-ɔ na unu ƒula kenye kemo litemi.”
Anwuɔsu Petro ɔ́ya bébeduo-nwu kudɔ na ɔ́ƒɔ-ma aani nwuna baƒɔ kalɛ. Ka kadi kégye ni, anwu ku baƒɔtaadine badi bani nási Yopa básiaku-ma bátɔlɔ.
Amu na bétéduo Kaesarea limeyi lɛmmɔ kadi kegye. Amu na uwi ɔmɛni ni, Kornelio ɔ́sala nwuna kaduli bekyuli lisu ku nwuna bakpana badi na belie bagya Petro bubo.
Amu ka Petro ɔ́nya úbeduo nwuna kaduli ni, Kornelio ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na Petro anumi na úboku lili kalɔ.
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye! Ami lɛnɔ ukyuli na ndi.”
Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ɔ́ta únye. Na ka bátɛmi blii ni, Kornelio útiku-nwu úsienku kesii kani na bekyuli bakladi bása belie.

Na Petro ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛgyi ka bula Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo útete-mi kuƒi ka nka liduo ukyuli ɔni naaadi bula kadi ukyuli ɔdi kesii iye liti lɛlɔ lɛmana-nwu lɛlɔ. Nsu Katɔti údie ɔ́tina-mi ka ntanu ukyuli ɔdi aani ukyuli keeke.
Anwuɔsu ka bánya bábalɔ-mi kani na lɛ́ta líbo. Na bi ɔsu na bɛɛwia-mi?”

Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, Kornelio ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔbla emeyi ene mɛni aani uwi ɔmɛni kemo ka nkya mɔɔkpali katɔ ɔƒiiwi aani kalɛ na mɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla uwi ndi uwi. Na kɔnakunwi ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔ́si úbenye-mi anumi, na ɔkya awu ɔni muukeye na ɔɔtu anumi!

Ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Kornelio, ƒula lɛƒɔndia ku ƒula katɔ bɔkpali ƒui uudú Katɔti kudɔ! Na ɔƒaani ni, tala bekyuli badi na besie Yopa na batálɔ Simon Petro ɔni nli Simon ɔni mɔɔbla bebuo lɛku kabla na uli ɛpu kudɔ.'
Ɔmɛni ɔsu na lɛ́tala lɛni babalɔ-ɔ, na awɔ lɛnɔ ábla kaduɛ ka áta lɛgba lɛgba ébo. Anwuɔsu na bulie bɔgya-a na Unwoti anumi ka abasu-bu litemi lɛni na ɔ́su-ɔ ɔnii su-bu.”
Amu na Petro ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Lɛ́nu lɛ́ti nwaa ka Blɔti ulánu bekyuli anumi.
Mmomu kalɔ biala lɛlɔ ukyuli ɔni muuboku lɛlɔ kalɔ teete-nwu na ɔɔbla nwuna lɛyɔla ni, anwu na ɔɔƒɔ́.
Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka bínu litemi buni lɛni na básu béte Israelƒuɔ ka ni, ɔkɛ Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ni, badubɔkɛ keyi buɛɛ. Na anwu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni lɛnɔ ndi bayawine ƒui Ɔti.
Na bɛgyi ala enengudi ani nálɛ na Yudea kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ani nése kalɔ ási Galilea kalɔ lɛlɔ uwi ɔni na Yohane ɔ́kɔ lɛsa ɔ́si ntu bɔkpila ɔdi lɛlɔ kama.

Na bínu lɛnɔ kalɛ na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna Yesu ɔni nási Nasaret ɔni na úti nwuna Kɔyu úse-nwu likpo na úti ɔyikun lɛnɔ úte-nwu. Na ɔ́kɛ útaavi taabla lɛbuni na útaabwi bani ƒui na ayu ekpidi eekpóku, ɔsika Katɔti ɔsiaku-nwu.
Abu muudie kenye na ala ani na úbabla na Israel ku Yerusalem. Mmɔ na bádu-nwu na ugyii lɛlɔ.
Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ya na ɔ́ta ɔ́si kekpine na limeyi lɛtɛdi lɛlɔ, na ɔ́ya na bekyuli bánu-nwu.
Nsu ni, ɔɔɔdi bekyuli ƒui nánu-nwu. Mmomu abu bani na ɔ́ƒuna ni, abu bɔ́nu-nwu. Na bɔ́di na bɔ́niku-nwu lɛnɔ na nwuna bɔsɔ bɔta kama.
Na abu na ɔ́tala ɔnii bɔsu litemi buni lɛmɛni na kesi kesii. Na budie kenye ka ni, Katɔti néti Yesu ɔ́bla bekpine ku bayawine ƒui litemi ɔtɛne.
Na Katɔti kenye bediene bénweni básiku-nwu lɛlɔ ka ukyuli biala ɔni maƒɔ-nwu madi ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔƒɔ nwuna ekpidi udie-nwu lɛlɔ na anwu Yesu lɛnyi kemo.”
Amu na uwi ɔni na Petro unye ɔɔsu etemila amɛni ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu na kɔ́ƒɔ bani nlie muunú Petro litemi mmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ kemo!
Yudaƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bani násiaku Petro bébo mmɔ ni, litemi lɛmɛni lítakɔsi na lɛ́bla-ma dɛye dɛye! Ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́yu kubo bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ lɛlɔ.
Nsu balakana ɔkɔ bɔsia, ɔsika beenú ka beetemi adi lidu lidu na beemwi Blɔti. Amu na Petro úye ɔnini,
“Ka báƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu aani kalɛ na abu lɛnɔ bɔ́ƒɔ ni, bulakana buni bɔnii bulakpila-ma ntu.”
Anwuɔsu ɔ́ya na bákpila-ma ntu na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo. Ɔmɛni kama ni, bévele Petro banii ulie-ma kudɔ emeyi adi.
