Uwi útetu asa na batalane ku baƒɔtaadine bakladi na Yudea bénu ka kadi bamba bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ báƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmmɔ.
Anwuɔsu ka Petro únwini úsie Yerusalem ni, Yudaƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bátatunaku-nwu, na básu-nwu banini,
“Awɔ ábla unwi ku baƒɔ bani naaasiaku Yudaƒuɔ ala bɔtina, na bɛ́kya kɔnu bɛ́di na lɛkyami linwi kemo!”
Amu na Petro údie etemila amɛni ƒui kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma na ɔ́su ɔnini,
“Uwi ɔni na nkya Yopa na mɔɔkpali katɔ ni, lɛ́nu ala budie bɔtina bɔdi. Mmɔ na lɛ́nu kɔdi bonwu kɔdi ka báda kuna ekpo ene na kɔ́si katɔ kúbayu.
Bebuo lidu lidu ƒui bakya kɔdi bonwu kɔmɛni kemo, bebuo bani mbo agyobi ku bebuo bani mɔɔkpɛ́ kalɔ ku baasɛ bekpidi lɛnɔ.
Na línu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-mi lɛnii, 'Petro! Du bana akɔ ɔdi biala na akun.'
Amu na lídie kenye nnini, 'Oowo! Kudi kudii! Ńtakun lɛla lɛni na Yudaƒuɔ bukisi kudii.'
Nsu lɛdi lɛmɛni lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, 'Lɛla lɛni na Katɔti úveli ɔ́bla kede kede ni, tasu anii liisé lɛlɔ.'
Ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛ kɔtɛ sɔɔn. Na nwuna kama ni, kɔdi bonwu kɔmɛni ku bebuo bani nkya-ku kemo mmɔ ƒui báta bákɔ katɔ na bátáyii bákya na kayaa.
Na uwi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kani ni, nkyuli ɛtɛ bani bátala banii bebetiku-mi besienku Kaesarea mmɔ bébeduo kaduli kani kemo na nli.
Amu na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́su-mi kɔnii nsiaku-ma nteesie, na ntayia. Mina banwani ɛku bamɛni básiaku-mi, na búsie bútéduo ɔnana ɔni nátala batu ɔ́kya-mi mɛni kudɔ.
Anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́su-bu kalɛ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi údie lɛlɔ ɔ́tina-nwu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, 'Wia Simon Petro.
Na anwu matina kalɛ na wabla na awɔ ku ƒula kaduli bekyuli ƒui bɛdubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ.'

Na ɔmɛni kama ni, líse kalɔ mɔɔsu-ma litemi buni lɛmɛni. Nsu asa na meduo litemi buni lɛmɛni ɔlati kemo ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kúbo na kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui aani kalɛ na kɔ́ƒɔ abu lɛnɔ lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na kalɔ kesekɔ!
Amu na líti kasusu lísienku uwi ɔni na Blɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Sɔsɔ ni, Yohane úti ntu ɔ́kpila bekyuli. Nsu ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti nwuna Kɔyu ɔkpila-mii.'
Na ka Unwoti néte bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ litela lɛmɛni aani kalɛ na úti úte-bu uwi ɔni na bɔ́ƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔ́di ni, naaakana Katɔti ulu butile.”
Uwi ɔni na bénu etemila amɛni ni, báda bana unyeƒi báya na bése kalɔ beemwi Unwoti. Na básu banini, “Sɔsɔ ni, Katɔti úte bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ kuƒi ka benwini bebo-nwu kudɔ na bakɛ ngba.”

Na uwi ɔni na ala amɛni aalɛ́ ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nékeli na lɛbibo lɛni nébo-ma lɛlɔ na Steƒano bɔdu ɔsu ni, bésie bétédu Ƒoinike ku Kipro ku Antiokia lɛma kemo. Na bakɛ baasu litemi buni lɛmmɔ, nsu ɔɔɔdi bekyuli ƒui, mmomu Yudaƒuɔ lɛti.
Nsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nási Kipro ku Kirene bésie Antiokia bátásu Blɔti Yesu lɛlɔ litemi béte Grikiƒuɔ.
Na ka Blɔti ɔyikun ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ bémomo bébu.
Uwi ɔni na baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yerusalem bénu lɛla lɛni nébo na mmɔ ni, bátala Barnaba banii uteesie Antiokia.
Ka útéduo mmɔ na ɔ́nu kalɛ na Katɔti úbunku-ma ni, ebiti áda-nwu geen na ɔ́kya-ma ogya úbu ɔnii benye Blɔti kama kpakplaa ku bana kayi ƒui.
Barnaba ɔdi ukyuli ɔbuni ɔni mbo bɔƒɔtaadi, na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Nwuna kebunku ɔsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bammɔ bémomo bébu.
Amu na Barnaba úsie Tarso ɔnii utáwia Saulo na mmɔ.
Uwi ɔni na ɔ́nu-nwu ni, úti-nwu úboku Antiokia na bana inyɔ ƒui bélie mmɔ lɛkwa limodi. Mmɔ na bakya baatina bekyuli pii ala. Amu na Antiokia mmɔ ni, bése kalɔ baalɔ baƒɔtaadine banii Kristoƒuɔ.
Uwi ɔmɛni kani kemo ni, Katɔti kenye bediene badi bási Yerusalem bébo Antiokia.
Amu na bana akɔ unwi ɔni baalɔ Agabo ni, ɔ́ta únye na Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun kemo na ɔ́su ɔnii kɔka kubendi kɔdi kɔdubo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni úbebo uwi ɔni na Klaudio ɔɔdi lɛga.
Anwuɔsu baƒɔtaadine bamɛni bábla kasusu ka beyi ala bemene banwa bani nkya Yudea. Na bana akɔ ɔdi biala úte kalɛ na wakana.
Ka béyi ala amɛni ni, béti-nya béte Barnaba ku Saulo na béti bésienku Yudea baƒɔtaadine benengu bammɔ.
Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, Ɔga Herode úƒie baƒɔtaadine badi kalɛ na ɔdu-ma.
Amu na ɔ́ya na békulo Yakobo lili ɔni ndi Yohane ɔnwani.
Na ka ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ebiti áda Yudaƒuɔ na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla mɛni ɔsu ni, úƒie Petro lɛnɔ na uwi ɔni kemo na baadi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu.

Na béti-nwu bákya ɔtɔ kesii kani na bagyumanane ine akpa ene baavumanaku lɛlɔ na baagyumana-nwu. Herode kasusu ndi ka nka udie-nwu ute kadi na bana limeyi bamba lɛni baalɔ Kukpi Lili Bɔvia Limeyi bɔdi kama.
Anwuɔsu bagyumanane bamɛni bágyumana-nwu na ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo kaduɛ. Nsu ni, baƒɔtaadine bákpali katɔ na bévele nwuna lili kpakplaa.
Amu na uwi ɔni na Herode ɔ́kali ka ɔdubudie Petro ute kadi si kadi kégye ni, Petro ɔtɛ ɔɔlɛɛ na bagyumanane inyɔ ntɛ. Na bébo-nwu kɔgba báda-ma. Na bagyumanane babambadi benye baagyumana kayakun.
Kɔnakunwi ni, bukeye bɔdi búbewi ɔtɔ mmɔ. Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbenye Petro kudɔ. Amu na ɔ́lɛ-nwu kɔnu lɛmangba buɛɛ, na ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔnini, “Babla, na ata!” Na kɔgba kɔmmɔ kɔ́lɛ-nwu enu kúwi kalɔ.
Amu na ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ti ƒula lɛwu ku lɛgbanvuo kya.” Amu na Petro ɔ́bla lɛni. Na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ti kɔdi bi lɛlɔ, na asiaku-mi.”
Na Petro ɔ́ta ɔ́siaku-nwu, na ɔ́vi ɔ́lɛ ɔtɔ ɔmɛni kemo. Uwi ɔmɛni ƒui kemo ni, ɔ́kali ɔnii kɔna na uugyé.

Amu na bávi bálɛ kayakun kedeedi ku kanyɔdi lɛnɔ. Na ka bétédu lɛbuala kayakun kenengudi kani nkya késie ɔma kakɛ ni, aka ɔlatidi kálɛmi. Na bávi aka lɛnɔ. Na ka bésie anumi blii ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́da-nwu ɔ́nyonu.

Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Petro úbati lɛla lɛni nébo. Na ɔ́su lɛlɔ ɔnini, “Sɔsɔ geen na ɔdi ka ni, Unwoti nátala ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔnii ubedie-mi ɔsiku Herode enu kemo ku ala ani na Yudaƒuɔ baasusu ka badubɔbla-mi lɛnɔ kemo!”
Na ka úti kasusu blii ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Maria ɔni ndi Yohane Marko uni kesii. Mmɔ na baƒɔtaadine pii bása bewi baakpali katɔ.
Amu ka únye kayakun kani nkya ulu kenye mmɔ ɔ́kpali ni, ulekubi ɔni baalɔ Rode úbo ɔnii ubalɛmi.
Na ka únu Petro lɛdi ɔ́ti ni, ebiti áda-nwu ávili! Útalɛmi ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ, mmomu úkeli úsie nwuna badi akɔ na útásu-ma ka Petro úbo unye kegbuta kama.
Nsu bátaƒɔ bátadi na básu-nwu banini, “Tabatɔlɔ-bu mɛni!” Amu na ɔ́mua unye kpakplaa ka sɔsɔ na ɔdi. Amu na básu lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔƒaalɛ nwuna ukpine nébo unye mmɔ.”
Amu na uwi ɔmɛni kemo ƒui ni, Petro ɔ́mua unye uubó kegbuta kɔnu. Na ka bésie bátálɛmi na bánu-nwu ni, ebiti átakɔsi na áda-ma.
Amu na ɔ́ya na bába lɛsɛ. Na ɔ́su-ma ala ani nébo ku kalɛ na Unwoti úbedie-nwu ɔ́lɛku ɔtɔ kemo. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii basu Yakobo ku bakladi lɛla lɛni nálɛ. Ɔmɛni kama ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ mmɔ úsie kesii bamba.
Amu na kadi bugye kemo ni, owogyo ubendi ɔdi ɔ́ƒɔ bagyumanane ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ mmɔ. Na béye lɛlɔ banii, “Wɛ geen na Petro ɔ́vi ɔƒɛni?”

Amu uwi ɔni na Herode ɔ́wia Petro bɔyii kalɔ na útabla-nwu nwaa ni, ɔ́ya na bétéƒie bagyumanane leevu-ɛku bammɔ béboku. Na ɔ́tɛku-ma litemi na ɔ́du-ma kukpi kɔtɔ, na bádu-ma. Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Herode ɔ́tɔlɔ Yudea úsie Kaesarea útélie mmɔ uwi ɔdi.

Uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Herode úti kɔnyi kati kati kɔdi ɔ́kya Tiro ku Sidonƒuɔ. Amu na batu badi bási Tiro ku Sidon mmɔ bébo-nwu kudɔ banii babanu-nwu. Amu na békeli bátátua Blasto ɔni ndi Herode kaduli lɛlɔ ɔnune banii utévele Herode na ɔya na unwi bɔbla bubo bana lɛma inyɔ bɔmɛni ku Herode ntɛ. Ɔsika Herode kalɔ lɛlɔ na baakɛ́ bana adila taasiku.
Amu na limeyi lɛni na Ɔga Herode úte-ma ni, ɔ́kya nwuna agala na útélie nwuna lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na úse kalɔ ku butemi.
Na nwuna butemi bɔwɔlɔ ni, bekyuli bamɛni bémwi-nwu ku bɔva na básu banini, “Unwoti Ɔyikune geen muutemi! Na ɔɔɔdi ukyuli ɔyawine!”
Kɔnakunwi ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi úbo Herode ɔ́ƒiɛmi kalɔ, ɔsika anwu úteti bumwi útete Katɔti. Na beklubi béyi-nwu lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, na úkpi.
Amu na Blɔti litemi buni lɛmɛni lígyingya geen, na baƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ bémomo bébu.
Amu uwi ɔni na Barnaba ku Saulo báwɔlɔ bana kabla kani bátala-ma bɔbla ni, bénwini bási Yerusalem na béti Yohane ɔni mɔɔdi ɔti lɛnyi Marko bébunku lɛlɔ.

Na Antiokia ni, Blɔti kenye bediene ku ala batinane badi bakya baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo. Na ama ndi Barnaba ku Simeon ɔni bátaalɔ Ukyuli Otondi ku Lukio ɔni nási Kirene ku Manaen ɔni ndi Ɔga Herode ɔvinkpana ɔ́si lɛnamu uwi ku Saulo.
Amu ka bakya beemwi Blɔti na beelie kɔka ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kútemiku-ma na kɔ́su kɔnini, “Bidie Barnaba ku Saulo bise bite kabla kani ɔsu na lɛ́lɔ-ma.”
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka benengu bammɔ bélie kɔka na bákpali katɔ na bana lili ni, bédie-ma ulu.
Na ka Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́tina-ma ulu ni, bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Seleukia. Mmɔ na béti ɔkɔlɔ bávia bésie ntu ntɛ kalɔ kani baalɔ Kipro.
Na ka bétéduo ɔma ɔni baalɔ Salami kemo ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ bátásu Blɔti litemi. Na Marko Yohane lɛnɔ ɔ́siaku-ma aani bana ubunkune kalɛ.
Na ɔmɛni kama ni, bávi bétédu ɔma ɔni baalɔ Paƒo. Na mmɔ bátánu Yudani ɔni mɔɔƒɛ evo na úti lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ɔkɔ kenye udiene ɔni baalɔ Bar-Yesu.
Na uvone ɔmɛni ku aban ɔgadine ɔnundane ɔni baalɔ Sergio Paulo badi bakpana. Na ɔgadine ɔmɛni ɔ́lɔ Barnaba ku Saulo ɔnii bebo babanu-nwu, ɔsika ɔɔwia ka unu Blɔti litemi.
Nsu ka bésie ni, uvone ɔmmɔ ɔni na baalɔ lɛnɔ banii Elima na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, ɔ́kyaku-ma unyeƒi. Na ɔ́wia ka unwini ɔgadine ɔmɛni kasusu udie litemi lɛni na Saulo ku Barnaba baasu lɛlɔ.

Nsu Saulo ɔni lɛnɔ baalɔ banii Paulo ni, ɔ́nu uvone ɔmɛni ku livoƒi, na údie lɛdi ɔ́kya-nwu ku Katɔti Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔnini, “Awɔ Satan ubidi, éyi ku katɔlɔ ku lɛkwɛnkpi, na ekisi lɛbuni bɔbla, na aatu Blɔti litemi teenwini. Adubɔnuku-ni!
Unwoti ɔdubɔya na anumi abwɛ-ɔ, na asɔ alanu ɔƒɛ weti wetédu uwi ɔdi!” Mmɔ kani na nwuna anumi ábla suu, na ɔsɔ ulánu. Na úse kalɔ ɔɔka taamana mmɔ, na uuvele bekyuli ɔnii bada-nwu kɔnu.
Uwi ɔni na aban ɔgadine ɔmɛni ɔ́nu lɛla lɛmɛni ni, ɔ́bla-nwu kalɛ kadi, na ɔ́ƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni ɔ́di.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Paulo ku bani nsiaku-nwu béduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bátɔlɔ Paƒo bésie Perge ɔni nkya Pamƒilia. Mmɔ na Marko Yohane ɔ́da-ma ɔ́nyonu, na ɔ́sɔ únwini úsie Yerusalem.
Ka bási Perge ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Antiokia na Pisidia ɔmii lɛlɔ. Na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na betélie kalɔ na bekyuli bammɔ akɔ.

Na uwi ɔni na báka ala básiku Mose ɔda bubo ɔku ku Katɔti Kenye bediene bunweni kemo bawɔlɔ ni, kasalakɔ batɔnkune bammɔ básu banini, “Banwa, si bina akɔ ɔdi ubo litemi lɛni mɔɔkya ɔkplu na wasu ni, na ubo ubasu.”
Amu na Paulo ɔ́ta na ɔ́talaku kɔnu na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii baba lɛsɛ, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Israelƒuɔ ku amii bani naaadi Israelƒuɔ ƒui na bɛnii bɛɛbu Katɔti ni, bise atu na binu!
Katɔti ɔni na Israelƒuɔ baabu ni, ɔ́ƒuna bula bati kuuku na úte-ma kusɛ kusɛ. Na anwu ɔlati ɔ́tɔnku-ma ɔ́lɛku bekyuli kalɔ bɔkya kemo na Egyipte ku nwuna ɔyikun.
Na ɔ́nu-ma lɛlɔ na ketele kemo ɔni na bákɛ baaví laa na akwa aavlene kemo.
Na ɔ́kyula kɔlɔ akpa maatɛ bekyuli na Kanaan, na úti bana kɔlɔ kɔmɛni úte Israelƒuɔ aani bana kadikɔ.
Na ala amɛni ƒui álɛ na akwa eti yaalenwi kemo. “Na nwuna kama ni, Katɔti úte-ma litemi batɛne bani nádi-ma lɛlɔ útédu Kenye Udiene Samuel uwi.
Amu na bévele-nwu banii use ɔga ute-ma. Na Katɔti úte-ma Kis ubidi Saul ɔni nási Benyamin kaba kemo, na ɔ́di lɛga akwa aavlene.

Nsu Katɔti ɔ́da-nwu údie liboku lɛlɔ na úti Dawid úse lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ. Dawid ɔmɛni ɔdi ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Yese ubidi Dawid ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na mina kayi kaayɔ́, ɔsika anwu ɔdubɔbu-mi.'
“Na ɔ́si Dawid kaba kemo ni, Katɔti údie Ɔƒɔne ɔni ndi Yesu úte Israelƒuɔ aani kalɛ na úse-bu kenye.
Na asa na Yesu webo ni, Ntu Ɔkpilane Yohane úbo úbasu ukyuli biala ka unwini kama ɔkya nwuna ekpidi na uti anumi ɔsia Katɔti lɛlɔ na bakpila-nwu ntu.
Uwi ɔni na Yohane kabla kadaku kawɔlɔkɔ budu ni, úye ɔnii, 'Bɛɛbu ka ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ? Oowo! Nsu ni, ɔkpɛ-mi kama ɔdubo, na ami ńtedu ka lɛbla kabla kadi lite-nwu muedi.'
“Banwa, amii bani ndi Abraham bebi ku amii bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ nsu bɛɛbu Katɔti ni, bɔƒɔ bɔmɛni búse búte bula ƒui!

Bekyuli bani nkya Yerusalem ku bana benengu bátanu Yesu bátati banii anwu ndi Ɔƒɔne ɔmmɔ. Nsu na nwuna bɔdu kemo ni, báya na Katɔti kenye bediene linyese lɛni na baaká na lɛnwunameyi biala lɛlɔ líbo lɛni.
Bátanu bɔƒiɔ bɔdi bátasiku-nwu lɛlɔ, nsu básu Pilato bani ɔya na badu-nwu.
Uwi ɔni na bábla ala ani na Katɔti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su na nwuna kukpi lɛlɔ báwɔlɔ ni, bámami-nwu básiku ugyii lɛlɔ bátáva na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.
Nsu Katɔti ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́lɛku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo uli ngba.
Emeyi ammɔ kemo ni, bekyuli bani na anwu ku-ma bási Galilea bésie Yerusalem ni, bánu-nwu uwi pii. Na ama ndi bekyuli bani muudie-nwu kenye na Israelƒuɔ anumi.

“Na ni, abu búbo mɛni bɔnii buuti litemi buni lɛmɛni buboku-mii, ka ni, Katɔti kenye kani na ɔ́su úse na bula banana bene uwi ni, kébo kéte lɛni na bula uwi lɛlɔ. Na aka ndi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́ya na Yesu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́ta úbo uli ngba. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni lɛlɔ na Dawid únweni na nwuna kɔgya kunyɔdi kemo. Mmɔ ni, Katɔti ɔɔsu taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ ɔnini, 'Awɔ ndi mina ubi. Na ɔmwi ni, línwini-ɔ ɔti.'

Na Katɔti úse kenye úse ɔnii wagyila-nwu wasiku kekpine na wasɔ webelie ngba na ɔsɔ ulekpi kudii. Bénweni ɔmɛni bákya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo na kesii kani na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Ndubute-ɔ kusɛ kusɛ kedee ɔni na líse kenye ka mete Dawid.'
Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su na Dawid kɔgya kɔbambadi kemo lɛnɔ ɔnini, 'Aláya na ƒula ukyuli kedee ɔmɛni webu na kaƒiɔtɔ kemo.'
“Litemi lɛmɛni lɛɛɛdanku Dawid, ɔsika úlie ɔ́bla Unwoti kabla na nwuna ngba bulie uwi ƒui aani kalɛ na Katɔti ɔlati ɔɔyɔ́, na úbekpi na báva-nwu na úbu lɛnɔ.
Nsu ukyuli ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́siku kekpine anwu ni, nwuna ɔlɔna útebu.
“Banwa, binu! Na Yesu ɔmɛni lɛnyi kemo ni, Katɔti ɔdubuti bina ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-mii.
Ukyuli biala ɔni náƒɔ Yesu ɔ́di ni, Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ubo. Ɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na Mose ɔda bubo bútakana bɔbla kudii.
Anwuɔsu bɛnu kaduɛ! Bitaya na Katɔti kenye bediene etemila ani básu alɛku-mii.
Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Amii bani naaabu mina litemi ni, bɛnu kaduɛ! Ɔsika ndubo lɛla lɛdi bɔbla na bina uwi lɛni na si ina bínu ka baasu-ni muedi ni, biláƒɔ biladi.' ”
Uwi ɔni na bási baalɛ kasalakɔ mmɔ ni, bekyuli bamɛni básu Paulo ku Barnaba banii si ɔbla na basɔ bebo bebetemi bete-ma na lɛnwunameyi lɛni nsia lɛlɔ.

Na ka bégyingya ni, Yudaƒuɔ pii ku bani nénwini Yudaƒuɔ na baayia Katɔti na kasalakɔ mmɔ básiaku Paulo ku Barnaba, na bákɛ beenú batalane bamɛni bɔlɛ ka benye lɛƒɔndia lɛni na Katɔti úti uute-ma mɛni kemo kpakplaa.
Lɛnwunameyi lɛni násia lɛmmɔ kama ni, kebu blii nka ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bekyuli ƒui bésie kasalakɔ mmɔ béténu Blɔti litemi lɛni na baasu.
Na uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ benengu bánu bekyuli lisu lɛni nébo kasalakɔ mmɔ ni, anumi égyie-ma, na bákyaku Paulo unyeƒi na bédumi-nwu.

Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba bése kayi na básu-ma banini, “Ɔlɛka bɔsu Katɔti litemi buni lɛmɛni buti bute Yudaƒuɔ kudeedi. Na ka bíni litemi lɛmɛni na bɛ́su bɛnii bilayɔ ngba bɔƒɔ bɔmɛni ɔsu ni, búti-ni búselaku bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
Ɔmɛni ndi bɔkada bɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu ɔnii, 'Lɛ́bla-mii aani bukeye líte bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ kalɛ na biti bɔƒɔ biboku kayawi ɔkɔkɔ biala.' ”
Amu ka bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ bénu lɛla lɛni básu mmɔ ni, kubiti kɔ́da-ma, na bémwi Katɔti. Na bani ƒui na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna úte ngba bɔƒɔ ni, bénwini baƒɔtaadine.
Na Katɔti litemi lígyingya lɛ́kya kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune bénwini bekyuli badi kasusu na Paulo ku Barnaba lɛlɔ. Na beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu ku ɔma benengu ƒui bétiku otogyi na báta békpoku-ma na bágya-ma bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
Nsu uwi ɔni na baalɛ́ ɔma ɔmɛni kemo ni, béveli bana lɛgba kalɔ ɔtumu béwi ɔma ɔmmɔ béti bátina ka ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli béni-ma. Ɔmɛni kama ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Ikonion.
Na bana kama basiakune ama ni, bákɛ lɛlɔyɔ básiku Katɔti Kɔyu kudɔ geen!
Amu ka bédu Ikonion lɛnɔ ni, Paulo ku Barnaba bésie kasalakɔ mmɔ. Na ka básu Yudaƒuɔ ku Grikiƒuɔ litemi buni lɛmmɔ ni, bana akɔ pii báƒɔ bádi.
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bani nátaƒɔ Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni bátadi ni, béti unyeƒi ɔdi bákya bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ku Paulo ku Barnaba ntɛ.
Nsu batalane bammɔ bákya ɔma ɔmɛni kemo bétu uwi básu litemi buni lɛmɛni ku ogya. Na Blɔti lɛnɔ údie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔ́tina geen na akɔla pii ani na bábla kemo.
Amu na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo bekyuli béle akpa anyɔ, na badi básiaku Yudaƒuɔ kama, na badi lɛnɔ básiaku batalane bammɔ kama.
Uwi ɔni na ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli badi ku Yudaƒuɔ ku bana batɔnkune ƒui báta banii bebebo-ma atabi ni, batalane bammɔ bénu na békeli bátɔlɔ bésie Listra ku Derbe ku lɛma lɛni nkya amadɔ mmɔ.
Na básu litemi buni mmɔ.
Ka bésie Listra ni, bátánu ɔnana ɔni náƒɛ uwi kalɔ ɔ́si uwi ɔni na báwɔ-nwu. Na útata útesie kudii.
Úlie mmɔ uunú litemi buni lɛni na Paulo unye ɔɔsu. Na ka Paulo ɔ́nu-nwu ɔ́ti kaduɛ ka ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di ka nwuna ɔlɛ ɔdubɔba-nwu ɔsu ni,
Paulo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta nye ƒula lɛgba lɛlɔ!” Na ɔnana ɔmɛni úmi ɔ́ta na úse kalɔ ɔkɛ uusié.
Ka bekyuli bani nnye beenú litemi mɛni bánu lɛla lɛni na Paulo ɔ́bla ni, báva momoomo na Likaonia lɛdi kemo básu banini, “Baƒiɔ badi! Bébo-bu kudɔ aani bekyuli kalɛ!”
Anwuɔsu básia Barnaba lɛnyi banii Seus. Na básia Paulo lɛnɔ banii Herme, ɔsika anwu nnye muutemi.
Amu na Seus ɔkpane ɔni koƒiodu nde kabanye mmɔ ni, úti ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku anwula úboku ɔnii anwu ku kadi baakpá bete batalane bammɔ.
Na uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Barnaba bénu lɛla lɛni na báyɔ ka babla ni, báni bana lɛwu bábwɛ, ɔsika bátayɔ ka bekyuli bammɔ babla lɛni. Anwuɔsu békeli béduo bekyuli bammɔ akɔ. Mmɔ na báva

básu banini, “Ati bene, bi na bɛɛbla mɛni? Abu lɛnɔ bekyuli bayawine kani na bɔdi aani amii kalɛ. Búbo mɛni bɔnii buuti litemi buni lɛmɛni buboku-mii. Bɛda ala keeke amɛni udu kama bɔsiaku bɛya na binwini biteemwi Blɔti ɔni mbo ngba. Anwu nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui!
Kukuuku ni, údie bayawine ƒui atu na baabla lɛla lɛni na baayɔ́.

Nsu úteedie lɛlɔ taatina-bu na nwuna ala abuni bɔbla ani mɔɔtina ka ɔkya sɔsɔ. Na uwi ndi uwi ni, ubo lɛla lɛni muunyimene-bu na nwuna ala abuni lɛlɔ. Uute-bu ɔnantu uwi ndi uwi ku edula abuni ku adila ku ebiti lɛnɔ.”
Na ina ka básu ala amɛni ƒui ni, úde bekyuli bamɛni asa báda bana akpala amɛni buti bɔkpa bute-ma báya.
Na Yudaƒuɔ badi bási Antiokia na Pisidia ɔmii lɛlɔ ku Ikonion bébo bábavumana bekyuli bamɛni kasusu, na báya bébo Paulo atabi na bákpɛ-nwu kalɔ bálɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, na bákali banii úkpi.
Nsu ka baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bátáka bámana-nwu mmɔ ni, ɔ́ta na ɔ́sɔ únwini úbeduo ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo. Na ka kadi kégye ni, anwu ku Barnaba bátɔlɔ bésie Derbe.
Amu na bátásu litemi buni lɛmɛni na Derbe. Na ka bákɛ baƒɔtaadine badi na mmɔ ni, básɔ bénwini bésie Listra ku Ikonion ku Antiokia.
Mmɔ na bákya baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ɔkplu banii benye kpakplaa na bana bɔƒɔtaadi kemo. Na básu-ma lɛnɔ banini, “Ɔlɛka bubo abi pii asa na bɔkɛ lɛlɔyɔ na Blɔti lɛga bɔdi kemo.”
Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba lɛnɔ bédie batɔnkune béte baƒɔtaadine akpa akpa ƒui, na bákpali katɔ na bélie kɔka na béti-ma bákya Blɔti ɔni na báƒɔ bádi lɛkɔkɔ.
Na ka bási lɛma lɛni nkya Pisidia ni, básɔ bébo Pamƒilia kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Na básu litemi buni na Perge asa na bávi bésie Atalia.
Mmɔ na básia ntu anumi bávi bésie Antiokia, na béti-ma bákya Blɔti lɛkɔkɔ ute kabla kani na bábla báawɔlɔ.

Ka bánya bétéduo Antiokia ni, bálɔ baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ƒui básala lisu na bédie bana ulu busie kemo bátina-ma. Na básu-ma ala ani ƒui na Blɔti ɔ́kɛ-ma lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ku kalɛ na ɔ́lɛmi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu úte bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
Amu na bélie Antiokia baƒɔtaadine bamɛni kudɔ bétu uwi.

Uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Barnaba bakya Antiokia ni, bekyuli badi bási Yudea bébo na bátina baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ala básu banini, “Amu ntu ukyuli biala ɔ́ƒɔ lego bukulo ɔdi ɔmmɔ aani kalɛ na Mose ɔda bubo bɔɔtina asa na wakɛ bɔƒɔ.”

Nsu Paulo ku Barnaba ku bekyuli bamɛni báni litemi lɛmɛni bénene kaduɛ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, báya na baƒɔtaadine badi básiaku-ma na bésie Yerusalem kalɛ na ama ku baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Yerusalem mmɔ batátɛmi basiku ɔlɔna bukulo kɔtɛ kɔmɛni lɛlɔ.

Anwuɔsu ka baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui bésie-ma ulu bétédu kabanye ni, bátɔlɔ bésie Ƒoinike ku Samaria lɛma kemo na bátávi baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ lɛlɔ. Na básu-ma ka ɔƒaani ni, ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ béti lɛlɔ béte Blɔti. Na litemi lɛmɛni lɛ́ya na bana ƒui bákɛ ebiti geen.

Amu ka bétédu Yerusalem ni, baƒɔtaadine ku batalane ku bana benengu ƒui báƒɔ-ma kaduɛ. Na Paulo ku Barnaba béti bana ulu busie litemi báva-ma anumi ɔ́si ala ani ƒui na Katɔti ɔ́bla ɔ́kɛnku-ma lɛlɔ.
Nsu ni, Ƒarisiƒuɔ lɛkpa lɛni nénwini kayi mmɔ badi báta bénye-ma akɔ na básu banii, “Ɔlɛka banwa bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na bakya-bu akɔ mɛni lɛnɔ bekulo lego na basiaku Mose ɔda bubo kama.”
Anwuɔsu bana benengu ku batalane bátásala lisu na béti litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ kasusu.

Na kasalakɔ kamɛni kalɔ ni, uwi ɔni na báatɛmi na ala pii lɛlɔ ni, Petro ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Banwa, amii alati bɛgyi ka Katɔti náƒuna-mi ɔ́siku bina akɔ ɔnii mbasu bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni kalɛ na ama lɛnɔ baƒɔ badi.
Na Katɔti ɔni ngyi bekyuli kɔyi kemo ni, údie ɔ́tina ka ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na úte-ma nwuna Kɔyu aani kalɛ na úti úte abu lɛnɔ.
Útakya kavumana kadi na abu ku-ma ntɛ, ɔsika ɔ́ƒɔ-ma na bana bɔƒɔtaadi ɔsu. Na úti bana ekpidi ɔ́kyiɛ-ma aani abu kalɛ.
Na ɔƒaani ni, bi ɔsu na bɛɛkɔ́ku Blɔti lɛni? Abu ku bula bati kuuku bútakana etila amɛni udu buti! Bi ɔsu na biiti-nya taasia baƒɔtaadine bamɛni lɛlɔ?
Oowo! Bɔƒɔ bɔni na bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ɔsu na Katɔti úti Blɔti Yesu kɔnyana bɔnu ɔ́ƒɔ-bu ngba aani kalɛ kani na ama lɛnɔ báƒɔ bádi.”
Amu na bana ƒui báda butemi báya na bélie beenú akɔla ani na Paulo ku Barnaba baasu ka Blɔti ɔkɛ bana lɛlɔ ɔ́bla úte ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ.
Uwi ɔni na ama báwɔlɔ ni, Yakobo lɛnɔ ɔ́ta únye na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Banwa, bɛkywɛ atu na binu.
Simon Petro únyimene-bu kudeedi kɔni na Katɔti údie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔ́tina bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na ɔ́ƒuna bana akɔ badi.
Na litemi lɛni na nwuna kenye bediene básu bése líbo lɛni aani kalɛ na bénweni ka Unwoti ɔ́su ɔnini,
'Nwuna kama ni, ndubɔsɔ libo na mbasɔku Dawid lɛga kadikɔ lise na lɛklibi ala ani néebie mmɔ, na asɔ atɛ kaduɛ.
Mmɔ asa na bekyuli bani nébu ku ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ƒui bani na lɛ́lɔ aani mina badi badubɔwia-mi kama ulu. Lɛni na Unwoti ɔni mɔɔbla ala amɛni ƒui ɔ́su úse.
Katɔti ɔgyi nwuna ablala ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.'
“Anwuɔsu ami Yakobo mɔɔsu-mii ka bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ mɛni na béti lɛlɔ béte Katɔti ni, utalɛka butile-ma ala bɔgya.
Mmomu bɛya bunweni-ma ɔku na bada ala aani béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ na aayá na beesé lɛlɔ bɔbla baya ku kɔsɔnɔ bɔdi ku bebuo bani bélii-ma amɔ bádu bɔkun ku ubugya bɔni baya.
Ɔsika ɔ́si kuuku ni, ala ani na Mose únweni úse mɛni ni, anya na baaká na baasu na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ na lɛnwunameyi biala na lɛma biala kemo.”

Amu na batalane ku benengu bani nábasa mmɔ ƒui bátuna, na bédie bekyuli badi banii basiaku Paulo ku Barnaba na besie Antiokia. Nkyuli inyɔ bani na bédie mmɔ badi baƒɔtaadine bammɔ benengu inyɔ. Ama ndi Yuda ɔni na basɔ baalɔ Barsaba ku Silas.

Na ɔku ɔni na bada bésienku mmɔ kemo etemila aasu anii Ɔmɛni ɔ́si abu batalane ku benengu ku banwa bani nkya Yerusalem kudɔ. Bɔnii buugyele amii banwa bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na bɛ́si Antiokia ku Siria ku Kilikia.
Búnu ka baƒɔtaadine badi bási bula akɔ mɛni, na bébo mmɔ bábakyaku-mii unyeƒi na bula Yudaƒuɔ ɔlɔna bukulo ɔdi lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, bútatala-ma bɔnii babasu-mii ala amɛni udu.
Anwuɔsu ka bɔ́sala eli ni, bɔ́tala bula akɔ benengu inyɔ bamɛni bɔnii basiaku bula banwa bayɔne Paulo ku Barnaba bani néti bana ngba bákpa béte Blɔti Yesu Kristo bɔnii bebo-mii kudɔ.
Yuda ku Silas ni, ama lɛnɔ badubɔsu-mii ala ani na búnweni mɛni lɛlɔ.
Ɔsika ɔdi Katɔti Kɔyu lɛƒɔyɔ ku abu lɛnɔ ka utalɛka buti Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo etila butile-mii bɔgya butulo ala amɛni.
Bini ala ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ ku ubugya bɔni ku bebuo bani na bélii-ma amɔ bádu bɔkun ku kɔsɔnɔ bɔdi. Si bɛda lɛlɔ lɛni ni, keyi kadubɔyɔku-mii. Bɛkya kpoo.
Anwuɔsu batu bamɛni ƒui bátɔlɔ bésie Antiokia. Na bana mmɔ buduo ni, bálɔ baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ƒui na bábasa. Na béti ɔku ɔni bada básiku Yerusalem mmɔ béte-ma.
Na ama bani nkya mmɔ ƒui bákɛ ebiti ɔ́si etemila ani na báka na ɔku ɔmmɔ kemo ɔsu.
Amu ka Yuda ku Silas ƒui badi Katɔti kenye bediene ɔsu ni, bédie ala kalɔ béte-ma bébu uwi gyɔlɔɔ, na bákya-ma ogya ku ɔyikun.
Amu ka bélie mmɔ emeyi alɛɛ adi ni, bédie Yuda ku Silas ulu ka basɔ benwini besie Yerusalem.
Nsu Silas ni, anwu ɔ́lɛ ugyii ka ɔƒɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya mmɔ.
Amu na Paulo ku Barnaba básɔ bákya Antiokia mmɔ, na ama ku badi pii bakya baatina ala na baasu litemi buni lɛmmɔ.
Amu na emeyi adi kama ni, Paulo ɔ́su Barnaba ɔnini, “Ya na bɔsɔ butánu bula banwa bani nkya lɛma lɛni kemo na bɔ́su litemi buni lɛmɛni bɔ́vi, na bɔnu kalɛ na badaku.”
Barnaba ɔ́tuna na ɔ́wia ka nka utiku Yohane ɔni baalɔ Marko ɔda.
Nsu Paulo anwu útayɔ lɛni munu munu! Ɔsika uwi ɔni na ama ku-nwu bésie Pamƒilia ni, Marko Yohane útáda-ma ɔ́nyonu na mmɔ.
Amu na bana inyɔ bamɛni báni Marko Yohane lɛlɔ litemi lɛmɛni bénene laa ɔni náya na bégyingyaku lɛlɔ. Barnaba útiku Marko na básia ntu anumi na bátɔlɔ bésie Kipro.
Nsu Paulo anwu útiku Silas, na baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ béti-ma bákya Blɔti lɛkɔkɔ na bátɔlɔ.
Amu na bátásia Siria ku Kilikia na bákya baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bene ɔkplu.

Amu na Paulo ku Silas bátɔlɔ bésie ɔma ɔni baalɔ Derbe, na bákɛ mmɔ bávi bésie Listra. Na mmɔ na bésie bátánu ɔƒɔtaadine ɔni baalɔ Timoteo. Na uni ɔdi Yudani, na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ Kristo ɔ́di. Nsu ɔti ɔdi Grikini.
Na baƒɔtaadine bani ƒui nkya Listra ku Ikonion ni, baabu Timoteo kaduɛ.
Anwu geen na Paulo ɔ́wia ka utiku na ɔsiaku-nwu. Anwuɔsu ɔ́bla-nwu Yudaƒuɔ ɔlɔna bukulo ɔdi, ɔsika Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya amadɔ mmɔ ƒui bagyi ka ɔti ɔdi Grikini.
Na ka báta ni, bakɛ baaví lɛma lɛni ƒui kemo, na baasu lɛla lɛni na Yerusalem benengu básu. Na básu-ma banii badi-nya lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu bekyuli bammɔ bémomo bébu, na lɛni kani na bana bɔƒɔtaadi lɛnɔ bɔ́yu ɔkplu búbu.
Na nwuna kama ni, bávi bésie Ƒrigia ku Galatia, ɔsika Katɔti Kɔyu kútete-ma kuƒi ka basu litemi buni na Asia kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Na ka bétédu Misia ni, báwia ka batávi Bitinia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu mɛni lɛnɔ ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kútatuna ka besie mmɔ.
Anwuɔsu básɔ bénwini básia Misia kalɔ na bétédu ɛpu kudɔ na ɔma ɔni baalɔ Troa.
Usien ɔmmɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́nu budie bɔtina bɔdi na kɔna kemo. Na kɔna kɔmɛni kemo ni, ɔ́nu ɔnana ɔdi ɔni nási Makedonia na unye uuvele-nwu ɔnini, “Via bo Makedonia mɛni na ebebunku-bu o-o!”
Amu na budie bɔtina bɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bɔ́klibi lɛlɔ na bɔ́tɔlɔ búsie Makedonia. Ɔsika ɔmɛni ɔɔtina-bu ka Blɔti ɔɔwia ka ɔtala-bu na busie butásu litemi buni lɛmɛni na mmɔ.
Amu na bútélie ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi kemo na Troa, na bɔ́via búsie Samotrake. Na ka kadi kégye ni, búsie bútéduo Neapoli.
Ka bɔ́si mmɔ ni, bútéduo Ƒilipi ɔni ndi Makedonia ɔma udeedi. Na mmɔ lɛnɔ ɔdi Romaƒuɔ kalɛkɛ. Na búlie mmɔ emeyi adi.

Amu na lɛnwunameyi lɛlɔ ni, bɔ́vi bɔ́lɛ ɔma ɔmɛni kemo na búsie ketu kadi kudɔ na kesii kani na bɔ́kali ka mmɔ na bekyuli beesié taatákpali katɔ. Na búlie mmɔ bɔ́su beleku bani nébo mmɔ Blɔti litemi.

Na bana kemo unwi baalɔ banii Lidia. Uuyé adi agyiedi na Tiatira, na ɔdi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbu Katɔti geen. Na uwi ɔni na ɔkya uunú bula butemi bɔmɛni ni, Blɔti úbimi-nwu kasusu na ɔ́ƒɔ etemila ani na Paulo ɔ́su mɛni ƒui.

Amu ka anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ni, úvele-bu ɔnini, “Si bɛ́tuna bɛnii ndi ɔƒɔtaadine geen nte Blɔti ni, na bibeduo-mi kudɔ.” Na ɔ́ni litemi lɛmɛni úneneku-bu útédu ka búsie bútéduo-nwu kudɔ.
Amu na limeyi lɛdi uwi ɔni na búsela butákpali katɔ ni, bɔ́siaku ugblebi ɔdi ɔni lɛlɔ na kɔyu kukpidi kulie na uubó like. Na ɔɔbla egulabi kaduɛ teete nwuna benwoti.
Amu na ugblebi ɔmɛni ɔ́siaku abu ku Paulo kama na ɔɔva taasu ɔnini, “Bekyuli bamɛni badi Katɔti kabla bablane, na bébo mɛni bani babatina-mii ngba bɔƒɔ ulu!”

Amu na lɛla lɛmɛni lísie anumi emeyi pii. Na ka Paulo ɔ́nɔ bɔnu ni, únwini na ɔ́su kɔyu kɔni nsiaku ugblebi ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Mɔɔbɔku-ɔ na Yesu Kristo lɛnyi kemo nnii vi lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ!” Na kɔnakunwi ni, kɔyu kukpidi kɔmɛni kɔ́vi kɔ́lɛ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo!
Amu ka nwuna benwoti bánu ka bana lɛlakɛ lɛ́yii ɔsu ni, béƒie Paulo ku Silas na báni-ma bésienku litemi katɛkɔ benengu na kuyentɛ.
Na básu na kuye mmɔ banini, “Bekyuli bamɛni badi Yudaƒuɔ, na bakya beebile bula ɔma.
Bakya baatina bekyuli ala ani na muunye teetile Romaƒuɔ ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.”
Na bekyuli pii bábaka bámana-ma, na benye beedí Paulo ku Silas teete lɛlɔ. Na litemi batɛne bamɛni báya na báni-ma lɛwu bábwɛ, na béte kuƒi banii bebo-ma kugyiimi.
Amu ka ebola éduo-ma lɛlɔ kaduɛ ni, béti-ma bátákya aban ɔtɔ. Na básu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔnu ama bani ntɛ ɔtɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ banii ɔda Paulo ku Silas kaduɛ.
Na ka bébo-nwu ɔda lɛni ɔsu ni, úti-ma útákya kasuudikɔ ƒui na bébo-ma kɔgba.
Amu na usientɛ uwi ɔni na Paulo ku Silas bakya baakpali katɔ na beedie lɛnu teete Katɔti ni, bani ntɛ ɔtɔ mmɔ bakya beenú.
Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ kákunku momoomo, na ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛnɔ ɔ́kunku ɔni na ɔtɔ kɔyakun ƒui kɔ́lɛmi, na kɔgba kɔni bébo báda batɔntɛne bammɔ ƒui kɔ́ƒɛ.
Amu na bana lɛlɔ ɔnune úkeyi lɛlɔ ɔ́gyinya na ɔ́nu ka ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kɔyakun ƒui kɔ́lɛmi kuwi. Na ka ɔ́kali ɔnii ɔtɔ batɛne bammɔ ƒui békeli ɔsu ni, ɔ́kpa nwuna kewii ɔnii ɔɔdú lɛlɔ.
Nsu ka Paulo ɔ́nu ɔ́ti lɛla lɛni na ɔ́yɔ ka ɔbla lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́kpali-nwu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Tabla! Bula ƒui bɔkya mɛni.”
Amu na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔ́lɔ ɔnii beti ukpo beboku. Na lɛlɔ bɔtɔ kemo ni, úbalɛ akɔnkɔ na Paulo ku Silas anumi.
Na ka ɔ́da-ma údie ɔtɔ ɔmɛni kemo ni, úye-ma ɔnini, “Ati bene, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla asa na lɛkɛ bɔƒɔ?”
Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Ƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo di, na adubɔkɛ bɔƒɔ, awɔ ku ƒula kaduli bekyuli ƒui.”
Na bésie bátásu anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi buni lɛmɛni.
Na usien ɔmmɔ kani na ɔ́mana-ma alɛbi ani nsia-ma lɛlɔ, na anwu ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi.
Amu na béduo ɔtɔ na úte-ma lɛla lɛdi bádi. Na nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui bákɛ ebiti geen, ɔsika báƒɔ Katɔti bádi.
Amu na kadi kégye ni, ɔma ɔmmɔ litemi batɛne bátala beƒiene banii bátásu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔnu batɔntɛne lɛlɔ mmɔ banii, “Nyonu baƒɔ bammɔ na beteesie.”
Amu na bana lɛlɔ ɔnune ɔmɛni ɔ́su Paulo ku Silas ɔnini, “Litemi batɛne banii nnyonu-mii na biteesie. Anwuɔsu biteesie ku keyi buɛɛ.”

Amu na Paulo ɔ́su beƒiene bammɔ ɔnini, “Bébo-bu na bekyuli ƒui anumi ɔni bátatɛku-bu litemi lɛdi asa na béti-bu bátákya aban ɔtɔ kemo. Nsu ni, Romaƒuɔ na bɔdi! Na ɔƒɛni na baawia ka bɔbɛ bɔtɔlɔ? Kudii! Ya ama alati bebo bebedie-bu!”
Amu na beƒiene bamɛni bénwini bésie bátásu litemi batɛne kenye kamɛni. Na ka bénu ka Paulo ku Silas badi Romaƒuɔ ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen!
Ɔmɛni ɔsu bésie bétékpi-ma kɔtɔ, na bákpanku-ma bálɛku aban ɔtɔ. Na bévele-ma banii batɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo na beteesie likpo bamba.
Amu na Silas ku Paulo bátɔlɔ bésie Lidia kesii. Na mmɔ na bátánu baƒɔtaadine bakladi. Na básɔ bákya-ma ogya bébu asa na bátɔlɔ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
Amu ka bésie bátásia Amƒipoli ku Apolonia ni, bétédu Tesalonika. Na mɛni na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi kákya.
Amu na aani kalɛ na Paulo ɔɔyɔ́ bɔbla ni, úsie mmɔ ɔnii utétemi ute-ma na kasalakɔ mmɔ. Na anwunameyi atɛ sɔɔn ni, útaatina Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila.

Na uudie lɛbibo lɛni na básu bése ka Kristo ɔdubo bɔnu ku kalɛ na ɔsɔ ɔdubɔta na ulie ngba ɔni na ɔsɔ ulekpi. Paulo ɔ́su-ma ɔnii, “Ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ litemi mɔɔsu-mii mɛni ndi Yesu ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.”

Etemila ani na údie kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma mɛni énwini bekyuli bamɛni badi kasusu, na báƒɔ bádi na básiaku Paulo ku Silas. Na Grikiƒuɔ bani nda lɛlɔ na Katɔti bɔyia kemo pii ku beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu pii lɛnɔ bénwini kayi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.

Nsu anumi égyie Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune na bana lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu bátáwia bekyuli basa basa badi na ɔmankemo banii batákya ɔma bekyuli ogya. Na básala otogyi bákya lɛsɛ lɛmɛni na bésie bátáka bámana Yason kaduli banii betéƒie Paulo ku Silas besienku ɔma ɔmmɔ kasalakɔ.
Nsu ka bátanu-ma ɔsu ni, béƒie Yason ku baƒɔtaadine badi na báni-ma bésienku kasalakɔ. Mmɔ na baava taasu banini, “Bekyuli badi bakɛ baakya lɛsɛ likpo biala, na bébo mɛni lɛnɔ baakya lɛsɛ lɛmmɔ.
Na anwu Yason lɛnɔ ɔ́ƒɔ-ma ɔ́kya nwuna kaduli. Na bekyuli bammɔ báta bénye Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare ɔda bubo lɛlɔ. Na baatina ka ɔnana ɔni baalɔ Yesu ndi Ɔga!”
Amu ka bénu ɔmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da otogyi ɔmmɔ ku ɔma benengu.
Na báya na Yason ku nwuna badi báƒɔ kɔtu bɔni kayu asa na bányonu-ma.
Nsu usien ɔmmɔ kani ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nkya ɔma ɔmmɔ bétiku Paulo ku Silas békeliku bésienku Beroia. Na ka bétéduo mmɔ ni, bésie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ batásu litemi buni lɛmɛni.

Na Beroiaƒuɔ ni, bana kasusu kébimi kétulo Tesalonikaƒuɔ kadi. Na bése atu na bénu bana butemi. Na limeyi ndi limeyi ni, bátaawia Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila taanu si Paulo ala ani na ɔ́su adi sɔsɔ.
Anwuɔsu bana akɔ pii báƒɔ bádi. Grikiƒuɔ beleku bani lɛlɔ mbo ɔbu pii bénwini kayi ku banana pii lɛnɔ.
Nsu uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya Tesalonika bénu ka Paulo ɔkya ɔɔsu litemi buni na Beroia ni, bávi bésie mmɔ bátákya kadɔ na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
Nsu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ni, báta kɔnakunwi na bétiku Paulo bésienku ɛpu kudɔ. Na Silas ku Timoteo báƒɔ lɛlɔ bákya kama.
Ama bani nsiaku Paulo mmɔ béti-nwu bétédu Atene. Na mmɔ na ama básɔ bénwini na Paulo ɔ́sia-ma kenye ɔnii batásu Silas ku Timoteo na bekeli babasiaku-nwu.
Uwi ɔni na Paulo ɔ́kya Atene na unye ɔgya Silas ku Timoteo bene ni, úduo kɔnyana ɔni na ɔ́nu kalɛ na kadi kammɔ bekyuli béti lɛlɔ béte lɛƒiɔkpa, na ɔma ɔmmɔ úyi ku baƒiɔ ala.
Anwuɔsu úsie útátɛmiku Yudaƒuɔ ku bekyuli bamba lɛnɔ na bana kasalakɔ. Na limeyi ndi limeyi ni, útaatɛmiku bani lɛnɔ na ɔ́nu na kuye.

Amu na uwi ɔdi ni, anwu ku bekyuli lisu lɛdi bani ndi Epikuroƒuɔ ku Stoaƒuɔ bani nlie nte kayawi lɛnunda bákya ku Paulo unyeƒi na básu banini, “Bi na ɔnana ɔmɛni uutemi taasu?” Amu na babambadi lɛnɔ básu banini, “Use aani kalɔ bamba baƒiɔ badi lɛlɔ kɔtɛ na ɔɔtɛmi.” Na bekyuli bammɔ básu lɛni ɔsika bénu ka Paulo ɔ́su litemi buni ɔ́siku Yesu ku nwuna bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ ɔsu.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, béti-nwu bésienku kesii kani na baatɛ etemila na Areopago benengu kasalakɔ, na básu banini, “Bɔwia bɔti lɛla lɛni na ala awɔdi ani na aatina mɛni adanku.
Ɔsika ala ani na aasu ni, eeese-bu nwaa. Anwuɔsu bɔɔyɔ́ bunu-nya kalɔ.”
Na Ateneƒuɔ ƒui ku baƒɔ bani nkya kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui ni, bebo kɔnu bete kɔtɛ keeke ku ala awɔdi bugyeli.
Amu na Paulo ɔ́ta únye kasalakɔ bekyuli bammɔ anumi, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Na ulu biala lɛlɔ ni, lɛ́nu ka amii Ateneƒuɔ ni, bɛɛsia lɛkpa anu geen.

Ɔsika ɔni na nkɛ mɔɔví na lɛ́nu bina kɔkpakɔ ni, lɛ́nu lɛkpatabi lɛdi lɛlɔ ka bénweni básia-ni lɛlɔ banii, 'Amɛni búti buute Bula Ɔti ɔni na bɔɔɔgyi.' Na Ati ɔni na bɛɛɛgyi asa na bɛɛkpá-nwu mɛni ni, nwuna lɛlɔ litemi mɔɔyɔ́ ka lɛsu-mii ɔƒɛni.
“Ati ɔmɛni ndi ala ƒui Ɔti ɔni nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui. Na ulélie ɔtɔ ɔni na ukyuli ɔyawine enu ábla kemo.
Na ulawia bɔdi lɛnɔ taasiku bayawine enu kabla kadi lɛnɔ kemo, ɔsika anwu ɔlati muute ukyuli biala ngba ku lɛkɛ.
Údie bayawine ƒui ɔ́siku ukyuli unwi lɛlɔ ɔnii bulie aani ubugya unwi bebi na kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ. Anwu ɔlati nése uwi ku kadikɔ úse úte ɔdi biala.
Na bula Ɔti ɔ́bla ɔmɛni úte abu bekyuli kalɛ na bɔwia-nwu kama ulu na bɔnu-nwu, ina ka nka utagyunku-bu.
Ɔsika aani kalɛ na bina agyangba bediene básu ni, 'Anwu nli na buli, na bɔdubɔsiaku-nwu na bɔtɛ bɔlɛɛ.' Na básu lɛnɔ banini, 'Bɔdi nwuna kaba.'
“Na ka bɔdi Katɔti bebi ɔsu ni, utalɛka bɔkali bɔnii Katɔti ɔmɛni use aani lɛla lɛni na abu bayawine néti enu bɔ́bla aani sika ugyiedi iye ɔƒualadi iye ugyii iye lɛtabi iye ala anwidi lɛnɔ kalɛ.
Na ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ úti úbedu uwi ɔmɛni kemo ni, Katɔti útani bekyuli kɔtu ɔsika bátati-nwu. Nsu ɔƒaani ni, úbo-bu ɔda ɔnii bɔda anumi budie ala amɛni bene lɛlɔ na bunwini anumi buboku-nwu kudɔ.

Ɔsika anwu údie limeyi lɛdi úse lɛni lɛlɔ na ukyuli ɔni na ɔ́ƒuna úse wabatɛku-bu litemi ɔ́si bula ɔbladu lɛlɔ. Na údie Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmɛni ɔ́tina-bu nwaa ɔ́si ɔni na ɔ́gyila-nwu ɔ́siku kekpine na ɔ́sɔ úbo úbelie ngba.”
Nsu uwi ɔni na bénu ka Paulo ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́siku bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ ni, bana akɔ badi báma-nwu. Na badi lɛnɔ básu banini, “Bɔsɔ bɔɔyɔ́ ka bunu etemila adi bɔsiku ukyuli bɔsɔ taata lɛlɔ.”
Amu ka úbo úte lɛni ni, Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ.
Nsu bekyuli badi bábasiaku-nwu na bénwini baƒɔtaadine. Na bana akɔ ɔdi ndi Areopago unengu ɔni baalɔ Dionisio ku uleku ɔni baalɔ Damari ku badi lɛnɔ.
Amu na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ Atene úsie Korinto.

Mmɔ na útánu Yudani ɔni baalɔ Akwila, na báwɔ-nwu na Ponto. Anwu ku ulekudi Priskila bási Italia bébo mmɔ uwi útetu tɔ, ɔsika kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔni baalɔ Klaudio ɔ́su ka Yudaƒuɔ ƒui balɛ Roma. Paulo úsie útanu-ma,
na ɔ́kya-ma kudɔ úteebunku-ma na bebuo lɛku bɔka kabla kani na anwu lɛnɔ ɔɔbla taadi kemo.
Amu na lɛnwunameyi biala ni, Paulo uusié Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ teetédie ala kalɔ teete Yudaƒuɔ ku Grikiƒuɔ ƒui kalɛ benwini kayi.
Amu na uwi ɔni na Silas ku Timoteo bási Makedonia bébo ni, Paulo ɔ́kɛ uwi kaduɛ úti úte litemi buni bɔsu ku kalɔ budie taatina Yudaƒuɔ ka ni, Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ geen.

Amu uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni báta bénye-nwu lɛlɔ na beetemi enyekpi taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ ni, Paulo úveli enu úwi-ma, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si bɛ́yii ni, mina kɔnu, mina ɔgba uuubo-nwu kemo. Ɔ́si ɔƒaani ni, lísela bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ kudɔ ntásu-ma litemi buni lɛmɛni.”
Na ka ɔ́gyu-ma kudɔ ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ útákya ɔnana ɔdi ɔni naaadi Yudani na baalɔ-nwu banii Tito Yusto kudɔ ɔni mɔɔbu Blɔti na ulie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kudɔ.
Amu na kasalakɔ kammɔ unengu ɔni baalɔ Krispo ku nwuna kaduli bekyuli ƒui báƒɔ Blɔti bádi, na bákpila-ma ntu. Lɛni kani na bákpila babambadi bani náƒɔ bádi lɛnɔ ntu na Korinto mmɔ.
Amu na limeyi lɛdi usientɛ ni, Blɔti ɔ́su Paulo na kɔna kemo ɔnini, “Tayia! Na tada litemi lɛmɛni bɔsu taya.
Ɔsika nsiaku-ɔ, na ukyuli ɔdi ulákana-a likpidi lɛdi bɔbla. Bekyuli pii bakya ɔma ɔmɛni kemo bani ndi mina badi.”
Anwuɔsu Paulo úlie ɔma ɔmɛni kemo lɛkwa linwi ku kakɛ ɔ́su Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni ɔ́tina bekyuli.
Nsu uwi ɔni na bése Galio Roma aban lɛga na Akaia kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ badi bábla lɛkpa lɛdi na bánwi litemi bámana Paulo lɛlɔ na béƒie-nwu bésienku litemi katɛkɔ.
Amu na básu ɔga ɔmmɔ banini, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni uunwíni bekyuli kasusu ɔnii bataakpa Katɔti na ulu ɔni náta únye bula ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.”

Nsu uwi ɔni kani na Paulo úse kalɔ ɔnii uteedie kenye ni, aban lɛga ɔdine Galio ɔmɛni útemi na ɔ́su Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni ɔnini, “Amii Yudaƒuɔ binu! Si litemi lɛni bɛda bíboku mɛni lɛdi bɔƒiɔ bubendi bɔdi ni, ndubɔkɛ kayi na linu bina litemi.
Nsu ka unyeƒi ukpludi na bɛɛkya na bina etemila ku ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ɔsu ni, amii alati bitásu-ni. Ɔɔɔdi ami mabla litemi ɔtɛne mete-mii na ala amɛni lɛlɔ.”
Anwuɔsu ɔ́bɔku-ma ɔ́lɛku nwuna litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ.
Amu na bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni béƒie Sostene ɔni ndi bana kasalakɔ kammɔ ɔtɔnkune na bétébo-nwu na litemi katɛkɔ kamɛni kudɔ. Nsu Galio útakpete-ma.

Amu na Paulo úlie Korinto ɔma ɔmɛni kemo emeyi pii. Na nwuna kama ni, ɔ́kada baƒɔtaadine bamɛni na anwu ku Akwila ku Priskila básia ntu anumi bésie Siria. Nsu asa na watɔlɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́ya na békpeyi-nwu lili na Kenkrea na Yudaƒuɔ ɔdi lɛlɔ ɔ́si kenye kani na úse ɔsu.
Ka úbayu na Eƒeso ni, ɔ́da Priskila ku Akwila ɔ́kya ɔkɔlɔ kemo mmɔ. Nsu anwu ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ ɔnii utéduoku Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ ala adi kemo.
Amu na bévele-nwu banii ulie-ma kudɔ ubu, nsu ɔ́nu ka uuubo uwi.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ka ɔɔtɔlɔ ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Si Blɔti ɔ́tuna ni, ndubɔsɔ linwini libo-mii kudɔ.” Na ɔ́sɔ útéduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na ɔ́tɔlɔ Eƒeso.
Na ka útéduo Kaesarea ni, ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Yerusalem na útákya baƒɔtaadine bammɔ kenye. Na ɔ́sɔ úbavi ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Antiokia.
Na ka ɔ́kya mmɔ uwi ɔdi ni, ɔ́sɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie útásia Galatia ku Ƒrigia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔmɛni ƒui ni, ɔkɛ ɔɔví taanu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ bene, na ɔɔkya-ma ɔkplu.
Amu na Yudani ɔdi úbo Eƒeso. Anwu baalɔ Apolo, na báwɔ-nwu na Aleksandria. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔni na kenye káda-nwu, na ɔgyi Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila lɛnɔ.
Na ina ka únu Blɔti lɛlɔ litemi na uutemi ku ogya ni, Yohane ntu bɔkpila lɛlɔ ala kani na ɔgyi.
Amu ka unye uutemi ku kayi buse na kasalakɔ mmɔ na Priskila ku Akwila bénu ni, bákpanku-nwu bésienku kaduli na bédie Blɔti etemila kemo bátina-nwu kaduɛ bébu.

Amu na ka Apolo ɔ́bla kasusu ka usie Akaia ni, Eƒesoƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine bébebunku-nwu na bénweni ɔku béte baƒɔtaadine bani nkya Akaia mmɔ banii si úbeduo mmɔ ni, na baƒɔ-nwu kaduɛ. Na uwi ɔni na útéduo mmɔ ni, úbunku bekyuli pii bani nébenwini kayi na Blɔti kɔnyana bɔnu ɔsu.
Na nwuna etemila ammɔ ádi Yudaƒuɔ lɛlɔ, ɔsika úti Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila údie ɔ́tina nwaa ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ.
Amu uwi ɔni na Apolo ɔkya Korinto ni, Paulo lɛnɔ útávi lɛgba ulu ɔtɔdi, na útédu Eƒeso. Mmɔ na útánu baƒɔtaadine badi.
Amu na úye-ma ɔnini, “Ɔ́si uwi ɔni na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́di ni, bɛ́ɛƒɔ Katɔti Kɔyu?” Amu bédie kenye banini, “Oowo! Bi ndi Katɔti Kɔyu? Bútenu-ku tɔ lɛla lɛdi.”
Amu na ɔ́sɔ úye-ma ɔnini, “Na bina ntu bɔkpila kalɔ ndi dɛ?” Na básu-nwu banini, “Amu ndi Yohane ntu bɔkpila lɛsa lɛni na ɔ́kɔ.”

Amu na Paulo údie kalɔ ɔ́tina-ma ɔnini, “Yohane ɔ́kpila bekyuli bani nénwini kama bákya bana ekpidi ntu. Na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii baƒɔ ukyuli ɔni ndubɔsia anwu Yohane kama badi. Na ukyuli ɔmmɔ ndi Yesu Kristo.”
Amu ka bánya bénu litemi lɛmɛni ni, báya na ɔ́kpila-ma ntu na Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi kemo.
Na uwi ɔni na Paulo úti enu ɔ́sia-ma lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ kemo ƒui, na bésie kalɔ ku adi lidu lidu butemi na bédie Blɔti ala kenye.
Amu na bana bumomo bɔ́bla aani banana leevu-inyɔ.
Amu na Paulo úteesie Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ taatátɛmi ku ogya abuli atɛ, na uudie ala kalɔ taatina-ma. Na uunwíni bana kasusu teesienku Blɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ.

Nsu badi ama bétenu nwuna litemi buni lɛmɛni, na báta bénye Blɔti lilu ku ala bɔtina lɛlɔ na kadi ƒui anumi. Anwuɔsu Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma kudɔ. Na útiku bani náƒɔ bádi úsienku Tirano lɛgbanya kemo. Na mmɔ na útaatɛmiku-ma limeyi ndi limeyi.
Amu na akwa anyɔ kemo ni, lɛni na ɔ́tina-ma ala. Na litemi buni lɛmɛni lígyingya lɛ́kya Asia kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ mmɔ ƒui. Na ama bani ndi Yudaƒuɔ ku Helaƒuɔ lɛnɔ bénu-ni.
Amu na Blɔti úte Paulo ɔyikun ɔni na úti ɔ́bla akɔla budie taatina.
Na si béti nwuna adala adi bétuku ɔlɛne ɔdi muedi ni, aabwi-nwu, na asɔ aagyá ayu ekpidi lɛnɔ taalɛku bekyuli bani kemo na eli.

Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bevone badi bani nkɛ mɔɔví ekpo ekpo ni, básusu banii beeti Yesu lɛnyi bataabɔku ayu ekpidi. Na baasu banii, “Bɔɔbɔku-ɔ na Yesu ɔni lɛlɔ na Paulo ɔkɛ uutemi taasiku bɔnii vi lɛ ukyuli ɔmɛni kemo!”
Amu na bekyuli bani nátaabla udu ɔmɛni ndi bakloƒu maatɛ bani ndi Yudani ɔkpane unengu ɔdi ɔni baalɔ Skeva bebi.
Nsu ka bátásu kɔyu kukpidi kɔdi lɛni ni, kɔ́su-ma kɔnini, “Ami ngyi Yesu, na ngyi Paulo lɛnɔ. Nsu amii ni, lɛɛɛgyi-mii! Ɔma bene bɛdi?”
Amu na ukyuli ɔni lɛlɔ na kɔyu kukpidi kɔmɛni kulie ni, úbo-ma! Na báƒɔ lɛlɛ geen, na békeli bálɛ kaduli kammɔ ku kasɔngya!
Lɛla lɛni nálɛ mɛni lígyingya na líyi Eƒeso ƒui ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ ku ɔma ɔmmɔ bekyuli ƒui bénu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma geen, na Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi lɛ́sɔ lɛ́ƒɔ kuye líbu.
Amu na bani nénwini kayi ni, bébo bébedie bana lɛlɔ kalɔ na bekyuli anumi.
Amu na bana akɔ bani náƒɛ evo béti bana evo lɛku ku lɛsɛbɛ béboku na bákyula-nya na bekyuli anumi. Lɛku lɛmmɔ ƒui kuye kɔdubɔbla aani sika ɔƒualadi mpimu liti.
Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina kalɛ na Blɔti litemi lígyingya ku ɔyikun, na lɛ́ƒɔ mmɔ ƒui.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kúdie kɔ́tina Paulo ɔnii ɔvi usie Makedonia ku Akaia asa na usie Yerusalem. Na Paulo ɔ́su ɔnini, “Si líduo mmɔ ni, ɔlɛka lɛvi lisie Roma lɛnɔ.”
Amu na ɔ́tala nwuna bebunkune inyɔ, Timoteo ku Erasto, na bágyu batɔ-nwu na Makedonia. Na anwu ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kya kama na Asia mmɔ uwi blii ɔdi.
Amu na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, lɛƒɛda bonwu lɛdi líbebo na Eƒeso na Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ kama bɔsiaku ɔsu.

Ɔmɛni úse kalɔ ɔ́si ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Demetrio ɔni muuti sika ɔƒualadi taakywɛ kakpakɔ ala. Na anwu ku nwuna bebunkune beeyé-nya teete bekyuli bani muubo taabakpa bana baƒiɔ bani baalɔ Artemi. Na ala amɛni buye eete-ma kɔsia geen.
Limeyi lɛdi ni, Demetrio ɔ́lɔ bakywɛne bamɛni ƒui ɔ́sala na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Banwa, bɛgyi ka bɔɔkɛ́ kɔsia geen na bula kabla kamɛni ɔsu.

Na biinú na bɛɛnu kede kede kalɛ na Paulo ɔkya uuwi bula kabla kamɛni anumi kalɔ, na uunwíni bekyuli pii kasusu ɔnii baƒiɔ ala ani na bɔɔbla ƒui aaadi ala ani na bakya lili kalɔ bete! Ɔmɛni ɔsu na bula liyedi líbo kalɔ! Na ɔɔɔdi Eƒeso mɛni lɛti na ɔmɛni ɔdaku bɔlɛ. Mmomu ɔkya na Asia kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ ƒui!
Nsu ɔɔɔdi bula kabla lɛti ndubɔyii udu! Geen geen ni, bula uni baƒiɔ benengudi Artemi lɛnyi ku nwuna ɔbu ɔdubɔyii na Asia mɛni ƒui!”
Amu ka bénu Demetrio butemi bɔmɛni ni, ɔƒɛ ɔ́da-ma na bákɛ kɔnyi pii na báva momoomo básu banini, “Eƒesoƒuɔ Uni Artemi ndi baƒiɔ benengudi ƒui!”

Na kɔvanu kɔmmɔ kúgyingya kɔ́kya ɔma ɔmmɔ ƒui kemo. Anwuɔsu bása lisu na bétéƒie Paulo basiakune inyɔ badi bani baalɔ Gaio ku Aristarko na bási Makedonia. Na béti-ma bésienku ɔma ɔmmɔ kasalakɔ.
Amu na Paulo lɛnɔ ɔ́yɔ ka nka usie mmɔ, nsu Kristoƒuɔ bakladi bátatunaku-nwu.
Amu na kalɛkɛ kammɔ benengu bani lɛnɔ ndi Paulo bakpana ni, bátala ɔtu bákya-nwu na bévele-nwu banii utakya lɛlɔ mmɔ munu munu!
Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo ni, ɔtɔ ɔmmɔ kemo ƒui kéyi ku lɛsɛ. Na bekyuli bani nábasa mmɔ ni, ɔdi biala ku lɛla lɛni na ɔɔsu. Na bana pii muedi baaagyi lɛla lɛni ɔsu na bébo mmɔ.
Amu na bédi Aleksandro bétényene lɛtɔtɔ banii udie lɛla lɛni mɔɔlɛ́ mɛni kalɔ. Amu na Aleksandro ɔ́kɔliku enu katɔ na ɔ́bala-ma ɔnii baba lɛsɛ na ɔsu-ma lɛla lɛdi.
Amu ka bekyuli bamɛni báti ka Yudani na ɔdi ni, básɔ bése kalɔ baaní lɛsɛ ku kɔvanu laa na ɔ́ƒɔ lɛdɔ bubo kunyɔ uwi. Na baasu banini, “Eƒesoƒuɔ Uni Artemi ndi baƒiɔ benengudi ƒui!”

Uwi útu asa na aban unengu ɔdi ɔ́kana-ma bɔbala, na ɔ́tɛmi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Eƒesoƒuɔ, bina akɔ ɔdi biala ɔgyi ka Eƒeso mɛni ndi baƒiɔ benengudi Artemi keliekɔ. Na baƒiɔ lɛtabi kedee lɛni nási katɔ líbayu ni, bula lɛkɔkɔ na lɛkya.
Na ukyuli ɔdi ulakana litemi lɛmɛni ɔkɔ bɔsia. Anwuɔsu bɛkɛ kayi buɛɛ na bitabla lɛla lɛdi ku kɔnyi.
Ɔsika bekyuli bani na bíƒie bíboku mɛni ni, béteyu bula kakpakɔ lɛla lɛdi na bétebile bula Artemi baƒiɔ lɛnyi lɛnɔ.

Nsu si Demetrio ku nwuna bakywɛne bánu ka bebo litemi lɛdi ku ukyuli ɔdi ni, litemi batɛne bakya mɛni. Na bubo emeyi ani lɛlɔ na baatɛ etemila. Bakana bedie bana bɔƒiɔ batina-ma na mmɔ. Bɛya na buwi lɛlɔ na bɔsia ulu ɔbuni lɛlɔ.
Nsu si lɛla bamba na bɛɛwia bɛti ni, bɛya na bɔda bɔlɛ kadi benengu anumi.
Ɔsika ɔmɛni use aani si bɔ́ta bunye aban lɛlɔ. Na si Romaƒuɔ bekpone bébo bábanu ɔmwi limeyi lɛmɛni ablala ni, bulakana kenye budie, na badubɔni-bu kɔtu.”
Na ka ɔ́su ala amɛni ni, ɔ́bɔku-ma na bana ƒui bégyingya.
Uwi ɔni na lɛsɛ lɛmmɔ líbo kalɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́lɔ baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ɔ́sala. Na ka ɔ́kya-ma ɔkplu na bana bɔƒɔtaadi kemo ɔ́wɔlɔ ni, úye ulu na ɔ́kada-ma na ɔ́tɔlɔ úsie Makedonia.
Na nwuna ulu busie kemo ni, Paulo ɔ́vi ekutɛ ammɔ ƒui na ɔ́su-ma Blɔti etemila pii úti ɔ́kya-ma ogya útédu Akaia.
Mmɔ na ɔ́kya aani abuli atɛ. Uwi ɔni na ɔɔklibi lɛlɔ ka watɔlɔ wesie Siria ni, ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka Yudaƒuɔ bakya baawia nwuna ngba na ulu ɔdi lɛlɔ. Anwuɔsu ɔ́bla nwuna kasusu ɔnii ɔsɔ ɔɔsia usie Makedonia.

Na uwi ɔni na úsela ni, anwu ku bekyuli pii nkɛ. Na bekyuli bamɛni ndi Sopater ɔni nási Beroia na ɔdi Piro ubidi ku Aristarko ku Sekundo bani nási Tesalonika ku Gaio ɔni nási Derbe ku Tihiko ku Troƒimo bani nási Asia kalɛkɛ ku Timoteo.
Ama nágyu bátɔ-bu béténye ɔma ɔni baalɔ banii Troa bágya-bu.
Amu ka Yudaƒuɔ emeyi ani na bɔɔdi bodobodo ɔni néteƒu ávi ni, búti ɔkɔlɔ na Ƒilipi, na bútásiaku-ma na Troa emeyi alɔ kama. Na búlie mmɔ emeyi maatɛ.
Amu na Kwasida limeyi lideedi lɛlɔ ni, bɔ́sala lɛlɔ lisu bɔnii bɔɔdi Blɔti adila. Na ka Paulo ɔdubo bɔtɔlɔ kadi kegye ɔsu ni, útemi laa útédu usientɛ.
Na bátu likpo pii bése ɔtɔ ɔtɔdi ɔmmɔ kemo.

Amu ka Paulo útemi úsela laa ni, lɛlɛɛ líti okloƒu ɔni baalɔ Eutiko uwi ɔni na ulie katɔ ƒansili lɛlɔ. Mmɔ na ɔ́ƒami ɔ́si katu taasia ɔtɔ ɔtɛdi lɛlɔ ɔmmɔ úbayu kalɔ. Na bani nátása-nwu kudɔ ni, bánu ka úkpi.
Nsu ka Paulo ɔ́yu úbo kalɔ ni, ɔ́kpɛ-nwu uboku lɛlɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitebo kudu! Ɔkya ngba!”
Amu na bana ƒui básɔ bénwini bésie katɔ mmɔ bátádi Blɔti adila. Na básɔ bátɛmiku lɛlɔ útédu lɛdigye asa na Paulo ɔ́tɔlɔ.
Nsu ka okloƒu ɔni na bágyila mmɔ ɔ́sɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔsu ni, kayi káyɔ-ma.
Amu na Paulo ɔ́sia lɛgba ulu úsie Aso. Nsu abu bani na abu ku-nwu bɔkɛ ni, búti ɔkɔlɔ bɔ́gyu bɔ́tɔ-nwu kalɛ na butása mmɔ na buti-nwu aani kalɛ na ɔ́su.
Amu ka úbo úbanu-bu na Aso mmɔ ni, abu ku-nwu ƒui bɔ́tɔlɔ búsie Mitilene.
Na kadi kégye ni, bútéduo Kio. Amu na limeyi lɛni nsɔ nsia lɛmmɔ kama ni, bútéduo Samo. Amu na limeyi lɛtɛdi ni, búsie bútéduo Mileto.
Paulo ɔ́ya na búbo bɔ́vi Eƒeso, ɔsika útayɔ ka ɔdi uwi gyɔlɔɔ ɔdi na Asia kalɔ mmɔ. Na ɔ́lɛ ugyii ka si ɔ́kana ni, na uduo Yerusalem na Pentekoste limeyi lɛlɔ.
Amu ka bútédu Mileto ni, ɔ́tala batu ɔ́kya Eƒesoƒuɔ baƒɔtaadine benengu ɔnii bebo babanu-nwu na mmɔ.
Amu ka bébo ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Banwa, bina ƒui bɛgyi ka ńtalɛ-mii kama kudii ɔ́si limeyi lideedi lɛni na lɛ́ka Asia kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni bubo úti úbedu ɔƒaani.
Bɛ́nu kalɛ na lɛ́siaku Blɔti na lɛlɔ kalɔ buboku kemo, ina ka líbo abi ku keku ɔ́si ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ báwia ka badu-mi ɔsu.
Bɛɛnu-mi kaƒɔ. Lɛɛɛdi ulikplune. Na Blɔti ala ani ƒui ngyi na nwuna lɛlɔ ni, anya na lɛtina-mii, na ńteti ɔdi ńtabla-mii. Lɛ́tina Blɔti litemi lɛmɛni na kadi ƒui anumi ku bina kɔduli.
Na kesi kesii na lísie ni, lɛ́su Yudaƒuɔ ku Helaƒuɔ ƒui kpakplaa ka bada ekpidi bɔbla baya na benwini besie Katɔti kudɔ, na baƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo badi.
“Na ɔƒaani ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu-mi ka nteesie Yerusalem, ɔni na lɛɛɛgyi lɛla lɛni malɛku-mi mmɔ.
Nsu na lɛma lɛni ƒui kemo na mɔɔví ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔyá na mɔɔtí ka ndubɔtɛ ɔtɔ ku lɛbibo.

Nsu ɔmmɔ ɔɔɔdi-mi lɛla lɛdi. Ɔsika si ńtakana na lɛbla lɛla lɛni na Blɔti Yesu ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii mbabla ni, mina ngba buuubo-mi kɔsia kɔdi. Lɛla lɛni na Yesu ɔ́tala-mi ɔnii mbabla ndi ka lɛsu bekyuli Blɔti litemi buni ku kalɛ na Katɔti ɔɔnu-bu kɔnyana.
“Na ni, amii bani ƒui nénu mina ala bɔtina ɔ́si Blɔti lɛga kadikɔ ala lɛlɔ ni, bɔsɔ bulasa kudii.
Anwuɔsu muute-mii bɔti ka ni, si ɔdi ɔ́yila nwuna ngba ulu ni, beleti ukyuli ɔmmɔ kɔtɔ bɔdu balasia-mi lɛlɔ.
Sɔsɔ ni, ńteti Katɔti lɛga kadikɔ ulu lɛla lɛdi ńtabla-mii.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, binye lɛlɔ kagyumana. Katɔti Kɔyu nábla-mii batɔnkune ɔnii bɛda nwuna bebi bani na Katɔti úti úte-mii bɔda kɔkɔɔkɔ. Bɛda-ma kaduɛ, ɔsika Katɔti úwi Ubidi ubugya kalɔ úti udie-ma lili.
Na ngyi kede kede ka si lɛ́tɔlɔ-mii kudɔ ni, bekyuli badubo bɔta bukpoku-mii na begyingya-mii aani kalɛ na begiti beekpóku baƒonu.
Na bina akɔ muedi ni, badi badubo litemi geen lɛmmɔ bɔda bɔnyonu na bakpanku bekyuli pii basiaku bana ɔkɔ ala bɔtina kama.
Binye kagyumana na bɛkali bɛnu kalɛ na líti keku buwulo lɛ́lɛ-mii na lɛ́tina-mii ala usien ku ɔƒɛ na akwa atɛ ani na lɛ́kya-mii kudɔ kemo.

“Na ɔƒaani ni, líti-mii mɔɔkya Blɔti lɛkɔkɔ nnii ɔnu-mii lɛlɔ. Na nwuna litemi lɛni muubunku bekyuli mɛni lɛkya bina bɔƒɔtaadi ɔkplu kalɛ na wabla-mii katɔ ala badine aani bani na ɔ́ƒuna úte nwuna lɛlɔ.
Anumi étegyie-mi na ɔkpanadi sika ugyiedi iye ɔƒualadi iye lɛwu lɛlɔ.
Amii alati bɛgyi ka mina enu amɛni líti lɛ́bla kabla kani na ńtaadi ku kani na ńteeti taanu bekyuli bani nsiaku-mi lɛlɔ.
Lɛ́bla ala amɛni ƒui líti lɛ́tina-mii kalɛ na buteebunku bawabane, na binyimo litemi lɛni na Blɔti Yesu ɔ́su ɔnini, 'Bute bɔdia butulo bɔƒɔ.' ”
Na uwi ɔni na Paulo ɔ́wɔlɔ butemi bɔmɛni ni, ɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na ama ku-nwu bákpali katɔ.
Na bana ƒui bátu báda-nwu na beewulo ɔ́si bana lɛlɔ bɔkada bɔmɛni ɔsu.
Na lɛla lɛni nábla-ma ɔkwɛnu útulo ndi ɔni na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii basɔ baaadubo-nwu bɔnu ɔsu. Amu na básiaku-nwu na béti-nwu bétése ɔkɔlɔ kudɔ na ketu kenye mmɔ.
Amu na uwi ɔni na bɔ́kada lɛlɔ bɔ́wɔlɔ ni, bútéduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo na bɔ́via búsie Ko. Amu na kadi kégye ni, bútéduo Rodo na bɔkɛ mmɔ bɔ́vi búsie Patara.
Na mmɔ na bútéti ɔkɔlɔ ɔdi ɔni nésela Ƒoinike, na bɔ́tɔlɔ.
Amu na bɔ́nu Kipro kalɔ, na bɔ́da mmɔ bɔ́va na búti bɔ́yu kada kakɛ búsie bútáyu Tiro. Na bútásia kesii kani na badubudie ala ani nkya ɔkɔlɔ ɔmɛni kemo ƒui.

Amu na bɔ́lɛ búsie ɔmankemo bútánu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ. Na ka bɔ́nu-ma ni, búlie-ma kudɔ emeyi maatɛ. Na ka Katɔti Kɔyu kúdie kɔ́tina baƒɔtaadine bamɛni lɛla lɛni mebo Paulo lɛlɔ ni, ama bálɛ Paulo banii ɔsɔ utesie Yerusalem.
Amu na uwi ɔni na búlie-ma kudɔ bɔ́wɔlɔ na búsela ni, baƒɔtaadine bamɛni ku bana beleku ku bebi ƒui béti-bu bétésie ɛpu kɔtu, na bula ƒui bɔ́lɛ akɔnkɔ na bɔ́kpali katɔ.
Amu na bɔ́kada lɛlɔ na bɔ́gyu bútéduo ɔkɔlɔ kemo, na ama lɛnɔ bénwini bésie bana kɔduli.
Amu ka bɔ́ta Tiro ni, bútédi búnye Ptolemai. Mmɔ na bútégyele baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ, na búlie-ma kudɔ limeyi linwi.
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, bɔ́ta mmɔ búsie Kaesarea. Na bútéduo Litemi Buni Lɛsa Ɔkɔne Ƒilipo kesii. Anwu ndi bebunkune maatɛ bani na bédie na Yerusalem akɔ unwi.
Na ubo bebi begblebi ine bani neeelie agya na badi Katɔti kenye bediene.
Amu na búlie mmɔ emeyi pii adi. Na uwi ɔni na bɔkya mmɔ ni, Katɔti kenye udiene ɔdi ɔni baalɔ Agabo ɔ́si Yudea úbo mmɔ.

Amu ka úbo-bu kudɔ ni, ɔ́ƒɛnimi kabuli kani nda Paulo kevobi na únyimi anwu ɔlati enu ku lɛgba na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu ka lɛni na Yudaƒuɔ badubunyimi ukyuli ɔni mbo kabuli kamɛni na Yerusalem na beti-nwu bakya ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛlɔ badine enu kemo.”
Amu ka búnu etemila amɛni ni, abu ku bekyuli bani nkya mmɔ ƒui búvele Paulo bɔnii utesie Yerusalem.
Mmɔ na ɔ́su-bu ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na biiwulo na bɛɛƒɛ-mi enu lɛni? Ami lɛ́tuna ka benyimi-mi na Yerusalem, na likpi lite Blɔti Yesu lɛnyi.”
Amu na uwi ɔni na bɔ́nu bɔ́ti ka bulakana-nwu kasusu bunwini ni, bɔ́da-nwu bɔ́nyonu na bɔ́su bɔnini, “Babla Unwoti lɛƒɔyɔ.”
Amu na emeyi adi kama ni, bɔ́sala bula ala ƒui lisu na bɔ́tɔlɔ búsie Yerusalem.
Na Kaesarea baƒɔtaadine badi básiaku-bu. Na bákpanku Kiproni unengu ɔni baalɔ banii Mnason bada banii butéduo-nwu kudɔ na mmɔ. Na unengu ɔmɛni ɔdi ɔƒɔtaadine ɔ́si kukuuku.
Amu ka búduo Yerusalem ni, baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ báƒɔ-bu kaduɛ.
Na ka kadi kégye ni, Paulo útiku-bu na búsie bútánu Yakobo ku Yerusalem baƒɔtaadine benengu.
Na ka búgyele-ma bɔ́wɔlɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́su-ma ala ani ƒui na Katɔti ɔ́bla ɔ́kɛnku-nwu lɛlɔ na bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ akɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bana ƒui bémwi Blɔti. Amu na básu-nwu banini, “Ɔnwa ɔyɔne, agyi lɛla lɛni nálɛ Yerusalem mɛni. Yudaƒuɔ mpimu mpimu badi bakya bani náƒɔ bádi na bada Mose ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kpakplaa.
Badi básu-ma ka awɔ nátina Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya ekpo ekpo anii batasiaku Mose ɔda bubo ku bula ɔdi bɔbla kama, na ásu lɛnɔ ka betekulo bana bebi ago lɛnɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu bi na ɔlɛka bɔbla ɔƒaani? Bɔgyi ka badubutiku lɛlɔ na bebo. Ɔsika badubunu ka ébo-bu kudɔ mɛni.”
Amu na béte-nwu kasusu kadi banini, “Bubo nkyuli ine badi na bula ɔma mɛni, bani nése kenye.
Ti-ma sienku Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ na ebunku-ma na bana lili bukpeyi kayu bɔƒɔ. Ɔmɛni ndubɔya na ukyuli biala ɔnu ka ɔkɔ na bányi básia-a, na awɔ lɛnɔ ada Mose ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kaduɛ.

Na ama bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ na bénwini baƒɔtaadine ni, búnweni-ma ɔku na bɔ́su-ma ka ni, bada ala ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ bɔdi baya ku ubugya bɔni baya, na batakun bebuo bani na bélii-ma amɔ bádu, na batadi kɔsɔnɔ.”

Anwuɔsu ka kadi kégye ni, Paulo útiku banana bammɔ na bésie batábla lɛlɔ buveli ɔdi ɔmmɔ. Nwuna kama úsie Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ na útéte bakpane bɔti emeyi ani kama asa na lɛlɔ buveli ɔdi ɔmmɔ webo kawɔlɔkɔ kalɛ na beti etela beboku na babla akpala na bana lili.
Amu ka kébu blii na emeyi maatɛ ammɔ edu ni, Yudaƒuɔ badi bási Asia kalɛkɛ bábanu Paulo na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ. Amu na bátásala bekyuli badi lisu na bétéƒie-nwu.

Na bákya baava taasu banini, “Israelƒuɔ banana, bibebunku-bu o-o! Ɔnana ɔmɛni nkɛ mɔɔsu bekyuli ƒui taavi na kesi kesii ku mɛni lɛnɔ ɔnii batadi bula Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo lɛlɔ. Na lɛnɔ ni, uuti Grikiƒuɔ teeduoku Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ɔni mɔɔtina ka bula Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ kammɔ keesé lɛlɔ!”
Básu lɛni ɔsika uwi ɔdi kemo ni, bánu ka Paulo ku Troƒimo ɔni ndi Eƒesoni bakɛ na Yerusalem. Anwuɔsu bákali banii útiku-nwu úsienku Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ.
Amu na bɔva bɔmmɔ ɔsu ni, bekyuli ƒui béƒu na báta ku lɛsɛ na békeli bátása kakpakɔ mmɔ. Badi báni Paulo bálɛku kakpakɔ na bákalɛ kɔyakun ƒui.
Amu uwi ɔni na báwia ka badu-nwu ni, Romaƒuɔ bekpone unengu ɔdi únu ka Yerusalemƒuɔ ƒui báta baakya lɛsɛ.
Kɔnakunwi ni, útiku bekpone badi na bésie lɛsɛ kanikɔ mmɔ. Amu ka lɛsɛ bakyane bammɔ bánu bekpone bamɛni ni, báda Paulo bubo báya.
Mmɔ kani na bekpone bamɛni unengu ɔ́ya na béƒie Paulo na béti kɔgba inyɔ bébo báda-nwu. Amu na úye únu ukyuli ɔni na ɔnana ɔmmɔ ɔdi ku lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla.
Amu na bekyuli bamɛni kemo ɔdi biala ɔɔsu litemi bamba. Na ka bekpone unengu ɔmɛni ulenu litemi ƒeelee lɛdi ulasiku-ma kudɔ ɔsu ni, ɔ́ya béti Paulo batákya bekpone ɔtɔ kemo.

Amu ka bédu kayakun kakɔkɔ ni, úbo úte ka bekpone bamɛni bagyu Paulo basiku mmɔ na lɛnungyie lɛni na otogyi ɔmmɔ úti ɔsiaku Paulo ɔsu. Na bakpɛ-ma kama ku lɛsɛ momoomo na baasu banini, “Bɛyila-nwu udu!”
Nsu uwi ɔni na báwia ka beti-nwu bakya ɔtɔ kemo ni, Paulo ɔ́su bekpone unengu ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Mɔɔyɔ́ ka lɛtɛmiku-ɔ blii.” Amu na bekpone unengu ɔmɛni úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi! Eenú Griki butemi?”
Na ɔ́sɔ úye-nwu ɔnini, “Ɔɔɔdi awɔ ndi Egyipteni ɔni néti bekyuli badune mpimu ine bani náta bénye aban lɛlɔ uyelu ɔdi mɛni, na békeli bésie ketele kemo?”
Amu na Paulo údie kenye ɔnini, “Yudani na ndi. Báwɔ-mi na Tarso na Kilikia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ni, ɔɔɔdi ɔma ubliidi na ɔdi. Anwuɔsu, buvele, ya na lɛtɛmiku bekyuli bammɔ.”

Amu na unengu ɔmɛni ɔ́tuna ɔnii Paulo ɔtɛmiku-ma. Na Paulo úbenye kayakun ubili kakɔkɔ mmɔ na ɔ́kɔliku kɔnu katɔ na ɔ́bala bekyuli lisu lɛmɛni. Na ka báda lɛsɛ báya ni, útemi úte-ma na Yudaƒuɔ butemi kemo ɔnini,
“Ati bene ku banwa, agoo! Bɛya na lidie lɛlɔ kenye na binu.”
Amu na uwi ɔni na bénu ka Yudaƒuɔ lɛdi kemo na uutemi ni, básɔ bába lɛsɛ bébu.

Na Paulo ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Yudani na ndi, na báwɔ-mi na Tarso na Kilikia kalɔ lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, Yerusalem mɛni na lísie sukuu. Gamaliel kalɔ na lɛ́kya lɛ́tɛya ala. Bátina-mi bula bati ɔda bubo ala ku bana ɔdi ƒui kaduɛ geen. Na líti mina kayi ƒui líte Katɔti aani kalɛ kani na amii lɛnɔ bɛɛbla.
Na ɔ́si uwi ɔmmɔ ni, líse kalɔ muukpóku bekyuli bani nsiaku Kristo baƒɔtaadine ulu lɛlɔ, na mɔɔyá na baadú-ma. Na líƒie banana ku beleku lɛ́kya aban ɔtɔ kemo.

Ɔkpane unengudi ku kasalakɔ unengu biala ɔdubudie lɛla lɛni mɔɔsu mɛni kenye, ɔsika béteenweni lɛku teete-mi banii ntátaabla ala amɛni. Na uwi ɔni na lísela Damasko ni, béte-mi ɔyikun ka si lɛ́nu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mmɔ ni, na liƒie-ma, na linyimi-ma liboku Yerusalem na bani-ma kɔtu.
“Uwi ɔni na nkɛ lísela na úbu blii na liduo Damasko ni, ɔbla aani ɔƒiiwi lɛdɔ leevu-inyɔ kemo ni, kɔnakunwi bukeye bɔni mbo ɔkplu bɔdi bɔ́si katɔ búbewi-mi!
Amu na líbuli lɛ́tɛ kalɔ na línu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛɛsu-mi lɛnini, 'Saulo, Saulo, bi ɔsu na eekpóku-mi lɛni?'
“Amu na líye nnini, 'Ati, ɔma na adi?' “Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Ami ndi Yesu Nasareni ɔni na eekpóku kpakplaa.'
Na bekyuli bani na ami ku-ma bɔkɛ ni, bánu bukeye bɔmɛni, nsu bétenu ukyuli ɔni na ami ku-nwu bɔɔtɛmi mmɔ lɛdi.
“Na líye-nwu nnini, 'Blɔti, bi na ɔlɛka lɛbla?' “Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Ta, na eteesie Damasko. Mmɔ na ndubɔtina-a lɛla lɛni na lɛ́ƒuna líte-ɔ ka abla.'
Bukeye bubendi bɔmɛni bɔ́bwɛ-mi anumi ɔni na bekyuli bani na ami ku-ma bɔ́kɛ mɛni náda-mi kɔnu asa na bɔ́tɔlɔ bútéduo Damasko.
“Na mmɔ ni, ɔnana ɔdi ɔkya ɔni baalɔ Anania. Ɔdi ukyuli ɔni mɔɔkya lili kalɔ teete Katɔti geen, na ɔsiaku bula ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ lɛnɔ. Na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya mmɔ ƒui baabu-nwu kaduɛ.
Ukyuli ɔmɛni úbo úbenye-mi kudɔ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Ɔnwa Saulo, bimi anumi!' Na uwi ɔmmɔ kemo kani ni, mina anumi ábla nwaa na lɛ́nu-nwu!
Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Bula bati kuuku Katɔti náƒuna-a kalɛ na anu nwuna lɛyɔla ati, na anu nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi Kedee ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ ati, na eteenu-nwu lɛdi.
Ɔlɛka eti linyesia lɛmɛni esienku kesi kesii na asu bekyuli ƒui lɛla lɛni na ánu ku ani na énu ƒui.
Na ɔƒaani ni, lɛla lɛdi lɛ́sɔ lítebu. Ta, na aƒɔ ntu bɔkpila ɔdi. Na akpali Blɔti lɛnyi, na ɔdubɔƒɔ ƒula ekpidi udie-ɔ lɛlɔ.'
“Ɔmɛni kama ni, línwini lísie Yerusalem. Na ka nkya kakpakɔ mɔɔkpali katɔ ni, ɔ́bla-mi aani si bɔlɛɛ na nda, na lɛ́nu budie taatina bɔdi.
Mmɔ na Blɔti ɔlati ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Babla na avi alɛ Yerusalem, ɔsika mɛni bekyuli belénu-ɔ litemi lɛni na aasu taasiku-mi lɛlɔ.'
“Nsu lídie kenye nnini, 'Blɔti, bana ƒui bagyi ka ami ńteeƒie ama bani náƒɔ-ɔ badi na ńteebo-ma.
Na uwi ɔni na badubɔdu Steƒano ni, ami lɛnɔ lɛ́tuna, na bédie bana lɛwu béte-mi, na nda-nya asa na beebo-nwu atabi.'
“Nsu Blɔti ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, 'Ta, na eteesie ɔgyu kakaaka na kesii kani mɔɔtala-a na bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ akɔ!' ”
Amu na uwi ɔmɛni ƒui ni, bekyuli bamɛni benye kpoo beenú-nwu litemi. Nsu uwi ɔni na ɔ́su lɛla likplodi lɛmɛni ni, bana ƒui báva momoomo básu banini, “Aa! Bɛyila-nwu udu! Bɛtɔlɔku-nwu ƒui!”
Amu na báva momoomo na bése kalɔ baakuna bana lɛwu, na beebo ɔtumu lɛnɔ taakɔliku katɔ na kɔnyi ɔsu.
Na bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmmɔ ɔ́ya na béti-nwu béduoku ɔtɔ kemo ɔnii betébo-nwu na ɔwia ɔti lɛla lɛni ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni baakywɛ-nwu anumi lɛni.
Amu na uwi ɔni na benye beenyimi-nwu ni, Paulo úye Romaƒuɔ bekpone unengu ɔdi ɔnini, “Ulu ɔtɛ ka bebo Romani ubi ɔni na batatɛku-nwu tɔ litemi?”
Amu na unengu ɔmɛni úsie bana ɔtɔnkune kudɔ na útéye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi ɔdi na bɛɛbla mɛni? Ɔnana ɔmɛni ni, Romani na ɔdi!”
Anwuɔsu bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni úsie Paulo kudɔ na útéye-nwu ɔnini, “Anii bi? Romani na adi?” Amu na Paulo údie kenye ɔnini, “Romani geen na ndi!”
Amu na ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ami lɛnɔ Romani na ndi. Na ami líbo kayu pim asa na línwini Romani!” Amu na Paulo ɔ́sɔ údie kenye ɔnini, “Ami ni, mina bawɔne ƒui badi Romaƒuɔ.”

Mmɔ mmɔ ka bekyuli bani na nka benye kagyumana ka bebo-nwu mɛni bénu ka Romani na ɔdi ni, bana ƒui békeyi lɛlɔ na bákpɛ bésie kama. Amu ka bana ɔtɔnkune ɔ́ti ka Romani na ɔdi ni, ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́gyu-nwu na liƒu lɛ́da-nwu geen, ɔsika anwu néte kuƒi na bébo-nwu kɔgba.

Amu ka kadi kégye na bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni ɔɔwia ɔti lɛla lɛni nébo asa na baadá Paulo kenye ni, ɔ́lɔ Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu ku bana litemi batɛne ƒui na bábasala lisu. Na ɔ́ya na báƒɛnimi Paulo na bétiku-nwu béboku-ma anumi banii beeduo nwuna litemi kemo.
Amu ka Paulo ɔ́tɛ anu na ɔ́nu Yudaƒuɔ litemi batɛne bani nása bélie litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ kpoo ni, ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Banwa, mina kayi kaladu-mi kɔtɔ kɔdi na Katɔti anumi úbedu ɔmwi kadi kamɛni lɛlɔ.”
Amu ka Anania ɔni ndi Yudaƒuɔ ɔkpane unengudi na bana akɔ mmɔ únu Paulo kenye kamɛni ni, údie lɛdi úte bani nnye Paulo kudɔ mmɔ na báƒiɛmi-nwu ɔtugya.

Mmɔ mmɔ ni, Paulo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Katɔti ɔdubɔƒiɛmi-ɔ ɔsia! Atɔnku akwadi na adi! Bi litemi ɔtɛne udu na adi mɛni? Ɔda bubo bɔni lɛlɔ na akɛ átɛku-mi litemi ni, amu kani lɛlɔ na áta enye uwi ɔni na áya na báƒiɛmi-mi kɔnu!”
Amu na ama bani nnye Paulo kudɔ mmɔ béye-nwu banini, “Ɔkpane unengudi na eedumi lɛni?”
Anwuɔsu Paulo údie kenye ɔnini, “Banwa, ńtati nnii anwu ndi ɔkpane unengudi, nka ńtasu-nwu lɛni. Ɔsika Bunweni Kedee Ɔku ɔ́su ɔnii, 'Bitetemi lɛla likpidi lɛdi na bina batɔnkune lɛlɔ.' ”

Amu na Paulo ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka ni, bekyuli bani nábasa mmɔ akɔ badi badi lɛkpa lɛni baalɔ Sadukiƒuɔ, na badi lɛnɔ badi Ƒarisiƒuɔ. Anwuɔsu ɔ́va momoomo ɔnini, “Banwa, Ƒarisini na ndi! Na Ƒarisini náwɔ-mi! Na baatɛku-mi litemi mɛni ɔmwi ɔni na lɛ́ƒɔ bekpine bɔsɔtaata lɛ́di ɔsu!”
Amu ka Paulo ɔ́nya ɔ́su litemi lɛmɛni ni, mmɔ kani na kadɔ kéduo akpa anyɔ amɛni ntɛ, na béle lɛlɔ kemo.
Ɔsika ama Sadukiƒuɔ baasu banii ukpine ɔsɔ ulata, na Katɔti batu beeebo, na ayu lɛnɔ eeebo. Nsu Ƒarisiƒuɔ ni, ama baaƒɔ́ ala amɛni ƒui taadi.

Mɛni na owogyo ɔdi úbeduo-ma akɔ. Na ɔda bubo ala batinane bani ndi Ƒarisiƒuɔ bénye Paulo litemi lɛmmɔ kama banii lɛdi litemi geen. Na báva momoomo básu banini, “Bútanu lɛla likpidi lɛdi na nwuna lɛlɔ! Na si kɔyu kɔdi iye Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi nétemiku-nwu ni, bitaya na bukpoku Katɔti!”

Mɛni ni, bɔva bɔmɛni bɔ́sɔ bɔ́kɔ katɔ búbu. Na bekyuli bamɛni ƒui bada Paulo na baaní-nwu teenene. Na ka bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmmɔ ɔɔyia ka badubɔni-nwu baduli ɔsu ni, ɔ́su nwuna bekpone ɔnii beti-nwu beboku aban ɔtɔ kemo.
Amu na limeyi lɛmmɔ usientɛ ni, Blɔti úbenye Paulo kudɔ na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Paulo, kya ɔkplu. Kalɛ na ásu mina lɛlɔ litemi mɛni na Yerusalem ni, lɛni kani na adubɔsu-ni na Roma lɛnɔ.”
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, Yudaƒuɔ badi bése kenye béte lɛlɔ ka ama baladi na baláni si bátadu Paulo!
Na bekyuli bamɛni badubɔbla aani nkyuli aavlene ku kama.
Amu na básɔ bésie bakpane benengu ku bana batɔnkune kudɔ na bátásu-ma banini, “Búse kenye ka buladi na buláni si bútadu Paulo.
Anwuɔsu amii ku litemi batɛne bɛsu bekpone ɔtɔnkune na ɔsɔ utédie Paulo uboku kasalakɔ mɛni. Bɛbla aani si bɛɛwia ka biye-nwu etemila adi bibu. Na si béti-nwu baduboku ni, na bɔdubɔdu-nwu na ulu.”
Nsu ka Paulo ɔnwani ulekubi ubidi ɔnanabi únu ala ani na básu mɛni ƒui ɔsu ni, úkeli úsie aban ɔtɔ mmɔ na útásu Paulo lɛla lɛni na básu.
Amu na Paulo ɔ́lɔ bekpone bani nnye mmɔ kemo unwi na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Tiku ɔnamu ɔmɛni teesienku bina ɔtɔnkune kudɔ. Ɔ́da litemi kpakplaa lɛdi na ɔsu-nwu.”
Anwuɔsu ni, ukpone ɔmmɔ útiku ubi ɔmɛni úsienku ɔtɔnkune ɔmmɔ kudɔ. Na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Paulo ɔni na bákya ɔtɔ mɛni nálɔ-mi na ɔ́su-mi ɔnii ntiku ubi ɔmɛni mboku-ɔ kudɔ na ubasu-ɔ litemi lɛdi.”
Amu na bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni ɔda ubi ɔmɛni kɔnu na útiku-nwu úsienku kɔƒɛlɛ na úye-nwu ɔnini, “Bi na aawia ka asu-mi?”
Amu na ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Yudaƒuɔ badi bása kenye ku bana benengu banii bebevele-ɔ na biti Paulo biboku kasalakɔ mmɔ kɔnaadi ku kasusu ka beye-nwu etemila adi.

Nsu tenu-ma litemi, ɔsika ama badi bani ntulo nkyuli aavlene badubɔbɛ na ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ bagya-nwu. Bekyuli bamɛni bése kenye ka badu Paulo asa badi iye bani. Anwuɔsu na baawia ƒula kebunku. Na béesie bebi ulu kudɔ mmɔ, ɔsika basia anu ka adubɔtuna ete-ma lɛni ɔsu.”
Bekpone Ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni ɔ́bala-nwu ɔnini, “Taya na ukyuli ɔdi biala ɔsɔ unu litemi lɛni na ásu-mi mɛni munu munu!”

Na uwi ɔni na ɔnamu ɔmɛni ɔ́tɔlɔ ni, bekpone ɔtɔnkune ɔmɛni ɔ́lɔ nwuna bekpone bamɛni kemo benengu inyɔ na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bɛwia bekpone nkyuli eti ene bani mesie Kaesarea ɔmwi usien ɔdɔ yaalenwi kemo. Bɛwia atula badane lɛnɔ nkyuli eti ene ku bapɔnkɔ kama beliene nkyuli liti ku aavlanyɔ.
Bite Paulo ɔpɔnkɔ ɔdi na ulie-nwu kama na bitiku-nwu buɛɛ bisienku Aban Ɔgadine Ƒelike.”
Amu na únweni ɔku ɔdi úte kalɔ lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔmmɔ ɔnini,
Ɔku ɔmɛni ɔ́si ami Klaudio Lisia kudɔ na liti muute awɔ Ɔgadine Ɔbune Ƒelike ku kegye.
Yudaƒuɔ béƒie ukyuli ɔmɛni na nka bɔdu banii baadú-nwu asa na ami lɛ́ya bekpone bátáƒɔ-nwu, ɔsika línu ka Romani ubi na ɔdi ɔsu.
Amu na líti-nwu lísienku bana kasalakɔ kalɛ na bunu lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla.
Lɛ́nu lɛ́ti ka ala ani badaku mɛni adi ama Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo ala ɔni na ɔɔɔdi bɔƒiɔ bɔni na bakya-nwu ɔtɔ iye badu-nwu.
Na uwi ɔni na básu-mi ka baabla-nwu lɛlɔ kasusu ka badubo-nwu bɔdu ni, lɛ́bu lili kemo nnii muuti-nwu liboku-ɔ na lɛsu ama bani na anwu ku-ma bákɛ litemi ka beti nwuna bɔƒiɔ beboku-ɔ anumi.
Anwuɔsu usien ɔmmɔ kani ni, bekpone bamɛni bétiku Paulo bésienku Antipatri.
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, bekpone bani nkɛ lɛgba básɔ bénwini bésie aban ɔtɔ mmɔ, na báya na bapɔnkɔ beliene bákpanku Paulo bésienku Kaesarea.
Ka bétéduo ni, béti Paulo ku ɔku ɔni na béte-ma mmɔ ƒui béte aban ɔgadine ɔmmɔ.
Amu uwi ɔni na ɔɔká ɔku ɔmɛni ni, úye Paulo kesii kani na ɔ́si. Ka ɔ́nu ɔ́ti ka Paulo ɔ́si Kilikia ɔ́su ni,

ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ndubuduo ƒula litemi lɛmɛni kemo na linu-ni kaduɛ si uwi ɔni na awɔ ku bekyuli bani ndaku lɛsɛ mmɔ bébo.” Amu na ɔ́sɔ údie lɛdi ɔ́su nwuna bekpone bani nnye ɔnii beti Paulo batákya ɔtɔ ɔni na Ɔga Herode ɔ́tu kemo na bataagyumana-nwu.
Emeyi alɔ kama ni, Ɔkpane Unengudi Anania ku Yudaƒuɔ batɔnkune badi ku litemi ɔtɛne ɔni baalɔ banii Tertulo bésie Kaesarea. Bébo Ƒelike kudɔ banii bebedie Paulo bɔƒiɔ ƒui batina.

Amu ka bákpali Paulo ni, Tertulo úse kalɔ uudie kenye ɔnini, “Bula Ɔbune, uwi pii na ɔdi mɛni ka bɔ́kɛ keyi buɛɛ na ƒula lɛnunda ku lɛlati lɛni na éti atɔnku-bu ɔsu. Na bɔ́nu ka kavumana pii lɛnɔ kébo bula kalɔ kemodi kammɔ ƒui kemo.
Ɔmɛni ɔdi lɛla lɛni náƒɔ abu Yudaƒuɔ ƒui anu.
Na muuvele-ɔ nnii se atu na enu etemila ani na ndubo bɔsu bɔsiku ɔnana ɔmɛni lɛlɔ.

“Ɔsika bɔ́nu-nwu bɔ́ti ka lɛsɛ ɔkyane na ɔdi, na ɔkɛ ɔɔví uwi ndi uwi uunwíni Yudaƒuɔ kasusu na kesi kesii na kayawi kamɛni ƒui ɔnii bataabla basa basa na bata benye aban lɛlɔ. Na anwu ndi lɛkpa lɛni na baalɔ banii Nasareƒuɔ ɔtɔnkune.
Na bɔ́nu lɛnɔ ka úsie ɔɔbla ala ani mɔɔyá na bula Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ keesé lɛlɔ asa na búƒie-nwu. Bɔ́yɔ ka nka bɔbla-nwu lɛla lɛni néduku nwuna bɔƒiɔ bɔmmɔ na bula ɔda bubo lɛlɔ.
Nsu ni, bekpone ɔtɔnkune Lisia úbeƒie-nwu ɔ́ƒɔ-bu enu kemo ku ɔkplu.
Na ɔ́su ɔnii ntu Romaƒuɔ ɔda bubo na badubuti batɛku-nwu litemi na ƒula anumi. Anwuɔsu akana na eye-nwu enu si etemila ani na bɔ́su mɛni adi ɔkɔ.”
Amu na Yudaƒuɔ bammɔ ƒui bása kenye na linyeda lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ banii ala ani ƒui na Tertulo ɔ́su ƒui adi sɔsɔ.

Nsu ka aban ɔgadine ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpali Paulo ɔnii ɔtɛmi ni, Paulo úse kalɔ ɔnini, “Ati, ngyi ka awɔ kani mɔɔtɛ Yudaƒuɔ etemila na akwa pii amɛni kemo. Na ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔɔda-mi kubiti ka lɛsu na lidie mina lɛlɔ kenye na ƒula anumi.
Adubɔnu ati ka ɔbla aani emeyi leevu-anyɔ kani mɛni ka líbo Yerusalem nnii muubo mbakpa na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ.
Na ɔdi útanu-mi ka mɔɔkyaku ɔdi unyeƒi iye lɛsɛ na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ mmɔ iye na Yudaƒuɔ kasalakɔ kadi lɛnɔ iye ɔgbami kesi kesii na ɔmankemo.
Na bekyuli bamɛni ɔdi ulakana lɛla lɛdi ugyii bɔlɛ geen na bɔnu bɔti ka etemila ani na básu básiku-mi lɛlɔ mɛni ni, sɔsɔ na adi.

Nsu ni, lɛlakpa linwi lɛni na lɛ́tunaku-ma ndi ɔnii nsiaku bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔni na baasu banii ɔdi lɛkpa lɛni náta linye-ma lɛlɔ. Na lɛ́ƒɔ Mose ɔda bubo ƒui lɛ́di kpakplaa ku ala ani na bénweni bákya kenye bediene lɛku kemo.
Mbo lɛnunsia aani kalɛ na ama lɛnɔ bebo lɛnunsia ka bekyuli babuni ku bekpidi ƒui básɔ badubɔta bɔlɛ kekpine.
Na ɔ́si ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, mɔɔkya ɔkplu ka lɛbla mina kasusu kemo nwaa na Katɔti ku bayawine ƒui anumi.
“Akwa pii mɛni ni, liiibo Yerusalem. Na ɔƒɛni lísie nnii muuti bawabane etela lite mina badi na lɛbla akpala lɛnɔ lite Katɔti.
Uwi ɔni na lɛ́bla lɛlɔ buveli ɔdi ɔmmɔ lɛ́wɔlɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ badi bábanu-mi na kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na ɔɔɔdi ami ku otogyi ɔdi nkɛ. Na ńtakya unyeƒi ɔdi lɛnɔ.
Na nka Yudaƒuɔ bani nási Asia kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, ama na nka ɔlɛka bebo ƒula anumi. Na si ami ku-ma bubo lɛla lɛdi ni, na basu.
Iye bekyuli bani nlie mɛni ni, ɔlɛka basu lɛla likpidi lɛni na lɛ́bla uwi ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ litemi batɛne benengu bakya baatɛku-mi litemi.
Munuu ɔdi uwi ɔni na lɛ́tala lɛdi katɔ lɛ́su nnii, 'Líbo kasalakɔ mɛni nnii mbedie lɛlɔ kenye lɛsu ka lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di ka bekpine basɔ badubɔta' ɔsu na bɛɛtɛku-mi litemi?”
Amu na Ƒelike ɔni ngyi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmɛni etemila kaduɛ ni, ɔ́su Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni ɔnini, “Binye bɛgya utédu uwi ɔni na Lisia webo asa na likulo litemi lɛmɛni.”
Na ɔ́ya bétiku Paulo bátákya ɔtɔ. Nsu ɔ́su nwuna lɛlɔ banune bammɔ ɔnii bada-nwu buɛɛ, na bete nwuna bakpana kuƒi si badi bebo-nwu kudɔ banii babanu-nwu iye beboku-nwu etela adi.
Amu na emeyi klukui adi kama ni, Ƒelike ku ulekudi Drusila ɔni ndi Yudani bébo na ɔ́ya-nwu bétédie Paulo béboku, na ɔ́su-ma litemi ɔ́siku Yesu Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ.

Amu na uwi ɔni na ulie uudie ala kalɔ taasiku bɔƒɔtaadi ngba buni bulie ku lɛlɔ bɔti bɔda ku litemi bɔtɛ bɔni ndubo diɛdi lɛlɔ ni, liƒu geen lɛ́da Ƒelike. Na mɛni na Ƒelike ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Ta, na eteesie. Na si lɛkɛ kɔnu kaduɛ ni, ndubɔya na balɔ-ɔ bete-mi.”
Na ka ɔ́kali ɔnii Paulo wasu ɔnii ɔɔwia lɛla lɛdi ususu-nwu kenye ɔsu ni, ɔɔtala na baalɔ-nwu uwi ndi uwi na anwu ku-nwu baatɛmiku lɛlɔ.
Amu na akwa anyɔ kama ni, bédie Ƒelike na béti Porkio Ƒesto bébesie-nwu keliekɔ. Nsu ka Ƒelike ɔɔwia ka Yudaƒuɔ bataayɔ-nwu litemi ɔsu ni, ɔ́ya na Paulo ɔ́sɔ ɔ́kya ɔtɔ katɛnkɔ mmɔ.
Amu ka Ƒesto útéduo nwuna kalɛkɛ kani lɛlɔ na ɔdubo bɔdi emeyi atɛ kama ni, ɔ́si Kaesarea úsie Yerusalem.
Mmɔ na bakpane benengu ku Yudaƒuɔ benengu básu-nwu Paulo lɛlɔ litemi. Na bévele-nwu banii
utétiku Paulo uboku Yerusalem. Na bana kasusu ndi ka nka betélie-nwu ulu. Na si ɔ́si ɔɔví ni, na badu-nwu.
Nsu Ƒesto ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Ɔtɔntɛne na Paulo ɔdi na Kaesarea. Na ami lɛnɔ ndubo mmɔ busie uwi klukui.
Anwuɔsu bɛya na bina benengu bebo mmɔ na bebedie nwuna bɔƒiɔ batina.”
Amu na emeyi maane iye leevu kama ni, Ƒesto únwini úsie Kaesarea. Na limeyi lɛni na útéduo mmɔ kadi kégye ni, ɔ́lɔ Paulo litemi lɛmɛni.
Amu ka Paulo úbeduo litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ ni, Yudaƒuɔ bani nási Yerusalem bébenye bámana na bánwi etemila pii básia-nwu ani kalɔ na bátakana budie.
Paulo údie nwuna kenye na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ńtaƒiɔ Yudaƒuɔ iye Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ iye Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare ɔda bubo bɔdi lɛlɔ.”
Amu ka Ƒesto ɔɔwia ka Yudaƒuɔ bataayɔ-nwu litemi ɔsu ni, úye Paulo ɔnini, “Aayɔ́ ka esie Yerusalem na ntátɛ ku-ɔ litemi mmɔ?”
Amu na Paulo ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Oowo. Béte-mi kuƒi ka kalɔ kamɛni ƒui lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔlatidi ɔtɛku-mi litemi. Awɔ agyi geen ka ńtaƒiɔ.

Si lɛ́bla lɛla lɛni na ɔlɛka badu-mi ni, ndubɔtuna na badu-mi! Nsu si ńtaƒiɔ ni, útalɛka awɔ iye ukyuli bamba uti-mi ute bekyuli bamɛni ɔnii badu-mi. Anwuɔsu lɛ́da mina litemi mɔɔvá Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare anumi!”
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Ƒesto ku nwuna litemi batɛne bammɔ básu-nwu banini, “Ka éti ƒula litemi átáva Kaesare anumi ɔsu ni, Kaesare kudɔ na adubusie.”
Amu na emeyi adi kama ni, Ɔga Agripa ku ɔnwani ulekubi ɔni baalɔ Berenike bébo Ƒesto kudɔ na Kaesarea banii babanu-nwu na begyele-nwu.
Bákya mmɔ emeyi pii na Ƒesto úti Paulo litemi ɔ́su ɔga ɔmɛni ɔnini, “Ɔnana ɔdi ɔtɛ ɔtɔ mɛni, na Ƒelike úti nwuna litemi úte-mi.
Ka lísie Yerusalem ni, bakpane benengu ku bana batɔnkune básu-mi etemila básiku-nwu lɛlɔ, na básu-mi ka nte kuƒi na badu-nwu.
“Na lídie kalɔ lɛ́tina-ma uwi klukui kemo ka Romaƒuɔ ɔda bubo uléte kuƒi ka badu ukyuli kɔtɔ asa na batɛku-nwu litemi. Ɔlɛka bete-nwu kuƒi na anwu ku bekyuli bani nákɛ litemi basa asa na basu-ni.
Uwi ɔni na bébo mɛni na litemi lɛmɛni ɔsu ni, ami lɛnɔ ńtada-ni ńtese. Limeyi lɛmmɔ kadi kégye kani ni, lɛ́ya na bétiku ɔnana ɔmɛni béboku.
Nsu ni, etemila ani na básu básiku-nwu lɛlɔ ni, ávumanaku ani na lɛ́kali ka anya na badubo bɔsu.
Ala ani na básu mɛni akɛnku bana bɔkpa lɛlɔ ku ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Yesu na úkpi lɛlɔ, nsu Paulo ɔmua unye ɔɔsu ka uli ngba!
Ɔ́bla-mi basaa na ńtati kalɛ na likulo litemi lɛmɛni. Anwuɔsu líye Paulo si ɔɔwia ka litiku-nwu lisienku Yerusalem na utédie etemila amɛni kenye na Yerusalem mmɔ.
Nsu Paulo ɔnii ɔɔwia ka uti nwuna litemi ute Ɔga Unengudi Kaesare.”
Amu na Ɔga Agripa ɔ́su Ƒesto ɔnini, “Mɔɔwia ka ami ɔlati linu nwuna litemi.” Amu na Ƒesto ɔ́su-nwu ɔnini, “Adubunu litemi lɛmɛni kɔnaadi!”
Amu ka kadi kégye ni, Ɔga Agripa ku Berenike bakɛ lɛgadi kemo bébeduo litemi katɛkɔ mmɔ. Na bekpone benengu ku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo benengu básiaku-ma kama. Na Ƒesto úte ɔyikun na bédie Paulo béboku.
Na Ƒesto ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɔga Agripa ku amii bani nábasa mɛni ni, ɔnana ɔmɛni ndi ukyuli ɔni na Yudaƒuɔ bani nkya Yerusalem ku Kaesarea mɛni lɛnɔ baawia badu!
Nsu nka mina kasusu kemo ni, útabla lɛla lɛni na ɔlɛka badu-nwu. Nsu anwu lɛnɔ ɔnii ɔɔƒɔ́ nwuna litemi ute bula ɔga unengudi. Na ami lɛnɔ ńtebulo.

Nsu ni, bi na ɔlɛka linweni lite ɔga unengudi ɔmɛni? Ɔsika ni, útaƒiɔ geen. Anwuɔsu na líti-nwu líboku-mii ku awɔ Ɔga Agripa geen ka atɛku-nwu litemi na atina-mi litemi lɛni na menweni masiku-nwu lɛlɔ.
Ɔsika ni, ɔɔɔdia ka liti ɔtɔntɛne ɔdi lisienku kalɔ kamɛni ƒui lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔni na ńtedie likpidi lɛni na ɔ́bla kalɔ ntatina-nwu.”
Amu na Agripa ɔ́su Paulo ɔnini, “Kuƒi kɔtɛ ka ataasu ƒula litemi.” Anwuɔsu Paulo ɔ́gya enu na ɔ́tɛmi údie lɛlɔ ɔnini,
“Bula Ɔga Ɔbune Agripa, lili lɛ́dia-mi ka ndubo mina litemi bɔda bɔva ƒula anumi na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ báda-mi kenye lɛlɔ.
Ɔsika ngyi ka awɔ agyi Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo ku bana ɔdi ƒui kaduɛ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, ntɛ na awɔ ɔsu. Kɛ kayi na enu mina litemi.
“Yudaƒuɔ ƒui bagyi kalɛ na lɛ́da mina lɛlɔ kaduɛ na mina lɛnamu uwi na mina ɔma ku Yerusalem lɛnɔ.
Lɛni kani na líti lílie ɔni na si nka budie na badubudie-mi kenye na litemi geen bɔsu kemo ni, nka bagyi ka ami ndi Ƒarisini ɔni mɔɔdi Yudaƒuɔ ɔda bubo ɔdi lɛlɔ teetulo.
Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu geen na béti etemila amɛni baasia-mi lili ndi ɔni na ami nnye mɔɔnu ulu ku lɛnunsia teete kenye kani na Katɔti ɔ́su bula bati kuuku úse ɔsu.
Israelƒuɔ kaba kani ndi leevu-inyɔ mɛni ƒui baakya ɔkplu usien ku ɔƒɛ ka ama lɛnɔ bakɛ lɛnunsia lɛni na ami mbo mɛni. Bula Ɔga Ɔbune, ɔmɛni ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ baadá-mi kenye.
Bi ɔsu na ɔɔyu-mii ɔkplu ka bɛƒɔ bɛdi ka Katɔti ɔɔgyila bekpine?
“Líti lɛ́sia lɛlɔ nnii ntaabla Yesu ɔni ndi Nasareni basiakune kalala.
Yudaƒuɔ bakpane benengu béte-mi ɔyikun na líƒie bekyuli kedee pii lɛ́kya ɔtɔ na Yerusalem. Na bana akɔ bani na bádu lɛnɔ ni, ɔdi-mi lɛƒɔyɔ.
Lɛ́siaku-ma na líkpoku-ma lɛni laa útédu lɛma bamba na ɔgyu kemo muedi. Na lɛ́ya na baabla-ma kalala na Yudaƒuɔ kɔsakɔ ƒui. Na línye-ma lɛlɔ na beetemi kɔbɔ ala taasiku Yesu lɛlɔ.
“Kasusu kamɛni udu kani lɛlɔ na líti lísela Damasko na ɔyikun ɔni na bakpane benengu béte-mi kenye.
Bula Ɔbune, ɔni na nkɛ ulu ɔƒiiwi lísela ni, lɛ́nu ka bukeye bɔni muukeye teetulo ɔƒɛ búkeye bɔ́si katɔ bɔ́mana ami ku bani nkɛ.
Mmɔ ka bula ƒui búbuli ni, línu lɛdi lɛdi ka lɛɛtɛmi na Hebri lɛdi kemo taasu lɛnini, 'Saulo, Saulo, bi ɔsu na eekpóku-mi lɛni? Si aata liyu ni, ƒula lɛlɔ kani na aadú.'
“Amu na líye-nwu nnini, 'Ati, ɔma na adi?' “Na lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, 'Ami ndi Yesu ɔni na eekpóku kpakplaa.
Ɔƒaani ni, ta nye! Ɔsika lídie lɛlɔ lɛ́tina-a kalɛ na meti-ɔ mabla mina kabla ɔblane ku mina kenye udiene. Adubɔsu kayawi ƒui lɛla lɛni na ánu mɛni ku ala ani na ndubo buteedie taatina-a.
Na kesii kani na mɔɔtala-a ni, ndubɔgyumana-a na ƒula kadi bekyuli akɔ ku kadi bamba lɛnɔ akɔ.

Na ndubɔya-a na etébimi-ma anumi na balɛ Satan ɔyikun kemo na kasuudikɔ mmɔ bebo Katɔti ɔyikun ku bukeye kemo. Na Katɔti ɔdubuti bana ekpidi ɔkyiɛ-ma na wabla-ma katɔ ala badine aani bani na ɔ́ƒuna úte nwuna lɛlɔ ka báƒɔ-mi bádi ɔsu.'
“Anwuɔsu ni, Ati Agripa, ńtada atu ńtedie budie bɔtina bɔni na lɛ́nu lɛ́siku katɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ!

Lɛ́ka litemi buni bɔsu bute Damaskoƒuɔ ku Yerusalemƒuɔ ku Yudaƒuɔ ƒui ku bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ lɛnɔ nnii benwini kama bakya bana ekpidi na beti anumi besienku Katɔti kudɔ, na bataabla ala ani mɔɔtina ka bávumana sɔsɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu na Yudaƒuɔ bamɛni bébeƒie-mi na Yudaƒuɔ kakpakɔ ɔni na nnye mɔɔsu etemila amɛni. Na báwia ka nka badu-mi.

Nsu ni, Katɔti údie-mi na bana enu kemo. Anwuɔsu na mmua nli ngba muudie ɔmɛni kenye taatina amii benengu ku bekyuli ƒui lɛnɔ. Lɛla lɛni na mɔɔsu mɛni ni, ani kani na Katɔti kenye bediene ku Mose bene ƒui básu ka lɛdubɔlɛ.
Na ani ndi ka Mesia ɔni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔdubo ubebo abi. Na anwu ndubɔbla ukyuli udeedi ɔni maka bɔta bɔlɛ bekpine akɔ, na ɔdubuti bukeye uboku Yudaƒuɔ ku bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ ƒui.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, Ƒesto ɔ́va ɔ́su ɔnini, “Paulo, eekpi libuo! Ƒula ala bɔtɛya pii búbile-ɔ lili kemo!”
Amu na Paulo údie kenye ɔnini, “Ƒesto Ɔbune, neeekpi libuo. Biteti litemi lɛmɛni bitakya bɔƒia. Litemi geen na mɔɔsu.
Sɔsɔ ni, Ɔga Agripa ɔgyi etemila ani na mɔɔsu mɛni. Anwuɔsu muutemiku-nwu ku kayi ƒaa. Lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́di kede kede ka bátabla ala amɛni bátabɛ-nwu.
Ati Agripa, áƒɔ Katɔti kenye bediene bamɛni ádi? Ngyi ka áƒɔ-ma ádi.”
Amu na Agripa úye Paulo ɔnini, “Aawia ka linwini Kristoni uwi klukui ɔmɛni kemo?”

Amu na Paulo údie kenye ɔnini, “Uwi klukui iye uwi gyɔlɔɔ ni, mɔɔkpali katɔ nnii ɔmwi ni, amii bani nkya mɛni ƒui binwini aani kalɛ na ami lɛnɔ nse. Nsu ɔɔɔdi aani kalɛ na kɔgba kɔmɛni kɔ́da-mi kalɛ!”
Amu na ɔga ɔmɛni ku aban ɔgadine ku Berenike ku bekyuli bakladi ƒui báta.
Na ka bávi bálɛ mmɔ ni, bátɛmi básiku Paulo litemi lɛmɛni lɛlɔ básu banini, “Ukyuli ɔmɛni útabla lɛla lɛni na badu-nwu iye bakya-nwu ɔtɔ.”
