Kalɛ na ɔkɔ kenye bediene bákya uwi ɔni návi ni, lɛni kani na ɔkɔ ala batinane bammɔ udu badubɔkya-mii akɔ. Badubo ɔkɔ bɔnyi bɔtina ala na ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔdi ka bekyuli basia bada bana ngba lɛlɔ. Nsu ɔmmɔ ɔdubɔya na bekyuli bayii. Na badubuni ala ƒui lɛlɔ ɔdine Blɔti ɔni nédie-ma ɔ́lɛku bana ekpidi kemo. Na ɔmmɔ ndubɔyila-ma udu.

Baƒɔtaadine pii lɛnɔ badubɔbla ala ekpidi ani na ɔkɔ ala batinane bamɛni baabla. Na si bani nátaƒɔ bátadi bánu lɛla lɛni baƒɔtaadine bamɛni baabla ni, ama lɛnɔ badubɔtɛmi enyekpi na Kristo bɔƒɔtaadi lɛlɔ.

Ɔkɔ ala batinane bamɛni bɔdubɔkɛ egulabi kɔsia na bina lɛlɔ na ɔkɔ ala ani na badubɔnwi basu-mii ɔsu, ɔsika baayɔ́ ama lɛti lɛkɛ geen. Ukyuli ɔni ndubɔtɛku-ma litemi ɔ́ɔklibi lɛlɔ úse-ma kuuku. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni ɔni ndubo-ma bɔkyula ni, ɔɔnu-ma nwaa.
Katɔti útenye útanu batu bani náƒiɔ-nwu. Mmomu úbo-ma útákya abi kebokɔ. Na ɔ́ya na bébo-ma kɔgba bákya kasuudikɔ mmɔ wetédu limeyi lɛni na ɔdubɔtɛku-ma litemi.

Lɛni kani na ɔ́bla bekyuli bani nákya kukuuku lɛnɔ. Nsu Noa ɔni násu bekyuli kalɛ na Katɔti ɔɔwia ka bekyuli belie ngba ku nwuna badi maatɛ kani na údie. Na ntu bɔ́ƒɔ kayawi ƒui na bɔ́nyina bekyuli bakladi na békpi.
Na Sodom ku Gomora lɛnɔ ni, Katɔti ɔ́du-ma kɔtɔ na ɔ́kyula-ma ku ogya úti-ma ɔ́tina-bu na bɔnu bɔtɛya lɛla lɛni ndubo bekyuli bani naaabu Katɔti lɛlɔ.
Katɔti údie Lot ɔni nse siin, ɔsika ngba bukpidi ku lɛyalɛ ala ani na bekyuli bammɔ baabla áda-nwu ɔƒɛ.
Bana ala ekpidi ani na bataabla na ukyuli ɔbuni ɔmɛni útaanu uwi ɔni na ɔ́kya-ma akɔ ƒui ni, átaada-nwu ɔƒɛ geen.
Ɔmɛni ɔɔtina ka Katɔti ɔgyi kalɛ na udie bekyuli babuni ɔlɛku ala ani muukpóku-ma kemo na ɔda bekyuli bekpidi use ute uwi ɔni na ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Na bani geen na ɔdubɔni kɔtu utulo ndi bani na ɔlɔna ala aada-ma ɔkwɛ na balábu Katɔti munu munu. Bekyuli bamɛni ni, beesé kayi kekpidi muedi teedumi kayaa bayikune.
Nsu Katɔti batu muedi bani mbo ɔyikun ku ɔkplu betulo bekyuli bamɛni ni, balakana Katɔti anumi bunye na bedumi kayaa bayikune bamɛni.

Nsu bekyuli bamɛni udu ni, baabla ala aani kalɛ na bebuo bani nnye nte ka beƒie-ma badu bese. Lɛlɔ kemo kani na beenú ala kɔku taati. Bekyuli bamɛni baata teenye taatɛmi enyekpi na lɛla biala lɛni na bétenu kalɔ lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti ɔdubɔyila-ma udu aani kalɛ baadú beƒiebuo teevaakun.

Katɔti ɔdubɔya na bebo abi aani kalɛ na ama báya na bekyuli bébo abi kalɛ. Bana ebiti ndi ka badi lɛla biala ɔdivo ku ɔƒiiwi nwaa muedi. Ɔdi kɔƒa litemi ka basalaku-mii si bɛɛdi. Na bana ɔkɔ ala kani mɔɔda-ma kubiti.

Lɛsɔnɔdi lɛ́ƒɔ-ma anu ƒui, na likpidi ala ɔkwɛ uláda-ma bɔda taaya kudii. Baatɔ́lɔ bekyuli bani bɔƒɔtaadi nátayu tɔ ɔkplu. Na baabla ekpidi. Na ama alati bébimi bana kaƒɔ bése ka beteemu ala taadi. Katɔti úwida bekyuli bamɛni geen.
Bédeyi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu ɔmmɔ ƒui, na báyii ulu. Basiaku Boer ubidi Bileam ɔbladu kama ɔni mɔɔbla ala ekpidi teeti taakɛ egulabi.
Ɔmmɔ ɔsu Katɔti ɔ́dɔnku Bileam na nwuna likpidi lɛmmɔ ɔsu. Nwuna ebuo ɔni muuti-nwu ala útemiku-nwu ukyuli butemi na ɔ́bala-nwu ɔnii ɔda adɔlɔla ammɔ ɔya.
Bekyuli bamɛni bese aani abiɔ ani nákwi, iye uyɔlɔ ɔni na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔda ɔɔvínku. Ama na Katɔti ɔ́da kesii kani nse suu mmɔ úse.
Baasu etemila keeke taatalaku lɛlɔ katɔ. Na bada ɔlɔna ɔkwɛ adala baatɔ́lɔ bani nétetu tɔ uwi ka báda ngba bukpidi bulie báya.

Ɔkɔ ala batinane bamɛni beesé kenye ka badubɔbla bana kama basiakune na bakɛ bɔnwuna uwi ɔni na ama alati bénwini kabla bablane béte ekpidi ani ndubo-ma bɔkyula. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔdi kabla ɔblane ute lɛla lɛni nádi-nwu lɛlɔ.

Si bekyuli bávumana kayi na Katɔti údie-ma ɔ́lɛku ala ani muukpóku-ma ƒui kudɔ ka báƒɔ Blɔti ku Ɔƒɔne Yesu Kristo asa na básɔ bénwini bésie belie bana ngba kuuku bɔmmɔ ni, bana ablala eebie teetulo kalɛ na úse kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui.
Si nka bétenu ngba siin bulie lɛlɔ litemi kudii muedi ni, nka ɔdia-ma utulo. Nsu bénu-ni asa na básɔ bédeyi ulu ɔmmɔ, na baládi ɔda bubo kedee bɔni na béte-ma lɛlɔ.
Sɔsɔ na ɔdi ka agba ani na bébo ébo éte lɛni na bana lɛlɔ ka akpɛwe ɔsɔ uuti nwuna kɔdala taadi, na ɔplakuo ɔni na bákpila-nwu ɔsɔ uunwíni taatákpi aba.
Mina banwa bayɔne, ɔmɛni ndi ɔku unyɔdi ɔni na línweni muute-mii. Líti lɛ́sia lɛlɔ ka lɛku inyɔ bɔmɛni kemo ni, ndubɔsɔ lɛgyila-mii kasusu na kabla-mii nwaa na ala amɛni lɛlɔ.
Mɔɔyɔ́ ka binyimo ala ani na Katɔti kenye bediene kedee básu dii ku ala ani na batalane bátina na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ.
Kudeedi ni, bɛya na ɔbla-mii nwaa ka na emeyi ekplodi ammɔ kemo ni, bekyuli bani nsiaku bana ɔlɔna ala ɔkwɛ adala kama badububo-mii kudɔ na bama-mii.
Na badubuye-mii banii, “Wɛ na ukyuli ɔni ndubo mmɔ ɔkya? Ɔsika ɔ́si uwi ɔni na bula bati békpi ni, lɛla lɛdi biala lɛmua lise aani uwi ɔni na bédie kayawi kalɛ!”
Na bagyi ƒui nsu béni kalɛ na Katɔti útemi na úti údie katɔ ku kalɔ. Ɔ́bla na kalɔ kákɔ kálɛ ntu kemo.
Na ɔkɛnku ntu bɔmmɔ kani lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́ya na ntu búyi bɔ́ƒɔ kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui, na ɔ́du kuuku bekyuli bammɔ.

Na litemi lɛni lɛlɔ na ɔkɛ údie katɔ ku kalɔ ƒui ni, litemi lɛmmɔ kani na úti ɔda kayawi kammɔ use ute uwi ɔni na ɔdubɔkyula-ka ku ogya. Na Katɔti ɔ́bla lɛni úse úte limeyi lɛni na ɔdubɔtɛku bekyuli bekpidi litemi na ɔkyula-ma.
Banwa bayɔne, ɔƒɛni ni, bitayiƒla lɛnɔ ka na Katɔti anumi ni, kavumana kadi keeebo limeyi linwi ku akwa apimu kemo. Ɔsika ɔna ƒui use-nwu likeke.
Katɔti uuuse nyɔɔ ka ɔbla lɛla lɛni kenye na ɔ́su úse aani kalɛ na badi baakali. Mmomu ni, ɔɔkɛ́ kayi teete-bu. Ɔsika ulayɔ ɔnii ɔdi ɔyii. Mmomu ɔɔyɔ́ ka bula ƒui bɔda bula ekpidi bɔbla bɔya.

Nsu Blɔti limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ ni, lɛdubo-bu buyu bɔtu. Na bɔdubunu kɔku bonwu kɔdi. Na kayaa kadubo bɔyii udu. Na ala ani ƒui nkya kayaa mmɔ ni, adubɔkywi kede kede! Na kalɔ ku kana ala ƒui adubo bɔyii.
Na si ala amɛni ƒui adubɔkywi lɛni ni, dɛ na ɔlɛka bɛda bina lɛlɔ? Ɔdi ka bɛda ngba bɔni nse kedee na biti lɛlɔ bite Katɔti.
Na kalɛ na bíti bilie siin bɛgya Blɔti limeyi lɛmmɔ ni, anwu ndubɔya na limeyi lɛmmɔ libo pla. Limeyi lɛmmɔ na kayaa kadubo bɔkywi, na ogya liwulu lɛdubɔya na ala ani nkya kayawi ƒui ayɛɛlɛ.
Nsu abu bunye bɔgya Katɔti kenye kani na úse-bu úse kani ndi katɔ kawɔdi ku kalɔ kawɔdi kani kemo na ala bɔbla siin sɔɔn ndubɔkya.
Anwuɔsu ni, mina banwa, bina ƒui anu asia Blɔti limeyi lɛmmɔ bubo lɛlɔ. Na uwi ɔni binye bɛgya-nwu ni, bɛya na amii ku Katɔti ntɛ bɔdia na bilabla likpidi iye biláƒiɔ-nwu.
Na bɛbu bɛnu kalɛ na Katɔti ɔɔkɛ́ku-mii kayi. Ɔmmɔ ndi kuƒi kɔni na úte-bu ka bɔkɛ ngba bɔƒɔ. Lɛni kani na Ɔnwa Paulo ɔkɛnku lɛlati lɛni na Katɔti úte-nwu kenye únweni ɔku úte-mii.

Na ɔmɛni lɛlɔ kɔtɛ kani na ɔɔtɛmiku-mii si uunweni nwuna lɛku. Ɔƒɛni ni, nwuna ala adi bene kalɔ bunu bɔɔyu ɔkplu teete bekyuli bani néteduo tɔ litemi lɛmmɔ kemo kaduɛ ku bani naaasia ulu geen ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Lɛni kani na Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo etemila lɛnɔ ese ete-ma. Anwuɔsu beedie-nya kalɔ na ulu bamba lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔsu na badubo bɔyii ku udu.
Nsu ni, mina bayɔne, bɛgyi ɔmɛni bise. Anwuɔsu bɛti lɛlɔ bɔda kalɛ na bekyuli bekpidi balátɔlɔ-mii ku bana ekpidi ablala na bideyi ulu geen ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Naaawia ka bina bɔƒɔtaadi bɔyuɛ!
Bisie anumi na Katɔti lɛƒɔndia ku kalɛ na bɛ́ƒɔ Blɔti Yesu Kristo ɔni ndi bula Ɔƒɔne bɛ́di kemo. Anwu na buute ɔbu ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui! Ɔsia lɛni.

Katɔti ngba litemi ndi anwu ɔni nkya ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ. Na ngba litemi lɛmmɔ lɛsa na bɔɔkɔ́. Búnu-nwu ala bɔsu na bɔ́nu-nwu ku anumi. Na sɔsɔ ni, búti bula enu bútuku-nwu. Uwi ɔni na ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ni, abu bɔ́nu-nwu bɔ́ti.

Ngba litemi lɛmɛni ndi anwu ɔni náda ɔ́lɛ-bu anumi, na buudie-nwu kenye. Na anwu ɔni ndi ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii mɛni lɛsa na bɔɔkɔ́ teete-mii. Na anwu ku Katɔti nkya asa na Katɔti údie-nwu keyi ɔ́tina-bu.
Na ala ani na bɔ́nu na búnu ni, ani na buudie kenye bute-mii mɛni, kalɛ na amii lɛnɔ bɛdiku-bu kɔkpana. Na bula kɔkpana bɔdi bɔkya abu ku Katɔti ku ngba litemi lɛni ndi Ubidi Yesu Kristo ntɛ.
Buunweni-mii ɔmɛni kalɛ na bula ebiti edu-bu ɔkwɛ.
Na lɛla lɛni na búnu bɔ́siku Kristo ɔmɛni kudɔ na ani na bɔɔyɔ́ ka budie kenye mɛni ni, ani ndi ka Katɔti ɔdi bukeye. Na lɛdisa lɛdi liiibo-nwu lɛlɔ kemo na ulu biala lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu si bɔnii abu ku-nwu bɔɔdi kɔkpana nsu bɔkɛ na lɛdisa ngba bukpidi bulie kemo ni, na bɔɔnyi ɔkɔ na bɔɔɔsiaku litemi geen lɛmmɔ kama.
Nsu si bɔkɛ na bukeye kemo aani kalɛ na anwu ɔkya bukeye kemo ni, ɔɔtina ka bɔɔdiku lɛlɔ kɔkpana. Na Ubidi Yesu ubugya ɔɔbla-bu lɛlɔ sɛɛn taalɛku ekpidi biala kemo.
Si búni bɔnii bulábla likpidi ni, na bɔɔtɔ́lɔ lɛlɔ, na litemi geen lɛmmɔ lítaƒɔ-bu lɛlɔ kemo.

Nsu ka Katɔti use siin na ɔdi bula kama kekpokɔ ɔsu ni, si búdie bula alaekpidi kalɔ bɔ́tina-nwu ni, ɔdubɔnu-bu kɔnyana na uti bula alaekpidi ɔkyiɛ-bu na ɔbla-bu sɛɛn ɔlɛku ala ani mɔɔyá na muusé lɛlɔ ƒui kemo.
Nsu si búni bɔnii bútabla likpidi lɛdi ni, buudie-nwu taatina aani ɔkɔ ɔnyine, na nwuna litemi lítáƒɔ-bu lɛlɔ kemo.
Mina bebi bayɔne, muunweni ɔmɛni lite-mii kalɛ na bilabla ekpidi. Nsu si ɔdi ɔ́bla likpidi lɛdi ni, bubo ukyuli ɔni nnye-bu kenye uuvele Katɔti teete-bu. Na anwu ndi Yesu Kristo ɔni nse siin.
Na Kristo ɔmmɔ ɔlati úti nwuna ngba ɔ́kpa na bula lili ɔsu, kalɛ na ɔklibi abu ku Katɔti ntɛ. Nsu ɔɔɔdi abu lɛti ekpidi lili, mmomu ku bayawine ƒui ekpidi lili.
Si bɔɔdi Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ni, bɔgyi nwaa ka bɔ́ti-nwu.
Si ɔdi ɔ́su ɔnii, “Ngyi-nwu,” nsu uládi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔɔnyi ɔkɔ. Na litemi geen lɛmmɔ lítaƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ kemo.
Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi nwuna litemi lɛlɔ ni, bɔyɔ bɔni na ubo ute Katɔti búdu bɔ́wɔlɔ. Bɛya na lɛsu-mii kalɛ na bɔɔnu taati ka buliku Katɔti.
Ukyuli ɔni mɔɔsu ɔnii uliku Katɔti ni, ɔlɛka ulie ngba aani kalɛ na Yesu Kristo úlie.
Mina bayɔne, ɔɔɔdi ɔda bubo bɔwɔdi na muunweni lite-mii. Mmomu ɔdi bɔni na bɛ́ƒɔ bɛ́si kalɔ kesekɔ. Ɔda bubo bɔkukudi bɔmɛni ndi lɛla lɛni na bɛ́ka bunu.

Nsu ɔda bubo bɔni na muunweni lite-mii ɔƒɛni ni, bɔmua bɔdi bɔwɔdi. Na ɔkɛnku Kristo ku amii lɛnɔ lɛlɔ ni, bekyuli badubɔnu bati litemi geen lɛni nkya ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kemo. Ɔsika kayawi kamɛni lɛdisa uwi ɔdaku bɔvi, na litemi geen bukeye bɔmmɔ búuse kalɔ bɔdaku bukeye.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni masu ɔnii ɔkya bukeye kemo nsu uukisi nwuna ɔƒɔtaadine ɔkpana ni, ɔmua ɔkya lɛdisa kemo.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ ɔƒɔtaadine ɔkpana ni, uli ngba na bukeye kemo, na lɛla lɛdi liiibo-nwu lɛlɔ lɛni maya na weduo likpidi kemo.
Nsu ukyuli ɔni muukisi ɔƒɔtaadine ɔkpana ni, ɔkya lɛdisa kemo ku nwuna ablala ƒui. Na ɔɔɔgyi likpo lɛni na úsela, ɔsika lɛdisa ablala ammɔ áya na use aani ɔnumbwɛne.
Mina bebi bayɔne, muunweni-mii ɔmɛni ɔsika mɔɔwia ka bɛti ka Katɔti úti bina ekpidi ɔ́kyiɛ-mii na Yesu Kristo ɔsu.

Na amii bati ni, muunweni-mii ɔmɛni ɔsika mɔɔwia ka bɛti ka bɛgyi Kristo ɔni nkya ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ. Na amii bakloƒu ni, muunweni-mii ɔmɛni ɔsika mɔɔwia ka bɛti ka bɛ́di ukisine ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na amii, mina bebi bayɔne ni, muunweni-mii ɔku ɔmɛni ɔsika bɛ́ɛti Katɔti.

Amii bebi bati ni, muunweni-mii ɔku ɔmɛni ɔsika bɛgyi Kristo ɔni nkya ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ. Na amii bakloƒu ni, muunweni-mii ɔku ɔmɛni ɔsika bibo ɔyikun na Katɔti litemi lɛmmɔ lɛ́ƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo, na bɛ́ɛdi ukisine ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Bitayɔ kayawi ku kana lɛlɔ ala ani náta énye Katɔti lɛlɔ. Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ kayawi lɛni ni, ulayɔ Katɔti geen.

Ɔsika ala amɛni udu ani nkya kayawi ni, átasi Katɔti kudɔ. Adi ala ani mɔɔda bula likyulikpi ɔlɔna ɔmɛni ɔkwɛ, ku adikpi bɔdi ala ani na bɔɔnu na aada-bu ɔkwɛ, ku kayawi ala ani kemo na ukyuli ɔɔkun lɛmɛnɛ. Ana akɔ lɛla lɛdi lítasi Katɔti kudɔ. Mmomu kayawi udunkpi kemo na ana ƒui aasí.
Kayawi ku kana lɛlɔ ɔkwɛ adala ƒui adaku bɔvi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ni, ɔdubulie ngba ku Katɔti uwi ƒui.

Mina bebi bayɔne, mɔɔsu-mii nnii kayawi kadaku kawɔlɔkɔ budu. Na aani kalɛ na bínu ka Kristo ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔdububo ni, ɔƒɛni muedi Kristo bekisine pii béebo bakya. Na ɔmmɔ ndi kalɛ na búti bɔ́ti ka kayawi kawɔlɔkɔ kammɔ kéede.

Na bekyuli bamɛni bálɛ bula lɛkpa lɛmɛni kemo, ɔsika baaadi bula badi. Na si bula bekyuli na badi ni, nka bamua bakya-bu akɔ. Nsu bana bɔtɔlɔ bɔmmɔ bɔ́tina geen ka bana akɔ ɔdi biala ɔɔɔdi bula badi.
Nsu amii ni, Kristo ɔ́ya na nwuna Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo, na bina ƒui bɛgyi Katɔti litemi geen.
Ńtenweni-mii ɔmɛni ka bɛɛɛgyi litemi geen lɛmmɔ ɔsu, mmomu ka bɛgyi-ni ɔsu. Na bɛgyi lɛnɔ ka ɔkɔ ɔdi ulasi litemi geen lɛmmɔ kemo.
Na ɔma ndi ɔkɔ ɔnyine? Ɔkɔ ɔnyine ɔmmɔ ndi ukyuli ɔni muuní ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ. Ukyuli ɔmmɔ udu ndi ukisine ute Kristo. Na ukyuli ɔmmɔ úni Katɔti ku Ubidi ɔmmɔ ƒui.
Na ukyuli ɔni muuní Ubi ɔmɛni taasu ka ɔɔɔdi Katɔti Ubidi ni, anwu ku Katɔti beeebo kɔna. Na ukyuli ɔni muudie kenye taasu ka ɔ́ƒɔ Ubi ni, ɔ́ƒɔ Katɔti lɛnɔ.
Bɛnu kaduɛ na bɛya na ala ani na bínu ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ mmɔ áƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ƒui. Na si bɛda-nya kaduɛ ni, bɛdubulieku Ubidi ku Ɔti ɔmmɔ ƒui uwi biala.
Na ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa ndi kenye kani na Kristo úse úte-bu.
Bekyuli bani mɔɔkya ɔkplu ka batɔlɔ-mii ɔsu na muunweni-mii ɔmɛni.

Nsu amii ni, Kristo Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo, na Kɔyu kɔmɛni kɔmua kɔkya-mii lɛlɔ kemo. Anwuɔsu ni, bɛsɔ biláwia ka ukyuli ɔdi ɔsɔ ɔtina-mii ala adi lɛnɔ. Ɔsika nwuna Kɔyu kɔɔtina-mii ala amɛni ƒui. Na ala ani na kɔɔtina adi litemi geen lɛmmɔ, na ɔɔɔdi ɔkɔ. Anwuɔsu biliku Kristo aani kalɛ na Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́tina-mii.
Mina bebi bayɔne, biliku Kristo kalɛ na si uwi ɔni na ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ni, bɔdubɔkana na bunye-nwu anumi ku kaƒɔ ƒaa na kɔƒa kulékpo-bu limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Si bɛgyi ka Kristo use siin ni, ɔlɛka bɛti ka ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala ani nse siin ni, ɔdi Katɔti ubidi aani Kristo kalɛ.
Bɛnu kalɛ sɔɔn na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ abu bani mɔɔƒɔ́ Yesu taadi. Anwuɔsu na ɔɔlɔ-bu ɔnii nwuna bebi. Na búnwini Katɔti bebi sɔsɔ! Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na kayawi bekyuli balánu-bu taati ndi ka baaagyi Katɔti.

Mina banwa bayɔne, ɔƒɛni ni, búnwini Katɔti bebi. Nsu bekyuli bani udu na bɔdubo bunwini ni, Katɔti útedie-nwu tɔ keyi. Nsu bɔgyi ka si lebo lɛni na Kristo ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ni, bɔdubo bɔbla aani nwuna kalɛ. Ɔsika bɔdubo-nwu bɔnu kalɛ geen na use.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔsia Kristo bubo anu ni, ɔɔklibi lɛlɔ teese sɛɛn aani kalɛ na Kristo lɛnɔ use sɛɛn.
Ukyuli biala mɔɔbla likpidi ni, ɔɔƒiɔ́ Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ. Ɔsika likpidi ndi Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔƒiɔ.
Na bɛgyi ka Kristo úbo kalɛ na ubada-bu udie ekpidi kemo. Na anwu ni, likpidi lɛdi lɛɛɛma-nwu lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni nliku Kristo ni, ulélie taabla likpidi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni muulie taabla likpidi ni, ɔɔtina ka útati Kristo kudii, na ɔƒaani muedi ɔɔɔgyi-nwu.
Bitaya na ukyuli ɔdi ɔtɔlɔ-mii! Mina bebi bayɔne, ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi ukyuli ɔni nse siin aani kalɛ na Kristo use siin.
Ukyuli ɔni muulie taabla likpidi ni, ɔdi Satan ɔdi. Ɔsika Satan nli mɔɔbla likpidi ɔ́si kayawi kalɔ kesekɔ. Na lɛla lɛni ɔsu na Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ úbo ni, ani ndi ka ɔyila Satan ablala.
Ama bani ndi Katɔti bebi ni, belélie taabla likpidi. Ɔsika Katɔti udu nkya-ma lɛlɔ kemo ɔƒaani. Na ka Katɔti ndi-ma Ɔti ɔsu ni, balakana bulie butaabla likpidi.
Bɛya na lɛtina-mii kalɛ na bɔɔnu taati kavumana kani nkya Katɔti bebi ku Satan bebi ntɛ. Ukyuli biala ɔni naaabla ala siin ni, iye ulayɔ nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ni, ɔɔɔdi Katɔti ubidi.
Ɔmɛni ndi kenye kani na bínu bɛ́si kalɔ kesekɔ ƒui, na ani ndi ka ɔlɛka bɛyɔ lɛlɔ.
Na utalɛka bɔbla lɛlɔ aani Kain kalɛ. Ɔsika anwu ɔdi Satan ɔdi, na ɔ́du ɔnwani. Na bi ɔsu na Kain ɔ́du-nwu? Ɔsika uukisi ɔnwani ka nwuna ablala ese siin ɔsu. Na anwu Kain adi eeese siin.
Anwuɔsu ni, banwa, utabla-mii dɛye dɛye si kayawi bekyuli beekisi-mii.
Na bɔgyi ka bɔ́ɔlɛ kukpi enu kemo, na búbo buli ngba geen, ɔsika bɔɔyɔ́ bula banwa baƒɔtaadine. Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ bekyuli ni, úkpi na kɔyu kemo.
Na ukyuli ɔni muukisi nwuna ukyulikpana ni, ɔdi bekyuli ɔdune. Na amii alati bɛgyi ka ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔdú bekyuli ni, uuubo ngba bɔni naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Kalɛ na Yesu Kristo úti nwuna ngba ɔ́kpa na bula lili ni, ɔmmɔ mɔɔtina-bu lɛla lɛni ndi bɔyɔ. Anwuɔsu na abu lɛnɔ ɔlɛka buti lɛlɔ bɔkpa bula banwa baƒɔtaadine lili.
Si ukyuli ɔdi ubo ala adi na ɔɔnu ka ɔnwani ɔɔyaki nsu útete-nwu kebunku kadi mmomu ɔ́da anumi údie ɔnwani ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, dɛ na wakana bɔsu ɔnii ɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti?
Mina bebi bayɔne, bitaya na bɔyɔ lɛlɔ ku kenyekplu. Mmomu biteebunku lɛlɔ geen.
Ɔmɛni bɔbla kemo na bɔdubɔti ka bɔgyi litemi geen lɛmmɔ na bɔkɛ kayi ƒaa na Katɔti anumi.
Na si ina bula kayi kaadú-bu kɔtɔ muedi ni, enu ataƒɛ-bu. Bɔgyi ka Katɔti ɔɔtɛ litemi biala ulu lɛlɔ teetulo-bu, na ɔgyi lɛla biala.
Anwuɔsu ni, banwa bayɔne, si bula kayi kaladu-bu kɔtɔ ni, na bɔdubɔkana na bunye Katɔti anumi ku kayi buse.
Na lɛla biala na buuvele-nwu ni, bɔɔkɛ́-ni ɔsika bɔɔdi nwuna ɔda bubo lɛlɔ na bɔɔbla lɛla lɛni mɔɔyɔ́-nwu kaƒɔ.
Ɔda bubo bɔni na úse úte-bu ndi ka bɔƒɔ Ubidi Yesu Kristo ɔmmɔ bɔdi, na bɔyɔ bula lɛlɔ aani kalɛ kani na úbo-bu ɔda úbavi.
Bekyuli bani mɔɔdi Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ ni, beliku Katɔti. Na Katɔti lɛnɔ uliku-ma. Na Kɔyu kɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu ɔsu ni, bɔgyi ka Katɔti uliku-bu.
Banwa bayɔne, bitaƒɔ kɔyu biala muulie ukyuli lɛlɔ bitadi. Mmomu bɛkɔku ɔdi biala bɛnu si kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ. Ɔsika ɔkɔ kenye bediene béegyingya bakya kayawi ekpo ƒui.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni muudie kenye taasu ɔnii Kristo Yesu úbo aani ɔyawine kalɛ ni, ukyuli ɔmmɔ ubo Kɔyu kɔni nási Katɔti kudɔ. Na ɔmɛni ndi ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na bɛdubɔsia bɛti Katɔti Kɔyu.

Nsu ukyuli biala ɔni meni ka ɔsu ɔnii Yesu úbo aani ɔyawine kalɛ ni, kɔyu kɔni na ubo mmɔ kútasi Katɔti kudɔ. Kɔyu kɔmɛni kɔdi Kristo ukisine. Na bínu ka kɔyu kɔmmɔ kɔdububo kayawi, na kúubo kɔkya ɔƒaani muedi.
Nsu amii bebi bayɔne ni, bɛ́si Katɔti kudɔ, na bɛ́ɛdi ɔkɔ kenye bediene bammɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Kɔyu kɔni náƒɔ-mii lɛlɔ kemo ni, kubo ɔyikun kutulo kɔyu kɔni nlie ama bani ndi kayawi badi mmɔ lɛlɔ.
Kayawi lɛlɔ bekyuli kani na badi. Na baatɛmi taasiku kayawi ala lɛlɔ. Na kayawi bekyuli lɛnɔ beenú-ma litemi.

Nsu abu ni, bɔdi Katɔti badi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni ngyi Katɔti ni, uunú-bu litemi. Na ukyuli biala ɔni nátasi Katɔti kudɔ ni, ulenu-bu litemi. Ɔmɛni buuti taanu taati Kɔyu kɔni mɔɔtina litemi geen lɛmmɔ ku kɔyu kɔni mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli.
Banwa bayɔne, bɛya na bɔyɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bɔyɔ bɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ bekyuli ɔdi Katɔti ubi, na ɔgyi Katɔti.
Na ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ bekyuli ni, ɔɔɔgyi Katɔti. Ɔsika Katɔti ablala ƒui adi bɔyɔ.
Ka Katɔti ɔ́yɔ ka udie nwuna bɔyɔ ɔtina-bu ɔsu ni, ɔ́tala Ubidi unwi pɛ ɔnii ubo kayawi, kalɛ na ɔkɛnku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ na bɔkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Bɛya na lɛsu-mii lɛla lɛni geen muudie bɔyɔ keyi. Ɔɔɔdi kalɛ na bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti muudie bɔyɔ keyi. Mmomu Katɔti ɔ́yɔ-bu, na úti Ubidi ɔ́kpa na bula ekpidi lili kalɛ na ɔklibi abu ku-nwu ntɛ.
Banwa bayɔne, ka Katɔti ɔ́yɔ-bu geen lɛni ɔsu ni, ɔlɛka abu lɛnɔ butaayɔ lɛlɔ.
Ukyuli ɔdi útanu Katɔti kudii. Nsu si bɔɔyɔ́ lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti uliku-bu, na bɔyɔ bɔni bubo bute-nwu búdu bɔ́wɔlɔ.
Bɔgyi ka buliku Katɔti geen, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku-bu, ɔsika anwu ɔlati Kɔyu na úti úte-bu.
Bɔ́nu bɔ́ti nwaa na buudie kenye ka Katɔti ɔ́tala Ubidi ka ubedie bayawine ɔlɛku ekpidi kemo.
Si ukyuli biala údie ɔ́su ɔnii Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ni, ɔɔtina ka Katɔti uliku-nwu, na anwu lɛnɔ uliku Katɔti.
Na abu alati bɔgyi na bɔ́ƒɔ bɔ́di ka Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́-bu. Katɔti ablala ƒui adi bɔyɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni muulie taayɔ bekyuli ni, uliku Katɔti, na Katɔti lɛnɔ uliku-nwu.

Na ulu ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na bɔyɔ búdu bɔ́wɔlɔ na bula akɔ. Ɔmmɔ ɔsu na bɔdubɔkana na bunye Katɔti anumi na litemi bɔtɛ limeyi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ku kayi buse. Ɔsika kalɛ na Kristo use ni, lɛni kani na buse na kayawi kamɛni kemo.
Liƒu lɛdi liiibo bɔyɔ kemo. Mmomu bɔyɔ bɔni nédu bɔ́wɔlɔ bɔɔgyá liƒu biala. Ɔsika liƒu ku kɔtu bɔni nkɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni mbo liƒu ni, nwuna bɔyɔ bútedu bútawɔlɔ.
Bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti ku bekyuli ɔsika Katɔti náka-bu bɔyɔ.

Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔsu ɔnii ɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti nsu uukisi nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ni, ɔkɔ ɔnyine na ɔdi. Ɔsika ukyuli biala ɔni naaayɔ ɔnwani ɔni na ɔɔnu ku nwuna anumi ni, dɛ na wakana na wayɔ Katɔti ɔni na ulánu ku anumi?
Na ɔda ɔni na Kristo úbo-bu ndi ka ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti ni, ɔlɛka ɔyɔ nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine lɛnɔ.
Bekyuli bani ƒui náƒɔ bádi ka Yesu ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ ni, badi Katɔti bebi. Na alakana ubi ɔti bɔyɔ na ekisi nwuna bebi! Anwuɔsu si aayɔ́ Katɔti ni, aayɔ́ nwuna bebi lɛnɔ.
Na dɛ na bɔdubɔnu bɔti ka bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti bebi? Bɔɔnu ɔmɛni taati si bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti na bɔɔdi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ.
Na dɛ na bɔɔnu bɔti ka bɔɔyɔ́ Katɔti? Bɔɔnu ɔmɛni taati si bɔɔdi nwuna etemila lɛlɔ. Na nwuna etemila eeese aani etila ani nétulo-bu.
Ɔsika Katɔti ubi biala ɔɔkana na ɔɔdi kayawi lɛlɔ. Na bɔƒɔtaadi ndi lɛla lɛni na buuti taadi kayawi lɛlɔ.
Nsu ukyuli ɔdi ulakana kayawi lɛlɔ bɔdi amu ntu ɔ́ƒɔ ɔ́di ka Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ.

Yesu ɔmɛni ndi Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔni nébo kayawi, na bɔ́nu-nwu bɔ́ti ɔkɛnku ntu bɔkpila ɔdi ɔni na ɔ́ƒɔ ku nwuna ubugya ɔni néwi kalɔ lɛlɔ ɔsu. Na ɔɔɔdi ntu lɛti pɛ lɛlɔ na ɔkɛ úbo, mmomu ntu ku ubugya ƒui lɛlɔ. Na Katɔti Kɔyu muudie-nwu kenye na ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔsika Kɔyu kɔmmɔ ablala ƒui adi litemi geen.
Ala ani muudie-nwu kenye mmɔ ebo atɛ. Na anya ndi
Katɔti Kɔyu ku ntu ku ubugya ɔni lɛlɔ na ɔ́sia úbo mmɔ. Na kenye budie ɛtɛ bɔmɛni ƒui buse unwi.
Bɔɔƒɔ́ ukyuli kenye budie taadi bɔdi. Nsu Katɔti kenye budie na ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, bɔdia butulo. Ɔsika kenye budie bɔmmɔ bɔdi Katɔti ɔlati bɔdi na Ubidi lɛlɔ.

Anwuɔsu ukyuli ɔni náƒɔ Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ ɔ́di ni, ɔgyi geen na nwuna kayi kemo ka kenye budie bɔmmɔ bɔdi litemi geen. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nátaƒɔ Katɔti útadi ni, ɔɔnu Katɔti aani ɔkɔ ɔnyine, ɔsika útaƒɔ ala ani na Katɔti ɔ́su ɔ́siku Ubidi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ útadi.
Na kenye budie bɔni na bubo ni, amu ndi ka Katɔti úte-bu ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii. Na uute-bu ngba bɔmɛni ɔkɛnku Ubidi kudɔ.
Ukyuli ɔni mbo kɔna ku Ubidi ɔmmɔ ni, ubo ngba bɔmɛni. Na ukyuli ɔni neeebo kɔna ku Katɔti Ubidi ɔmmɔ ni, uuubo ngba bɔmmɔ.
Muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii bani mbo ngba bɔƒɔ lɛnunsia na Katɔti Ubidi Yesu lɛnyi kemo kalɛ na bɛti ka bibo ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Bɔgyi nwaa ka si buuvele Katɔti lɛla biala na nwuna bɔyɔ kenye ni, uunú-bu bɔkpali.
Na si bɔgyi ka uunú-bu lɛla biala na buuvele-nwu ni, bɔgyi geen ka ala ani buuvele taasiku-nwu kudɔ mmɔ éenwini bula ɔdi.

Si ɔdi ɔ́nu ka nwuna ɔnwa ɔƒɔtaadine ɔ́bla likpidi lɛdi lɛni na lilákpanku-nwu taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo ni, ɔkpali katɔ na nwuna lili na Katɔti ɔdubute-nwu ngba. Na ɔmɛni use ute bekyuli bani na bana ekpidi alákpanku-ma taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo. Nsu likpidi lɛdi lɛkya lɛni mɔɔkpanku bekyuli taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo. Na naaasu nnii bɛkpali katɔ na likpidi lɛmɛni lili.
Lɛla biala naaakɛ ulu siin lɛlɔ ni, ɔdi likpidi. Nsu ekpidi adi akya ani naaakpanku ukyuli taatákya kukpi ƒui kemo.
Bɔgyi ka ukyuli ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubi ni, ulélie taabla likpidi. Ɔsika Katɔti Ubidi ɔɔgyumana-nwu kalɛ na uleduo ukisine ɔmmɔ enu kemo.
Abu bɔgyi ka bɔdi Katɔti badi geen, na kayawi bekyuli bakladi ƒui bakya ukisine ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ bɔdi kalɔ.

Na abu bɔgyi lɛnɔ ka Katɔti Ubidi úbo kayawi kamɛni úbedie ala kalɔ úte-bu kalɛ na bɔti anwu ɔni geen ndi Katɔti. Na ɔƒaani ni, buliku anwu ɔni geen ndi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ku nwuna Ubidi Yesu Kristo lɛnɔ. Na anwu geen ndi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔni ndi ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Anwuɔsu, mina bebi bayɔne, bɛda lɛlɔ bidie lɛƒiɔkpa kemo.

Ami baƒɔtaadine unengu muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite awɔ uleku ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna aani nwuna ɔdi ku ƒula bebi. Mɔɔyɔ́-mii na litemi geen lɛmmɔ kemo. Na ɔɔɔdi ami lɛti mɔɔyɔ́-mii, mmomu ami ku bani ƒui ngyi litemi geen lɛmmɔ.
Ɔsika litemi geen lɛmmɔ lɛ́ƒɔ abu ku-mii ƒui lɛlɔ kemo na lɛdubulie-bu kudɔ uwi ƒui.
Na si bulie na litemi geen lɛmmɔ ku bɔyɔ kemo ni, lɛƒɔndia ku kɔnyana bɔnu ku keyi buɛɛ kadubɔsiaku-bu ɔ́si Katɔti ɔni ndi bula Ɔti Ku Yesu Kristo ɔni ndi Katɔti Ubidi kudɔ.
Kubiti kɔ́da-mi geen ka lɛ́nu ka ƒula bebi badi bamua basiaku litemi geen lɛmmɔ kama aani kalɛ kani na Katɔti úbo-bu ɔda.
Na ɔƒɛni ni, uleku ɔyɔne, muuvele-ɔ ka aya na bula ƒui bɔyɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔmɛni ɔɔɔdi ɔda bubo bɔwɔdi na muunweni lite-ɔ. Mmomu ɔdi ɔda bubo bɔni nkya ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ.
Na bɔgyi ka bɔɔyɔ́ lɛlɔ si bɔsiaku Katɔti ɔda bubo bɔmmɔ kama. Na ɔda bubo bɔmɛni ndi ka bulie ngba na bɔyɔ kemo aani kalɛ na bínu ɔ́si kalɔ kesekɔ mmɔ.

Bekyuli bani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli béebo bakɛ baaví kayawi. Bekyuli bamɛni muuní ka basu banii Yesu Kristo úbo kayawi aani ukyuli ɔyawine kalɛ. Na ukyuli ɔmɛni udu ni, unye ute ɔkɔ ɔnyine ɔni ndi Kristo ukisine ɔmmɔ.
Anwuɔsu binye kagyumana kalɛ na bilatuma bilewiakun, mmomu na bina katuma kalɛ-mii kɔsia kudu kɔwɔlɔ.
Ukyuli ɔni náda ɔ́via Kristo ala bɔtina na ulásia-nya kama ni, uuubo kɔna ku Katɔti. Nsu ukyuli ɔni nsiaku Kristo ala bɔtina bɔmmɔ kama ni, uliku Katɔti ku Ubidi lɛnɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu si ukyuli ɔdi úbo-mii kudɔ na ɔɔɔda Kristo ala bɔtina bɔmɛni ni, bitegyingya enu bitaƒɔ-nwu na uduo-mii kaduli.
Ɔsika ukyuli ɔni megyingya enu waƒɔ-nwu ni, ɔ́blaku-nwu unwi na nwuna udunkpi ala bɔbla kemo.
Mbo ala pii na lɛsu-mii, nsu naaayɔ ka linweni ala ammɔ limene-mii. Mmomu mɔɔwia kuƒi ka libo-mii kudɔ na bɔtɛmi anumi ku anumi kalɛ na bula ebiti edu-bu ɔkwɛ.
Ƒula ɔnwani ulekubi ɔni lɛnɔ na Katɔti ɔ́ƒuna bebi beegyele-ɔ kaduɛ.
Ɔkpana ɔyɔne Gaio, ami baƒɔtaadine unengu muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite-ɔ. Mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ na litemi geen lɛmmɔ kemo.
Ɔkpana ɔbuni, mɔɔkpali katɔ nnii lɛla biala lɛtɛ lite-ɔ kaduɛ na akɛ ɔlɔkplu aani kalɛ na ebo ɔlɔkplu na kɔyu kemo.
Lɛlɔ lɛ́yɔ-mi geen uwi ɔni na banwani badi bébo na bábasu-mi kalɛ na aadi litemi geen lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na ngyi ka asiaku-ni kama.
Lɛla biala lilayɔ-mi kaƒɔ teetulo ɔni na muunú ka mina bebi basiaku litemi geen lɛmmɔ kama.
Mina ɔkpana buni, ka aanu banwa baƒɔtaadine ina ka badi badi baƒɔ bani na aaagyi muedi ɔsu ni, aabla ala ulu lɛlɔ teete Katɔti.
Baƒɔ bammɔ bábasu baƒɔtaadine bani nkya mɛni kalɛ na aayɔ́-ma. Anwuɔsu muuvele-ɔ nnii bunku-ma na bakɛ ala ani ƒui na baawia na bana ulu busie kemo aani kalɛ na ɔ́manku-ma aani Katɔti kabla bablane.
Ɔsika bése bana ulu busie kalɔ na Kristo kabla bɔbla kemo, na bátaƒɔ kebunku kadi bátasiku bekyuli bani nátaƒɔ bátadi kudɔ.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, abu Kristoƒuɔ ɔlɛka bubunku bekyuli bamɛni udu kalɛ na bunyeku-ma na bugyingya Kristo litemi geen lɛmmɔ.
Línweni ɔku ɔdi líte ƒula baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ. Nsu ka Diotreƒe ɔɔyɔ́ ka ɔtalaku lɛlɔ katɔ aani ɔtɔnkune na mmɔ ɔsu ni, ulábu lɛla lɛni na abu batalane bɔɔsu.

Si líbo ni, ndubudie-nwu keyi na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla lɛlɔ ku ala ekpidi ani na ɔɔsu tasiku-bu lɛlɔ ku ɔkɔ ɔni na ɔ́nyi ɔ́sia-bu. Nsu ɔmmɔ lɛti bɔbla bútabɔ-nwu. Ɔsika ulátuna ɔnii ɔɔƒɔ́ banwa si bébo. Na uutile bekyuli bamba bani mɔɔyɔ́ ka baƒɔ-ma lɛnɔ kuƒi, na ɔɔbɔku-ma teedie lɛkpa lɛmmɔ kemo.
Mina ɔkpana ɔyɔne, tasiaku likpidi bɔbla kama. Mmomu siaku lɛbuni bɔbla kama. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔbla lɛbuni ni, ɔdi Katɔti ɔdi. Nsu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala ekpidi ni, ɔɔɔgyi Katɔti.

Na Demetrio anwu ni, ukyuli biala ɔɔlɔ-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na kalɛ na bɔɔnu litemi geen lɛmmɔ na nwuna lɛlɔ kemo ni, úte-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na abu lɛnɔ bɔɔlɔ-nwu lɛnyi buni. Na bɛgyi ka lɛla lɛni na bɔɔsu lise lɛni.
Mbo ala pii na lɛsu-mii, nsu naaayɔ ka linweni ala ammɔ limene-ɔ.
Mɔɔwia ka libo-ɔ kudɔ uwi klukui kemo na bɔtɛmi anumi ku anumi.
Lɛ́wɔ mɛni. Keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-ɔ. Bakpana bani nkya mɛni ƒui beegyele-ɔ kaduɛ. Lɔ bakpana bani nkya mmɔ anyi unwi unwi na egyele-ma ete-mi.

Ami Yuda ɔni ndi Yesu Kristo kabla ɔblane na ndi Yakobo ɔnwani ni, muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii bani nénu Katɔti bɔlɔ. Na ka bɛ́siaku-nwu ɔsu ni, ɔɔyɔ́-mii. Na Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛnɔ ɔɔgyumana-mii geen.
Muuvele Katɔti nnii ɔnu-mii kɔnyana na nwuna keyi buɛɛ kasiaku-mii, na nwuna bɔyɔ butaakɔ katɔ teebu na bina akɔ.

Banwa bayɔne, ɔdi lɛla lɛni na mɔɔyɔ́-mii kaƒɔ geen ka linweni-mii ɔku ɔ́si ulu unwi pɛ ɔni lɛlɔ na Katɔti ɔdubɔsia ɔƒɔ-bu ngba lɛlɔ. Na ɔƒɛni ni, lɛ́nu ka ɔlɛka lɛkya-mii ogya na kalɛ na bɛ́ƒɔ Kristo bɛ́di lɛlɔ na bɛda-nwu kpakplaa. Ɔsika ɔmmɔ ndi bɔƒɔtaadi ulu unwi pɛ ɔni na Katɔti úti úte-bu na ulakana na wavumana kudii lɛnɔ.

Bekyuli bekpidi bani naaayia Katɔti bábɛ béduo-mii akɔ. Na Katɔti ɔ́lɛ ugyii úse ɔ́si kukuuku ƒui ka ɔdubɔdu-ma kɔtɔ na ɔyila-ma udu. Badi bekyuli bekpidi bani nákɛ kasiakɔ na bánu kalɛ na Katɔti ubo lɛƒɔndia úte-bu, na bátu ala bénwini kalɛ na bakɛ kuƒi bataabla bana lɛyalɛ ku likyulikpi ala.
Bɛgyi ɔmɛni, nsu nsɔ mɔɔsu-mii ka uwi ɔni na Katɔti údie Israelƒuɔ ɔ́siku Egyipte kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, ɔ́du bani nátaƒɔ-nwu bátadi ƒui.

Na Katɔti batu bani nátakana na benye bana kenyekɔ na ɔyikun ɔni na Katɔti úte-ma kenye ni, Katɔti úbo-ma kɔgba ɔ́kya kasuudikɔ wetédu limeyi lɛni na watɛku-ma litemi na limeyi likplodi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Na Sodom ku Gomora ku lɛma lɛni náka lɛ́mana-ma lɛnɔ ni, bátakana lɛlɔ bɔda na bábla lɛyalɛ ku ala ekpidi bamba. Katɔti úti ogya ɔ́kyula-ma kalɛ na abu bɔnu bɔtɛya.

Lɛni kani na ala ani na bekyuli bekpidi bani na bébeduo-mii akɔ baanu na ana ani na baatɛ teegye kemo ni, áya na baabla alaekpidi ani mɔɔyá bana ɔlɔna uusé lɛlɔ. Báta bénye Katɔti lɛlɔ na baatɛmi enyekpi na bagadine lɛlɔ.

Na Katɔti ɔtu unengudi ɔni ndi Mikael muedi ka kadɔ kéduo anwu ku Satan ntɛ na baakya unyeƒi na Mose ɔlɔna lɛlɔ ni, úteti anwu ɔlati kenyekɔ ɔyikun útabɔku Satan. Mmomu ɔ́su ɔnini, “Blɔti ɔbɔku-ɔ!”
Nsu bekyuli bamɛni udu ama ni, lɛla biala kalɔ na bétenu ni, beewida na beedumi. Na ala ani kalɔ na bénu ni, beléti kasusu baabla-nya aani bebuo kalɛ. Na anya geen mɔɔyila-ma udu.

Bɔbwɛ muute-ma! Ɔsika ulu ɔni lɛlɔ na Kain ɔ́vi ni, nwuna lɛlɔ kani na ama lɛnɔ bakɛ. Na bányonu lɛlɔ na belie ngba bukpidi bɔni na ukyuli ɔni baalɔ Bileam úlie ka baawia kayawi lɛkɛ ɔsu. Báta bénye Katɔti ɔda bubo lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na Koran ɔ́bla. Na badubɔyii udu aani Koran ɔmmɔ kalɛ.

Badi bekyuli bani ablala mɔɔyá na bina kasala keesé lɛlɔ si bɛ́sala bɛɛdi Blɔti adila ammɔ. Beedie lɛlɔ na ama lɛti baadi teemo kalɛ na baayɔ́. Bese aani ɔnantu ɔni nánwu, nsu ulána kudii, na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kani muubó-nwu taavinku. Na bese lɛnɔ aani egyii ani naaanwu ina egyiibi bɔnwu uwi muedi. Bese aani egyii ani na bágyu-nya ku ligyiitu na ékpi ƒui.

Bese aani ɛpu ntu bɔni mɔɔnwanɛ lɛlɔ ku avlɔvɔ. Bana kɔƒa ala na bada baatina lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na avlɔvɔ aata. Na bese aani ayabi ani mɔɔkpa na kayaa na aayii. Bekyuli bamɛni udu geen na Katɔti ɔ́klibi kasuudikɔ kammɔ úse ka uti-ma ɔkya mmɔ uwi ƒui.
Bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ litemi geen na Henok ɔni ndi kaba maatɛdi ubi ɔ́si Adam lɛlɔ ɔ́su úse ɔnini, “Katɔti ku nwuna batu ƒui bumomo báyu bébo kalɔ lɛlɔ.

Bébo banii babatɛku bekyuli ƒui litemi. Na bekyuli bani ƒui na balábla Katɔti lɛƒɔyɔ ku ala ani ƒui na bábla ka baláyia Katɔti ɔsu ni, bátɛmi enyekpi na nwuna lɛlɔ lɛnɔ. Anwuɔsu Katɔti ɔni-ma kɔtu.”

Bekyuli bamɛni baadɔ na bana lɛlɔ kemo. Na beedie bekyuli bamba bɔƒiɔ. Baakun lɛlɔ lɛmɛnɛ, na bekyuli bamba ala alaƒɔ-ma anu amu ntu uwi ɔni na bákɛ-ma lɛlɔ kɔsia kani. Bana likyulikpi ala ani mɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ kani na baabla uwi biala.
Nsu ni, mina banwa, bɛkali etemila ani na Yesu Kristo batalane básu-mii.
Básu banini, “Emeyi ekplodi ammɔ kemo ni, bekyuli badubo-mii buti bɔbla lɛmala na ala ani baasu taasiku-mii lɛlɔ ɔsu. Na basiaku bana udunkpi ala ani na Katɔti ulayɔ kama.”
Ama mɔɔyá na bekyuli beele lɛlɔ akpa akpa. Na Katɔti Kɔyu kuuubo-ma lɛlɔ kemo, anwuɔsu bakɛ basiaku bana ɔlɔna kemo ala ani mɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ kani.
Nsu ni, mina banwa, biti lɛlɔ bɛsia Kristo kalɛ na bina bɔƒɔtaadi kedee bɔyu ɔkplu, na bitaakpali katɔ na Kɔyu kemo na ɔkya-mii ɔyikun.
Bɛda lɛlɔ na bitaayɔ Katɔti uwi ɔni na binye bɛɛnu ulu ka Yesu Kristo wanu-mii kɔnyana na bɛkɛ ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii.
Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, bekyuli bani na bana bɔƒɔtaadi bútayu tɔ ɔkplu ni, bɛnu-ma kɔnyana.

Na bidie babambadi lɛnɔ ɔkplu kemo na beleduo lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo. Na bakladi ni, bitaanu-ma kɔnyana. Nsu bɛgyumana bina lɛlɔ kalɛ na bana lɛyalɛ udunkpi ɔni náƒɔ-ma lɛlɔ aani adala kalɛ alávi-mii.
Na anwu ɔni ndubɔkana na uƒie-mii ɔda na bilebuli ni, ɔdubɔkana na ɔbla-mii kedee lɛnɔ. Na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii na ɔya na bɛkana na binye nwuna anumi ani muukeye lɛtɔtɔ na bilásɔ.

Anwu ɔmmɔ ndi Katɔti unwi pɛ ɔni náƒɔ-bu ngba ɔkɛ Blɔti Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ. Anwu na buumwi, ɔsika anwu mɔɔdi lɛga na ɔɔdi ala ƒui lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun ɔ́si kukuuku ku uwi ɔmɛni kemo ku ɔni mebo lɛnɔ kemo. Ɔsia lɛni.

Ɔku ɔmɛni ndi ala ani na Katɔti údie ɔ́tina nwuna kabla bablane ɔkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ ka adubo bɔlɛ na uwi klukui kemo. Báti ɔmɛni ɔkɛnku Katɔti ɔtu ɔni na Kristo ɔ́tala ɔ́kya nwuna kabla ɔblane Yohane na ala ani na údie ɔ́tina-nwu kemo.
Ami Yohane línweni ala ani ƒui na línu ku ani na lɛ́nu. Na lídie kenye na linyesia lɛni nási Katɔti kudɔ ku litemi geen lɛni na Yesu Kristo údie ɔ́tina lɛlɔ.

Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni mɔɔká ɔku ɔmɛni teete bekyuli. Na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli bani muunú Katɔti linyese etemila amɛni na balábla atuɔkplu na lɛla lɛni na línweni lɛ́kya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo lɛlɔ. Ɔsika uwi ɔni na ala amɛni ƒui adubo bɔlɛ úude.

Ami Yohane muunweni ɔku ɔmɛni lite amii baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ani nkya Asia kalɛkɛ lɛlɔ. Bɛkɛ lɛƒɔndia ku keyi buɛɛ bɛsiku Katɔti ku nwuna Kɔyu ku Yesu Kristo kudɔ. Katɔti ndi anwu ɔni nli ɔ́si kukuuku, na ulie ɔƒɛni, na ɔdubo bulie uwi ɔni mebo ƒui. Na Katɔti Kɔyu ndi anwu ɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ ɔni nnye Katɔti lɛgaboku anumi.

Na Yesu Kristo ndi anwu ɔni muudie lɛla lɛdi biala kenye ulu lɛlɔ. Ɔdi ukyuli udeedi ɔni na Katɔti ɔ́gyila ɔ́lɛku bekpine akɔ na ɔsɔ ulekpi kudii. Yesu ɔmɛni mɔɔdi kayawi baga ƒui lɛlɔ. Na ɔɔyɔ́-bu. Na úti nwuna ubugya ɔ́kpa na bula lili, na ɔ́ƒɔ-bu ɔ́lɛku bula ekpidi kemo.
Na ɔ́bla-bu baga ku bakpane bani mɔɔkpanku bekyuli teeboku Ɔti ɔni ndi Katɔti. Uukeye, na ubo ɔyikun ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui! Ɔsia lɛni.
Bɛnu! Aanu-nwu ka ɔ́si kayaa ɔdubo na uyɔlɔ kemo! Ukyuli biala ɔdubo-nwu bɔnu ku bani ƒui nábla-nwu kalala. Kayawi bekyuli ƒui badubuwulo kɔnyana ku keku. Ɔsia lɛni.
Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui mɔɔsu ɔnini, “Ami ndi kalɔ kesekɔ ku kawɔlɔkɔ. Ami nli, na lílie, na ndubo bulie uwi ɔni ndubo ƒui.”

Banwa, bɔdi bavinkpana ka buliku Yesu ɔsu. Na ami ku-mii ƒui bunye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa na kayawi kamɛni kemo, na bɔɔdi Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ala. Ńtaakɔ Katɔti litemi buni lɛni nkɛnku Yesu Kristo lɛlɔ lɛsa na ulu lɛlɔ. Nsu ka bekyuli balayɔ lɛni ɔsu ni, béti-mi bétése ntuntɛ kalɔ kani baalɔ Patmo.
Na limeyi lɛni lɛlɔ na baƒɔtaadine baasa teemwi Blɔti ni, Katɔti Kɔyu kɔ́ƒɔ-mi lɛlɔ kemo ƒui na línu ka lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́ku momoomo aani kakpɛɛ na lɛɛtɛmi na mina kama.

Lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, “Nweni lɛla lɛni na ánu se na eti-ni esienku baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ na lɛma linengudi lɛdi kemo. Ani ndi Eƒeso ku Smirna ku Pergamo ku Tiatira ku Sardi ku Ƒiladelƒia ku Laodikea.”
Amu ka lɛ́tu línwini nnii mɔɔnu ukyuli ɔni mɔɔtɛmiku-mi ni, lɛ́nu sika ugyiedi ligyii maatɛ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔɔsia.
Na ligyii lɛmmɔ akɔ ni, lɛla lɛdi linye aani ukyuli kalɛ. Na ɔkya awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔni néne útédu-nwu kanintɔ. Na sika ugyiedi kabuli káda kámana-nwu kayi.
Nwuna lili linwini lɛ́ƒuala aani unwo na úlieku etubanke. Na nwuna anumi aada aani ogya.
Na nwuna lɛgba lise aani lɛbuala lɛni bédie na ogya kemo, na lígyie na liikeye. Nwuna lɛdi lɛɛku aani ketu kani mɔɔgbá taasi taayu lɛtabi lɛni nákuku lɛdi lili ku kɔku bonwu.
Ukyuli ɔmmɔ ɔda ayabi maatɛ na nwuna kɔdianu. Na litemi geen lɛni nse aani kewii kani na bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ lɛɛlɛ́-nwu kenye. Na nwuna anumi eekeye aani kalɛ na ɔƒɛ ɔɔbi.
Ka lɛ́nu-nwu ni, líbuli ńtáyu kalɔ aani ukpine na nwuna anumi. Nsu ukyuli ɔmɛni úti nwuna kɔdianu ɔ́sia-mi lɛlɔ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sɔ tayia! Ami ndi Udeedi ku Ukplodi.
Ami ndi Ukyuli Ɔni Nli Ngba! Líkpi, nsu ɔƒɛni ni, nli ngba. Na nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo bukpi kudii. Mbo ɔyikun na kukpi ku kekpine lɛlɔ.
Anwuɔsu ala ani na ánu ku ala ani nkya ɔƒɛni ku ani ndubo bɔlɛ lɛnɔ ni, nweni-nya se.

Ayabi maatɛ ani na ánu na mina kɔdianu ku sika ugyiedi ligyii lɛmmɔ enye ete lɛla lɛdi. Na ana kalɔ na ndubo budie mɛni. Ayabi maatɛ ammɔ ndi Katɔti batu maatɛ ute baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ammɔ. Na sika ugyiedi ligyii lɛmmɔ ndi baƒɔtaadine akpa maatɛ ammɔ.”

Amu na ɔ́su ami Yohane ɔnini, “Nweni ɔku te Eƒeso baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu nda ayabi maatɛ na mina kɔdianu na muusié teebo na sika ugyiedi ligyii maatɛ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔɔsia mmɔ ntɛ. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.

Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla. Na ngyi kalɛ na binye kabla kammɔ lɛlɔ kpakplaa ku kalɛ na bɛ́kya ɔkplu. Ngyi ka biléte bekyuli bekpidi kuƒi ku kalɛ na bɛ́kɔku-ma bɛ́nu. Ama ndi bani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli banii badi batalane, nsu baaadi batalane. Na bɛ́nu-ma bɛ́ti ka badi ɔkɔ banyine.
Ngyi ka binye lɛbibo lɛmmɔ kenye kpakplaa na bɛɛkya ɔkplu na ami ɔsu, na enu átaƒɛ-mii.
Nsu bɔƒiɔ bɔni muudie-mii lɛlɔ ndi ka bɛsɔ bilayɔ-mi aani kalɛ na bítaayɔ-mi kudeedi.

Anwuɔsu bɛkali bina kenyekɔ kedeedi kani bínye asa na bíbuli bɛnu. Na binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi, na bitaabla lɛla lɛni na bítaabla kudeedi. Nsu si bítenwini kama bítakya bina ekpidi ni, ndububo-mii kudɔ na mbada bina sika ugyiedi ugyii ku nwuna asogya ɔmmɔ lɛgyu nwuna kenyekɔ.
Nsu lɛla lɛni mɔɔda-mi kubiti na bina lɛlɔ ndi ka ala ani na bekyuli bani nsiaku Nikolatia kama baabla ni, biikisi-nya. Na ami lɛnɔ nkisi-nya.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubute-nwu ulu na ɔdi ngba kugyii kɔni nnye Katɔti Paradiso kemo mmɔ ebi.”
Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Smirna baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu ndi Udeedi ku Ukplodi. Na líkpi, nsu lɛ́sɔ lɛ́ta líbo nli ngba. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.

Ngyi ka biibó abi na bɛɛyaki ala. Nsu geen ni, bibo ala ƒui. Ngyi enyekpi ani na bekyuli bani mɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ banii Yudaƒuɔ básu básiku-mii lɛlɔ. Nsu ni, baaasiaku Katɔti. Mmomu badi kasala kani ndi Satan badi.

Bitayia lɛbibo biala lɛni mebo-mii lɛlɔ. Bise atu na binu! Ukisine ɔmmɔ ɔdubo bina akɔ badi bukpoku bɔnu na ɔya na bakya-mii ɔtɔ na bekpoku-mii emeyi leevu. Ɔlɛka bɛbla ala ulu lɛlɔ bite-mi si ina úbo úte ka bikpi muedi. Na ami ndubuti ngba bɔni nsɔ naaadubo bɔsa kudii lɛƒɔ-mii kayu.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, uleduo kukpi kunyɔdi ɔgbankpi kemo.”
Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ɔku te Pergamo baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu mbo kewii kani bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ mmɔ. Na ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.

Ngyi ka ɔma ɔni na bilie ndi likpo lɛni na Satan úse nwuna lɛga kadikɔ. Bɛ́siaku-mi kama kpakplaa. Na bítedie bina bɔƒɔtaadi atu na mina lɛlɔ ina uwi ɔni na bádu Antipa ɔni lɛnɔ nédie-mi litemi kenye ulu lɛlɔ na likpo lɛni na Satan ulie mmɔ.

Nsu alakpa alɛɛ adi ábala-mii. Bibo bekyuli badi na bina akɔ mmɔ bani mɔɔsiaku Bileam ala bɔtina kama. Ukyuli ɔmɛni nátina Balak kalɛ na ɔtɔlɔ Israelƒuɔ. Na ɔ́kpanku-ma útákya likpidi kemo. Baadi adila ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ, na bábla lɛyalɛ ala.
Lɛni kani bibo bekyuli badi na mmɔ bani mɔɔsiaku Nikolatia ala bɔtina kama.
Binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi! Na si ɔɔɔdi lɛni ni, ami ndubo-mii kudɔ uwi klukui ku litemi geen lɛni mɔɔtu aani kewii kani mɔɔlɛ́-mi kenye na mbekpoku bekyuli bani nsiaku ala bɔtina bɔmmɔ kama.

Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ. Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubo-nwu adila ani na Katɔti ɔ́bala úse adi bute. Na ndubute-nwu lɛtabi lɛƒualadi lɛdi lɛnɔ lɛni lɛlɔ na bénweni lɛnyi lɛwɔdi básia lɛni na ukyuli ɔmmɔ kani ndubɔti-ni.”
“Nweni ɔku te Tiatira baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Ami Yesu ndi Katɔti Ubidi. Na mina anumi aada aani ogya na mina lɛgba liikeye aani lɛbuala lɛni bákya ogya na lígyie. Ami mɔɔsu kenye kamɛni.

Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla. Na ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛyɔ́-mi na bɛɛƒɔ́-mi taadi ku kalɛ na bɛɛbla-mi kabla na binye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa. Na ngyi ka kabla kabuni kani bɛɛbla ɔƒɛni ketulo kalɛ na bítaabla kudeedi.

Nsu bɔƒiɔ bɔni muudie-mii ndi ka biite uleku Isebel ɔni mɔɔlɔ lɛlɔ ɔnii Katɔti kenye udiene kuƒi. Nsu uleku ɔmmɔ ala ani na ɔɔtina aayá na mina kabla bablane bayii ulu na baabla lɛyalɛ ala, na baadi adila ani na béti bákpa béte baƒiɔ.
Líte-nwu uwi ɔni na uti ɔvumana na ɔda ekpidi bɔbla ɔya, nsu ulenu kalɔ.
Anwuɔsu ndubɔya na ɔlɛ ubo-nwu ɔva lɛtala lɛlɔ. Na bani na anwu ku-ma badi kɔsɔnɔ badububo abi geen, amu ntu bada-nwu kama bɔsiaku báya.

Lɛnɔ ni, ndubo uleku ɔmɛni basɔnɔbi ƒui bɔdu. Na mmɔ ni, baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa lɛmmɔ ƒui badubɔti ka ami ndi ukyuli ɔni ngyi ukyuli biala kayi ku lili kemo. Ndubo bina akɔ ɔdi biala kayu bɔƒɔ na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla kenye.

Nsu amii bakladi bani nkya Tiatira na bɛɛɛsiaku nwuna ala bɔtina kama na bítatɛya Satan ala abɛdi ani baasu ka ana kemo ágyu mmɔ ni, mɔɔsu-mii ka nsɔ lɛɛɛdubo etila abambadi adi buti bɔsia-mii lɛlɔ.
Nsu biƒie bɔƒɔtaadi bɔni na bibo bɛda kpakplaa úti útédu uwi ɔni na mebo.

Na ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ na wenye kpakplaa wetédu kawɔlɔkɔ ni, ndubute-nwu ɔyikun aani kalɛ na lɛ́ƒɔ lɛ́siku mina Ɔti kudɔ na ɔdubɔdi kadi ƒui lɛlɔ. Bénweni bése banii, 'Ɔdubɔdi-ma lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun kpakplaa na ɔbwɛ-ma uwi kalɔ kpɛtɛ kpɛtɛ aani ebwi kalɛ.'
Ndubute-nwu bukeye aani ɔtanta lɛyabi lɛnɔ.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”
Ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Sardi baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Lɛni na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔdi ayu maatɛ ani mɔɔbla Katɔti kabla na nwuna lɛga boku anumi lɛlɔ na ɔda ayabi maatɛ ammɔ na nwuna kɔdianu ɔɔsu.

Ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛbla bina kabla, na ngyi lɛnɔ ka bekyuli baanu-mii ka bili ngba, nsu bíkpi na kɔyu kemo! Anwuɔsu bɛgyinya na bɛkya lɛla lɛni nébu lise-mii ogya kalɛ na bilekpi ƒui! Ɔsika lɛ́nu ka lɛla lɛni na bɛɛbla ni, lítedu tɔ lítawɔlɔ na Katɔti anumi.

Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, binyimo lɛla lɛni na bátina-mii na bínu lɛnɔ, na bɛda-ni kaduɛ na bina ekpidi eduo-mii na binwini kama bɛkya-nya. Nsu si bítagyinya ni, ndubo-mii kudɔ aani uyune kalɛ na biláti uwi ɔni kemo na meti mada malɛ-ɔ lɛlɔ.
Nsu bibo nkyuli ɛlɛɛ badi na Sardi mmɔ bani nétebile bana adala. Na ami ku-ma bɔdubɔda ala aƒualadi na bɔkɛ butaavi, ɔsika bámanku ka babla lɛni.
Ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔda ala aƒuala aani bana kalɛ. Na lɛɛɛdubo-ma anyi bɔda budie ngba ɔku kemo. Na ndubudie-ma kenye na mina Ɔti ku Katɔti batu ƒui anumi ka badi ami badi.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Ƒiladelƒia baƒɔtaadine lɛkpa ɔtu anii Lɛni na anwu ɔni nse kedee na nwuna litemi lɛdi litemi geen ɔɔsu. Anwu nda Ɔga Dawid ɔyikun ɔni na si ɔ́lɛmi kayakun kadi ni, ɔdi ɔsɔ ulakana-ka bɔkalɛ. Na si ɔ́kalɛ-ka ni, ɔdi ulakana-ka bɔlɛmi.

Ngyi kalɛ na bɛɛbla bina kabla na ngyi ka bibo ɔyikun blii ɔdi. Bɛ́siaku mina ala bɔtina kama na bɛ́di mina etemila lɛnɔ lɛlɔ ulu lɛlɔ. Lɛ́lɛmi kayakun kadi líte-mii na bina anumi na ukyuli biala ulakana-ka bɔkalɛ.
Bɛnu! Ɔkɔ banyine bani násala bewi Satan ku nwuna badi kasalakɔ ngye na baalɔ-ma Yudaƒuɔ nsu baaadi Yudaƒuɔ ni, ndubɔya na balɛ akɔnkɔ na ƒula lɛgba akɔ. Na bana ƒui badubɔsu banii mɔɔyɔ́-ɔ.

Na ka bɛ́di mina ɔda ɔni na líbo-mii lɛlɔ na bínye kpakplaa na bɛ́siaku ala ani ƒui muukpóku-mii ɔsu ni, ndubɔda-mii lidie lɛbibo lɛni mebo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ na lɛkɔku bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ lɛnu kemo.
Ndubo uwi klukui kemo. Anwuɔsu bɛda lɛla lɛni nse-mii kaduɛ kalɛ na ukyuli ɔdi uláƒɔ bina lɛyuƒɔla ulásiku-mii enu kemo.

Ndubo ukyuli ɔni madi lɛlɔ bɔbla aani lɛkpa na mina Katɔti kakpakɔ ɔni na lɛsɔ lilágyu mmɔ kudii. Ndubo mina Katɔti lɛnyi ku nwuna ɔma kedee ɔmmɔ lɛnyi bunweni bɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ. Na ɔdi Yerusalem ɔwɔdi ɔni mayu masi katɔ na Katɔti kudɔ. Na ndubo ami ɔlati lɛnyi lɛwɔdi lɛnɔ bunweni bɔsia-nwu lɛlɔ.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”

Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni te Laodikea baƒɔtaadine ɔtu anii Lɛni na anwu ɔni mɔɔyá na lɛla biala lɛɛsia lɛni ɔɔsu. Na ɔdi Katɔti kenye udiene geen ɔni mɔɔbla ala ulu lɛlɔ, na anwu mɔɔdi Katɔti ala ani ƒui na údie lɛlɔ.
Ngyi lɛla lɛni na bɛ́bla na ngyi ka bítaba na bítaƒɔ ogya lɛnɔ. Nsu nka mɔɔyɔ́ si bɛ́ƒuna linwi.
Nsu ka buse kani na bise guguugu na bítaba iye bítaƒɔ ogya lɛnɔ ɔsu ni, ndubo-mii butuo bɔlɛku mina kenye kemo!
Bɛɛsu bɛnii, 'Mbo ala na ɔdianku-mi, na mbo ala ani ƒui na mɔɔwia.' Nsu bɛɛɛgyi bɛnii biisé lɛlɔ na bina lɛlɔ libo kɔnyana, na biiibo lɛla lɛdi, na anumi ábwɛ-mii, na bɛkɛ kasɔngya.

Anwuɔsu mɔɔlɛ-mii kpakplaa nnii bibo na bibeye sika ugyiedi ɔni bábla kede kede na ogya kemo na mina kudɔ na binwini balakɛne. Na bibeye adiƒuala ani na binyimi na bekyuli basɔ balanu bina kasɔngya ku kɔƒa. Na biye kuvo bɛkya anumi na bitaanu kaduɛ.
Bekyuli bani na mɔɔyɔ́ ni, ama na mɔɔdɔnku na mɔɔní-ma kɔtu. Anwuɔsu bɛsia lɛlɔ anu kpakplaa na binwini kama bɛkya bina ekpidi.
Binu! Nnye kayakun muubó kɔnu. Na si ukyuli ɔdi únu-mi lɛdi na ɔ́lɛmi úte-mi ni, ndubuduo-nwu kudɔ na ami ku-nwu bɔsala bɔdi.
Anwu ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ndubute-nwu kuƒi na ulie-mi kudɔ na lɛgaboku lɛlɔ aani kalɛ na lɛ́di lɛlɔ na nli mina Ɔti kudɔ na lɛgaboku lɛlɔ.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu lɛla lɛni na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔsu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ.”

Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti údie kɔyu kemo ala adi ɔ́tina-mi. Na lɛ́nu kayakun kadi ka bálɛmi-ka na katɔ. Amu na lɛdi lɛni na lɛ́ka bunu aani kakpɛɛ ni, línu ka lɛsɔ lɛɛtɛmiku-mi lɛnini, “Bo katɔ kakɛ mɛni na lɛtina-a lɛla lɛni ndubo bɔlɛ na ɔmɛni kama.”
Kɔnakunwi ni, Kɔyu kɔmmɔ kúti-mi kɔ́kɔliku katɔ. Ka mɔɔnu ni, lɛgaboku lɛdi lise na Katɔti ulie liboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.
Na uukeye kede kede! Na bukeye bɔmmɔ buse aani aseebi egyiedi ku aƒualadi ani náƒɔ kuye. Na bukeye bonwu bɔdi bɔ́ka bɔ́mana lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ƒui aani evete awɔdi bukeye.
Na agaboku aavlanyɔ-ene áka ámana lɛgaboku lɛmɛni. Na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine lɛnɔ belie-nya lɛlɔ. Na bebi adiƒuala lɛlɔ, na sika ugyiedi kɔgabwa kubi-ma eli.

Na ogya ɔɔbwɛ ku bukeye geen taasi lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ! Na muunú adi adi ku ɔnantu budu kɔku na mmɔ. Na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi ni, lɛsogya maatɛ lɛɛda. Na ani ndi Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ ɔni nnye Katɔti lɛgaboku anumi.

Na kesii kani na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɛ anumi ni, ɔdi kalɔ kani nwi aani ɛpu na use kede kede aani kanu. Na lɛgaboku lɛmɛni amadɔ ni, ngba batu ine badi udu benye lɛƒɛnyi lɛna ƒui. Na anumi áka ámana-ma lɛlɔ lɛtɔtɔ ku kama ƒui.
Ngba ɔtu udeedi ɔ́lɛ gyata. Na unyɔdi ɔ́lɛ akɔ. Na ɔtɛdi ɔ́lɛ ukyuli. Na unedi ɔ́lɛ kɔdigbo aasɛ ɔni muuveyi.

Na ngba batu ine bamɛni ƒui bebo avwi aku aku, na anumi akya avwi amɛni kemo ku kama. Usien ku ɔƒɛ ni, baláda bɔsu taaya banini, “Kedee, kedee, kedee ndi Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ɔni nélie, na uli, na ɔdubo bulie.”
Ngba batu bammɔ beeti bumwi ku ɔbu ku linugya teete anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ na uli ngba úsela ƒui. Na uwi biala na baabla lɛni ni,
benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ beebimi bana kɔgabwa taava-nwu anumi, na baayu teebi kalɔ. Na beemwi anwu ɔni nli ngba úsela ƒui, na baasu banini,
“Blɔti ku bula Katɔti! Awɔ námanku éte bumwi ku ɔbu ku ɔyikun. Ɔsika awɔ nédie ala ani ƒui, na áya na ana ƒui eli ngba na ƒula lɛƒɔyɔ kenye.”

Amu na lɛ́nu ka anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔda kakunkɛ kadi na nwuna kɔdianu, na bénweni ala ani ndubo abalɛ básia-ka anumi ku kama. Na báƒɛ-ka, na béti kɔma bábala-nwu kenye ekpo maatɛ kalɛ na ukyuli keeke ulakana bubimi.
Mmɔ ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔdi ɔni násu ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Ɔma námanku ka ɔmami kɔma kɔmɛni na ɔƒɛnimi kakunkɛ kammɔ?”
Nsu ukyuli ɔdi uuubo katɔ iye kalɔ lɛlɔ iye kekpine muedi ɔni makana kakunkɛ kamɛni bɔƒɛnimi na wanu ɔku ɔmmɔ kemo.
Mmɔ ni, líwulo geen ɔsika bátakana ukyuli ɔdi bɔkɛ na ɔkana ɔku ɔmɛni bɔƒɛnimi bɔka.

Amu na benengu bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sɔ tewulo. Nu! Yesu ɔni baalɔ banii Gyata ɔni nási Yuda kaba kemo na ɔdi Dawid Kugyii Ugyiitu ni, ɔ́di lɛlɔ. Anwu námanku ka ɔƒɛnimi kɔma kɔni na béti bábala ekpo maatɛ ammɔ.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu ka Katɔti Koƒonu Ubi ɔdi unye agaboku ammɔ lɛlɔ. Na ngba batu ine bammɔ ku benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ báka bámana-nwu. Na ɔɔtina aani si bɔkpa na béti-nwu bákpa. Ese maatɛ alɛ Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lili, na ubo anumi maatɛ. Na alakpa maatɛ amɛni adi Katɔti Kɔyu kɔni mbo ɔyikun maatɛ kɔni na Katɔti ɔ́tala ɔ́kya kayawi ƒui.
Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ úsie na útáƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ ɔ́siku anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ kɔnu kemo.

Na uwi ɔni na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmɛni ɔɔƒɔ́ kakunkɛ kamɛni ni, ngba batu ine bammɔ ku benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ anumi. Ɔdi biala ɔda agyala ani béti kɔbuli bábla na baagyá taatu lɛnu. Na ɔdi biala ɔda sika ugyiedi kɔlaku kɔni néyi ku oloƒui. Na oloƒui ɔmɛni unye ute Katɔti bekyuli katɔ bɔkpali.

Bédie ɔnu ɔwɔdi ɔdi banini, “Awɔ námanku ka aƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ na amami kɔma kɔmmɔ. Ɔsika awɔ na bádu. Na ɔkɛnku ƒula ubugya akpala ɔsu ni, áƒɔ bekyuli lili kayu, na ásɔku-ma éte Katɔti. Awɔ náƒɔ-ma ásiku kadi ƒui bekyuli ku adi lidu biala batɛmine ku bekyuli lidu ƒui akɔ na kalɔ biala lɛlɔ.
Awɔ nábla-ma bénwini baga ku bakpane bani mɔɔkpanku bekyuli teeboku bula Katɔti. Na badubɔdi lɛga na kalɔ lɛlɔ.”
Ka lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu ni, lɛ́nu katɔ batu mpimu ɛlɛ ɛlɛ ku mpimu leevu akpa leevu alɛ alɛ ka bénye bámana lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ku ngba batu ine ku benengu bammɔ.
Na katɔ batu bamɛni bédie ɔnu ku lɛdi momoomo banini, “Awɔ ndi Koƒonu Ubi ɔni na béti bákpa. Na ámanku éte ɔyikun ku lɛlakɛ ku lɛnunda ku ɔlɔkplu ku ɔbu ku bumwi ku linugya.”

Na línu ka ala ani ƒui na Katɔti údie na katɔ ku kalɔ ku kekpine ku ɛpu ku kayawi beedie ɔnu banini, “Linugya ku ɔbu ku bumwi ku ɔyikun na beete anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui.”
Amu na ngba batu ine bammɔ bédie kenye banini, “Ɔsia lɛni.” Na benengu bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na beemwi-nwu.

Amu na lɛ́nu ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma kɔni nda kakunkɛ kani mɔɔtina ala ani ndubo abalɛ mmɔ ekpo maatɛ ammɔ akɔ unwi. Na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo lɛni náku aani ɔnantu budu ɔnini, “Bo!”

Na lɛ́nu ɔpɔnkɔ ɔƒualadi ɔdi ka unye. Ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́da kantaminta na béti kagabwa kadi béte-nwu. Ukyuli ɔmɛni ulie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ aani ukpone lɛlɔ ɔdine ɔni nésela utádi lɛlɔ.
Na ɔmmɔ kama ni, Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo linyɔdi na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unyɔdi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!”

Mmɔ na ɔpɔnkɔ ɔbambadi ɔni négyie aani ogya kalɛ ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ. Na Katɔti úti ɔyikun úte ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmɛni lɛlɔ ɔnii uti kekpo uboku kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui kalɛ na bekyuli badu lɛlɔ. Na úte-nwu kewii bonwu kadi.

Ɔmɛni kama ni, Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo lɛtɛdi. Mmɔ ni, línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ ɔtɛdi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!” Na ka mɔɔnu ni, lɛ́nu ɔpɔnkɔ totonto ɔdi ka unye. Na ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔda kakpagyuɛ kani na baakɔ́ku ala unu taanu.

Línu ka kɔku kɔdi kɔ́si ngba batu ine bammɔ kudɔ aani ukyuli butemi, na lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su lɛnini, “Ya na kamu kalaku kenwi kuye kɔkɔ kutédu limeyi lɛyuƒɔla, na antabi kɔlaku ɛtɛ kuye lɛnɔ kɔkɔ kutédu limeyi lɛyuƒɔla. Nsu tavumana inɔ iye ntɛ bɔmmɔ kuye!”
Amu na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo linedi. Na línu ka ngba batu bammɔ akɔ unedi ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bo!”

Na mmɔ ni, lɛ́nu ka ɔpɔnkɔ ƒuƒuu ɔdi unye aani ɔlɛne. Na básia ukyuli ɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ lɛnyi banii Kukpi. Na ukyuli bamba ɔkpɛ-nwu kama ɔni baalɔ Kekpine. Béte-ma ɔyikun ka badu kalɔ lɛkpa linedi bekyuli ƒui. Na kekpo ku kɔka ku ɔlɛ ku beƒiebuo ndubɔdu-ma.

Amu na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami likpo lɛlɔndi. Na lɛ́nu ayu adi na katɔ ka enye lɛbi lɛni lɛlɔ na baakpá mmɔ kalɔ. Badi bekyuli bani ƒui na bádu ayu ka básu Katɔti litemi buni ɔsu. Ama ndi bani nédie ala ammɔ kenye na ulu lɛlɔ.

Ayu amɛni áva ku lɛdi momoomo anini, “Blɔti, ala ƒui lɛlɔ ɔdine, awɔ nse kedee na ƒula etemila lɛnɔ adi litemi geen. Uwi ɛlɛ sɔɔn na adubunye etédu asa na bekyuli bani nádu-bu na kalɔ kamɛni lɛlɔ ni, atɛku-ma litemi na ani-ma kɔtu?”

Mmɔ na úte bekyuli bamɛni ɔdi biala awu ɔƒualadi, na ɔ́su-ma ɔnii bakɛ kayi betédu uwi ɔni na kayawi bekyuli bádu bana kabla bablane bakpana bammɔ aani kalɛ na bádu ama lɛnɔ. Ɔsika bana bumomo bútedu bútawɔlɔ tɔ.

Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo lɛkundi. Na kayawi kemodi kákunku kpakplaa, na ɔƒɛ ɔ́da bukeye ɔ́ya, na ala ƒui ábla suu. Na kɔbuli kumodi kɔmmɔ kɔ́vumana kɔ́bla aani ubugya.
Ayabi ánu ébo kalɔ aani kalɛ na kugyii ebi aanú na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ kpakplaa kemo.
Kayaa káyii aani kalɛ na baaƒɛ ebuo ɔku. Na bágyu abi ku ntuntɛ kalɔ ƒui na ana kenyekɔ.

Amu na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga ƒui ku bekyuli bani mbo kenyekɔ ku bekpone batɔnkune ku balakɛne ku bayikune ku bekyuli bamba lidu ƒui bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla ƒui bábala lɛlɔ na libu ku atakpɛ kalɔ na abi lɛlɔ.
Bákpali abi ku atakpɛ ammɔ banii, “Bibo na bibebi-bu lɛlɔ na bɛbala-bu kalɛ na anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ulanu-bu, na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ uláni-bu kɔtu!
Ɔsika Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ kɔnyi kpakplaa limeyi lídu! Na ɔma makana kɔnyi kɔmmɔ kenye bunye?”

Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti batu ine badi ka benye kayawi ekpo ene ammɔ. Na bada ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni muukpó taasi ekpo ene ammɔ ƒui kenye, kalɛ na ɔƒɛƒɛɛ biala ulékpo na kalɔ lɛlɔ iye ɛpu anumi iye na egyii akɔ.

Katɔti úte-ma ɔyikun ka babla kalɔ ku ɛpu kalala na beti bani bekyuli kɔtu. Nsu lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔdi ka ɔ́si ɔƒɛ katukɔ ɔdubo na ɔda lɛla lɛni na Katɔti ɔni nli ngba ɔdubuti use bekyuli likpo. Na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpali batu ine ku lɛdi momoomo,
na ɔ́su-ma ɔnini, “Bitabla kalɔ iye ɛpu iye egyii adi kalala weti wetédu lebo lɛni na búse Katɔti kabla bablane likpo ku likposela lɛmɛni na bana atɛntɛ.”

Na básu-mi ka bekyuli bani na béti Katɔti likposela lɛmmɔ bése-ma likpo na bana atɛntɛ bumomo bɔdubɔbla aani bekyuli mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine. Na bekyuli bammɔ bási Israel kaba leevu-inyɔ kammɔ kemo.
Nkyuli mpimu leevu inyɔ bási Yuda kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Ruben kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Gad kaba kemo.
Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Aser kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Naƒtali kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Manase kaba kemo.
Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Simeon kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Lewi kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Isakar kaba kemo.
Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Sebulon kaba kemo. Na mpimu leevu-inyɔ bási Yoseƒ kaba kemo. Na nkyuli mpimu leevu-inyɔ na bése likpo na Benyamin kaba lɛnɔ kemo.

Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka bekyuli pii badi benye mmɔ bani na ukyuli ɔdi ulakana bɔka! Bekyuli bamɛni bási kalɔ biala kemo ku kadi biala akɔ ku bekyuli lidu lidu ƒui akɔ ku adi lidu biala kemo ka bénye lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ anumi, na bákya lɛwu lɛƒualadi na bada like.
Na básu ku lɛdi momoomo banini, “Ngba bɔƒɔ bɔɔsí bula Katɔti ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ kudɔ.”
Batu ƒui benye báka bámana lɛgaboku ku benengu ku ngba batu ine bani nnye mmɔ.

Na báyu bébi kalɔ na lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi na beemwi Katɔti, na baasu banini, “Ɔsia lɛni! Bula Katɔti uukeye, na ubo lɛnunda ku ɔbu ku kenyekɔ ku ɔyikun, na ɔ́manku bumwi ku linugya ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui! Ɔsia lɛni.”
Amu na benengu bammɔ akɔ unwi úye-mi ɔnini, “Ɔma bene ndi bekyuli bani nkya lɛwu lɛƒualadi mɛni lɛni? Na wɛ na bási?”

Amu na lɛ́su-nwu nnini, “Ati, lɛɛɛgyi-ma. Awɔ ngyi bekyuli bamɛni.” Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bekyuli bamɛni ndi bani nénye lɛbibo bonwu lɛmmɔ kenye, na bálɛ-nwu kemo. Bábla sɛɛn na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ubugya ɔsu, aani kalɛ na baaƒɔ lɛwu na lɛɛƒuala.
Anwuɔsu na “benye Katɔti lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi na baabla-nwu kabla usien ku ɔƒɛ na nwuna kakpakɔ. Ka anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔkya-ma akɔ ɔsu ni, ɔdubo-ma bɔgyumana.
Na kɔka iye utukwɛ ɔsɔ uladu-ma kudii. Na ɔƒɛ iye liwulu lɛdi lɛsɔ lileƒi-ma.

Ɔsika Koƒonu Ubi ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛlɔ na mmɔ ni, anwu ndubɔda-ma aani baƒonu ɔdane buni. Na ɔdubo-ma bɔtɔnku busienku abiɔ ani kemo na ntu bɔni muute ngba buwi uwi biala. Na Katɔti lɛnɔ ɔdubo-ma imii buni.”
Lebo lɛni na Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ɔ́mami kɔma likpo maatɛdi ni, katɔ mmɔ ƒui kábla diin, na ɔdubɔbla aani ɔdɔ bubo kakɛ kemo.
Amu na lɛ́nu Katɔti batu maatɛ bani muunye Katɔti anumi, na úte-ma kɔkpɛɛ maatɛ.

Na Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ɔni nda sika ugyiedi libwi lɛni kemo na baakyula oloƒui, na úbenye lɛkpabi lɛmmɔ kudɔ. Béte-nwu oloƒui pii kalɛ na ɔkyula-nwu na sika ugyiedi lɛkpabi lɛni nnye lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ anumi lɛlɔ. Na oloƒui ɔmmɔ ku Katɔti bekyuli ƒui katɔ bɔkpali bɔbla akpala enwi.
Oloƒui ɔni mɔɔkywí mmɔ uyɔ ku Katɔti bekyuli bammɔ katɔ bɔkpali ƒui bɔ́kɔ búsie Katɔti kudɔ ɔ́si Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ enu kemo.

Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ úti oloƒui libwi lɛmmɔ na úyile-ni ku ogya ɔni na údie na lɛbi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ, na úbo éwi kalɔ lɛlɔ na kayawi. Mmɔ ni, línu ɔnantu budu kudu ku kɔku bonwu, na kayaa kaabwɛ ogya, na kalɔ kaakunku.
Amu na batu maatɛ bani nda kɔkpɛɛ maatɛ kɔmmɔ báklibi lɛlɔ kalɛ na bavwii bana kɔkpɛɛ.
Katɔti ɔtu udeedi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Mmɔ kani ni, etubanke ku ogya ɔni násalaku ubugya ɔ́bwɛ úbewi kalɔ lɛlɔ na kalɔ kemodi ku egyii lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́kywi. Nsu livo ƒui lɛ́kywi.
Ɔmɛni kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi lɛnɔ ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Amu na úbo lɛla lɛni nálɛ aani kɔbi kɔni mɔɔda ku ogya útákya ɛpu kemo. Na ɛpu lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui línwini ubugya.
Na ketu kemo bebweyi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui békpi. Na lɛkɔlɔ linengudi ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́kywi.
Katɔti ɔtu ɔtɛdi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Amu na lɛyabi bonwu lɛdi lɛni mɔɔda aani ogya lɛ́lɛ líbo lɛ́si kayaa na lɛ́yu ntukpa ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ku abiɔ ƒui lɛlɔ.
Lɛyabi lɛmmɔ lɛnyi ndi Ɔdu Kati Kati. Ntu lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛmmɔ ƒui lɛ́yu ɔdu, na bekyuli pii badi békpi na ntu bɔmmɔ ɔdu ɔsu.
Amu na ɔtu unedi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na lɛla lɛdi lɛ́yila ɔƒɛ ku kɔbuli ku ayabi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi bukeye. Anwuɔsu usien ku ɔƒɛ limeyi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi lɛ́sɔ lítanu bukeye.

Amu ka nnye mɔɔnu budie bɔtina bɔmɛni ni, lɛ́nu kɔdigbo aasɛ ɔdi ɔni néveyi ɔkɛ kayaa kakaaka, na ɔ́su ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Si uwi ɔni na Katɔti batu ɛtɛ bani nébu mɛni bávwii bana kɔkpɛɛ ni, muute bekyuli bani ƒui nli kalɔ lɛlɔ bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ kɔtɛ!”
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔlɔndi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na lɛ́nu ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́nu ɔ́si katɔ aani lɛyabi úbayu kalɔ. Na Katɔti úte-nwu ɔyikun ɔni mɔɔbala kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kenye.
Ɔtu ɔmɛni ɔ́lɛmi ubu bonwu ɔmɛni na uyɔ ɔ́lɛ ubu ɔmmɔ kemo aani uyɔ ɔni mɔɔlɛ́ taasi lɛgyavonku bonwu lɛdi kemo. Na ɔƒɛ bukeye ku kayaa kábla suu na uyɔ ɔmmɔ ɔsu.
Baalɔlɔ bani muubile edula badi báyu bási uyɔ ɔmmɔ kemo bébo kalɔ, na Katɔti úte-ma ɔyikun aani ɔni na batamlukpa bebo kalɛ.
Na ɔ́su baalɔlɔ bammɔ ka batabla livete iye livo iye kugyii kɔdi kalala ntu bekyuli bani na Katɔti útese likpo na bana atɛntɛ.
Útete baalɔlɔ bammɔ ulu ka baya na ukyuli ɔdi ukpi, nsu babla-ma kalala na bebo abi na benu ɔlɛ abuli alɔ. Na ɔlɛ bunu ɔni nkya lɛbibo lɛmɛni kemo ni, buse aani kalɛ na katamlukpa kaata.
Ɔƒɛni na abuli alɔ ammɔ kemo ni, badubo kukpi bɔwia, nsu balákɛ-ku. Badubɔwia banii beekpi, nsu kukpi kɔdubo-ma bukeli.
Baalɔlɔ bammɔ bɔnu buse aani bapɔnkɔ bani nnye kagyumana bete kekpo. Na kɔbwa kɔni nálɛ sika ugyiedi kɔgabwa kubi-ma eli. Na bana anumi álɛ bekyuli anumi.
Bana lili linwini lise gyɔlɔɔ, na bana kenye kemo anyi ese aani gyata anyi.
Na béti ala ani nse aani abuala lɛwu lɛni mɔɔgyumana kayi bákya. Na kɔku kɔni na bana avwi aabla ni, aaku aani kɛɛkɛ pii ɔni bapɔnkɔ báni béselaku kekpokɔ.
Baalɔlɔ bamɛni bebo lɛka ku akplɛ aani batamlukpa kalɛ na bana lɛka lɛmɛni kemo, na bebo ɔyikun ɔni na badubo buti bɔbla bekyuli kalala abuli alɔ.
Bebo ɔga ɔni ndi ɔtu ɔni mɔɔnu kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Ɔtu ɔmmɔ lɛnyi na Hebri lɛdi kemo ndi Abadon. Na Griki lɛdi kemo ni, nwuna lɛnyi ndi Apolion ɔni kalɔ ndi Ɔkyulane.
Bɔbwɛ lɛla lideedi lɛ́vi. Na alakpa anyɔ ani ndanku bɔbwɛ inyɔ bɔni nébu ni, adubo bɔlɛ.
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔkundi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na línu lɛdi lɛdi ka lɛ́si sika ugyiedi lɛbi lɛni nnye Katɔti anumi ekpo ene ammɔ lɛlɔ lɛdubo.
Lɛdi lɛmmɔ lɛ́su Katɔti ɔtu ɔkundi ɔmmɔ ɔnini, “Táƒɛnimi batu ine bani na bényimi bése Euƒrate ketu bonwu kudɔ!”

Amu na báƒɛnimi batu ine bamɛni bani na bényimi-ma bése mmɔ bete ka báƒɛnimi-ma na ɔdɔ ɔmɛni lɛlɔ na limeyi lɛmɛni kemo na kɔbuli kɔmɛni kemo na lɛkwa lɛmɛni tutuutu kemo kalɛ na badu bayawine ƒui lɛkpa lɛtɛdi.

Ɔƒɛni na lɛla lɛni bédie bátina-mi mɛni kemo ni, lɛ́nu bekpone pii bani nlie bapɔnkɔ lɛlɔ bésela kekpokɔ. Na básu-mi bana bumomo ɔni ndi bekyuli bɔka etili eti ene. Na abuala lɛwu lɛni mɔɔgyumana-ma kayi mmɔ égyie aani ogya, na eekeye aani ɛpu ku ogya atabi. Bapɔnkɔ bammɔ eli ese aani bagyata eli, na ogya ku uyɔ ku agyakpabi aalɛ́ taasi-ma inye kemo.
Na alakpa atɛ ani ndanku kukpi na ási bapɔnkɔ bamɛni inye kemo ɔsu ni, bekyuli lɛkpa lɛtɛdi sɔɔn békpi.
Ɔsika bapɔnkɔ bammɔ ɔyikun ɔkya bana inye ku lɛka kemo. Bana lɛka libo eli aani balakpi kalɛ, na beeti taadu bekyuli.

Bekyuli bakladi bani ƒui nétekpi na alakpa atɛ ani ndanku kukpi mmɔ kemo ni, béténwini kama bátákya ala ani na ama alati béti bana enu bábla bése béte lɛlɔ ka bataakpa. Ala amɛni adanku ayu ekpidi ku bana baƒiɔ bani na béti sika ugyiedi ku ɔƒualadi bávɔ ku kalɔ kemo abuala ku atabi ku egyii ani na bánwi. Nsu ala amɛni ƒui ni, alánu na elenu na elesie muedi!
Bétenwini kayi na bana bekyuli bɔdu ku evo ala bɔbla kudɔ iye kɔsɔnɔ ala bɔbla ku kuyu kudɔ.

Amu na lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔbambadi ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔɔyu. Na uyɔlɔ ɔ́ka ɔ́mana-nwu aani kɔdi, na bukeye bɔ́ka bɔ́mana-nwu lili. Nwuna anumi eekeye aani ɔƒɛ kalɛ, na nwuna lɛgba lise aani akpa ani nnye kalɔ na aada aani ogya.
Kakunkɛ blii suɛ kadi kébimi kakya-nwu kɔnu. Na úti nwuna kɔdianu ɔgba únyene ɛpu lɛlɔ, na úti kɔmiinu ɔgba únyene kalɔ lɛlɔ.
Amu na údie lɛdi momoomo aani gyata kalɛ. Na ka ɔ́va ni, kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu maatɛ!
Ka línu kɔku bonwu kɔmɛni ni, líse kalɔ nnii muunweni lɛla lɛni na línu. Nsu lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si katɔ na lɛ́su-mi lɛnini, “Ɔlɛka abɛla lɛla lɛni na énu na kɔku bonwu kɔmmɔ kemo ese, na tenweni-nya.”
Amu na lɛ́nu ka ɔtu ɔni nnye kalɔ ku ɛpu lɛlɔ mmɔ ɔ́talaku kɔdianu kɔnu katɔ.
Na ɔ́kpali ala ɔ́lɔ Katɔti lɛnyi. Ɔ́lɔ Anwu ɔni nli ngba ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui ɔni nédie katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ala ani nkya-nya kemo ƒui. Na ɔ́su ɔnini, “Katɔti ɔsɔ ulebile uwi!
Kabla kabɛdi kani na ɔ́su nwuna kenye bediene bani ndi nwuna kabla bablane ka kadubɔlɛ ni, kadubo kete lɛni si Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi ɔmmɔ ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛdi lɛni nátɛmiku-mi lɛ́si-ku katɔ mmɔ lɛ́sɔ lɛ́su-mi lɛnini, “Sie na atáƒɔ kakunkɛ kani nkya Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nnye ɛpu ku kalɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ kɔnu kemo.”

Amu na lísie ɔtu ɔmmɔ kudɔ na lɛ́su-nwu nnii uti kakunkɛ kammɔ ute-mi. Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ƒɔ, na eti-ka akun! Mɔɔsu-ɔ ka ɔdubo ɔdu bɔyu na ƒula kaƒɔ kemo, nsu ɔdubɔyu-ɔ emini aani uwɔ na ƒula kenye kemo.”
Amu na lɛ́ƒɔ kakunkɛ kammɔ, na lɛ́kun. Na ɔ́yu-mi emini na kenye kemo. Nsu ka líbweli-ka lɛ́wɔlɔ ni, ɔ́yu ɔdu na mina kaƒɔ kemo.
Nwuna kama ni, ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ɔlɛka asɔ esie anumi eteedie Katɔti litemi lɛni ndanku bekyuli lidu lidu na kalɔ pii lɛlɔ ku adi lidu lidu batɛmine ku baga pii lɛlɔ ete bekyuli.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti úti ugyii ɔdi úte-mi ɔni nse aani lɛkɔkula. Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Sie na atákɔku mina kakpakɔ ku lɛbi lɛni lɛlɔ na baakpá na katɔ mmɔ, na aka bekyuli bani ƒui nkya mmɔ beemwi-mi.
Nsu takɔku keyi, ɔsika béti mmɔ béte bekyuli bani naaadi Yudaƒuɔ. Badubo mmɔ ku ɔma ɔmmɔ ƒui lɛgba butu bɔvi abuli aavlene-anyɔ.
Ndubute mina kenye bediene inyɔ ɔyikun na beedie-mi kenye na emeyi apimu unwi ku emeyi eti alɔ ku leevu kemo. Badubunyimi adala ani mɔɔtina ka bewulo kɔnyana na bekyuli alaekpidi ɔsu.”

Ɔkya Bunweni Kedee Ɔku kemo ka inɔ egyii anyɔ ku sika ugyiedi ligyii inyɔ lɛni lɛlɔ na asogya ɔsia ni, linye Kayawi Ƒui Unwoti anumi na katɔ. Na akpa anyɔ amɛni enye ete Katɔti kenye bediene inyɔ bamɛni.

Si ukyuli ɔdi ɔ́kya ɔkplu ɔnii ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni, ogya ɔdubo bɔlɛ bɔsi bana kenye kemo na ɔkyula bekisine bammɔ. Na ukyuli biala ɔni mɔɔwia ɔnii ɔɔbla-ma kalala ni, ulu ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ kani na ɔdubɔsia ukpi.

Bebo ɔyikun ka betile ɔnantu na ɔsɔ ulana na uwi ɔni kemo na beedie Katɔti kenye mmɔ. Na bebo ɔyikun lɛnɔ na ntukpa ƒui lɛlɔ kalɛ na baya na bunwini ubugya. Na bebo ɔyikun lɛnɔ na baya na lɛlɛ lidu lidu libo kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ uwi biala na baayɔ́.
Ɔƒɛni si bédie Katɔti kenye báwɔlɔ ni, eƒiebuo ɔni nási ɔɔlɛ́ kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo ɔda bukpoku-ma na ɔdi-ma lɛlɔ na ɔdu-ma lɛnɔ.
Bana ɔlɔna ɔdubɔtɛ lɛblɔnu lɛlɔ na ɔma unengudi ɔni baalɔ na lɛsugba kemo banii Egyipte iye Sodom. Mmɔ na bákana Blɔti bámana ugyii lɛlɔ.
Ama bani nási bekyuli ku kadi ku adi lidu ƒui akɔ ku kalɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ni, badubo bekyuli bamɛni ɔlɔna bɔnu emeyi atɛ ku kakɛ sɔɔn. Nsu badubuni na baláva-ma.
Na bekyuli bani nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ badubo kubiti bɔkɛ na nkyuli inyɔ bammɔ kukpi ɔsu. Badubo limeyi bɔdi na bete lɛlɔ ala, ɔsika kenye bediene inyɔ bammɔ béti lɛbibo pii béboku kayawi bekyuli lɛlɔ.
Na emeyi atɛ ku kakɛ kama ni, ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔni muute ngba ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ úbo na úduo-ma lɛlɔ kemo na báta bénye. Na bani ƒui nánu-ma ni, liƒu lɛ́da-ma.
Mmɔ na kenye bediene inyɔ bammɔ bénu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ na lɛ́su-ma lɛnini, “Bibo katɔ mɛni!” Ka bana bekisine baanu ni, bákɔ bésie katɔ na uyɔlɔ kemo.
Kɔnakunwi ni, kalɔ bɔkunku kpakplaa bɔdi bɔ́lɛ na ɔma ɔmmɔ lɛkpa leevudi lɛ́bwɛ, na bekyuli mpimu maatɛ békpi. Liƒu pim líƒie bekyuli bakladi, na bákɔliku Ati ɔni nkya katɔ lɛnyi katɔ!
Bɔbwɛ lɛla linyɔdi lɛ́vi, na lɛtɛdi lɛdubo lɛmmɔ kama bɔsia uwi klukui.

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi ɔ́vwii nwuna kakpɛɛ. Na línu ka bekyuli pii báva na katɔ mmɔ básu banini, “Kayawi lɛga kadikɔ ƒui kénwini bula Unwoti Katɔti ku nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi kadi! Na ɔdubo lɛlɔ bɔdi ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ƒui!”
Amu na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bani nlie Katɔti anumi na bana agaboku lɛlɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na bémwi Katɔti.
Na baasu banini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ɔni nli na úlie, bɔɔgyá-a enu, ɔsika áƒɔ ƒula ɔyikun ubendi na ése kalɔ aadi lɛlɔ!

Bekyuli bani ƒui nátaƒɔ-ɔ bátadi ni, béti kɔnyi. Anwuɔsu ƒula kɔtu bɔni kúbo-ma lɛlɔ. Ɔsika uwi údu ka atɛku bekyuli litemi. Ɔdi uwi ɔni na adubɔƒɔ kayu kabuni ete ƒula kabla bablane ku kenye bediene ku ƒula bekyuli ƒui. Na benengu ku banamu bani ƒui mɔɔbu-ɔ ni, adubɔƒɔ-ma kayu kabuni. Na adubɔkyula bekyuli bekpidi bani nádu ƒula bekyuli na kalɔ lɛlɔ!”
Amu na bálɛmi Katɔti kakpakɔ kedee, na bánu bunyimi adaka kedee ka use mmɔ. Na kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu. Na katɔ keedu taasia kama. Kalɔ kákunku, na etubanke áyu pii!
Amu na akɔla ala budie taatina bonwu adi áda álɛ kayaa. Na ɔƒɛ ɔ́ka ɔ́mana uleku ɔdi aani kɔdi kalɛ, na kɔbuli kɔkya-nwu lɛgba kalɔ. Na úbi ayabi leevu-inyɔ kagabwa kadi lili.
Ɔda kaƒɔ. Na ka uwi údu ka ɔwɔ ni, ɔ́va momoomo ka uunú ɔlɛ ɔsu.
Amu na lɛ́nu akɔla ala bɔnu bɔbambadi lɛnɔ! Liƒu kɔlakpi bonwu kɔdi négyie geen kɔ́da kɔ́lɛ kayaa. Na kubo eli maatɛ ku ese leevu. Na kagabwa kebi-ku lili biala lɛlɔ.
Na kútiku kayaa ayabi lɛkpa lɛtɛdi ƒui ku nwuna ɔka úbo úbewi kalɔ lɛlɔ. Kunye uleku ɔmmɔ lɛtɔtɔ kalɛ na kuti ubi ɔni na uleku ɔmmɔ wawɔ ɔkun si ɔ́nya ɔ́wɔ-nwu.
Na uleku ɔmmɔ ɔ́wɔ ɔnanabi ɔni madi kayawi ƒui lɛlɔ ku ɔyikun kpakplaa. Nsu Katɔti Kɔyu kúkpeli ubi ɔmmɔ kɔ́ƒɔ na kúti-nwu kúsienku Katɔti na nwuna lɛgaboku anumi.
Na uleku ɔmmɔ úkeli úsie ketele kemo likpo lɛni na Katɔti ɔ́klibi úse-nwu. Mmɔ na badubo-nwu lɛlɔ bɔnu emeyi apimu unwi eti alɔ ku leevu.
Amu na kekpo kálɛ na katɔ. Na Katɔti ɔtu unengudi ɔni ndi Mikael ɔ́tɔnku Katɔti batu bakladi na báta, na ama ku liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ ku kuna batu lɛnɔ békpo.
Nsu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kútakana-ma kenye bunye. Anwuɔsu básɔ bátakɛ keliekɔ kadi na katɔ mmɔ.
Na bábɔku liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ béboku kalɔ. Aku ndi kɔlakpi kɔkukudi bonwu kɔni baalɔ ukisine ɔmmɔ iye Satan, na ɔɔtɔ́lɔ kayawi kemodi ƒui. Bábɔku anwu ku nwuna batu ƒui bábava kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni.

Ɔmmɔ kama línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi na katɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔƒɛni na Katɔti ngba bɔƒɔ ku nwuna ɔyikun ku lɛgadi lɛ́da lɛ́lɛ. Na nwuna Ukyuli Ɔƒunadi ɔmmɔ kenyekɔ lɛnɔ káda kálɛ. Ɔsika bábɔku baƒɔtaadine ukisine ɔmmɔ bálɛku katɔ mmɔ. Anwu muunye bula Katɔti anumi usien ku ɔƒɛ taawia baƒɔtaadine bammɔ litemi.
Bula banwani bádi-nwu lɛlɔ ɔkɛnku Koƒonu Ubi ubugya lɛlɔ ku litemi geen lɛni kenye bédie lɛlɔ. Ɔsika bénye kagyumana ka beti bana ngba bakpa.
Anwuɔsu lɛlɔ lɛyɔ amii bani nkya katɔ mmɔ ƒui! Nsu muute kalɔ ku ɛpu ala ƒui bɔbwɛ! Ɔsika Satan ɔ́ɔda ɔ́lɛ-mii lɛlɔ. Na úti kɔnyi geen, ɔsika ɔgyi ka uwi klukui kani nébu-nwu.”
Lebo lɛni na liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kɔ́nu kɔ́ti ka bábɔku-nwu bábava kalɔ lɛlɔ ni, úse kalɔ ɔ́bi ɔ́siaku uleku ɔni náwɔ ubi ɔnanabi ɔmmɔ.
Amu na Katɔti úte uleku ɔmmɔ aasɛ bonwu avwi kalɛ na uveyi uteesie nwuna keliekɔ na ketele kemo. Mmɔ na badubo-nwu bɔgyumana akwa atɛ ku kakɛ ɔsiku kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kudɔ.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kútuo ntu pii bɔdi bɔ́lɛku nwuna kenye kemo kalɛ na bɔgba butéƒie uleku ɔmmɔ na butiku-nwu bɔtɔlɔku.
Nsu kalɔ kébunku uleku ɔmmɔ na kébimi kenye na káni ntu bɔni nálɛ bɔ́si kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kenye kemo ƒui.
Mmɔ ni, kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kúti kɔnyi kɔ́kya uleku ɔmmɔ geen, na kɔ́gyu kɔ́tɔlɔ kúsie kútékpoku nwuna bawɔ bakladi bani muunú Katɔti litemi na beedie Yesu kenye.
Amu na kɔlakpi kukpidi kɔmmɔ kɔ́ƒɔ lɛlɔ kɔkya ɛpu kɔtu mmɔ.

Ɔmɛni kama lɛ́nu eƒiebuo ɔdi ka ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si ɛpu kemo ɔ́kɔ ɔɔlɛ́. Ubo eli maatɛ na ese leevu alɛ-nwu eli ammɔ lɛlɔ. Na lise biala lɛlɔ ni, kagabwa kebi. Na nwuna lili biala lɛlɔ ni, lɛnyi lɛdi lɛsia lɛni muudumi Katɔti.

Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ use aani ebuoƒuala, na nwuna lɛgba lise aani kegiti lɛgba, na nwuna kenye kese aani gyata kenye. Liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kúti kuna ɔyikun kúte eƒiebuo ɔmɛni ku kuna lɛgaboku ku kenyekɔ kenengudi.
Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lili linwi lɛ́tina aani si ɔ́ƒɔ ɔlɛ ɔni na ɔlɛka ukpi nka. Nsu ɔlɛ ɔmmɔ ɔ́ɔsa. Ɔmɛni ɔ́bla kayawi bekyuli ƒui dɛye dɛye, na basiaku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ kama.

Bekyuli bátaalɛ akɔnkɔ teete kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ, ɔsika kúte eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ kenyekɔ kenengudi. Na bátaalɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛnɔ. Na baasu banii, “Ɔma nse aani eƒiebuo ɔmɛni? Na ɔma makana-nwu bukpoku? Ɔdi uuubo!”
Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun na ɔ́di ala lɛlɔ abuli aavlene-anyɔ, na ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ katɔ, na údumi Katɔti geen.
Úse kalɔ uuwida Katɔti lɛnyi ku nwuna keliekɔ ku bekyuli bani ƒui nlie-nwu kudɔ.
Ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun ka ukpo Katɔti bekyuli na ɔdi-ma lɛlɔ. Kaba biala ku bekyuli lidu ku adi ƒui ku ama bani nási kalɔ biala lɛlɔ béduo nwuna lɛlɔ bɔdi kalɔ.

Na bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ badubɔlɛ akɔnkɔ bete-nwu, ntu bekyuli bani anyi na bénweni bákya ngba ɔku kemo bése asa na Katɔti údie kayawi. Ngba ɔku ɔmmɔ ɔdi Koƒonu Ubi ɔni na béti bákpa ɔdi.
Si bibo atu ni, na binu!

Ukyuli ɔni na badubo buƒie ni, badubuƒie-nwu. Na ukyuli ɔni lɛnɔ na badubo bɔdu na ɔkɛɛ kenye lɛnɔ ni, badubo-nwu bɔdu. Ɔmɛni ɔsu ni, amii Katɔti bekyuli ɔlɛka binye lɛbibo biala kenye kpakplaa na bɛsiaku Blɔti ulu lɛlɔ.
Amu na lɛ́nu eƒiebuo ɔbambadi ɔni nálɛ ɔ́si kalɔ kemo. Ese anyɔ alɛ-nwu lili aani koƒonubi, nsu ɔ́talaku lɛlɔ katɔ aani liƒu kɔlakpi kɔni muuƒwii.
Únye eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye útaabla nwuna kabla. Na únye kayawi kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ beliene lɛlɔ ka balɛ akɔnkɔ bete eƒiebuo udeedi ɔni ɔlɛ nása mmɔ.
Eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔmɛni údie akɔla ɔ́tina-ma, na ɔ́ya na ogya muedi ɔ́si katɔ úbo kalɔ lɛlɔ na ukyuli biala anumi.

Ɔ́tɔlɔ bekyuli bani ƒui nlie kalɔ lɛlɔ na nwuna akɔla bɔbla ani na ɔ́bla ɔkɛnku eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔsu. Ɔ́ya na bekyuli bammɔ bése baƒiɔ badi béte lɛlɔ, na bávɔ-ma na bese aani eƒiebuo udeedi ɔni náƒɔ ɔlɛ ka bébeyi-nwu ɔkɛɛ nsu ɔmua uli ngba.
Eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɛ ɔyikun ka ɔnwuna ngba ɔƒɛƒɛɛ ɔkya eƒiebuo baƒiɔ bani na bése béte lɛlɔ mmɔ kemo kalɛ na ɔkana butemi, na ɔya na badu bekyuli bani ƒui naaadubo akɔnkɔ bɔlɛ bute-nwu.

Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ únye bekyuli ƒui lɛlɔ, banamu ku benengu, balakɛne ku bawabane ku bekyuli bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla ka bese-ma likpo na bana kɔdianu kɔnu lɛlɔ iye bana atɛntɛ.

Ukyuli ɔdi biala ulakana na weye lɛla lɛdi wasiku ɔdi kudɔ iye uye lɛla lɛdi ute ukyuli bamba lɛnɔ si uuubo likpose lɛmmɔ. Na likpose lɛmmɔ nnye nte eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛnyi iye bumomo bɔka bɔni nnye lɛnyi lɛmɛni kenye.

Ntu ebo lɛnunda asa na ala amɛni adubɔbla-a nwaa. Ukyuli ɔni makana ni, ɔwia bumomo bɔni nnye eƒiebuo ɔmɛni lɛnyi kenye kalɔ unu. Ɔsika bumomo bɔmɛni bɔdi bɔka bɔni nnye nte ukyuli lɛnyi. Na bumomo bɔmmɔ ndi 666.

Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu na budie taatina bɔmmɔ kemo ka Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ unye Sion kɔbi lɛlɔ. Na bekyuli bani mabla aani mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine benye mmɔ. Na bekyuli bamɛni atɛntɛ ni, bénweni Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ku Ɔti lɛnyi básia.
Amu na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi lɛni nse aani ntu bɔni mɔɔgbá taayu lɛtakpɛ bonwu lɛdi lɛlɔ na lɛ́sɔ lɛ́lɛ aani si katɔ muudu ku kɔku bonwu. Lɛnɔ ni, use aani ɔnu na bagyane baagyá na lɛbentaa lɛlɔ.

Na nkyuli mpimu eti anyɔ ku aavlene-ine bamɛni badi bekyuli bani na bédie básiku kayawi na bákɛ ngba bɔƒɔ. Na bana ƒui benye lɛgaboku ku Katɔti ngba batu ine bammɔ anumi ku benengu bammɔ anumi. Na béteedie ɔnu ɔwɔdi ɔni na ama lɛti pɛ kani nákana-nwu bɔtɛya.

Ama ndi bekyuli bani náda lɛlɔ sɛɛn. Na bana lɛlɔ lilese lɛlɔ na lɛsɔnɔdi ala lɛlɔ ɔsu. Ama mɔɔsiaku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ likpo biala na úsela. Ama na bédie bálɛku bayawine ƒui akɔ. Na ama ndi bekyuli bedeedi bani na béti béte Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ.
Likpidi lɛɛɛma bekyuli bamɛni lɛlɔ, na ɔkɔ lɛla lɛdi lɛɛɛda-ma.

Ɔmmɔ kama lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔdi ka úveyi ɔɔví kayaa katɔ katɔ ku litemi buni lɛni nse nte uwi biala. Litemi lɛmmɔ lɛsa na úbo úbakɔ ute bekyuli bani nlie kayawi kamɛni lɛlɔ. Na ama ndi kalɔ biala lɛlɔ bekyuli ku kaba biala ku adi ƒui batɛmine ku bekyuli lidu ƒui.
Ɔ́su ku lɛdi bonwu ɔnini, “Bɛbu Katɔti na bɛkɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ! Ɔsika nwuna uwi údu ka ɔtɛku bayawine ƒui litemi. Bimwi anwu ɔni nábla katɔ ku kalɔ ku ɛpu ku ntukpa ƒui!”

Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi ɔsia udeedi kama na ɔɔva momoomo ɔnini, “Úbuli! Babilon bonwu ɔmmɔ úbuli geen! Kayawi bekyuli ƒui báni ɔma ɔmmɔ alaekpidi bɔbla békpi aani ntɛ. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma aani kalɛ na ɔyalɛ ɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli taatákya likpidi kemo.”

Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔsia bammɔ kama na ɔɔva ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Bekyuli bani mɔɔlɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ bani na bávɔ béte lɛlɔ ni, ama náƒɔ eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na bana lɛtɛntɛ iye kɔnu.
Ama na Katɔti ɔdubɔya na babani nwuna kɔnyi lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ku ɔdu kati kati! Ogya ku ogya atabi adubo-ma bɔkyula na Katɔti batu kedee ku Koƒonu Ubi anumi.
Na ogya ɔni mɔɔkyula-ma uyɔ ɔdubɔkɔ uteesie katɔ uwi ƒui. Na usien ku ɔƒɛ ni, bekyuli bamɛni balákɛ bɔnwuna! Ɔsika ama mɔɔlɛ akɔnkɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ, na báƒɔ nwuna lɛnyi likpose.
“Ɔmɛni ɔsu ɔlɛka amii Katɔti bekyuli bani mɔɔdi Katɔti litemi lɛlɔ na bɛsiaku Yesu kama ulu lɛlɔ ni, binye lɛbibo kenye kpakplaa.”

Ɔmmɔ kama línu lɛdi lɛdi ka lɛ́si katɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Nweni ala amɛni. Bekyuli bani na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ-ma ndi bani ndubukpi ka básiaku Blɔti kama ɔ́si ɔƒɛni úsela ɔsu.” Na Katɔti Kɔyu kɔɔtuna kɔnini, “Ɛɛn, badubɔkɛ bɔnwuna! Na badubɔkɛ bana kabla kɔsia!”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu uyɔlɔ ƒututuutu ɔdi. Na lɛ́nu ka ukyuli ɔni nálɛ Ukyuli Ɔyawine Ubi ulie uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ, na sika ugyiedi kagabwa kebi-nwu lili. Na ɔda lɛsaka.

Amu na ɔtu ɔbambadi ɔ́lɛ ɔ́si kakpakɔ mmɔ na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔɔsu ukyuli ɔni nlie uyɔlɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔnini, “Awɔ, sala Katɔti bekyuli lɛku kayawi aani kalɛ na beeti lɛsaka taanwa edula. Ɔsika uwi údu ka basala-ma bete-nwu.”
Amu na ukyuli ɔni nlie uyɔlɔ lɛlɔ mmɔ ɔ́sala-ma na kalɔ kammɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
Ɔmmɔ kama lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔbambadi ka ɔ́si Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ ɔ́yu úbo, na anwu lɛnɔ ɔ́da asɔsɔ ɔni mbo ɔbi.

Na ɔtu ɔbambadi lɛnɔ ɔ́si Katɔti lɛbi lɛmmɔ kudɔ úbo. Na anwu ndi ɔni mɔɔdi ogya lɛlɔ. Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo na ɔ́su Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nda asɔsɔ mmɔ ɔnini, “Awɔ, sala bekyuli bekpidi lɛku kayawi aani kalɛ na beeti asɔsɔ ɔni mbo ɔbi teede egyiibi. Ɔsika uwi údu ka basala-ma.”
Anwuɔsu Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́sala bekyuli bammɔ na kayawi lɛlɔ, na úti-ma útéwi kesii kani na Katɔti ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu aani ebi ani béte béwi ntɛ kablakɔ.
Na ɔ́ni-ma kɔtu na ɔma ɔmmɔ kabanye aani kalɛ na baamana ntu teedie ebi ammɔ kemo. Na ubugya ɔ́gba ɔ́si mmɔ, na ɔ́ƒɔ kalɛkɛ kammɔ ƒui. Na ubugya ɔmmɔ bɔgyu ɔdubudu ukyuli limɔ.

Na lɛ́sɔ lɛ́nu akɔla budie taatina bonwu bɔbambadi na katɔ bɔni nábla-mi kalɛ kadi. Lɛ́nu batu maatɛ ka bada lɛbibo maatɛ lɛni ndi lɛbibo maatɛ likplodi. Ɔsika ɔmɛni kemo na Katɔti kɔnyi kúdu kɔ́wɔlɔ.

Na lɛ́nu kalɔ kani nwi aani ɛpu na use kede kede aani kanu kani kemo na ogya ɔɔda. Na ɛpu ɔmmɔ amadɔ ni, bekyuli benye beedie lɛnu na baagyá lɛbentaa lɛni na Katɔti úte-ma. Ama nádi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku nwuna baƒiɔ ku bumomo bɔni nnye nte nwuna lɛnyi lɛlɔ.

Na lɛnu lɛni na beedie mmɔ ni, lɛdi Mose ɔni ndi Katɔti kabla ɔblane ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛnu. Na beedie banini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ƒula ala bɔbla ébomo, na bulakana-nya kalɔ bunu. Na ƒula ablala ese siin, na ƒula etemila adi litemi geen. Awɔ ndi Uwi Ƒui Ɔga.

Ɔma makana-a anumi bunye na ulayia awɔ Blɔti, na uleti bumwi ulete ƒula lɛnyi? Ɔsika awɔ lɛti nse kedee, na kalɔ ƒui bekyuli badubo babakya-a lili kalɔ. Ɔsika bédie bátina ka aabla lɛla biala ulu siin lɛlɔ.”
Ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu ka bálɛmi kakpakɔ kedee na katɔ. Na adaka ɔni kemo na Katɔti bunyimi bɔkya ni, use mmɔ.
Na Katɔti batu maatɛ bani nda lɛbibo maatɛ bammɔ bálɛ bási Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ. Na bakya lɛwu lɛƒualadi lɛni muukeye na sika ugyiedi kɔbuli kɔ́da kɔ́mana-ma kayi.
Amu na ngba batu ine bammɔ kemo unwi úti sika ugyiedi kɔlaku kɔni na Katɔti ɔni nli ngba uwi ƒui kɔnyi kúyi úte batu maatɛ bammɔ.

Na Katɔti kakpakɔ kammɔ kemo kéyi ku uyɔ ɔni nási Katɔti ɔyikun ku bukeye kemo. Na ukyuli biala ulakana kakpakɔ kammɔ kemo buduo, amu ntu batu maatɛ bammɔ béti lɛbibo maatɛ lɛmmɔ béboku kayawi báwɔlɔ.
Amu na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ka lɛɛtɛmi taasiku Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ úte batu maatɛ bammɔ ɔnini, “Bisie na bitéwilimi Katɔti kɔnyi kalaku maatɛ kammɔ biwi kayawi lɛlɔ!”
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu udeedi úsie na útéwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi kayawi lɛlɔ. Ɔmmɔ ɔ́ya na alɛbi álɛ éwi bekyuli bani mbo eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na baalɛ akɔnkɔ teete nwuna baƒiɔ mmɔ lɛlɔ.
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu unyɔdi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ɛpu kemo, na ntu bɔmmɔ búnwini ubugya aani ɔni nkya ukpine. Na lɛla biala lɛni mbo ngba na lɛkya ɛpu kemo mmɔ líkpi.
Amu na ɔtu ɔtɛdi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ntukpa ku abiɔ ƒui kemo na búnwini ubugya.
Amu na línu ka ɔtu ɔni mɔɔnu ntukpa lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Awɔ ɔni nli na élie ni, awɔ nse kedee. Ɔsika átɛ etemila amɛni ƒui na ulu siin lɛlɔ.
Bekyuli bamɛni nádu ƒula bekyuli ku kenye bediene. Anwuɔsu na éte-ma ubugya ukpidi ɔmɛni na báni. Lɛla lɛni námanku-ma na baaƒɔ́!”
Amu na línu lɛdi lɛni nási Katɔti lɛbi lɛmmɔ kudɔ ka lɛ́su lɛnini, “Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui, ƒula litemi bɔtɛ buse siin, na ƒula etemila adi litemi geen.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔtu unedi úwilimi nwuna kalaku úwi ɔƒɛ lɛlɔ na béte kuƒi ka nwuna ogya ɔkyula bekyuli.

Na bekyuli bákywi ɔ́si ogya liwulu kpakplaa lɛmmɔ ɔsu. Na béwida Katɔti lɛnyi, ɔsika nwuna ɔyikun ɔsu na lɛbibo lɛmɛni líbo-ma lɛlɔ. Nsu ɔmɛni kama ƒui ni, bétenwini kama bátakya bana ekpidi na bemwi Katɔti.
Amu na ɔtu ɔlɔndi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku lɛlɔ. Na kalɔ kani lɛlɔ na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ɔɔdi lɛga ƒui kábla suu kɔnakunwi! Na bekyuli baadu anyi na lɛbibo ɔsu.
Na bekyuli bammɔ béwida Katɔti, ɔsika bana alɛbi áya na beenú ɔlɛ geen! Nsu bátada bana alaekpidi bɔbla bátaya.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔtu ɔkundi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi Euƒrate ketu kebendi kammɔ kemo. Na ketu kammɔ kákwi kalɛ na baga bani nási ɔƒɛ katukɔ bakɛ kavinkɔ.
Amu na lɛ́nu ayu ekpidi atɛ ani nálɛ aani bapɔtɔlɔ ka bási baalɛ́ liƒu kɔlakpi kɔmmɔ kenye ku eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye ku eƒiebuo unyɔdi ɔni baalɔ ɔkɔ kenye udiene kenye kemo.

Ayu ammɔ ndi ukisine ayu ekpidi ani muudie akɔla taatina. Na ayu atɛ amɛni muusié kayawi baga ƒui kudɔ kalɛ na basala lɛlɔ na bekpo Katɔti bekyuli na Katɔti ɔni ndi Ɔyikune Ƒui limeyi linengudi lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ.

“Binu! Ami Yesu ndubo bɔda bɔlɛ-mii lɛlɔ kɔnakunwi aani uyune kalɛ! Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni nnye kagyumana na ɔda adala ani mɔɔtina ka use siin uwi biala kemo, kalɛ na ulakɛ kasɔngya ku kɔƒa na kadi akɔ!”
Amu na ayu ekpidi ammɔ ásala baga bammɔ na likpo lɛni baalɔ na Hebri kemo bani Armagedon.
Amu na Katɔti ɔtu maatɛdi úwilimi lɛla lɛni nkya nwuna kalaku kemo úwi kayaa. Na lɛdi bonwu lɛdi lɛ́ku lɛ́si lɛgaboku kudɔ na Katɔti kakpakɔ mmɔ, na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Ɔ́sa!”
Na kayaa kábwɛ ogya ku kɔku bonwu, na katɔ keedu taasia kama! Na kalɔ kaakunku ɔni na kalɔ bɔkunku bɔmmɔ udu bútalɛ kudii ɔ́si uwi ɔni na Katɔti údie ukyuli!
