Na ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ ɔ́bwɛ úle akpa atɛ, na lɛma linengudi lɛkladi lɛni nkya kayawi ekpo ƒui lɛ́bwɛ ƒui. Mmɔ ni, Katɔti únyimo Babilon ɔma unengudi ɔmmɔ ekpidi na ɔ́ya na ɔ́ni nwuna kɔnyi lɛbibo ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmmɔ ƒui.
Na ntuntɛ kɔlɔ ku abi ani ƒui nkya ni, áyii ákya.
Etubanke bonwu adi aani atakpɛ áyu ási kayaa ábaƒiɛmi bekyuli, na béwida Katɔti ɔ́si ɔgbankpi ɔmɛni ɔsu.

Amu na batu maatɛ bani nda kɔlaku kɔmmɔ kemo unwi úbo-mi kudɔ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bo, na lɛtina-a kalɛ na badubo ɔyalɛ ɔni náƒɔ lɛnyi mmɔ kɔtu bɔni. Anwu ndi ɔma unengudi ɔni na bátu bényene ntukpa pii kudɔ.
Na kayawi baga bákya béteesie teesie ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo aani kalɛ na banana beesié ɔyalɛ kudɔ. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ekpidi bɔbla bɔ́ƒɔ kayawi bekyuli lɛlɔ kemo aani kalɛ na baaní ntɛ teekpi.”

Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kpanku-mi úsienku ketele kemo na kɔyu kemo. Mmɔ na lɛ́nu uleku ɔdi ka ulie eƒiebuo ugyiedi lɛlɔ. Na bénweni anyikpi ani muudumi Katɔti ƒui básia eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ. Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ mbo eli maatɛ ku ese leevu.

Uleku ɔmmɔ unyimi adi atondi ku egyiedi na úti sika ugyiedi ku asɛɛ ku aseebi ɔ́klibi lɛlɔ. Na ɔda sika ugyiedi ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔdi ɔni kemo na ala ani na Katɔti ukisi na eesé lɛlɔ éyi tɛtɛɛtɛ ɔkɛnku nwuna lɛyalɛ ala bɔbla ɔsu.
Na nwuna lɛtɛntɛ ni, bénweni lɛsugba lɛnyi lɛdi básia. Babilon, ɔma unengudi. Bayalɛ ƒui uni ku ekisila ƒui uni.
Amu na lɛ́nu ka uleku ɔmmɔ úkpi ntɛ na Katɔti bekyuli bani ubugya na ɔ́ni ku bani na ɔ́du ɔsika benye Yesu kama kpakplaa ɔsu. Uwi ɔni na lɛ́nu-nwu ni, ɔ́bla-mi kalɛ kadi.

Amu na ɔtu ɔmmɔ úye-mi ɔnini, “Bi ɔsu na ɔ́bla-a kalɛ kadi? Ndubudie lɛsugba lɛmɛni kalɔ lite-ɔ. Lɛkɛnku uleku ɔmmɔ ku eƒiebuo ɔni lɛlɔ na uleku ɔmmɔ ulie mmɔ lɛlɔ. Na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ mbo eli maatɛ, na ese leevu alɛ eli ammɔ lɛlɔ.

Eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ni, úlie ngba dii, nsu ɔsɔ uuubo. Na ɔdubo bɔlɛ bɔsi kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu ɔmmɔ kemo, na usie na Katɔti ɔyila-nwu udu ƒui. Na bekyuli bani nli kayawi lɛlɔ na bétenweni-ma anyi bátakya ngba ɔku kemo asa na Katɔti údie kayawi ni, ɔdubo-ma bɔbla kalɛ kadi si banu eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ. Ɔsika úlie ngba dii, nsu ɔsɔ uuubo, na ɔsɔ ɔdubo bɔda bɔlɛ.
“Asa na ukyuli wenu lɛsugba lɛmɛni kalɔ ni, amu ntu ubo lɛnunda. Eƒiebuo eli maatɛ ku uleku ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ benye bete ɔma ɔni bátu bálɛ abi maatɛ lɛlɔ. Na eli ammɔ lɛnɔ enye ete baga maatɛ badi.
Baga ɛlɔ bádi lɛga bávi, na unwi ɔmua ɔɔdi lɛga, na ɔkladi anwu útadi tɔ lɛga. Nsu si úbo ni, ɔdubo lɛga bɔdi uwi klukui ɔdi kani.
Eƒiebuo ɔni nélie ngba dii nsu ɔsɔ uuubo mmɔ ni, anwu ɔdi ɔga maanedi. Na nwuna udu use aani baga maatɛ bammɔ kalɛ, na usie na Katɔti ɔyila-nwu udu ƒui.
“Na ese leevu ani na ánu mmɔ ni, adi baga leevu bani nétese tɔ kalɔ ku lɛga bɔdi. Nsu badubo-ma kuƒi bute uwi klukui na badi lɛga ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ.
Baga leevu bamɛni ƒui bada kasusu kenwi, na beeti bana ɔyikun ku kenyekɔ teete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ.
Na badubɔta na bekpoku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ. Nsu Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ku nwuna bekyuli baƒunadi ku nwuna baƒɔtaadine geen badubo-ma lɛlɔ bɔdi. Ɔsika anwu ndi Blɔti ɔni ndi Bati Ƒui Ɔti ku Baga Ƒui Ɔga.”
Amu na ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ntukpa bɔni kudɔ na ánu ka ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ ulie ni, anya nnye nte kalɔ ƒui bekyuli ku bani nkya kaba ku kadi ku kalɔ ku adi ƒui kemo.

Ese leevu ani nnye nte baga bani na ánu ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ni, badubukisi ɔyalɛ ɔmmɔ. Na badubo ala ani nse-nwu ƒui bɔƒɔ bɔsiku-nwu kudɔ na ɔsɔ ɔkɛ utaavi kasɔngya. Badubo-nwu lɛna bɔkun na bakyula lɛni nébu.

Ɔsika Katɔti úti ɔ́kya-ma kayi kemo kalɛ babla lɛla lɛni na anwu Katɔti ɔɔwia. Na bénu lɛlɔ kalɔ ka beti bana ɔyikun bete eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ na ɔdi lɛga uti utédu ka Katɔti etemila ani na ɔ́su úse ébo-nwu kemo lɛni.
Uleku ɔni na ánu mmɔ ni, anwu unye ute ɔma unengudi ɔni mbo ɔyikun na kayawi baga ƒui lɛlɔ.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́si katɔ mmɔ ɔɔyu ɔdubo kalɔ. Na ubo kenyekɔ geen, na nwuna bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ ƒui.
Amu na ɔ́va ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Úbuli o-o! Babilon ɔni náƒɔ lɛnyi geen mmɔ úbuli! Na ɔ́ta únwini ayu ekpidi ƒui kabɛkɔ. Mmɔ na ayu ekpidi ku begbini ku baasɛ bani muusé lɛlɔ ƒui bakya.

Ɔsika Kayawi bekyuli ƒui báni ɔma ɔmmɔ alaekpidi bɔbla békpi aani ntɛ. Na ɔ́tɔlɔ-ma aani kalɛ na ɔyalɛ ɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli taatákya likpidi kemo. Kalɔ lɛlɔ baga ƒui beesié ɔma ɔmmɔ teebo aani kalɛ na banana beesié ɔyalɛ kudɔ. Na kalɔ ƒui beyedine benengudi bénwini balakɛne ɔkɛnku bana liyedi na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔni néyi ku akɛla ani ndanku adikpi bɔdi.”
Na línu lɛdi bamba ka lɛ́si katɔ mmɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Mina bekyuli, bɛvi bɛlɛ ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo kalɛ na bilabla ekpidi ani na ɔɔbla, na ɔgbankpi ɔni mebo nwuna bekyuli lɛlɔ ulebo amii lɛnɔ lɛlɔ!
Ɔsika ɔma ɔmmɔ ekpidi éemomo na ákuku étédu katɔ, na Katɔti únyimo udunkpi ala ani ƒui na nwuna bekyuli bábla.

Amii Katɔti batu ni, bɛƒɔ-ma kayu na lɛla lɛni na bábla Katɔti kenye. Na bɛƒɔ-ma kayu kammɔ akpa anyɔ na bana ablala kenye. Ala ani na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔ́sala aani ɔdu ala na ɔɔƒɛɛ kemo úte bekyuli na báni ni, bɛsala ɔdu ɔmmɔ akpa anyɔ na ɔɔƒɛɛ ɔmmɔ kani kemo na bite nwuna bekyuli na bani!

Na kalɛ na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɔliku lɛlɔ katɔ na nwuna adikpi bɔdi akɛla kenye ni, bɛya na ubo abi na uwulo utédu ekpidi ammɔ kenye. Ɔsika ɔma ɔmmɔ use aani uleku ɔni násu na nwuna kayi kemo ɔnini, 'Uleku Ɔga na ndi, na nlie mina lɛgaboku lɛlɔ. Lɛɛɛdi ukpinele, na lɛɛɛdubo kɔnyana kɔdi lɛnɔ buwulo kudii!'
Anwuɔsu ɔgbankpi ɔdubuƒie-nwu ɔva limeyi linwi. Na ɔdubuduo ɔlɛ ku kɔnyana buwulo ku kɔka lɛnɔ kemo. Na ogya ɔdubo-nwu bɔkyula, ɔsika Katɔti úbomo na anwu ndubɔtɛku-nwu litemi.”

“Na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga bani muusié ɔma ɔmmɔ teebo taabla ekpidi na békeli basiaku adikpi bɔdi akɛla kama na mmɔ ni, badubo keku ku kɔnyana buwulo na ɔma ɔmmɔ lili si bánu uyɔ ka ɔɔkɔ́ katɔ uwi ɔni na ɔɔkywí.

Baga bamɛni badubunye ɔgyu kakaaka bataanu ala amɛni, ɔsika baayia ka ɔma ɔmmɔ lɛbibo lɛmmɔ udu lɛdububo-ma lɛlɔ. Na badubɔsu banini, 'Bɔbwɛ! Bɔbwɛ! Ɔma ɔni mbo ɔyikun! Babilon, ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ! Ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani ƒula kɔtu bɔni kɔ́da kɔ́lɛ-ɔ lɛlɔ!'
“Mmɔ ni, kalɔ ƒui beyedine benengudi béwulo keku ku kɔnyana, ɔsika basɔ beeebo ukyuli ɔni meye-ma ala.

Ka ala beyene basɔ beeebo ɔsu ni, bana sika ugyiedi ku ɔƒualadi ku aseebi ku asɛɛ ani náƒɔ kuye ébo kalɔ. Na bana adi abuni egyiedi ku aƒualadi ku ana lidu ébo kalɔ. Na egyii ani muunwenyi ƒɛƒɛɛ ku ala ani ƒui na béti ɔtunkpɛ bábla lɛnɔ ébo kalɔ. Lɛni kani na use ute ala ani na bábla ku egyii ani náƒɔ kuye ku abuala ani muukeye ku ani neeekeye ku atabi ani náƒɔ kuye lɛnɔ.

Na evete ani muudie inɔmii ƒɛƒɛɛ ku kutu akyala lidu lidu ku klobo ku oloƒui ku ugyulo ƒɛƒɛɛ lɛnɔ kuye kúbo kalɔ. Ntɛ ku inɔ ku ɔlaaƒɔ ku edula ebi lɛnɔ ébo kalɔ. Na balakɛ bekyuli bani na beye bana ɔmantɛ bakɔ ku baƒonu ku bapɔnkɔ ku kɛɛkɛ ɔni na bapɔnkɔ baaní ku bekyuli bani na béƒie betéye kalɛ na badubɔbla akpala lɛnɔ ƒui.
“Na básu banini, 'Babilon! Ala abuni ani ƒui na áyɔ ka akɛ ni, anya nálɛ-ɔ enu kemo mɛni. Na ƒula ebiti akɛla ku lɛkɛ ni, áyila-nya na asɔ aaadubo-nya bɔnu kudii.'
Beyedine bani mbo eyedila ani na beeti taakɛ lɛkɛ taasiku ɔma ɔmmɔ kudɔ mɛni ni, badubunye ɔgyu kakaaka na bewulo keku ku kɔnyana momoomo banini,
'Bɔbwɛ! Bɔbwɛ! Uwi ɔdi kemo ni, ɔma bonwu ɔmmɔ úyi ku adiƒuala abuni ku adi ani nse ƒuƒuu ku egyiedi. Na báklibi ɔma ɔmmɔ ku sika ugyiedi ku aseebi ku asɛɛ ani náƒɔ kuye éyi tɛtɛɛtɛ!
Nsu ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani na akɛla amɛni ƒui ébie!' “Na lɛkɔlɔ libendi bakane ku bekyuli bani ngyi ketu lɛlɔ kabla kaduɛ ku bani ƒui mɔɔdi kuye na ntu anumi mmɔ bénye ɔgyu kakaaka.
Na báva momoomo uwi ɔni na bánu uyɔ ɔni mɔɔkɔ́ katɔ taasi ɔma bonwu ɔni mɔɔkywí mmɔ kemo banini, 'Ɔma bonwu ɔmani nsɔ nse aani ƒula kalɛ?'

Amu na béti enu béwi lili na béwulo kɔnyana geen na básu banini, 'Bɔbwɛ, bɔbwɛ na buute ɔma unengudi ɔmɛni. Kesii kani na bekyuli bani mbo lɛkɔlɔ bonwu na beesiénku-ni ntu anumi bákɛ bana lɛkɛ! Ɔdɔ bubo unwi kemo kani ni, lɛla biala líbie!
Amii bani nkya katɔ ƒui lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii. Na amii Katɔti bekyuli ƒui ku batalane ku Katɔti kenye bediene ni, lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-mii! Ɔsika Katɔti ɔ́tɛku ɔma ɔmmɔ litemi na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla-mii ɔsu!' ”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti ɔtu ɔyikune ɔdi úti lɛtabi lɛdi nse aani kukɔ bonwu kɔdi úbo ɔ́kya ɛpu kemo na ɔɔsu ɔnini, “Lɛni na Katɔti ɔdubo Babilon ɔma bonwu ɔmɛni bubo butáƒiɛmi kalɔ momoomo ɔni na basɔ balanu-nwu kudii.

Na ɔbentaa ku lɛnu bediene ku atoloyi ku kɔkpɛɛ bavwiine ni, basɔ belénu-ma kɔku kudii na ƒula kemo. Enu kabla ɔblane biala ɔ́sɔ ulabla nwuna kabla na ƒula kemo. Na basɔ belénu kukɔ kɔdi kɔku na ƒula kemo.

Na basɔ balanu asogya bukeye bɔdi na ƒula kemo kudii. Na basɔ belénu uleku buti lɛnu lɛdi lɛnɔ. Ƒula beyedine bani néteeti ala teebeye ni, bekyuli bánu-ma aani bekyuli benengudi ƒui na kalɔ lɛlɔ mɛni. Na ɔkɛnku ƒula evo ani na aaƒɛ teete bekyuli ɔsu ni, áya na kalɔ ƒui bekyuli báyii ulu.
Na Katɔti kenye bediene ku Katɔti bekyuli ku bekyuli bamba bani ƒui na bádu na kayawi mɛni ni, bana ubugya ɔsiaku-ɔ!”
Ɔmɛni kama ni, línu kɔku bonwu kɔdi na katɔ aani bekyuli lisu bonwu lɛdi. Na báva momoomo básu banini, “Aleluya! Ngba bɔƒɔ ku bukeye ku ɔyikun ɔdi Katɔti ɔmmɔ ɔdi.

Ɔsika nwuna litemi bɔtɛ buse siin. Na nwuna etemila adi litemi geen. Ɔma ɔni nébile kayawi ku nwuna alaekpidi bɔbla aani ɔyalɛ ni, Katɔti nátɛku-nwu litemi. Na Katɔti kabla bablane bani ubugya na béwi kalɔ ni, údie ɔma ɔmɛni bekyuli kasi na ubugya ɔmmɔ ɔsu.”
Básɔ báva básu banini, “Aleluya! Uyɔ ɔni mɔɔkɔ́ katɔ mɛni ni, utaakɔ lɛni usela ƒui.”
Na benengu aavlanyɔ-ine bammɔ ku ngba batu ine bammɔ báyu bébi kalɔ na bémwi Katɔti ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ banini, “Ɔsia lɛni! Aleluya!”
Na lɛdi lɛdi lɛ́si lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ mmɔ na lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Bimwi bula Katɔti amii nwuna kabla bablane bani mɔɔyia-nwu, benengu ku banamu ƒui.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, línu kɔku bonwu aani bekyuli lisu lɛdi na ɔ́lɛ aani ntukpa pii bɔku ku katɔ budu taasia kama. Na baasu banini, “Aleluya! Ɔsika Blɔti ɔni mbo ɔyikun ƒui ni, bédie nwuna lɛga bɔdi keyi!

Bɛya na bula ƒui bɔkɛ ebiti na lɛlɔ lɛyɔ-bu na bɔkɔliku-nwu lɛnyi katɔ. Ɔsika Katɔti Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ limeyi libendi lɛmmɔ lídu aani kalɛ na beeti uleku. Na Katɔti bekyuli báaklibi lɛlɔ bése aani uleku ɔmmɔ kalɛ.
Blɔti úte-ma kɔdi kɔbuni kɔni muukeye sɛɛn ka beti benyimi.” Na kɔdi kɔbuni kɔmmɔ ndi ala siin ani na Katɔti bekyuli bammɔ bábla.
Mmɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ala amɛni. Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ama bani na badubɔlɔ beboku uleku ketikɔ adila kadikɔ.” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Etemila amɛni adi Katɔti ɔlati etemila geen.”

Mmɔ ni, lɛ́yu líbi kalɔ na nwuna lɛgba akɔ na límwi-nwu aani Katɔti kalɛ. Nsu ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Tabla lɛni! Ami lɛnɔ kabla ɔblane ɔkpana na ndi aani ƒula kalɛ ku ƒula banwa bakladi bani nsiaku Blɔti Yesu ala bɔtina kama. Katɔti kani na ɔlɛka emwi lɛni. Ɔsika ala ani na Yesu ɔ́tina ni, ana kenye budie ndi Kɔyu ɔyikun ɔni nákya Katɔti kenye bediene lɛlɔ kemo.”
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu ka kayaa kálɛmi na ɔpɔnkɔ ɔƒualadi ɔdi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ. Na ukyuli ɔni nlie-nwu lɛlɔ ni, baalɔ-nwu banii Kama Kekpokɔ ku Litemi Geen. Na ɔɔtɛ litemi siin na uukpó kekpo lɛnɔ siin.
Nwuna anumi ese aani ogya na kɔgabwa pii kubi-nwu lili. Na bénweni lɛnyi lɛdi básia-nwu lɛlɔ lɛni na ukyuli ɔdi ɔɔɔgyi ntu anwu kani.
Na ɔkya awu gyɔlɔɔ ɔni na báka bɔnyina bɔkya ubugya kemo. Na lɛnyi lɛni kani na bagyi-nwu ndi Katɔti Litemi.
Na katɔ bekpone ƒui bakya lɛwu lɛbuni lɛƒualadi lɛni nse sɛɛn, na belie bapɔnkɔ baƒualadi lɛlɔ na basiaku ukyuli ɔmmɔ kama.

Na litemi geen lɛni nse aani kewii kani bádɔ-ka lɛvi inyɔ lɛɛlɛ́-nwu kenye kani na ɔdubuti ukpo kalɔ ƒui bekyuli, na uti nwuna ɔyikun utaadi-ma lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubɔni-ma kɔtu kpakplaa ku Katɔti Ɔyikune Ƒui kɔnyi geen aani kalɛ na baaka ntu teedie ebi kemo kpakplaa na ntɛ kablakɔ.
Na bénweni lɛnyi lɛdi básia nwuna awu lɛlɔ ku nwuna libuili kakɛ banii BAGA ƑUI ƆGA KU BATI ƑUI ƆTI.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu Katɔti ɔtu ɔdi ka unye ɔƒɛ kemo na ɔ́kpali baasɛ bani ƒui muuveyi taavi kaya ku lɛdi momoomo ɔnini, “Bibo bibasala na bɛdi Katɔti adila enengudi ani na ɔ́klibi úse-mii.

Katɔti úte-mii baga ku kekpo kenye benyene ku bayikune ku bapɔnkɔ ku bekyuli bani muulie-ma lɛlɔ. Badi benengu ku banamu ku bani mɔɔbla bekyuli bamba kabla ku bani mɔɔbla ama alati kabla. Bana ɔlɔna na úti úte-mii ka bɛduli bibweli na bimo!”
Na lɛ́nu ka eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku kayawi baga ku bana bekpone ƒui básala ka betékpo Anwu ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ ɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ku nwuna bekpone.

Nsu béƒie eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku eƒiebuo ɔni néti lɛlɔ ɔ́bla ɔkɔ kenye udiene. Anwu ndi ɔni nábla akɔla budie taatina na eƒiebuo udeedi ɔmmɔ kenye, na úti akɔla budie taatina ammɔ ɔ́tɔlɔ bekyuli bani na bése likpo ku eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ likpose na bémwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ baƒiɔ. Na bekpone bammɔ béti eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku bekyuli bamɛni ƒui na bébo-ma bátákya ogya livongu lɛni nse bonwu aani ɛpu kalɛ, na ɔɔda ku ogya atabi kemo.
Na bekyuli bakladi ni, ukyuli ɔni nlie ɔpɔnkɔ lɛlɔ na kewii katu-nwu kenye mmɔ ɔ́du-ma ku kewii kammɔ, na baasɛ bammɔ báduli-ma ɔlɔna ƒui bébweli na bémo.

Amu na lɛ́nu ɔtu ɔdi ka ɔ́si katɔ ɔɔyu na ɔda kɔgba bonwu na ubo ɔyikun ɔni na uuti taabala kasuudikɔ ubu bonwu mmɔ kenye. Na úƒie liƒu kɔlakpi kɔni ndi kɔlakpi kɔkukudi kɔni baalɔ ukisine iye Satan.
Na únyimi-ku úse akwa apimu unwi.

Na úbo-nwu útákya kasuudikɔ ubu ɔmmɔ kemo, na ɔ́kalɛ na ɔ́bala ubu ɔmmɔ kenye kalɛ na ɔ́sɔ ulátɔlɔ kadi bekyuli wetédu uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ɔmmɔ webo kawɔlɔkɔ. Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔlɛka baƒɛnimi-nwu kɔgba kɔmmɔ uwi klukui ɔdi.

Na ɔmɛni kama ni, lɛ́nu agaboku adi. Na bekyuli bani na Katɔti úte ɔyikun ka batɛku bekyuli litemi ni, belie-nya lɛlɔ. Na lɛ́nu bekyuli babambadi ayu. Ama ndi bani nédie Blɔti Yesu kenye na básu Katɔti litemi. Anwuɔsu kayawi bekyuli békulo-ma eli. Ama ndi bani nétemwi eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ iye eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ baƒiɔ bani bése béte lɛlɔ ka bataakpa. Na bátasia-ma nwuna likpose lɛdi na bana atɛntɛ iye enu lɛlɔ. Bekyuli bamɛni básɔ báta bébelie ngba na bádiku Kristo lɛga akwa apimu unwi.
Na ɔmɛni ndi bekpine bɔgyila kudeedi. Bekpine bakladi ama bátata bátalɛ kekpine útédu uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ammɔ ása.

Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli kedee bani na Katɔti ɔdubɔgyila na bekpine bɔgyila kudeedi kemo. Na bekyuli bammɔ ni, kukpi kunyɔdi kɔ́sɔ kulákɛ ɔyikun na bana lɛlɔ. Mmomu badubo bakpane bunwini na bataakpanku bekyuli teete Katɔti ku Kristo. Na badubɔdiku-nwu lɛga akwa apimu unwi.
Na si uwi ɔni na akwa apimu unwi ammɔ ása ni, badubo Satan budie bɔsiku nwuna kasuudikɔ kakyakɔ mmɔ.
Na ɔdubo ubatɔlɔ kalɔ lɛlɔ bekyuli bani nkya kayawi ekpo ƒui, na baalɔ-ma na lɛsugba kemo banii Gog ku Magog. Na ɔdubɔsala-ma kalɛ na betékpo. Na bana bumomo bɔdubɔbla aani ɛpu kɔnwinimi.
Otogyi ɔmɛni ɔkɛ ɔɔví kalɔ kammɔ ƒui lɛlɔ. Na úbo úbaka ɔ́mana ɔma ɔni na Katɔti ɔɔyɔ́ na nwuna bekyuli kedee belie-nwu kemo mmɔ. Nsu ogya ɔ́si katɔ na úbo úbakyula-ma ƒui.

Na bébo ukisine ɔni nátɔlɔ-ma mmɔ bátákya lɛgyavonku bonwu lɛni mɔɔda ku ogya atabi mmɔ kemo kesii kani na eƒiebuo ɔmmɔ ku ɔkɔ kenye udiene bakya, na badubo abi buteebo usien ku ɔƒɛ usela uwi ƒui.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu lɛgaboku bonwu ƒuala ƒuala lɛdi ka Katɔti ulie-ni lɛlɔ. Na ka ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ ni, kalɔ ku katɔ ƒui káyii na asɔ alánu-ka lɛla lɛdi na kesii kadi.

Na lɛ́nu ka bekpine ƒui benye lɛgaboku lɛmɛni anumi, banamu ku benengu, na bébimi lɛku lɛdi béwi. Na básɔ bébimi ɔku ɔbambadi ɔni ndi ngba ɔku lɛnɔ béwi. Na lɛku lɛmɛni kemo na baanu taatɛku bekpine ƒui litemi ɔkɛnku ala ani na bábla na bénweni bákya lɛku lɛmmɔ kemo lɛlɔ.
Bekyuli bani ƒui nékpi ɛpu kemo bási bálɛ. Na bekpine ƒui lɛnɔ báta bálɛ kekpine ku kɔƒiɔtɔ kemo. Na Katɔti ɔ́tɛku ɔdi biala litemi ɔkɛnku ala ani na ɔ́bla lɛlɔ.
Béti kukpi ku kekpine kammɔ ƒui bébo bátákya lɛgyavonku kemo. Na ɔmɛni ndi kukpi kunyɔdi.
Na ukyuli ɔni na bétenweni-nwu lɛnyi bátakya ngba ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ni, béti-nwu bébo bákya lɛgyavonku lɛmmɔ kemo.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, lɛ́nu katɔ ku kalɔ kawɔdi. Ɔsika katɔ ku kalɔ kedeedi aka káyii, na ɛpu lɛnɔ ɔsɔ uuubo.
Na lɛ́nu ɔma kedee ɔni ndi Yerusalem ɔwɔdi ka ɔ́yu ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ na kayaa ɔdubo. Na báklibi-nwu aani kalɛ na baaklibi uleku ɔni béti beete ɔgyani.

Na línu lɛdi bonwu lɛdi ɔ́si lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ kudɔ ka lɛɛsu lɛnini, “Bɛnu! Katɔti keliekɔ káyu kébo bekyuli akɔ. Ɔdubulie-ma kudɔ na ama benwini-nwu bekyuli. Na Katɔti ɔlati ɔkya-ma akɔ na ɔdi-ma Kɔti.
Na ɔdubuni-ma imii biala na bana anumi. Na kukpi kɔsɔ kulakya lɛnɔ. Na keku ku kɔnyana buwulo ku ɔlɛ bunu lɛnɔ bɔdi bɔsɔ bulakya, ɔsika ala akukudi ƒui ávi.”

Amu na anwu ɔni nlie lɛgaboku lɛmmɔ lɛlɔ ɔ́su ɔnini, “Bɛnu! Lɛ́sɔku ala ƒui lɛ́bla ɔwɔdi.” Na ɔ́sɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Nweni ala amɛni se, ɔsika adi etemila ani ndi ukyuli kama kekpokɔ, na adi etemila geen.”
Na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Ɔ́sa! Ami ndi Alƒa ku Omega ɔni ndi lɛla biala kalɔ kesekɔ ku kawɔlɔkɔ. Na bani na utukwɛ ɔɔda ni, ndubute-ma ntu ƒaa na bani basiku libiɔ lɛni muute ngba ƒui kemo.
Ukyuli ɔni madi ekpidi lɛlɔ ni, ɔdubɔkɛ kadikɔ kamɛni. Na ami lɛdi-nwu Kɔti, na anwu wadi mina ubi.

Nsu bekyuli bani mbo liƒu ku bani nátaƒɔ bátadi ku bani muusé lɛlɔ ku bekyuli badune ku bayalɛ ku evo baƒɛne ku bani mɔɔkpá baƒiɔ ku ɔkɔ banyine ku bana udu ƒui ni, badubuduo lɛgyavonku lɛni mɔɔda ku ogya atabi mmɔ kemo. Na ɔmmɔ madi kukpi kunyɔdi kɔmmɔ.”

Ɔmmɔ kama ni, Katɔti batu maatɛ bani náda kɔlaku maatɛ kɔni néyi ku lɛbibo kpakplaa maatɛ mmɔ akɔ unwi ɔ́da ɔ́lɛ na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Bo, na ndubɔtina-a Katɔti bekyuli bani nse aani Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ uleku ɔni na ɔdubo buti mmɔ.”
Na útiku-mi na kɔyu kemo ɔ́tɔlɔku úsienku kɔbi bonwu kɔni nákuku lili. Na ɔ́tina-mi Yerusalem ɔma unengudi kedee ɔni náyu ɔ́si Katɔti kudɔ na kayaa ɔdubo.
Na Katɔti bukeye bɔ́ƒɔ-nwu lɛlɔ ƒui. Na uukeye aani liseebi lɛni náƒɔ kuye geen na baalɔ-ni yaspa, na lise kede kede aani kanu atabi.
Bátu kowodu kangyaa kɔdi báka bámana-nwu, na bakya-ku kɔyakun leevu-inyɔ. Na Katɔti batu leevu-inyɔ benye-ku kenye. Na bénweni Israelƒuɔ kaba leevu-inyɔ bammɔ bebi anyi básia kadi biala lɛlɔ.
Na ɔƒɛ katukɔ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na katɔ kakɛ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na kada kakɛ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya. Na ɔƒɛ kanukɔ ni, kɔyakun ɛtɛ kɔkya.
Na kowodu kalɔ atabi ani bákya kowodu kɔmmɔ kalɔ ebo atabi leevu-anyɔ. Na bénweni Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ batalane anyi leevu-anyɔ básia kadi biala lɛlɔ.
Amu na ɔtu ɔni nnye mɔɔtɛmiku-mi mmɔ ni, ɔda lɛbuala lɛkɔkula lɛni béti sika ugyiedi bábla ka ɔkɔku ɔma ɔmmɔ ku kɔyakun kɔmmɔ ku awodu ammɔ.

Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔtɛ lɛƒɛnyi ine bɔmmɔ ƒui lɛlɔ ɔni na nwuna bune ku bɔbɛbɛ ƒui bɔdi unwi. Na ɔ́kɔku ɔma ɔmmɔ ku nwuna lɛkɔkula. Na ubo liluku bɔkɔku apimu unwi ku eti leevu. Na nwuna linene ku bɔbɛbɛ ku bɔkuku ƒui búlieku lɛlɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́kɔku kowodu kɔmmɔ butigbli, na kubo lɛgba eti ene ku leevu-ɛku aani kalɛ na bekyuli baakɔ́ku ala.
Yaspa aseebi bonwu ani náƒɔ kuye na béti bátu awodu ammɔ. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔlati ɔdi sika ugyiedi na use kede kede aani kanu.

Na awodu ammɔ kalɔ atabi ani lɛlɔ na bátu awodu ammɔ basia ni, bákya-nya akya ku aseebi abuni lidu lidu ani náƒɔ kuye geen. Udeedi ɔdi liseebi lɛni baalɔ yaspa, na unyɔdi baalɔ sapir. Ɔtɛdi baalɔ yalkedon, na unedi baalɔ smardo.

Ɔlɔndi baalɔ sardonik, na ɔkundi baalɔ sardis. Maatɛdi baalɔ krisolit, na maanedi baalɔ beril. Yaalenwidi baalɔ topas, na leevudi baalɔ krisopras. Leevu-unwidi baalɔ yiakint, na leevu-unyɔdi baalɔ ametist.
Kɔyakun leevu-inyɔ kɔmmɔ kɔdi aseebi leevu-anyɔ ani náƒɔ kuye geen, na ɔdi biala ɔdi liseebi libendi linwi. Na ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔblɔnu ɔdi sika ugyiedi ɔni na akana na anu avinku-nwu kemo aani kanu.
Na ńtanu kakpakɔ kadi na ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo, ɔsika Unwoti Katɔti ɔni ndi Ɔyikune Ƒui ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ alati ndi ɔma ɔmmɔ kakpakɔ.
Na ɔma ɔmmɔ uláwia ɔƒɛ ɔdi iye kɔbuli ka ute bukeye bɔdi, ɔsika Katɔti bukeye ndi-nwu bukeye, na ɔma ɔmmɔ asogya ndi Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ.
Na bukeye bɔmɛni na kadi ƒui bekyuli badubɔnu busie. Na kalɔ lɛlɔ baga badubuti bana agala beboku ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.
Na balakalɛ kɔyakun kɔmɛni kɔdubuwi uwi biala, ɔsika lɛdisa liiibo mmɔ.
Na kadi bekyuli ƒui badubuti bana akɛla ku ɔbu bebeduo mmɔ.

Nsu lɛla biala muusé lɛlɔ lileduo mmɔ kudii. Na bani ƒui mɔɔbla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ iye ala ani muukpó kɔƒa iye ala ani mɔɔtɔ́lɔ bekyuli ni, beleduo mmɔ. Mmomu bani anyi na bénweni bákya Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ ngba ɔku kemo kani ndubuduo mmɔ.
Ɔmmɔ kama ni, ɔ́tina-mi ketu kani ntu muute ngba. Ketu kammɔ kaagbá taasi Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku kudɔ. Na buukeye aani kanu.

Na ketu kammɔ kaagbá taavi ɔma ɔmmɔ ɔblɔnu ntɛ. Na kana lɛvi inyɔ bɔmmɔ lɛlɔ ni, kugyii kɔni muute ngba kunye ku kuna ebi lidu leevu-inyɔ bɔmmɔ, na kɔɔnwu ebi ammɔ kɔbuli biala. Na kugyii kɔmmɔ evete adi kuvo kɔni na beti babwi kalɔ ƒui bekyuli.
Ewida eeebo mmɔ. Mmomu Katɔti ku Koƒonu Ubi ɔmmɔ lɛgaboku lɛdubuse mmɔ na nwuna kabla bablane badubo-nwu lɛnyi buteemwi.
Badubɔnu-nwu anumi na nwuna lɛnyi lɛdubɔsia-ma atɛntɛ.
Lɛdisa lɛsɔ lilakya mmɔ. Na baláwia bukeye bɔdi taasiku asogya iye ɔƒɛ kudɔ, ɔsika Unwoti Katɔti ɔlati ndi bana bukeye na badubɔdi lɛga usela uwi ƒui.

Amu na Katɔti ɔtu ɔmmɔ ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Etemila amɛni adi ukyuli kama kekpokɔ na adi etemila geen. Na Unwoti Katɔti ɔni muuti nwuna Kɔyu teete nwuna kenye bediene ni, anwu nátala nwuna ɔtu ɔnii ubatina nwuna kabla ɔblane ala ani ndubo abalɛ na uwi klukui kemo.”
“Bɛnu! Ami Yesu ndubo uwi klukui kemo! Na lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ ukyuli ɔni mada linyese lɛmɛni etemila ani nkya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo.”
Ami Yohane ni, ami ndi ukyuli ɔni nénu na lɛ́nu ala amɛni ƒui. Na uwi ɔni na línu na lɛ́nu-nya ni, lɛ́yu líbi kalɔ na Katɔti ɔtu ɔni nédie ala amɛni ɔ́tina-mi lɛgba akɔ na límwi-nwu aani Katɔti.

Nsu ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Tabla lɛni! Ami lɛnɔ kabla ɔblane ɔkpana na ndi aani ƒula kalɛ ku ƒula banwa kenye bediene babambadi ku bakladi bani mɔɔda etemila ani nkya ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ƒui kaduɛ. Katɔti kani na ɔlɛka emwi lɛni!”
Amu na ɔ́su-mi ɔnini, “Teti kenye kani na Katɔti údie na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo etemila tabɛla, ɔsika uwi ɔmmɔ úude.

Ukyuli ɔni na likpidi na ɔɔyɔ́ ka utaabla ni, usie anumi utaabla likpidi. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔyɔ́ ka utaabla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ ni, usie anumi utaabla ala ani muusé lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni mɔɔbla ala siin ni, usie anumi utaabla ala ulu lɛlɔ. Na ukyuli ɔni nse kedee ni, usie anumi na ɔda lɛlɔ kedee.”
“Bɛnu! Ami Yesu ndubo uwi klukui! Na ndanku lɛyuƒɔla lɛni námanku kabla biala nduboku, na mbaƒɔ ɔdi biala kayu na lɛla lɛni na ɔ́bla kenye.
Ami ndi Alƒa ku Omega, Udeedi ku Ukplodi, Kalɔ Kesekɔ ku Kawɔlɔkɔ.
“Lɛlɔ lɛdubɔyɔ bekyuli bani náklibi lɛlɔ bése aani kalɛ na baaƒɔ lɛwu sɛɛn. Ama ndubɔkɛ kuƒi ka badi kugyii kɔni muute ngba mmɔ ebi. Na badubɔsia kayakun mmɔ beduo Katɔ Ɔga Ɔma ɔmmɔ kemo.

Na bani ndubunye ɔba kama aani bakpɛwe ni, ama ndi bekyuli bani mɔɔƒɛ evo ku bani mɔɔbla lɛyalɛ ala ku bani mɔɔdú bekyuli ku bani mɔɔkpá baƒiɔ ku bekyuli bani ƒui mɔɔyɔ́ ka batɔlɔ bekyuli na ɔkɔ bɔnyi bɔɔda-ma ɔkwɛ.

“Ami Yesu nátala mina ɔtu lɛ́kya-a nnii ubedie ala amɛni kenye ute awɔ, Yohane, kalɛ na eti asu baƒɔtaadine akpa ammɔ ƒui. Ami ndi Kugyii Ugyiitu ɔmmɔ ɔni ndi Ɔga Dawid kaba kemo ubi. Ami ndi ɔtanta lɛyabi lɛni muukeye mmɔ.”

Katɔti Kɔyu kɔmmɔ ku Yesu bayɔne banii, “Bo!” Na ɔlɛka ukyuli biala ɔni muunú ɔmɛni lɛnɔ ɔsu ɔnii, “Bo!” Na bani ƒui na utukwɛ ɔɔda ni, bebo. Na bani ƒui mɔɔyɔ́ ni, babani ngba ntu bɔmmɔ ƒaa. Kayu kadi taƒɔ taƒɔ.

Mɔɔlɛ ukyuli biala ɔni muunú kenye kani na Katɔti údie na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ka si úti lɛla lɛdi úbunku ala amɛni lɛlɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubɔya na ɔgbankpi ɔni lɛlɔ kɔtɛ na bɔ́tɛmi na ɔku ɔmɛni kemo ubo-nwu lɛlɔ.
Na si lɛla lɛdi na ɔ́da údie na kenye budie ɔku ɔmɛni kemo lɛnɔ ni, Katɔti ɔdubudie ukyuli ɔmmɔ kadikɔ na ngba kugyii kɔmmɔ ebi lɛlɔ. Na ɔdubutile-nwu kuƒi ka uduo ɔma kedee ɔmmɔ kemo na katɔ.
Yesu ɔni muudie ala amɛni kenye ni, ɔ́su ɔnini, “Ɛɛn, ndubo na uwi klukui kemo!” Amu na ami lɛnɔ lɛ́tuna nnii, “Ɔsia lɛni. O Blɔti Yesu, bo!”
Muuvele nnii lɛƒɔndia lɛni nási Blɔti Yesu kudɔ lɛsiaku Katɔti bekyuli. Ɔsia lɛni.
